atk-s0201a0:74_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye,

atk-s0201a0:74_5: Tattha tathā idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-s0201a0:74_6: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.

atk-s0201a0:75_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.

atk-s0201a0:100_6: Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0201a0:100_8: Khoti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇe ādikālatthe vā nipāto.

atk-s0201a0:101_5: Bhikkhavoti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena vacanena te attano mukhābhimukhe karoti.

atk-s0201a0:101_7: Teneva ca sambodhanaṭṭhena sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārepi ne niyojeti.
atk-s0201a0:102_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce.
atk-s0201a0:102_5: anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca. Āsannā,
atk-s0201a0:102_11: Visesato ca ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāya ayaṃ desanātipi te eva āmantesi.

atk-s0201a0:103_4: Bhikkhū hi aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti,

atk-s0201a0:103_8: Tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ āmantetvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:104_2: apicettha bhikkhavoti vadamāno bhagavā te bhikkhū ālapati.
atk-s0201a0:104_10: abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu sampaṭicchiṃsu paṭiggahesunti attho.
atk-s0201a0:104_11: Bhagavā etadavocāti bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a0:105_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā sukhāvataraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:105_9: suppatiṭṭhitavisāladvārabāhaṃ mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa
atk-s0201a0:107_0: Idāni “sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0201a0:107_1: Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:107_3: Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti.
atk-s0201a0:108_0: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:109_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā,
atk-s0201a0:109_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0201a0:110_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā nāgā supaṇṇā gandhabbā asurā yakkhā mahārājāno
atk-s0201a0:110_1: tāvatiṃsādayo devā mahābrahmāti evamādayo “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgā”ti, bhante, vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:110_5: “Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0201a0:110_6: Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni.
atk-s0201a0:111_0: Yāni panetāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni.
atk-s0201a0:111_2: dhammadāyādaṃ cūḷasīhanādaṃ candūpamaṃ puttamaṃsūpamaṃ dārukkhandhūpamaṃ aggikkhandhūpamaṃ pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṃ pāricchattakūpamanti evamādīni.
atk-s0201a0:112_0: Evamimesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0201a0:112_4: Pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū aparabhāge bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0201a0:112_5: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0201a0:112_6: pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ “yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā katheti,
atk-s0201a0:112_8: bhagavā hi tīṇi liṅgāni cattāri padāni satta vibhattiyo muñcitvā na kiñci katheti,
atk-s0201a0:112_9: evaṃ kathite ca amhākaṃ gaṇṭhipadaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:112_10: Te bhagavati agāravā hutvā tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato upaṭṭhānampi dhammassavanampi abhiṇhaṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:112_11: Bhagavā tesaṃ taṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā “abhabbā ime imaṃ mānakhilaṃ anupahacca maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā sacchikātu”nti
atk-s0201a0:112_12: tesaṃ sutapariyattiṃ nissāya uppannaṃ mānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo bhagavā mānabhañjanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:113_5: “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ sabbā vedanā aniccā sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu dhammesū”ti. Dhamma-
atk-s0201a0:113_6: saddo panāyaṃ pariyatti- sacca- samādhi- paññā- pakati-
atk-s0201a0:113_10: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu hi dhammasaddo pariyattiyaṃ vattati.
atk-s0201a0:115_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:117_3: “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādīsu suññatāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:117_6: “Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyye.
atk-s0201a0:118_2: yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu kāraṇe.
atk-s0201a0:118_6: Tasmā “sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ asādhāraṇahetusaññitaṃ kāraṇanti vā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0201a0:118_7: dhammānaṃ kāraṇadesananti vā evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:118_10: Sakkāyapariyāpannā pana tebhūmakā dhammāva anavasesato veditabbā,
atk-s0201a0:120_6: Taṃ suṇāthāti tamatthaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ taṃ desanaṃ mayā vuccamānaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0201a0:120_7: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:120_10: saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane dissati. “Sādhu,
atk-s0201a0:120_11: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane. “Sādhu,
atk-s0201a0:123_3: Idhāpi ayaṃ ettheva daḷhīkamme ca āṇattiyañca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:123_5: Daḷhīkaraṇatthena hi daḷhamimaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātha suggahitaṃ gaṇhantā.
atk-s0201a0:123_7: Sundaratthena sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāthāti evaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:124_2: avikkhittacittā hutvā nisāmetha citte karothāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:124_4: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:124_13: Sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi yojetvā yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro desanāgambhīro ca,
atk-s0201a0:124_16: tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:125_1: “Taṃ suṇāthā”ti ettha paṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ na saṃkhittatova desessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:125_2: apica kho vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:128_0: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātā hutvā evaṃ bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:128_2: Atha nesaṃ bhagavā etadavoca etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ idha bhikkhavotiādikaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a0:128_4: Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:130_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:131_4: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:132_1: Bhikkhaveti yathāpaṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ puna bhikkhū ālapati.
atk-s0201a0:132_5: Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti.
atk-s0201a0:132_6: Yassa hi khandhadhātuāyatanasaccapaccayākārasatipaṭṭhānādīsu uggahaparipucchāvinicchayarahitattā maññanāpaṭisedhako neva āgamo,
atk-s0201a0:132_7: paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā neva adhigamo atthi.
atk-s0201a0:132_8: So āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti. Svāyaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:135_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:135_9: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā lagitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0201a0:135_10: puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvuṭā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanāti.
atk-s0201a0:135_11: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā.
atk-s0201a0:138_5: sadevakena ca lokena araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti,
atk-s0201a0:138_10: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca “sappurisā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:138_11: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā.
atk-s0201a0:138_13: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca,
atk-s0201a0:143_0: Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotīti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto,
atk-s0201a0:143_5: So ca cakkhunā adassāvī ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho,
atk-s0201a0:143_7: Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi adiṭṭhāva honti.
atk-s0201a0:144_1: cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a0:144_2: caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi “ariyā nāma, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:144_4: Thero āha “idhekacco mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā sahacarantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:144_10: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0201a0:144_13: Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto ariyādhigatañca dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a0:144_14: anadhigacchanto ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā “ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:145_0: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti ettha pana –
atk-s0201a0:148_1: Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati.
atk-s0201a0:148_2: Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho.
atk-s0201a0:148_3: Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgapahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ samucchedapahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānaṃ nissaraṇapahānanti pañcavidho.
atk-s0201a0:149_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a0:149_1: “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a0:154_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato “saṃvaro”,
atk-s0201a0:154_5: Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:155_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa,
atk-s0201a0:155_1: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:156_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:157_0: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0201a0:157_1: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:157_5: Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ etaṃ nissaraṇapahānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:157_6: Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:157_9: Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:158_1: bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā pahātabbassa ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi,
atk-s0201a0:158_2: tasmā abhāvato tassa ayaṃ avinītoti vuccatīti.
atk-s0201a0:158_3: Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthapi.
atk-s0201a0:158_19: ariyavinayeti vā sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekatthe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:159_4: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti evaṃ puthujjanaṃ niddisīti?
atk-s0201a0:159_9: puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanāti dhammapuggalavaseneva tāva catubbidhā desanā.
atk-s0201a0:160_4: Sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā. Imā kho,
atk-s0201a0:160_6: tisso vedanā”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:160_7: “Cha dhātuyo ayaṃ putiso cha phassāyatano aṭṭhārasa manopavicāro caturādhiṭṭhāno”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā. “Tayome,
atk-s0201a0:161_1: apariññāmūlikā ca idhādhippetānaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ mūlabhūtā maññanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:161_2: tasmā puthujjanaṃ dassetvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya tamatthaṃ āvikātuṃ, “idha,
atk-s0201a0:161_4: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti evaṃ puthujjanaṃ niddisīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:164_0: Evaṃ puthujjanaṃ niddisitvā idāni tassa pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sabbasakkāyadhammajanitaṃ maññanaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a0:164_2: Tattha lakkhaṇapathavī sasambhārapathavī ārammaṇapathavī sammutipathavīti catubbidhā pathavī.
atk-s0201a0:164_5: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādīsu vuttā lakkhaṇapathavī.
atk-s0201a0:164_6: “Pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā”tiādīsu vuttā sasambhārapathavī.
atk-s0201a0:164_9: Sā hi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi saddhiṃ pathavīti sasambhārapathavī.
atk-s0201a0:164_12: Pathavīkasiṇajjhānalābhī devaloke nibbatto āgamanavasena pathavīdevatāti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0201a0:164_15: Tāsu yaṃkañci pathaviṃ ayaṃ puthujjano pathavito sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a0:164_19: Evaṃ pathavībhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva vā etaṃ “sattoti vā sattassā”ti vā ādinā nayena sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:164_22: So yaṃkiñci yena kenaci ākārena gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:164_24: Yaṃ vā parato “apariññātaṃ tassā”ti vadantena bhagavatāva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:165_0: Pathaviṃ pathavito saññatvāti so taṃ pathaviṃ evaṃ viparītasaññāya sañjānitvā,
atk-s0201a0:165_1: “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti vacanato aparabhāge thāmapattehi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcehi idha maññanānāmena vuttehi maññati kappeti vikappeti,
atk-s0201a0:165_4: Evaṃ maññato cassa tā maññanā oḷārikanayena dassetuṃ “yā ayaṃ kesā lomā”tiādinā nayena vīsatibhedā ajjhattikā pathavī vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:165_5: Yā cāyaṃ vibhaṅge “tattha katamā bāhirā pathavīdhātu?
atk-s0201a0:165_6: Yaṃ bāhiraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ kakkhaḷattaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvo bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:165_8: ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsaṃ sajjhaṃ muttā maṇi veḷuriyaṃ saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ
atk-s0201a0:165_9: tiṇaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ sakkharā kaṭhalaṃ bhūmi pāsāṇo pabbato”ti evaṃ bāhirā pathavī vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:166_0: Pathaviṃ maññatīti tīhi maññanāhi ahaṃ pathavīti maññati,
atk-s0201a0:166_4: atha vā ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati,
atk-s0201a0:166_7: Ayañhi kesādīsu chandarāgaṃ janeti kese assādeti abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Lome, nakhe, dante, tacaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:166_11: Iti lomātiādinā vā pana nayena tattha nandiṃ samannāneti.
atk-s0201a0:166_13: brahmacariyena vā evaṃ siniddhamudusukhumanīlakeso bhavissāmī”tiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhānaṃ paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati.
atk-s0201a0:167_0: Tathā attano kesādīnaṃ sampattiṃ vā vipattiṃ vā nissāya mānaṃ janeti,
atk-s0201a0:167_3: “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti āgatanayena pana kesaṃ “jīvo”ti abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a0:168_4: taṃ netaṃ mamā”ti imissā pavattiyā paccanīkanayena kesādibhedaṃ pathaviṃ etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attāti abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a0:168_6: Evaṃ tāva ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0201a0:169_0: Yathā ca ajjhattikaṃ evaṃ bāhirampi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:169_2: Ayalohādīni assādeti abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:169_3: Mama ayo mama lohantiādinā nayena ayādīni mamāyati rakkhati gopayati,
atk-s0201a0:169_5: Iti me ayalohādayo siyuṃ anāgatamaddhānanti vā panettha nandiṃ samannāneti,
atk-s0201a0:169_6: imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā evaṃ sampannaayalohādiupakaraṇo bhavissāmī”ti appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati.
atk-s0201a0:170_0: Tathā attano ayalohādīnaṃ sampattiṃ vā vipattiṃ vā nissāya mānaṃ janeti “imināhaṃ seyyosmīti vā,
atk-s0201a0:170_1: sadisosmīti vā hīnosmīti vā”ti evaṃ bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:170_2: Aye jīvasaññī hutvā pana ayaṃ “jīvo”ti abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a0:171_1: Yaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, so ahaṃ. Yo ahaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:171_2: taṃ pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassatī”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayeneva nimittapathaviṃ “attā”ti abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a0:171_4: Evampi bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0201a0:171_5: Evaṃ tāva “pathaviṃ maññatī”ti ettha tissopi maññanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:172_4: parassa kiñcanaṃ palibodho pathaviyāti maññatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:173_0: Atha vā yvāyaṃ “kathaṃ rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati?
atk-s0201a0:173_5: so kho pana me attā imasmiṃ rūpeti evaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassatī”ti etassa atthanayo vutto,
atk-s0201a0:173_6: eteneva nayena vedanādidhamme attato gahetvā tato ajjhattikabāhirāsu pathavīsu yaṃkiñci pathaviṃ tassokāsabhāvena
atk-s0201a0:173_7: parikappetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imissā pathaviyāti maññanto pathaviyā maññati,
atk-s0201a0:173_9: Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:173_10: Yadā pana teneva nayena so kho panassa attā pathaviyāti maññati,
atk-s0201a0:174_0: Pathavito maññatīti ettha pana pathavitoti nissakkavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:174_1: Tasmā saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa vā yathāvuttappabhedato pathavito uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā pathavito
atk-s0201a0:174_2: vā añño attāti maññamāno pathavito maññatīti veditabbo,
atk-s0201a0:174_4: Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:174_5: Apare āhu pathavīkasiṇaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā tato aññaṃ appamāṇaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā pathavito bahiddhāpi me attāti maññamāno pathavito maññatīti.
atk-s0201a0:175_0: Pathaviṃ meti maññatīti ettha pana kevalañhi mahāpathaviṃ taṇhāvasena mamāyatīti iminā nayena pavattā ekā taṇhāmaññanā eva labbhatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:175_3: mama lohanti evaṃ yathāvuttappabhedāya sabbāyapi ajjhattikabāhirāya pathaviyā yojetabbāti.
atk-s0201a0:176_0: Pathaviṃ abhinandatīti vuttappakārameva pathaviṃ taṇhādīhi abhinandati, assādeti,
atk-s0201a0:176_2: “Pathaviṃ maññatī”ti eteneva etasmiṃ atthe siddhe kasmā etaṃ vuttanti ce.
atk-s0201a0:176_8: Tasmā pubbe maññanāvasena kilesuppattiṃ dassetvā idāni abhinandanāvasena dassento desanāvilāsato vā idamāha.
atk-s0201a0:176_13: so yasmā na sakkoti pathavīnissitaṃ taṇhaṃ vā diṭṭhiṃ vā pahātuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:177_0: Evaṃ pathavīvatthukaṃ maññanaṃ abhinandanañca vatvā idāni yena kāraṇena so maññati,
atk-s0201a0:177_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvikaronto āha taṃ kissa hetu,
atk-s0201a0:177_5: so puthujjano taṃ pathaviṃ kissa hetu maññati,
atk-s0201a0:177_12: so tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti ñātapariññāya tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññāyāti.
atk-s0201a0:178_8: Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā pathavīdhātuṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi,
atk-s0201a0:178_11: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:179_5: assa ca puthujjanassa tā pariññāyo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:179_6: tasmā apariññātattā pathaviṃ maññati ca abhinandati cāti.
atk-s0201a0:182_0: Āpaṃ āpatoti etthāpi lakkhaṇasasambhārārammaṇasammutivasena catubbidho āpo.
atk-s0201a0:182_4: sineho sinehagataṃ bandhanattaṃ rūpassa ajjhattaṃ upādinna”ntiādīsu vutto lakkhaṇaāpo.
atk-s0201a0:182_5: “Āpokasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto āpasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhātī”tiādīsu vutto sasambhārāpo.
atk-s0201a0:182_7: Kevalaṃ yojanānaye pana “pittaṃ semha”ntiādinā nayena vuttā dvādasabhedā ajjhattikā āpodhātu, “tattha,
atk-s0201a0:182_10: sineho sinehagataṃ bandhanattaṃ rūpassa bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:182_12: mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu
atk-s0201a0:182_13: phāṇitaṃ bhummāni vā udakāni antalikkhāni vā”ti evaṃ vuttā ca bāhirā āpodhātu veditabbā,
atk-s0201a0:183_0: Tejaṃ tejatoti imasmiṃ tejovārepi vuttanayeneva vitthāro veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:183_4: yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ vuttā catuppabhedā ajjhattikā tejodhātu.
atk-s0201a0:183_6: Yaṃ bāhiraṃ tejo tejogataṃ usmā usmāgataṃ usumaṃ usumagataṃ bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:183_8: kaṭṭhaggi palālaggi tiṇaggi gomayaggi thusaggi saṅkāraggi indaggi aggisantāpo sūriyasantāpo kaṭṭhasannicayasantāpo
atk-s0201a0:183_9: tiṇasannicayasantāpo dhaññasannicayasantāpo bhaṇḍasannicayasantāpo”ti evaṃ vuttā ca bāhirā tejodhātu
atk-s0201a0:184_0: Vāyaṃ vāyatoti imassa vāyavārassāpi yojanānaye pana “uddhaṅgamā vātā adhogamā vātā kucchisayā vātā koṭṭhāsayā
atk-s0201a0:184_1: vātā aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā satthakavātā khurakavātā uppalakavātā assāso passāso”ti evaṃ vuttā ajjhattikā
atk-s0201a0:184_4: Yaṃ bāhiraṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ thambhitattaṃ rūpassa bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:184_6: puratthimā vātā pacchimā vātā uttarā vātā dakkhiṇā vātā sarajā vātā arajā vātā sītā vātā uṇhā vātā parittā
atk-s0201a0:184_7: vātā adhimattā vātā kāḷavātā verambhavātā pakkhavātā supaṇṇavātā tālavaṇṭavātā vidhūpanavātā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a0:186_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, iti vutto lakkhaṇo hāro”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:187_0: Evaṃ nettiyaṃ lakkhaṇo nāma hāro vutto,
atk-s0201a0:187_1: tassa vasena yasmā catūsu bhūtesu gahitesu upādārūpampi gahitameva bhavati,
atk-s0201a0:187_4: Tasmā “assutavā puthujjano pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ maññatī”ti vadantena atthato rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:187_5: “Pathaviyā āpasmiṃ tejasmiṃ vāyasmiṃ maññatī”ti vadantena rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassatīti vuttampi hoti.
atk-s0201a0:187_6: “Pathavito āpato tejato vāyato maññatī”ti vadantena rūpato añño attāti siddhattā rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ samanupassatītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:187_9: tisso sassatadiṭṭhiyoti dveva diṭṭhiyo hontīti ayampi atthaviseso veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:190_1: Evaṃ rūpamukhena saṅkhāravatthukaṃ maññanaṃ vatvā idāni ye saṅkhāre upādāya sattā paññapīyanti,
atk-s0201a0:190_2: tesu saṅkhāresu sattesupi yasmā puthujjano maññanaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:190_3: tasmā te satte niddisanto bhūte bhūtato sañjānātītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:190_13: “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti bhūtā loke samussaya”nti ettha sattesu.
atk-s0201a0:190_17: Cātumahārājikānaṃ hi heṭṭhā sattā idha bhūtāti adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:191_1: Bhūte maññatītiādīsu pana tissopi maññanā yojetabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:191_2: Ayañhi “so passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūta”nti vuttanayena bhūte subhā sukhitāti gahetvā rajjati,
atk-s0201a0:191_8: “Aho vatāhaṃ khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”ntiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati,
atk-s0201a0:191_10: Attano pana bhūtānañca sampattivipattiṃ nissāya attānaṃ vā seyyaṃ dahati.
atk-s0201a0:191_11: Bhūtesu ca yaṃkiñci bhūtaṃ hīnaṃ attānaṃ vā hīnaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:191_16: aññataraññatarena vatthunā pubbakālaṃ parehi sadisaṃ attānaṃ dahati.
atk-s0201a0:192_0: Bhūte pana “niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti vā “sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā
atk-s0201a0:192_1: avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vā maññamāno
atk-s0201a0:193_1: Tesu tesu bhūtesu attano upapattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā ākaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:193_3: Bhūtesu vā upapattiṃ ākaṅkhamāno dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:193_7: Bhūte pana samūhaggāhena gahetvā tattha ekacce bhūte seyyato dahati,
atk-s0201a0:193_10: Tathā ekacce bhūte niccā dhuvāti maññati.
atk-s0201a0:194_0: Bhūtato maññatīti ettha pana saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa vā yato kutoci bhūtato uppattiṃ maññamāno bhūtato maññatīti veditabbo,
atk-s0201a0:194_2: Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:194_3: Bhūte meti maññatīti ettha pana ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhati.
atk-s0201a0:194_8: hatthigavassavaḷavā”ti evamādinā nayena mamāyato pavattatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:194_10: Apariññātaṃ tassāti ettha pana ye saṅkhāre upādāya bhūtānaṃ paññatti,
atk-s0201a0:194_11: tesaṃ apariññātattā bhūtā apariññātā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:195_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato saṅkhāravasena ca sattavasena ca maññanāvatthuṃ dassetvā idāni bhūmivisesādinā bhedena vitthāratopi taṃ dassento deve devatotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:195_1: Tattha dibbanti pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano vā iddhiyāti devā,
atk-s0201a0:195_5: Upapattidevā nāma cātumahārājike deve upādāya tatuttaridevā.
atk-s0201a0:195_9: Paranimmitavasavattidevaloke māraṃ saparisaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā cha kāmāvacarā idha devāti adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:195_10: Tattha sabbā atthavaṇṇanā bhūtavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:196_0: Pajāpatinti ettha pana māro pajāpatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:196_1: Keci pana “tesaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ adhipatīnaṃ mahārājādīnametaṃ adhivacana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:196_2: Taṃ devaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ gahitattā ayuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:196_3: māroyeva pana sattasaṅkhātāya pajāya adhipatibhāvena idha pajāpatīti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:196_7: Māro ekasmiṃ padese attano parisāya issariyaṃ pavattento rajjapaccante dāmarikarājaputto viya vasatīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:196_9: Yojanānayo cettha pajāpatiṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ dīghāyukaṃ sukhabahulaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā rajjanto taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:196_10: “Aho vatāhaṃ pajāpatino sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”ntiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ
atk-s0201a0:196_12: Pajāpatibhāvaṃ pana patto samāno ahamasmi pajānamissaro adhipatīti mānaṃ janento pajāpatiṃ mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:196_13: “Pajāpati nicco dhuvo”ti vā “ucchijjissati vinassissatī”ti vā “avaso abalo avīriyo niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇato
atk-s0201a0:196_14: chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vā maññamāno pana pajāpatiṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti
atk-s0201a0:197_0: Pajāpatisminti ettha pana ekā diṭṭhimaññanāva yujjati.
atk-s0201a0:197_3: sabbe te niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti maññati.
atk-s0201a0:197_5: na tasmiṃ pāpakāni kammāni upalabbhantī”ti maññati.
atk-s0201a0:198_0: Pajāpatitoti ettha tissopi maññanā labbhanti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:198_1: Idhekacco saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa vā pajāpatito uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā maññati,
atk-s0201a0:198_3: Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:198_4: Pajāpatiṃ meti ettha pana ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhati.
atk-s0201a0:198_5: Sā cāyaṃ “pajāpati mama satthā mama sāmī”tiādinā nayena mamāyato pavattatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:199_0: Brahmaṃ brahmatoti ettha brūhito tehi tehi guṇavisesehīti brahmā.
atk-s0201a0:199_3: “Sahasso brahmā dvisahasso brahmā”tiādīsu hi mahābrahmā brahmāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:206_2: Idha pana paṭhamābhinibbatto kappāyuko brahmā adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:207_0: Ābhassaravāre daṇḍadīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati visaratīti ābhassarā.
atk-s0201a0:207_2: ekatalavāsino eva cete sabbepi parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:208_0: Subhakiṇhavāre subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena ekagghanā suvaṇṇamañjūsāya ṭhapitasampajjalitakañcanapiṇḍasassirikāti subhakiṇhā.
atk-s0201a0:208_2: Ekatalavāsino eva cete sabbepi parittasubhā appamāṇasubhā subhakiṇhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:209_3: Atthanayayojanā pana imesu tīsupi vāresu bhūtavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:210_4: Asaññasattā devā vehapphalehi saddhiṃ ekatalāyeva ekasmiṃ okāse yena iriyāpathena nibbattā,
atk-s0201a0:210_7: Keci abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmāti evamādinā nayena tattha tattha adhipatibrahmānaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0201a0:210_8: Brahmaggahaṇeneva pana tassa gahitattā ayuttametanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:210_9: Yojanānayo cettha abhibhū vaṇṇavā dīghāyukoti sutvā tattha chandarāgaṃ uppādento abhibhuṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:210_10: “Aho vatāhaṃ abhibhuno sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”ntiādinā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahantopi abhibhuṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:210_11: Attānaṃ hīnato abhibhuṃ seyyato dahanto pana abhibhuṃ mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:210_12: “Abhibhū nicco dhuvo”tiādinā nayena parāmasanto abhibhuṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:213_1: Evaṃ bhagavā paṭipāṭiyā devaloke dassentopi abhibhūvacanena asaññabhavaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā ayaṃ vaṭṭakathā,
atk-s0201a0:213_6: Buddhā pana asaṅkheyepi kappe na uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:213_8: Rañño khandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ viya hi buddhānaṃ suddhāvāsabhavo.
atk-s0201a0:213_9: Te teneva ca kāraṇena viññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsavasenapi na gahitā,
atk-s0201a0:213_11: Tasmā tāsaṃ sadāvijjamānabhūmiṃ dassento suddhāvāse atikkamitvā,
atk-s0201a0:213_13: Tattha ākāsānañcāyatananti tabbhūmikā cattāro kusalavipākakiriyā khandhā.
atk-s0201a0:213_14: Te ca tatrūpapannāyeva daṭṭhabbā bhavaparicchedakathā ayanti katvā.
atk-s0201a0:213_16: Atthayojanā pana catūsupi etesu vāresu abhibhūvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:216_1: Evaṃ bhūmivisesādinā bhedena vitthāratopi maññanāvatthuṃ dassetvā idāni sabbamaññanāvatthubhūtaṃ sakkāyapariyāpannaṃ
atk-s0201a0:217_3: Tattha diṭṭhaṃ maññatīti diṭṭhaṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:217_4: Rūpāyatanaṃ subhasaññāya sukhasaññāya ca passanto tattha chandarāgaṃ janeti,
atk-s0201a0:217_8: sattā rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā,
atk-s0201a0:217_11: “Iti me rūpaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānanti vā panettha nandiṃ samannāneti,
atk-s0201a0:217_12: rūpasampadaṃ vā pana ākaṅkhamāno dānaṃ detī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a0:217_14: Attano pana parassa ca rūpasampattiṃ vipattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ janeti.
atk-s0201a0:217_15: “Imināhaṃ seyyosmī”ti vā “sadisosmī”ti vā “hīnosmī”ti vāti evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:217_16: Rūpāyatanaṃ pana niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti maññati,
atk-s0201a0:217_22: Rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassananayena maññanto diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati.
atk-s0201a0:217_24: Evaṃ rūpasmiṃ rāgādayoti maññantopi diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati.
atk-s0201a0:217_26: Tasmiññeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:218_0: Sutanti maṃsasotenapi sutaṃ, dibbasotenapi sutaṃ, saddāyatanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:219_2: indriyānaṃ ārammaṇānañca aññamaññasaṃsilese viññātanti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:220_1: sesānaṃ sattannaṃ āyatanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ dhammārammaṇassa vā.
atk-s0201a0:223_1: Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyabhedaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi dassetvā idāni tameva samāpannakavārena ca asamāpannakavārena
atk-s0201a0:224_5: asamāpannakavārañca pañcahi khandhehi bhinditvā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā sāsananayena pathavīvārādīsu
atk-s0201a0:224_6: vuttena ca aṭṭhakathānayena yathānurūpaṃ vīmaṃsitvā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:224_7: Keci pana ekattanti ekattanayaṃ vadanti nānattanti nānattanayaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:224_8: Apare “ekattasaññī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā,
atk-s0201a0:224_10: Taṃ sabbaṃ idha nādhippetattā ayuttameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:225_0: Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyaṃ dvidhā dassetvā idāni tameva ekadhā sampiṇḍetvā dassento sabbaṃ sabbatotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:225_1: Yojanānayo panettha sabbaṃ assādento sabbaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:225_2: “Mayā ete sattā nimmitā”tiādinā nayena attanā nimmitaṃ maññanto sabbaṃ mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:225_7: sabbaṃ natthī”tiādinā nayena maññanto sabbaṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:225_10: So sabbalokasannivāsaṃ tassokāsabhāvena parikappetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā sabbasminti maññati,
atk-s0201a0:225_12: Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:226_0: Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyaṃ ekadhā dassetvā idāni aparenapi nayena taṃ ekadhā dassento nibbānaṃ nibbānatoti āha.
atk-s0201a0:226_2: ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricāreti.
atk-s0201a0:226_4: ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ patto hotī”tiādinā nayena pañcadhā āgataṃ paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:226_6: Tena nibbānena “ahamasmi nibbānaṃ patto”ti mānaṃ janento mānamaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a0:226_7: Anibbānaṃyeva samānaṃ taṃ nibbānato niccādito ca gaṇhanto diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:227_0: Nibbānato pana aññaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ nibbāneti maññanto nibbānasmiṃ maññati,
atk-s0201a0:227_2: Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:227_4: Tatrapi hi nibbānato aññaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā “idaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:227_6: so kho pana me ayaṃ attā ito nibbānato añño”ti maññanto nibbānato maññati,
atk-s0201a0:227_8: Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:227_9: “Aho sukhaṃ mama nibbāna”nti maññanto pana nibbānaṃ meti maññatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:228_0: Yādiso esa sakkāyo, tathā naṃ avijānato;
atk-s0201a0:231_0: Taṃ paccanīkato bālo, gaṇhaṃ gaṇhāti maññanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:235_0: Gūthādī viya gūthasmiṃ, hoti mānena maññanā.
atk-s0201a0:236_0: Attā attaniyo meti, passato naṃ abuddhino;
atk-s0201a0:237_0: Ādāse viya bondhissa, diṭṭhiyā hoti maññanā.
atk-s0201a0:242_0: Sa’so sakkāyamalīno, jātiyā ca jarāya ca;
atk-s0201a0:243_0: Rogādīhi ca dukkhehi, niccaṃ haññati bāḷhaso.
atk-s0201a0:244_0: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, sakkāyaṃ anupassatha;
atk-s0201a0:246_0: Eso sabhāvo hetassa, passaṃ evamimaṃ budho;
atk-s0201a0:251_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sabbasakkāyadhammamūlabhūtaṃ puthujjanassa pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0201a0:251_2: tesveva vatthūsu sekkhassa pavattiṃ dassento yopi so,
atk-s0201a0:251_7: Pikāro sampiṇḍanattho ayampi dhammo aniyatotiādīsu viya.
atk-s0201a0:251_15: Tena vuttaṃ “ārammaṇasabhāgena puggalaṃ sampiṇḍeti no puggalasabhāgenā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:251_16: Yopi soti iminā pana sakalena vacanena idāni vattabbaṃ sekkhaṃ dassetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:252_10: Vuttañhetaṃ “sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:252_15: sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:253_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
atk-s0201a0:253_1: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati –
atk-s0201a0:253_2: “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:254_3: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:258_2: Tena patthayamānoti taṃ yogakkhemaṃ pattukāmo adhigantukāmo tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:258_3: Viharatīti aññaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ kāyaṃ harati.
atk-s0201a0:258_4: Atha vā “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī”tiādināpi niddesanayenettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:258_5: Pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānātīti pathaviṃ pathavībhāvena abhijānāti,
atk-s0201a0:258_6: na puthujjano viya sabbākāraviparītāya saññāya sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:258_8: evaṃ pathavīti etaṃ pathavībhāvaṃ adhimuccanto eva naṃ aniccātipi dukkhātipi anattātipi evaṃ abhijānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:258_9: Evañca naṃ abhiññatvā pathaviṃ mā maññīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:258_11: Ayaṃ pana maññī ca na maññī ca na vattabboti.
atk-s0201a0:258_12: Etasmiñhi atthe idaṃ padaṃ nipātetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:258_14: puthujjano tāva sabbamaññanānaṃ appahīnattā maññatīti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:258_18: tena so maññatītipi na vattabbo puthujjano viya,
atk-s0201a0:258_19: na maññatītipi na vattabbo khīṇāsavo viyāti.
atk-s0201a0:259_0: Pariññeyyaṃ tassāti tassa sekkhassa taṃ maññanāvatthu okkantaniyāmattā sambodhiparāyaṇattā ca tīhi pariññāhi pariññeyyaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:259_1: apariññeyyañca apariññātañca na hoti puthujjanassa viya,
atk-s0201a0:262_1: Evaṃ pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sekkhassa pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa pavattiṃ dassento yopi so,
atk-s0201a0:262_15: Ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0201a0:262_20: ime cattāro āsavā arahato khīṇā pahīnā samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā,
atk-s0201a0:263_0: Vusitavāti garusaṃvāsepi ariyamaggasaṃvāsepi dasasu ariyavāsesupi vasi parivasi vuttho parivuttho,
atk-s0201a0:263_1: so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇoti vusitavā katakaraṇīyoti puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ upādāya satta sekkhā catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ karonti nāma,
atk-s0201a0:263_3: natthi tassa uttari karaṇīyaṃ dukkhakkhayādhigamāyāti katakaraṇīyo.
atk-s0201a0:265_0: Katassa paṭicayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:266_0: Ohitabhāroti tayo bhārā khandhabhāro kilesabhāro abhisaṅkhārabhāroti,
atk-s0201a0:266_1: tassime tayo bhārā ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitā,
atk-s0201a0:266_7: Tañhi attupanibandhanaṭṭhena attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano attho sakatthoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:267_2: Imāni hi satte bhavesu saṃyojenti upanibandhanti,
atk-s0201a0:267_5: Imāni bhavasaṃyojanāni arahato parikkhīṇāni pahīnāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni,
atk-s0201a0:267_7: Sammadaññā vimuttoti ettha sammadaññāti sammā aññāya.
atk-s0201a0:267_16: sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti evamādiṃ vā bhedaṃ sammā yathābhūtaṃ aññāya jānitvā tīrayitvā tulayitvā vibhāvetvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti.
atk-s0201a0:268_0: Vimuttoti dve vimuttiyo cittassa ca vimutti nibbānañca.
atk-s0201a0:268_4: Pariññātaṃ tassāti tassa arahato taṃ maññanāvatthu tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:268_5: Tasmā so taṃ vatthuṃ na maññati,
atk-s0201a0:268_6: taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:269_0: Nibbānavāre pana khayā rāgassātiādayo tayo vārā vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:269_3: Vitthārentena ca pariññātaṃ tassāti sabbapadehi yojetvā puna khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:269_5: Desanā pana ekattha vuttaṃ sabbattha vuttameva hotīti saṃkhittā.
atk-s0201a0:270_0: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti ettha ca yasmā bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo,
atk-s0201a0:270_5: Yathā ca “pariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmī”ti vuttepi pariññātattā so taṃ vatthuṃ taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti attho hoti,
atk-s0201a0:270_6: evamidhāpi vītarāgattā so taṃ vatthuṃ taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:271_0: Ettha ca pariññātaṃ tassāti ayaṃ vāro maggabhāvanāpāripūridassanatthaṃ vutto.
atk-s0201a0:271_2: Dvīhi vā kāraṇehi arahā na maññati vatthussa ca pariññātattā akusalamūlānañca samucchinnattā.
atk-s0201a0:271_5: Tattha pacchimesu tīsu vāresu ayaṃ viseso veditabbo,
atk-s0201a0:271_6: tīsu hi vāresu rāge ādīnavaṃ disvā dukkhānupassī viharanto appaṇihitavimokkhena vimutto khayā rāgassa vītarāgo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:271_7: Dose ādīnavaṃ disvā aniccānupassī viharanto animittavimokkhena vimutto khayā dosassa vītadoso hoti.
atk-s0201a0:271_8: Mohe ādīnavaṃ disvā anattānupassī viharanto suññatavimokkhena vimutto khayā mohassa vītamoho hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:272_0: Evaṃ sante na eko tīhi vimokkhehi vimuccatīti dve vārā na vattabbā siyunti ce, taṃ na. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:272_5: Na pana vuttaṃ appaṇihitavimokkhena vā vimutto,
atk-s0201a0:273_0: Avisesena vā yo koci arahā samānepi rāgādikkhaye vipariṇāmadukkhassa pariññātattā khayā rāgassa vītarāgoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:273_3: Iṭṭhārammaṇassa vā pariññātattā khayā rāgassa vītarāgo.
atk-s0201a0:273_6: Sukhāya vā vedanāya rāgānusayassa samucchinnattā khayā rāgassa vītarāgo,
atk-s0201a0:273_7: itarāsu paṭighamohānusayānaṃ samucchinnattā vītadoso vītamoho cāti.
atk-s0201a0:273_8: Tasmā taṃ visesaṃ dassento āha “khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:276_1: Evaṃ pathavīādīsu vatthūsu khīṇāsavassa pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni attano pavattiṃ dassento tathāgatopi,
atk-s0201a0:276_3: Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti vuccati –
atk-s0201a0:277_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:278_7: aṅgapariccāgaṃ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā pubbayogapubbacariyadhammakkhānañātatthacariyādayo pūretvā,
atk-s0201a0:279_1: yathā kassapo bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne sammappadhāne iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge
atk-s0201a0:279_2: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato,
atk-s0201a0:285_4: so hi sampatijātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:285_6: bodhisatto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhārīyamāne,
atk-s0201a0:286_0: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0201a0:286_1: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0201a0:286_5: “Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā”ti ettha vutto cāmarukkhepo sabbatitthiyanimmathanassa.
atk-s0201a0:286_10: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaññeva visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0201a0:296_2: ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato.
atk-s0201a0:309_11: Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti tathāgato,
atk-s0201a0:310_12: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0201a0:310_16: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho.
atk-s0201a0:310_18: tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:311_2: sadevamanussāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a0:311_4: Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:311_5: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”nti ādinā nayena
atk-s0201a0:311_6: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:311_12: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0201a0:312_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0201a0:312_2: yañca rattiṃ yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0201a0:312_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:312_4: taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnamanadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:312_8: ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:312_11: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0201a0:312_12: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti no aññathā.
atk-s0201a0:312_18: Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:314_1: Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā aviciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati,
atk-s0201a0:314_3: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0201a0:314_4: atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājarājo devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā.
atk-s0201a0:314_7: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī.
atk-s0201a0:315_4: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati,
atk-s0201a0:315_5: iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo ceva puññassayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:316_4: Tattha sakalaṃ lokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a0:316_5: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a0:316_6: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a0:316_7: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a0:316_30: Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0201a0:317_0: Arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti padadvaye pana ārakattā arīnaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:317_3: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi arahanti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:318_0: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti.
atk-s0201a0:318_2: Vitthārato panetaṃ padadvayaṃ visuddhimagge buddhānussativaṇṇanāyaṃ pakāsitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:319_0: Pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassāti ettha pana taṃ maññanāvatthu pariññātaṃ tathāgatassātipi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:319_1: Pariññātantaṃ nāma pariññātapāraṃ pariññātāvasānaṃ anavasesato pariññātanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:319_2: Buddhānañhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ kiñcāpi tena tena maggena kilesappahāne viseso natthi,
atk-s0201a0:319_4: Sāvakā hi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekadesameva sammasitvā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:319_5: Buddhānaṃ pana aṇuppamāṇampi saṅkhāragataṃ ñāṇena adiṭṭhamatulitamatīritamasacchikataṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:322_1: Nandī dukkhassa mūlantiādīsu ca nandīti purimataṇhā.
atk-s0201a0:322_4: Iti viditvāti taṃ purimabhavanandiṃ “imassa dukkhassa mūla”nti evaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0201a0:322_11: Ayañhi ettha attho “kammabhavato upapattibhavo hotīti evañca jānitvā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:322_15: tena upapattibhavena bhūtassa sattassa khandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ hotīti evañca jānitvāti.
atk-s0201a0:323_0: Ettāvatā yaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno sammasitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a0:323_1: tassa paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭivedhā maññanānaṃ abhāvakāraṇaṃ dassento catusaṅkhepaṃ tisandhiṃ tiyaddhaṃ vīsatākāraṃ tameva paṭiccasamuppādaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:324_0: Kathaṃ pana ettāvatā esa sabbo dassito hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:324_1: Ettha hi nandīti ayaṃ eko saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a0:324_8: dukkhassa ca bhavassa ca antaraṃ dutiyo,
atk-s0201a0:324_9: bhavassa ca jātiyā ca antaraṃ tatiyo.
atk-s0201a0:324_10: Evaṃ catunnaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ antarasadisā catusaṅkhepantarā tayo sandhī veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:325_2: dukkhañca bhavo ca paccuppannoti evaṃ tayo addhā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:325_3: Atīte pana pañcasu ākāresu nandīvacanena taṇhā ekā āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:325_4: tāya anāgatāpi avijjāsaṅkhāraupādānabhavā paccayalakkhaṇena gahitāva honti.
atk-s0201a0:325_6: te vuttā yevāti katvā āyatiṃ viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā gahitāva honti.
atk-s0201a0:326_4: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā.
atk-s0201a0:326_9: vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
atk-s0201a0:326_14: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā.
atk-s0201a0:326_19: vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti evaṃ niddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā vīsati ākārā idha veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:326_20: Evaṃ “nandī dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti,
atk-s0201a0:326_21: bhūtassa jarāmaraṇa”nti ettāvatā esa sabbopi catusaṅkhepo tisandhi tiyaddho vīsatākāro paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:327_2: abhisambuddhoti vadāmīti ettha apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ katvā padayojanāya atthanigamanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0201a0:327_3: Tasmā tihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:327_10: virattāpi tā bhavanti niruddhāpi cattāpi paṭinissaṭṭhāpi.
atk-s0201a0:327_16: Yāhi vā taṇhāhi pathaviṃ pathavito sañjāneyya,
atk-s0201a0:328_4: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhānehi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:329_0: Sāvakānaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti na hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:329_8: Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:329_9: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:330_2: Iti vadāmīti iti vadāmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi,
atk-s0201a0:330_14: Tena imassa paṭiccasamuppādassa viditattā paṭividdhattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:330_16: yasmā ca evamimaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvā tathāgatassa yā nandīti vuttataṇhā sabbappakārā,
atk-s0201a0:330_21: pathaviṃ nābhinandatīti vadāmīti evaṃ abhisambuddhattā na maññati nābhinandatīti vadāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:331_0: Atha vā yasmā “nandī dukkhassa mūla”ntiādinā nayena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvā sabbaso taṇhā khayaṃ gatā,
atk-s0201a0:331_5: So evaṃ abhisambuddhattā pathaviṃ na maññati…pe…
atk-s0201a0:331_7: Yattha yattha hi yasmāti avatvā tasmāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:332_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva abhisambuddhoti vadāmīti sakalasuttantaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a0:332_1: paresaṃ paññāya alabbhaṇeyyapatiṭṭhaṃ paramagambhīraṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ dassento ekena puthujjanavārena
atk-s0201a0:332_2: ekena sekkhavārena catūhi khīṇāsavavārehi dvīhi tathāgatavārehīti aṭṭhahi mahāvārehi ekamekasmiñca vāre
atk-s0201a0:332_3: pathavīādīhi catuvīsatiyā antaravārehi paṭimaṇḍetvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇāya tantiyā avoca.
atk-s0201a0:333_0: Evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttaṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ karavikarudamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:333_2: Na te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti te pañcasatā bhikkhū idaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ nānumodiṃsu. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:333_4: Te kira imassa suttassa atthaṃ na jāniṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:333_6: Tesañhi tasmiṃ samaye evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttampi etaṃ suttaṃ ghanaputhulena dussapaṭṭena mukhe
atk-s0201a0:333_7: bandhaṃ katvā purato ṭhapitamanuññabhojanaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:333_8: Nanu ca bhagavā attanā desitaṃ dhammaṃ pare ñāpetuṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:333_9: So kasmā yathā te na jānanti,
atk-s0201a0:333_11: Vuttamidaṃ imassa suttassa nikkhepavicāraṇāyaṃ eva “mānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbadhammamūlapariyāyanti desanaṃ ārabhī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:333_13: evaṃ mānabhañjanatthaṃ desitañca panetaṃ suttaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū taṃyeva kira pathaviṃ diṭṭhigatikopi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a0:333_15: Kinnāmidaṃ kathaṃ nāmidanti cintentā pubbe mayaṃ bhagavatā kathitaṃ yaṃkiñci khippameva jānāma,
atk-s0201a0:333_16: idāni panimassa mūlapariyāyassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā na jānāma na passāma,
atk-s0201a0:333_17: aho buddhā nāma appameyyā atulāti uddhaṭadāṭhā viya sappā nimmadā hutvā buddhupaṭṭhānañca dhammassavanañca sakkaccaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:334_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā imaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0201a0:334_1: te nāma brāhmaṇapabbajitā tathā mānamadamattā bhagavatā mūlapariyāyadesanāya nihatamānā katā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:334_3: Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiyā nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā te bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0201a0:334_10: pubbepi ahaṃ ime evaṃ mānapaggahitasire vicarante nihatamāne akāsi”nti.
atk-s0201a0:334_11: Tato imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ atītaṃ ānesi –
atk-s0201a0:335_2: aññataro disāpāmokkho brāhmaṇo bārāṇasiyaṃ paṭivasati tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇṭukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:335_8: Sopi brāhmaṇo ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ akatvā ghaṭe udakaṃ āsiñcanto viya sabbampi sippaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā te māṇavake
atk-s0201a0:335_13: mayampi dāni ācariyā evā”ti mānaṃ uppādetvā tato pabhuti ācariye agāravā nikkhittavattā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:335_15: So ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinne te māṇavake āha “tātā pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:337_0: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:339_3: Te dasapi vīsatipi sampiṇḍitā hutvā na tassa pañhassa ādiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:339_5: Āgantvā ācariyassa ārocesuṃ “na imassa pañhassa atthaṃ ājānāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:342_2: sabbāni ca tāni lomasāni sabbāni ca mahantāni gīvāyameva ca ṭhapitāni,
atk-s0201a0:342_5: Ettha pana kocideva kaṇṇavāti attānaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0201a0:342_8: taṃ sutvā te māṇavakā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā aṅguliyā bhūmiṃ vilikhantā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:343_0: Atha nesaṃ ahirikabhāvaṃ passitvā ācariyo “uggaṇhatha tātā pañha”nti pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a0:343_3: Kālo hi bhūtānaṃ na cammamaṃsādīni khādati,
atk-s0201a0:343_4: apica kho nesaṃ āyuvaṇṇabalāni khepento yobbaññaṃ maddanto ārogyaṃ vināsento ghasati khādatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:343_5: Sabbāneva sahattanāti evaṃ ghasanto ca na kiñci vajjeti,
atk-s0201a0:343_11: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūtoti khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:343_12: So hi āyatiṃ paṭisandhikālaṃ khepetvā khāditvā ṭhitattā “kālaghaso”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:343_13: Sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacīti so yāyaṃ taṇhā apāyesu bhūte pacati,
atk-s0201a0:344_0: Atha te māṇavakā dīpasahassālokena viya rattiṃ samavisamaṃ ācariyassa vissajjanena pañhassa atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0201a0:344_3: mayañhi bahussutamānaṃ uppādetvā catuppadikagāthāyapi atthaṃ na jānāmā”ti nihatamānā pubbasadisameva
atk-s0201a0:345_4: Evaṃ pubbepāhaṃ ime evaṃ mānapaggahitasire vicarante nihatamāne akāsinti.
atk-s0201a0:346_0: Imañca jātakaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū pubbepi mayaṃ māneneva upahatāti bhiyyosomattāya nihatamānā hutvā attano upakārakakammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:347_0: Tato bhagavā ekaṃ samayaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caranto vesāliṃ patvā gotamake cetiye viharanto imesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:347_1: bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā imaṃ gotamakasuttaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0201a0:348_20: imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne dasasahassilokadhātu akampitthā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:349_0: Idañca suttaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā bhikkhū tasmiṃyevāsane saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:354_5: yathā kākandī mākandī kosambīti evaṃ tāva akkharacintakā.
atk-s0201a0:354_6: Aṭṭhakathācariyā pana bhaṇanti “yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ sabbamettha atthīti sāvatthī.
atk-s0201a0:354_7: Satthasamāyoge ca kiṃ bhaṇḍamatthīti pucchite sabbamatthī”ti vacanamupādāya sāvatthī.
atk-s0201a0:359_0: Vuddhiṃ vepullataṃ pattaṃ, iddhaṃ phītaṃ manoramaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:361_1: Jetavaneti ettha attano paccatthikajanaṃ jinātīti jeto,
atk-s0201a0:361_2: raññā vā attano paccatthikajane jite jātoti jeto,
atk-s0201a0:361_3: maṅgalakamyatāya vā tassa evaṃnāmameva katanti jeto,
atk-s0201a0:361_5: Tañhi jetena rājakumārena ropitaṃ saṃvaddhitaṃ paripālitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:361_9: Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti ettha sudatto nāma so gahapati mātāpitūhi katanāmavasena.
atk-s0201a0:361_10: Sabbakāmasamiddhitāya pana vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ anāthānaṃ piṇḍamadāsi,
atk-s0201a0:361_12: Āramanti ettha pāṇino visesena vā pabbajitāti ārāmo,
atk-s0201a0:361_13: tassa pupphaphalādisobhāya nātidūranaccāsannatādipañcavidhasenāsanaṅgasampattiyā ca tato tato āgamma
atk-s0201a0:361_14: ramanti abhiramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā nivasantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:361_15: Vuttappakārāya vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
atk-s0201a0:361_16: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi koṭisantharena
atk-s0201a0:361_17: kīṇitvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0201a0:362_4: Tatra hi dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādamāpane bhūmivikkayaladdhā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo anekakoṭiagghanakā rukkhā ca jetassa pariccāgo,
atk-s0201a0:362_6: Iti tesaṃ parikittanena evaṃ puññakāmā puññāni karontīti dassento āyasmā ānando aññepi puññakāme tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjane niyojeti.
atk-s0201a0:363_2: Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayāya paṭipattidassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:363_3: Tattha sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyanti sabbesaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarakāraṇaṃ saṃvarabhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:363_4: yena kāraṇena te saṃvaritā pidahitā hutvā anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ gacchanti pahīyanti nappavattanti,
atk-s0201a0:363_9: Dhammato yāva gotrabhuṃ okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā,
atk-s0201a0:363_10: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:363_21: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā.
atk-s0201a0:363_22: Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:363_28: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:366_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ; –
atk-s0201a0:367_0: Ettha tebhūmakañca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
atk-s0201a0:367_1: “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0201a0:367_3: Te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:368_0: Ete hi vinaye tāva “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
atk-s0201a0:368_4: Aññesu ca suttantesu abhidhamme ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:368_14: āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:368_15: Imasmiṃ pana sutte teyeva dassanāpahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatāti.
atk-s0201a0:368_16: Ayaṃ tāva āsavapade vacanattho ceva pabhedo ca.
atk-s0201a0:369_1: pidahati nivāreti pavattituṃ na detīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:369_6: paññāyete pidhīyare”ti ca ādīsu pidhānaṭṭhena saṃvaramāha.
atk-s0201a0:369_7: Svāyaṃ saṃvaro pañcavidho hoti sīlasaṃvaro satiñāṇa khanti vīriyasaṃvaroti.
atk-s0201a0:369_14: Ñāṇañhettha pidhīyareti iminā pidhānaṭṭhena saṃvaroti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:369_16: uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā pana nayena idheva khantivīriyasaṃvarā āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:369_17: Tesañca “sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāya”nti iminā uddesena saṅgahitattā saṃvarabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:370_0: Apica pañcavidhopi ayaṃ saṃvaro idha āgatoyeva,
atk-s0201a0:370_2: “So tañca anāsanaṃ tañca agocara”nti ayaṃ panettha sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a0:370_5: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā ca ñāṇasaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a0:370_7: uppattiṃ nirodhaṃ vā gacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:371_5: Evaṃ santepi jānatoti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisati,
atk-s0201a0:371_9: Ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni ñāṇena vivaṭe dhamme passati.
atk-s0201a0:372_0: Āsavānaṃ khayanti āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayasamuppādaṃ khīṇākāraṃ natthibhāvanti ayameva hi imasmiñca sutte,
atk-s0201a0:374_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:378_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:380_0: No ajānato no apassatoti yo pana na jānāti na passati,
atk-s0201a0:380_2: Etena ye ajānato apassatopi saṃvarādīhiyeva suddhiṃ vadanti,
atk-s0201a0:380_6: Saṅkhepena cettha ñāṇaṃ āsavasaṃvarapariyāyoti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:381_0: Idāni yaṃ jānato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:381_5: Dabbajātiko eva hi koci bhikkhu chattaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:381_7: tassa īdisāni kammāni vattasīse ṭhatvā karontassa sā jānanā maggaphalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā.
atk-s0201a0:381_8: Yo pana sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādīni kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:381_10: tasmā yaṃ jānato passato ca āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:381_11: tadeva dassento āha yoniso ca manasikāraṃ ayoniso ca manasikāranti.
atk-s0201a0:382_0: Tattha yoniso manasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro pathamanasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:382_1: aniccādīsu aniccanti ādinā eva nayena saccānulomikena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:383_1: Anicce niccanti dukkhe sukhanti anattani attāti asubhe subhanti ayoniso manasikāro uppathamanasikāro.
atk-s0201a0:383_2: Saccappaṭikulena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:383_5: ayoniso manasikāro ca yathā na uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:384_0: Idāni imassevatthassa yuttiṃ dassento āha ayoniso,
atk-s0201a0:384_6: tasmā jānitabbaṃ yoniso manasikāraṃ uppādetuṃ jānato,
atk-s0201a0:384_7: ayoniso manasikāro ca yathā na uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:385_1: tattha “yoniso ayoniso”ti imehi tāva dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ hoti upari sakalasuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:385_5: Ayoniso manasikāro hi vaḍḍhamāno dve dhamme paripūreti avijjañca bhavataṇhañca.
atk-s0201a0:385_10: Evaṃ ayaṃ ayoniso manasikārabahulo puggalo vātavegābhighātena vippanaṭṭhanāvā viya gaṅgāvaṭṭe patitagokulaṃ
atk-s0201a0:385_11: viya cakkayante yuttabalibaddo viya ca punappunaṃ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu āvaṭṭaparivaṭṭaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:386_5: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissatī”ti vacanato sammādiṭṭhipamukhaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0201a0:386_9: evaṃ etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti evaṃ yoniso manasikāramūlakaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:386_10: Evaṃ imehi dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ hoti upari sakalasuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:387_0: Evaṃ ābaddhe cettha yasmā pubbe āsavappahānaṃ dassetvā pacchā uppatti vuccamānā na yujjati.
atk-s0201a0:388_0: Tattha ayoniso manasikarototi vuttappakāraṃ ayoniso manasikāraṃ uppādayato.
atk-s0201a0:388_1: Anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjantīti ettha ye pubbe appaṭiladdhapubbaṃ cīvarādiṃ vā paccayaṃ upaṭṭhākasaddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:388_4: aññataraññataraṃ vā pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā vā tathā vā ayoniso manasikaroto āsavā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:388_6: aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma āsavā na santi.
atk-s0201a0:388_7: Anubhūtapubbepi ca vatthumhi ārammaṇe vā yassa pakatisuddhiyā vā uddesaparipucchāpariyattinavakammayonisomanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:388_8: vā aññataravasena pubbe anuppajjitvā pacchā tādisena paccayena sahasā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:388_10: Tesuyeva pana vatthārammaṇesu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā uppannā pavaḍḍhantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:388_11: Ito aññathā hi paṭhamuppannānaṃ vaḍḍhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:389_1: bhikkhaveti ettha pana yassa pakatisuddhiyā vā seyyathāpi āyasmato mahākassapassa bhaddāya ca kāpilāniyā,
atk-s0201a0:389_3: so ca jānāti “na kho me āsavā maggena samugghātaṃ gatā,
atk-s0201a0:389_6: Tassa te āsavā anuppannā na uppajjantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:389_7: Yassa pana kārakasseva sato satisammosena sahasā āsavā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:389_8: tato saṃvegamāpajjitvā yoniso padahanto te āsave samucchindati,
atk-s0201a0:389_9: tassa uppannā pahīyantīti vuccanti maṇḍalārāmavāsīmahātissabhūtattherassa viya.
atk-s0201a0:389_10: So kira tasmiṃyeva vihāre uddesaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:389_11: athassa gāme piṇḍāya carato visabhāgārammaṇe kileso uppajji,
atk-s0201a0:389_12: so taṃ vipassanāya vikkhambhetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:389_13: Tassa supinantepi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:389_14: So “ayaṃ kileso vaḍḍhitvā apāyasaṃvattaniko hotī”ti saṃvegaṃ janetvā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā vihārā nikkhamma
atk-s0201a0:389_15: mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa santike rāgapaṭipakkhaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a0:389_16: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ santharitvā nisajja anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaṃ chinditvā uṭṭhāya ācariyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0201a0:390_1: Idāni “uppannā ca āsavā pahīyantī”ti idameva padaṃ gahetvā ye te āsavā pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a0:390_2: tesaṃ nānappakārato aññampi pahānakāraṇaṃ āvikātuṃ desanaṃ vitthārento atthi,
atk-s0201a0:390_4: āsavā dassanā pahātabbātiādimāha yathā taṃ desanāpabhedakusalo dhammarājā.
atk-s0201a0:392_1: Idāni tāni padāni anupubbato byākātukāmo “katame ca,
atk-s0201a0:392_3: āsavā dassanā pahātabbā”ti pucchaṃ katvā mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva “idha,
atk-s0201a0:392_6: Tattha manasikaraṇīye dhamme nappajānātīti āvajjitabbe samannāharitabbe dhamme na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:393_0: Tattha ya’ssāti ye assa assutavato puthujjanassa.
atk-s0201a0:393_2: Anuppanno vā kāmāsavoti ettha samuccayattho vāsaddo,
atk-s0201a0:393_7: tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vutte apadā ca dvipadā cāti attho,
atk-s0201a0:393_8: yathā ca “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā”ti vutte bhūtānañca sambhavesīnañcāti attho,
atk-s0201a0:393_9: yathā ca “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā”ti vutte aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho,
atk-s0201a0:393_11: uppanno ca kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:394_3: Evaṃ diṭṭhāsavopi bhavāsave eva samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:394_5: Tattha kāmaguṇe assādato manasikaroto anuppanno ca kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:394_7: Mahaggatadhamme assādato manasikaroto anuppanno ca bhavāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:394_9: Tīsu bhūmīsu dhamme catuvipallāsapadaṭṭhānabhāvena manasikaroto anuppanno ca avijjāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:395_0: Kasmā pana tayo eva āsavā idha vuttāti.
atk-s0201a0:395_4: Tasmā ime tayo āsave uppādentā tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ abhāgino honti,
atk-s0201a0:395_5: anuppādentā bhāginoti etamatthaṃ dassentena tayo eva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:395_6: Diṭṭhāsavopi vā ettha vutto yevāti vaṇṇitametaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:396_5: uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhantī”ti heṭṭhā vuttaāsavānaṃyeva abhedato nigamanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:397_1: Ettāvatā yo ayaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dassanā pahātabbe āsave niddisituṃ assutavā puthujjano vutto,
atk-s0201a0:397_4: manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjantī”ti evaṃ sāmaññato vuttānaṃ ayoniso manasikārapaccayānaṃ kāmāsavādīnampi adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:397_5: tasmā tepi āsave teneva puggalena dassetvā idāni dassanā pahātabbe āsave dassento so evaṃ ayoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a0:397_7: Vicikicchāsīsena cettha diṭṭhāsavampi dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:398_1: yassa te iminā vuttanayena āsavā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:398_4: so puthujjano evaṃ ayoniso anupāyena uppathena manasi karoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:398_5: Ahosiṃ nu kho…pe…so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:398_8: yathāssa “ahaṃ ahosiṃ nu kho”tiādinā nayena vuttā soḷasavidhāpi vicikicchā uppajjatīti.
atk-s0201a0:399_0: Tattha ahosiṃ nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte attano vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:399_2: Ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjano yathā vā tathā vā pavattati.
atk-s0201a0:399_4: Evaṃ ayoniso manasikārassa pana kiṃ kāraṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:399_6: Nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotīti.
atk-s0201a0:399_7: Ko vā evamāha na manasi karotīti.
atk-s0201a0:399_10: Na hi macchamaṃsādīni attano attano pakatiyā sugandhāni,
atk-s0201a0:400_0: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgūpapattiyo nissāya khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:401_0: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:401_2: Keci pana issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosinti hetuto kaṅkhatīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:402_0: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a0:402_1: devo hutvā manussoti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:403_0: Bhavissāmi nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:404_0: Etarahi vā paccuppannamaddhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a0:404_1: Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hotīti attano khandhesu vicikiccho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:404_2: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:404_9: So uṭṭhāya ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya puttoti cintesi.
atk-s0201a0:404_10: Evaṃ ahaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:405_0: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:405_2: eko kira macche gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ macchoti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0201a0:405_3: Aparo susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi.
atk-s0201a0:405_4: So paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni dve yakkhāti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0201a0:406_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:406_2: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:406_3: Sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:406_5: Apaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti.
atk-s0201a0:406_7: Pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino.
atk-s0201a0:406_8: Manussāpi ca rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
atk-s0201a0:407_1: Kevalañcettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya dīgho nu khosmi,
atk-s0201a0:407_2: rassacaturaṃsachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ aññatarappakāroti kaṅkhanto kathaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:407_3: Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:408_0: Kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:409_1: Evaṃ soḷasappabhedaṃ vicikicchaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ iminā vicikicchāsīsena diṭṭhāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0201a0:409_2: Taṃ dassento tassa evaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:409_3: Tattha tassa puggalassa yathā ayaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:409_4: evaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto tasseva savicikicchassa ayoniso manasikārassa thāmagatattā channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:409_6: evaṃ vā evaṃ vā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:409_7: Atthi me attāti cettha sassatadiṭṭhi sabbakālesu attano atthitaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:409_8: Saccato thetatoti bhūtato ca thirato ca,
atk-s0201a0:409_9: “idaṃ sacca”nti bhūtato suṭṭhu daḷhabhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:409_10: Natthi me attāti ayaṃ pana ucchedadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a0:409_12: Atha vā purimāpi tīsu kālesu atthīti gahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a0:409_14: Pacchimāpi atītānāgatesu natthīti gahaṇato bhasmantāhutiyoti gahitadiṭṭhikānaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:409_16: Atīte eva natthīti gaṇhanto adhiccasamuppattikasseva sassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0201a0:410_0: Attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmīti saññākkhandhasīsena khandhe attāti gahetvā saññāya avasesakkhandhe sañjānato iminā attanā imaṃ attānaṃ sañjānāmīti hoti.
atk-s0201a0:410_2: itare cattāropi anattāti gahetvā saññāya tesaṃ jānato evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:410_4: Itare cattāro attāti gahetvā saññāya tesaṃ jānato evaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:411_0: Vado vedeyyotiādayo pana sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā.
atk-s0201a0:411_6: tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0201a0:411_7: Tatra tatrāti tesu tesu yonigatiṭṭhitinivāsanikāyesu ārammaṇesu vā.
atk-s0201a0:411_16: tāva tatheva ṭhassatīti gaṇhato evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti.
atk-s0201a0:412_8: Diṭṭhīsu vā gatamidaṃ dassanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiantogadhattātipi diṭṭhigataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:412_10: Idañhi atthi me attātiādi diṭṭhiyā gamanamattameva,
atk-s0201a0:412_11: natthettha attā vā nicco vā kocīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:412_17: kadāci ucchedassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:412_23: Iminā diṭṭhisaṃyojanena saṃyutto puthujjano etehi jātiādīhi na parimuccatīti.
atk-s0201a0:413_1: Evaṃ chappabhedaṃ diṭṭhāsavaṃ dassetvā yasmā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmāsavādivacaneneva dassito hoti.
atk-s0201a0:413_2: Kāmasukhatthañhi bhavasukhabhavavisuddhiatthañca avijjāya abhibhūtā ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlabbatāni parāmasanti,
atk-s0201a0:413_3: tasmā taṃ adassetvā diṭṭhiggahaṇena vā tassa gahitattāpi taṃ adassetvāva idāni yo puggalo dassanā pahātabbe āsave pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:413_4: taṃ dassetvā tesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ dassetuṃ pubbe vā ayoniso manasikaroto puthujjanassa tesaṃ uppattiṃ
atk-s0201a0:413_5: dassetvā idāni tabbiparītassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ sutavā ca kho,
atk-s0201a0:414_2: tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca vuttapaccanīkato ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:414_3: Paccanīkato ca sabbākārena ariyadhammassa akovidāvinītapaccanīkato ayaṃ “sutavā ariyasāvako ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:414_4: Apica kho sikhāpattavipassanato pabhuti yāva gotrabhu,
atk-s0201a0:414_5: tāva tadanurūpena atthena ayaṃ ariyasāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:415_1: “So idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādīsu pana ayaṃ atthavibhāvanā,
atk-s0201a0:415_2: so catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko ariyasāvako taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:415_5: nirodhasampāpako maggoti evaṃ pubbeva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ
atk-s0201a0:415_6: samāruḷho samāno te tebhūmake khandhe idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a0:415_7: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a0:415_10: Yā panāyaṃ tasseva dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā pabhāvikā taṇhā,
atk-s0201a0:415_12: Yasmā pana dukkhañca samudayo ca idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti nappavattanti,
atk-s0201a0:415_15: Nirodhasampāpakaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0201a0:415_16: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a0:416_4: āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena sakasantatiyaṃ cattāri bhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā ayaṃ rūpakkhandhoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a0:416_5: Taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasike dhamme ime cattāro arūpakkhandhāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a0:416_7: Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgāyeva honti.
atk-s0201a0:416_9: Tassa ayaṃ hetu ayaṃ paccayoti avijjābhavataṇhākammāhārādike hetupaccaye vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a0:416_10: Tato tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannadhammānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā ime dhammā ahutvā hontīti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0201a0:416_13: Evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā paṭipāṭiyā vipassanaṃ pavattento sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:417_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0201a0:417_10: sesāni kiccato paṭivijjhati ceva abhisameti ca.
atk-s0201a0:417_11: Na hissa tasmiṃ samaye evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0201a0:417_14: Apica khvassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭivedhavasena nirodhaṃ sacchikaroto evaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhapariññākiccampi
atk-s0201a0:417_16: Tassevaṃ upāyena yoniso manasikaroto tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a0:417_19: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti sīlabbatānaṃ parāmasanato sīlabbataparāmāsoti.
atk-s0201a0:417_20: Tattha catūsu āsavesu sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhāsavena saṅgahitattā āsavā ceva saṃyojanā ca.
atk-s0201a0:417_22: “Dassanā pahātabbā āsavā”ti ettha pariyāpannattā pana āsavāti.
atk-s0201a0:418_1: pahātabbā”ti ime sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo dassanā pahātabbā nāma āsavāti dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:418_2: Atha vā yā ayaṃ channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti evaṃ sarūpeneva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vibhattā.
atk-s0201a0:418_5: Sā ca yasmā sahajātapahānekaṭṭhehi saddhiṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:418_6: Diṭṭhāsave hi pahīyamāne taṃsahajāto catūsu diṭṭhisampayuttacittesu kāmāsavopi avijjāsavopi pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:418_7: Pahānekaṭṭho pana catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu nāgasupaṇṇādisamiddhipatthanāvasena uppajjamāno bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a0:418_10: tathā vicikicchācittasampayutto avijjāsavopīti evaṃ sabbathāpi avasesā tayopi āsavā pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a0:418_11: Tasmā bahuvacananiddeso katoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:419_6: Disvā kattabbakiccaṃ pana na karoti saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato.
atk-s0201a0:419_8: Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā “ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī”ti vadanto gāmavāsī puriso cettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:422_1: Evaṃ dassanena pahātabbe āsave dassetvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhe saṃvarā pahātabbe dassetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:423_0: Nanu ca dassanena bhāvanāyāti imehi dvīhi appahātabbo āsavo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:423_1: atha kasmā visuṃ saṃvarādīhi pahātabbe dassetīti.
atk-s0201a0:423_2: Saṃvarādīhi pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā āsavā catūhi maggehi samugghātaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:423_3: tasmā tesaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge imehi pañcahākārehi vikkhambhanappahānaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:423_4: Tasmā yo cāyaṃ vutto paṭhamo dassanamaggoyeva,
atk-s0201a0:425_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā paccavekkhitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:425_1: Ettha ca asaṃvare ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:425_4: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:425_5: na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā ādittapariyāyanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:425_6: Cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti ettha cakkhumeva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:426_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:426_1: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:426_2: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:426_3: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0201a0:426_7: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a0:427_1: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
atk-s0201a0:427_2: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:427_4: Evaṃ hontopi so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:427_8: yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
atk-s0201a0:427_9: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:427_13: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:428_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:428_3: Yathā nagaradvāresu susaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharādayo asaṃvutā,
atk-s0201a0:428_4: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:428_5: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
atk-s0201a0:428_6: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:428_8: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:428_12: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti imassa vibhaṅge “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:428_14: Taṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā cakkhundriyasaṃvarena saṃvutoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:429_4: gharadvāre kavāṭaṃ viya saṃvari thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:429_6: Tathā hi “cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ asaṃvutassa viharato saṃvutassa viharato”ti etesu padesu ayameva attho dissati.
atk-s0201a0:430_0: Viharatīti evaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto yena kenaci iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
atk-s0201a0:430_1: Yañhissātiādimhi yaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ assa bhikkhuno asaṃvutassa athaketvā apidahitvā viharantassāti evamattho veditabbo. Atha vā, ye-
atk-s0201a0:431_1: Āsavā vighātapariḷāhāti cattāro āsavā ca aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā vipākapariḷāhā ca.
atk-s0201a0:431_2: Cakkhudvāre hi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:431_3: īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:431_4: sattoti vā sattassāti vā gaṇhantassa diṭṭhāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:431_5: sabbeheva sahajātaṃ aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavoti cattāro āsavā uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:431_8: Tepi hi asaṃvutasseva viharato uppajjeyyunti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:433_2: āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbāti ime chasu dvāresu cattāro cattāro katvā catuvīsati āsavā saṃvarena pahātabbāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:433_3: Sabbattheva cettha satisaṃvaro eva saṃvaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:436_3: Yañhissāti yaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātādīsu vā aññataraṃ assa.
atk-s0201a0:436_6: Kevalaṃ panidha aladdhaṃ cīvarādiṃ patthayato laddhaṃ vā assādayato kāmāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:436_7: Īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sampattibhave sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavassa,
atk-s0201a0:436_8: ahaṃ labhāmi na labhāmīti vā mayhaṃ vā idanti attasaññaṃ adhiṭṭhahato diṭṭhāsavassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:436_9: Sabbeheva pana sahajāto avijjāsavoti evaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ uppatti vipākapariḷāhā ca navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:437_2: āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbāti ime ekamekasmiṃ paccaye cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasa āsavā iminā ñāṇasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a0:440_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassāti upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā khamo hoti sītassa sītaṃ khamati sahati,
atk-s0201a0:440_2: na avīrapuriso viya appamattakenapi sītena calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahati.
atk-s0201a0:440_3: Apica kho lomasanāgatthero viya anappakenāpi sītena phuṭṭho na calati na kampati,
atk-s0201a0:440_5: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāyaṃ padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikaniraye
atk-s0201a0:441_0: Kevalañhi yo bhikkhu adhimattampi uṇhaṃ sahati sveva thero viya,
atk-s0201a0:441_2: Thero kira gimhasamaye pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:441_7: Thero “uṇhabhayenevamhi āvuso idha nisinno”ti avīcimahānirayaṃ paccavekkhitvā nisīdiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:442_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano pettivisayūpapattiṃ
atk-s0201a0:442_2: Adhimattehi ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cāpi tiracchānūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:442_3: Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṃsāre sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṃ parivattitapubbabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a0:442_4: paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a0:443_0: Theraṃ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsaṃ suṇantaṃ ghoraviso sappo ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0201a0:443_1: Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṃyeva suṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:443_3: Thero upasampadamaṇḍalaṃ ādiṃ katvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā parisuddhasīlohamasmīti pītiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0201a0:443_4: Saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a0:443_5: Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:444_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe sutvā khantiguṇaṃyeva
atk-s0201a0:445_3: Taṃ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto dīghabhāṇako ariyavaṃsaṃ kathemīti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karosītiādīhi akkosi.
atk-s0201a0:445_4: Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:445_6: Tato yattha dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ maggo bhijjati,
atk-s0201a0:445_7: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṃ vanditvā “esa, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:445_10: Theropi vihāraṃ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:445_12: sakalagāvutaṃ paribhāsantaṃ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:446_0: Yo pana uppannā sārīrikā vedanā dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhā,
atk-s0201a0:446_8: Evaṃ sabhāvo hoti cittalapabbate padhāniyatthero viya.
atk-s0201a0:447_0: Therassa kira rattiṃ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajji.
atk-s0201a0:447_1: So taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āvattati parivattati.
atk-s0201a0:447_7: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti.
