atk-s0201a0:448_4: Sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhaṃ patthayantassa kāmāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:448_6: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vāti bhavaṃ patthayantassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a0:449_1: adhivāsanā pahātabbā”ti ime sītādīsu ekamekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā imāya khantisaṃvarasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0201a0:449_3: Ettha ca yasmā ayaṃ khanti sītādidhamme adhivāseti,
atk-s0201a0:452_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetīti ahaṃ samaṇoti caṇḍassa hatthissa āsanne na ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:452_2: Tatonidānañhi maraṇampi siyā maraṇamattampi dukkhanti evaṃ upāyena pathena paccayena paccavekkhitvā caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjeti paṭikkamati.
atk-s0201a0:452_17: Anāsaneti ettha pana ayuttaṃ āsanaṃ anāsanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:452_19: Agocareti etthapi ca ayutto gocaro agocaro,
atk-s0201a0:452_26: Te hi ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti imaṃ brahmaṃ samānaṃ caranti,
atk-s0201a0:452_30: adhimucceyyuṃ “addhā ayamāyasmā akāsi vā karissati vā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:453_3: Hatthiādinidānena dukkhena phuṭṭhassa sukhaṃ patthayato kāmāsavo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:453_4: Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave īdisaṃ dukkhanti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavāsavo.
atk-s0201a0:454_1: parivajjanā pahātabbāti ime hatthiādīsu ekekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā iminā sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a0:457_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetīti “iti pāyaṃ vitakko akusalo,
atk-s0201a0:457_4: so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena yoniso kāmavitakke ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a0:457_5: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannaṃ jātamabhinibbattaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti,
atk-s0201a0:459_0: Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? Na hi, apica kho naṃ vinodeti tudati vijjhati nīharati.
atk-s0201a0:460_0: Kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? Na hi,
atk-s0201a0:460_1: atha kho naṃ byantīkaroti vigatantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:461_1: Anabhāvaṃ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti,
atk-s0201a0:462_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakkoti “yo kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti vibhaṅge vutto.
atk-s0201a0:462_4: Sakiṃ vā uppanne vinodetvā dutiyavāre ajjhupekkhitā na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:462_8: Dhammeti teyeva kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi vā nava mahāvitakke.
atk-s0201a0:462_10: Avasesā “ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amaravitakko parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0201a0:464_1: vinodanā pahātabbāti ime kāmavitakkādivasena vuttappakārā āsavā iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vitakke ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇasahitena
atk-s0201a0:467_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti abhāvanāya ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:467_2: bhāvanāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0201a0:467_4: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ime uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtā lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā,
atk-s0201a0:467_5: tathāpi ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakena nesaṃ nayena atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a0:467_6: Idha pana lokiyanayaṃ pahāya lokuttaranayo eva gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:467_7: Tattha satisambojjhaṅgantiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva –
atk-s0201a0:470_4: rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño sāpateyyaṃ apilāpeti, ettakaṃ, mahārāja, hiraññaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:470_11: Kiccavaseneva hissa etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ therena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:470_15: Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0201a0:471_9: Yathāha “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti.
atk-s0201a0:472_0: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:472_3: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:472_13: Evaṃ tāva ekassa ādipadassa atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a0:473_29: Evaṃ sesapadānampi atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a0:474_2: sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato sabbesaṃ sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgova paṭhamaṃ vutto.
atk-s0201a0:474_3: Tato paraṃ “so tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ pubbāpariyavacane payojanaṃ sutteyeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:475_0: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
atk-s0201a0:475_2: Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:475_22: Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti,
atk-s0201a0:476_0: Evaṃ tāva “satisambojjhaṅga”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbā.
atk-s0201a0:476_2: attano cittasantāne punappunaṃ janeti abhinibbattetīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:476_6: Tassa nānattaṃ “ariyadhamme avinīto”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:477_0: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:477_1: Tathā hi ayaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:477_6: te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0201a0:477_9: Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:478_0: Kevalañhettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0201a0:478_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0201a0:478_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggattaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti.
atk-s0201a0:478_9: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggattaṃ
atk-s0201a0:479_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0201a0:479_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:479_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0201a0:479_7: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:480_2: Āsavuppattiyaṃ panettha imesaṃ uparimaggattayasampayuttānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo āsavā,
atk-s0201a0:480_3: bhāvayato evaṃsa te āsavā na hontīti ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:481_1: bhāvanā pahātabbāti ime tayo āsavā imāya maggattayasampayuttāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya pahātabbāti vuccantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:482_1: Idāni imehi sattahākārehi pahīnāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ thomento āsavappahāne cassa ānisaṃsaṃ dassento eteheva
atk-s0201a0:482_2: ca kāraṇehi āsavappahāne sattānaṃ ussukkaṃ janento yato kho,
atk-s0201a0:482_8: Ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbāti ye āsavā dassanena pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a0:483_4: Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi nimmalamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:483_9: Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a0:484_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṃ arahattamaggena sammā mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca ye ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati.
atk-s0201a0:484_6: “esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti evaṃ vuttakoṭanto cāti evaṃ cattāro antā,
atk-s0201a0:484_7: tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antimakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:485_2: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti idaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyāpariyosānaṃ bhagavato bhāsitaṃ sukathitaṃ sulapitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:485_3: evametaṃ bhagavā evametaṃ sugatāti matthakena sampaṭicchantā abbhanumodiṃsūti.
atk-s0201a0:486_1: taṃ pubbe vuttattā ca suviññeyyattā ca na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:491_3: tasmā taṃ dassetvā vassa apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0201a0:491_8: Sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmāti
atk-s0201a0:491_16: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuramāhaccatiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca.
atk-s0201a0:491_18: Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:492_1: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:492_5: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:493_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakamiva appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:493_2: Pacchābhattampi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu āhaṭesu gaṇḍiṃyeva paharitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha,
atk-s0201a0:493_4: Sā ca nesaṃ pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:493_5: Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a0:494_3: Sā sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso viya ca,
atk-s0201a0:494_4: yathā hi nagaradvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṃ disvā vajjaṃ pahāya niddosā honti,
atk-s0201a0:494_5: evameva sikkhākāmā kulaputtā payogamaṇḍanena attānaṃ maṇḍetukāmā imaṃ sabbakāyikādāsūpamaṃ desanaṃ āvajjitvā
atk-s0201a0:494_6: āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ vajjetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ pūrentā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:495_8: tassa mā paṭiggāhakā bhavathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:495_15: Maggaphalanibbānabhedo hi navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo nippariyāyadhammo nibbattitadhammo,
atk-s0201a0:495_16: na yena kenaci pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā dhammo.
atk-s0201a0:495_24: evaṃ karonto anupubbena nippariyāyadhammaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0201a0:495_27: na aññena pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā āmisaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:495_30: idhekacco vaṭṭaṃ patthento sampattibhavaṃ icchamāno dānaṃ deti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:496_1: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā bhikkhū maggaphalanibbānāni adhigacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:496_2: Vuttampi cetaṃ “so hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā,
atk-s0201a0:496_6: Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti ca –
atk-s0201a0:496_9: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti ca.
atk-s0201a0:496_11: Bhagavatā hi kathitattā evaṃ jānanti “vivaṭṭaṃ patthetvā dānaṃ dento…pe…
atk-s0201a0:496_12: samāpattiyo nibbattento anukkamena amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:496_14: Bhagavatā hi anuññātattāyeva bhikkhūhi jīvakavatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā paṇītacīvaraṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:497_5: saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadika”nti evaṃ anuññātattāyeva paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:497_10: pañca leṇānī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā anuññātattāyeva vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti imāni senāsanāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:497_18: phāṇita”nti evamādinā nayena anuññātattā nānābhesajjāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:498_3: samāpattiyo nibbattetvā anukkamena pariyāyāmisaṃ dibbasampattiṃ manussasampattiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti. Tadeva,
atk-s0201a0:498_4: yasmā nippariyāyadhammopi pariyāyadhammopi nippariyāyāmisampi pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:498_5: tasmā tattha attano sāmibhāvaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0201a0:499_2: Yañca kho etaṃ mayhameva santakaṃ āmisaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:499_6: Yo hi jinasāsane pabbajitvā paccayaparamo viharati catūsu taṇhuppādesu sandissamāno nikkhittadhuro dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:499_9: Yo pana anuññātapaccayesu appicchatādīni nissāya paṭisaṅkhā sevamāno paṭipattiparamo viharati catūsu ariyavaṃsesu sandissamāno,
atk-s0201a0:500_1: bhavissati vā anāgatamaddhānaṃ “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā sāvakānaṃ alābhatthiko evamāhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:500_2: tesaṃ atipaṇītalābhatthiko ahaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti dassetumāha atthi me tumhesu…pe…
atk-s0201a0:501_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā anuddayā hitesitā,
atk-s0201a0:501_2: kena nu kho kāraṇena kena upāyena sāvakā dhammadāyādā assu dhammakoṭṭhāsasāmino,
atk-s0201a0:501_5: passati kira bhagavā āmisagarukānaṃ āmise upakkhalitānaṃ atītakāle tāva kapilassa bhikkhuno,
atk-s0201a0:501_9: Tasmā tesaṃ apāyā parimuttiṃ sabbaguṇasampattiñca icchanto āha –
atk-s0201a0:501_10: “atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:501_12: Paccayagaruko ca catuparisantare kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nibbutaṅgāro viya ca nittejo nippabho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:501_13: Tato vivattitacitto dhammagaruko tejavā sīhova abhibhuyyacārī,
atk-s0201a0:502_2: mā āmisadāyādā”ti idaṃ anukampāya paṇītataraṃ lābhaṃ icchantena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:502_3: no alābhatthikenāti sāvetvā idāni imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassento āha “tumhe ca me,
atk-s0201a0:502_6: Tattha tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthāti tumhepi tena āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena ādiyā bhaveyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:502_8: viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kinti?
atk-s0201a0:503_0: Ahampi tena ādiyo bhaveyyanti ahampi tena tumhākaṃ āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena gārayho bhaveyyaṃ. Kinti? Āmisa…pe… dāyādāti.
atk-s0201a0:503_5: tattha viññū maṃ garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:503_6: Seyyathāpi nāma anākappasampanne bhikkhū disvā ācariyupajjhāye garahanti “kassime saddhivihārikā,
atk-s0201a0:503_8: seyyathā vā pana kulakumārake vā kulakumārikāyo vā dussīle pāpadhamme disvā mātāpitaro garahanti “kassime puttā,
atk-s0201a0:503_10: evameva maṃ viññū garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:504_0: Evaṃ imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassento tumhe ca metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:504_1: Tattha ahampi tena na ādiyo bhaveyyanti seyyathāpi nāma vattaparipūrake daharabhikkhū uddesaparipucchāsampanne
atk-s0201a0:504_7: paṭibalo vata ovadituṃ anusāsitu”nti ācariyupajjhāyā na ādiyā na gārayhā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a0:504_8: evameva ahampi tena tumhākaṃ dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvena kassa sāvakā nālakapaṭipadaṃ tuvaṭṭakapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0201a0:504_9: candūpamapaṭipadaṃ rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ mahāgosiṅgasālapaṭipadaṃ mahāsuññatapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsesu
atk-s0201a0:504_10: sakkhibhūtā paccayagedhato vivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasamā viharantīti;
atk-s0201a0:504_12: asakkhi vata sāvake āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipattipūrake kātu”nti viññūnaṃ na ādiyo na gārayho bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0201a0:504_13: Evamimasmiṃ pade adhippāyaṃ ñatvā sesaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayapaccanīkena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:504_14: Evaṃ imassa ovādassa karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ ovādaṃ niyyātento āha –
atk-s0201a0:505_1: Evamimaṃ ovādaṃ niyyātetvā idāni tassā dhammadāyādapaṭipattiyā paripūrakāriṃ thometuṃ idhāhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:505_3: Bhagavato hi thomanaṃ sutvāpi hontiyeva tadatthāya paṭipajjitāro.
atk-s0201a0:506_4: yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā paṭikkhittabhojano tittovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:506_5: Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā paccayapavāraṇā anatirittapavāraṇā yāvadatthapavāraṇāti. Tattha,
atk-s0201a0:506_7: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a0:506_9: saṅghaṃ catumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu”nti ca “aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti ca ayaṃ paccayapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a0:506_15: “Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a0:507_10: Ettha ca purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pacchimāni sādhakāni.
atk-s0201a0:508_10: Jighacchādubbalyaparetāti jighacchāya ca dubbalyena ca paretā phuṭṭhā anugatā ca aṭṭhapi dasapi divasāni.
atk-s0201a0:508_11: Tattha keci jighacchitāpi na dubbalā honti,
atk-s0201a0:508_13: Ime pana na tādisāti dassetuṃ ubhayamāha.
atk-s0201a0:509_1: yasmiṃ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi,
atk-s0201a0:509_4: yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti,
atk-s0201a0:510_0: Appāṇaketi nippāṇake piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe.
atk-s0201a0:510_1: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āḷulite sukhumapāṇakā maranti,
atk-s0201a0:511_1: Yo imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṭṭhu sutavā punappunaṃ āvajjeti ca,
atk-s0201a0:511_4: saddo kesohāraṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu.
atk-s0201a0:511_14: sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:511_19: Evanti yathā idāni imaṃ khaṇaṃ vītināmemi,
atk-s0201a0:512_0: So taṃ piṇḍapātanti so taṃ sadevakena lokena sirasā sampaṭicchitabbarūpaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0201a0:512_1: abhuñjitvā dhammadāyādabhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamāno ādittasīsūpamaṃ paccavekkhitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ
atk-s0201a0:513_0: Atha dutiyassāti imasmiṃ pana vāre esa saṅkhepo,
atk-s0201a0:513_4: pabbajitena kho vāḷamigākule araññe bhesajjaṃ viya pañcakāmaguṇavāḷākule gāme piṇḍapātopi dukkhaṃ pariyesituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:513_5: Ayaṃ pana piṇḍapāto iti pariyesanādīnavavimutto ca sugatātiritto cāti ubhato sujātakhattiyakumāro viya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:513_6: yehi ca pañcahi kāraṇehi piṇḍapāto na paribhuñjitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:513_8: puggalaṃ garahitvā na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “alajjipuggalassa santako”ti.
atk-s0201a0:513_10: Sāmikānukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu jighacchito”ti.
atk-s0201a0:513_11: So dhāto tasseva antevāsikādīsu anukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “antevāsikā aññe vā tappaṭibaddhā jighacchitā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:513_13: apica kho assaddhatāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu assaddho”ti.
atk-s0201a0:513_20: bhagavā tesaṃ aggoti evaṃ cintetvā ca so taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:513_23: sopi bhuñjitabbakameva piṇḍapātaṃ na bhutto hoti.
atk-s0201a0:514_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yadipi so bhikkhu evaṃ bhuñjitabbameva bhuñjitvā kātabbameva kareyya.
atk-s0201a0:514_6: Atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhūti yo purimo bhikkhu tampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:514_7: soyeva mama dvīsu sūresu sūrataro viya dvīsu paṇḍitesu paṇḍitataro viya ca pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro ca,
atk-s0201a0:514_8: dutiyabhikkhuto atirekena pūjanīyo ca pasaṃsanīyo cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:515_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ kāraṇena sādhento taṃ kissa hetūtiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:515_3: kasmā so bhikkhu bhagavato pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro cāti?
atk-s0201a0:515_4: Tañhi tassāti yasmā taṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ tassa bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ appicchatāya…pe…
atk-s0201a0:515_6: Tassa hi sace aparena samayena paccayesu atricchatā vā pāpicchatā vā mahicchatā vā uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a0:515_7: Tato naṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepaṅkusena nivāressati “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a0:515_9: Esa nayo asantuṭṭhiyā asaṃlekhassa cuppannassa nivāraṇe.
atk-s0201a0:515_10: Evaṃ tāvassa appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā saṃlekhāya saṃvattissati.
atk-s0201a0:516_1: idhekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hoti dupposo.
atk-s0201a0:516_2: Ekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi subharo hoti suposo. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:516_3: Yo hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati,
atk-s0201a0:516_4: aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṃ gāmaṃ vicaritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati,
atk-s0201a0:516_6: Yo pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:516_7: tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnampi deti,
atk-s0201a0:516_9: Etaṃ disvā manussā dūrato parivajjanti dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positunti.
atk-s0201a0:516_10: Yo pana yaṃkiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:516_12: Yo ca paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā tesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti,
atk-s0201a0:516_14: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti –
atk-s0201a0:516_16: mayameva naṃ posissāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0201a0:517_0: Tattha sace aparena samayena assa attano vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā dubbharatānayena cittaṃ uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a0:517_2: “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ cittaṃ uppādesī”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamāno,
atk-s0201a0:517_6: “are tvaṃ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tathā jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a0:517_11: Evamassime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:518_1: Atra hi pāḷiyaṃyeva appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāvīriyārambhavasena tīṇi āgatāni,
atk-s0201a0:518_6: kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a0:518_9: Evaṃ ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:518_10: Dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:519_1: Etesu hi appicchakathā santosakathā asaṃsaggakathā sīlakathāti imā catasso kathā adhisīlasikkhāsaṅgahitāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:519_2: Pavivekakathā vīriyārambhakathā samādhikathāti imā tisso adhicittasikkhasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0201a0:519_3: Paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti imā tisso adhipaññāsikkhāsaṅgahitāti.
atk-s0201a0:519_4: Evaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:519_5: Tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:520_1: Paripūrā hi adhisīlasikkhā asekkho sīlakkhandhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:520_4: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhā evāti evaṃ tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:520_5: Pañca dhammakkhandhā paripūrā amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:520_6: Seyyathāpi uparipabbate pāvussako mahāmegho abhivuṭṭho pabbatakandarasarasākhā paripūreti.
atk-s0201a0:520_12: evameva tassa bhikkhuno ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthuni ādiṃ katvā yāva amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a0:520_13: Evamayaṃ bhikkhu dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno paramadhammadāyādaṃ labhatīti etamatthaṃ sampassamāno bhagavā “taṃ kissa hetu tañhi tassa,
atk-s0201a0:521_0: Evaṃ tassa bhikkhuno pujjatarapāsaṃsatarabhāvaṃ kāraṇena sādhetvā idāni te bhikkhū tathattāya sanniyojento tasmā tiha me bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:521_2: yasmā yo taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:522_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānapariyosānato pabhuti yāva no āmisadāyādāti suttappadesaṃ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a0:522_1: Idaṃ vatvāna sugatoti idañca suttappadesaṃ vatvāva sobhanāya paṭipadāya gatattā sugatoti saṅkhaṃ pattoyeva bhagavā.
atk-s0201a0:522_2: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisī paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ attano mahāgandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya.
atk-s0201a0:523_0: Buddhā kira apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya vihāraṃ pavisantā dvīhi kāraṇehi pavisanti puggalathomanatthaṃ vā dhammathomanatthaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a0:523_4: dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṃ vā kaccānaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
atk-s0201a0:523_11: ahampi naṃ evameva byākareyyanti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:523_12: tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0201a0:523_13: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti,
atk-s0201a0:523_14: te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūrentā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:524_2: “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe tameva āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0201a0:524_3: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā.
atk-s0201a0:524_4: Caturoghanittharaṇaṭṭhena titthe ṭhapitā nāvā viya maggagamanaṭṭhena catuyuttaājaññaratho viya ca bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:524_5: Yathā ca ‘evaṃ karontassa ayaṃ daṇḍo’ti parisati āṇaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pāsādaṃ āruḷhe rājini tattheva
atk-s0201a0:524_6: nisinno senāpati taṃ raññā ṭhapitaṃ āṇaṃ pavatteti;
atk-s0201a0:524_7: evampi mayā ṭhapitaṃ desanaṃ imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto thometvā desessati,
atk-s0201a0:524_8: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā balavatarā majjhanhikasūriyo viya pajjalissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:525_0: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṃ pavisatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:525_3: sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0201a0:526_1: Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ taṃ dhammaṃ thometukāmo tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto…pe…etadavoca.
atk-s0201a0:526_9: bhikkhaveti ettha pana buddhā bhagavanto sāvake ālapantā bhikkhaveti ālapanti.
atk-s0201a0:526_10: Sāvakā pana buddhehi sadisā mā homāti āvusoti paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā bhikkhaveti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:526_11: Buddhehi ca ālapito bhikkhusaṅgho bhadanteti paṭivacanaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:527_7: Vivekaṃ nānusikkhantīti tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampi nānusikkhanti,
atk-s0201a0:527_8: āmisadāyādāva hontīti imamatthaṃ āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:528_0: Evaṃ vutte tamatthaṃ sotukāmā bhikkhū dūratopi khotiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:528_1: Tattha dūratopīti tiroraṭṭhatopi tirojanapadatopi anekayojanagaṇanatopīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:528_4: Āyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātūti āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassa bhāgo hotu,
atk-s0201a0:528_5: āyasmā pana sāriputto attano bhāgaṃ katvā vibhajatūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:528_7: amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-s0201a0:528_12: Tato nesaṃ kathetukāmo thero tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:529_1: āmisadāyādaṃ garahantena bhagavatā “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti ekenevākārena vuttamatthaṃ tīhi ākārehi dassento āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca –
atk-s0201a0:529_5: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:530_0: Ettāvatā yañca bhagavā āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ garahanto “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti āha,
atk-s0201a0:530_1: yañca attanā pucchaṃ pucchi “kittāvatā nu kho…pe…
atk-s0201a0:530_4: So ca kho bhagavato ādiyabhāvaṃ anāmasitvāva.
atk-s0201a0:530_5: Bhagavatoyeva hi yuttaṃ sāvake anuggaṇhantassa “ahampi tena ādiyo bhavissāmī”ti vattuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:531_1: satthu pavivittassāti satthuno tīhi vivekehi accantapavivittassa.
atk-s0201a0:531_4: Yadi pana tividhaṃ vivekaṃ sandhāya vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:531_9: “bāhulikā”tiādinā upadhivivekañca dassetīti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:532_1: ye parato “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinā nayena vakkhati.
atk-s0201a0:532_6: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccanti avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0201a0:532_11: ettāvatā upadhivivekaṃ na paripūrentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:533_0: Ettāvatā aniyameneva vatvā idāni desanaṃ niyamento “tatrāvuso”tiādimāha. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:533_1: Sāvakā “tīhi ṭhānehī”ti evañhi aniyametvāva vuccamāne “kampi maññe bhaṇati,
atk-s0201a0:533_3: “Therā navā majjhimā”ti evaṃ pana niyametvā vuccamāne amhe bhaṇatīti ādaraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:533_4: Yathā raññā “amaccehi nagaravīthiyo sodhetabbā”ti vuttepi “kena nu kho sodhetabbā”ti maññamānā na sodhenti,
atk-s0201a0:533_5: attano attano gharadvāraṃ sodhetabbanti pana bheriyā nikkhantāya sabbe muhuttena sodhenti ca alaṅkaronti ca,
atk-s0201a0:534_4: “Kiṃ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
atk-s0201a0:534_9: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
atk-s0201a0:535_0: Iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha gārayhāti garahitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:535_1: Therā nāma samānā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na upenti,
atk-s0201a0:535_5: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a0:535_7: Dutiyena ṭhānenāti etthāpi ime nāma āvuso therāpi samānā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha,
atk-s0201a0:535_9: accharāsaṅghātamattampi ekamantaṃ nisīditvā cittekaggataṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0201a0:535_10: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a0:535_11: imaṃ nindaṃ āvuso labhantīti dassetīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0201a0:535_15: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti,
atk-s0201a0:536_1: Majjhimāti pañcavasse upādāya yāva nava vassā vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:536_3: Yathā ca tattha navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:537_1: Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkanayena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:537_3: Ime vata therāpi samānā yojanaparamparāya araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni sevanti,
atk-s0201a0:537_5: evaṃ jiṇṇasarīrāpi āraddhavīriyā paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti,
atk-s0201a0:537_6: navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a0:537_9: ayampi mahāthero saddhivihārikaantevāsikaparivārito hutvā nisīdituṃ yuttakālepi īdisepi vaye vattamāne bhattakiccaṃ katvā paviṭṭho sāyaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:537_14: sabbathāpi cittavivekaṃ pūretīti iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a0:537_16: Yasmiṃ kāle therassa paṭṭadukūlakoseyyādīni sukhasamphassāni lahucīvarādīni yuttāni,
atk-s0201a0:537_17: tasmimpi nāma kāle ayaṃ mahāthero paṃsukūlāni dhāreti,
atk-s0201a0:537_18: asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā vigatanīvaraṇo phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā upadhivivekaṃ paripūrayamāno viharati,
atk-s0201a0:537_19: navamajjhimakāle kīdiso ahosīti iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā pāsaṃsā bhavanti,
atk-s0201a0:538_6: te ca dhamme na pajahantī”ti evaṃ pahātabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:540_1: “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādinā nayena vuttadesanāyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:540_3: doso ca pāpakoti ime dve dhammā pāpakā lāmakā,
atk-s0201a0:540_7: Tesu lobho āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hoti,
atk-s0201a0:541_0: Idāni tesaṃ pahānūpāyaṃ dassento lobhassa ca pahānāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:541_2: tassa pana pāpakassa lobhassa ca dosassa ca pahānāya.
atk-s0201a0:541_3: Atthi majjhimā paṭipadāti maggaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:541_5: doso eko antoti ete dve ante na upeti,
atk-s0201a0:542_1: Sā hi saccānaṃ dassanāya saṃvattati dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti cakkhukaraṇī.
atk-s0201a0:542_7: Maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato.
atk-s0201a0:542_8: Nibbānaṃ nāma appaccayaṃ tassa pana sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāya saṃvattanato nibbānāya saṃvattatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:543_0: Idāni taṃ majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā nayena vissajjeti.
atk-s0201a0:544_5: Aripahānāya saṃvattatītipi ariyena desitotipi ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāya saṃvattatītipi ariyo.
atk-s0201a0:544_13: tassa katamo so iti ceti attho,
atk-s0201a0:545_8: Nibbacanampi nesaṃ sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhīti eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:546_0: Tattha sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā micchādiṭṭhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca avijjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:551_0: Sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca kosajjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:553_0: Sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca uddhaccañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:554_3: yvāyaṃ cattāropi lokuttaramagge ekato katvā kathito “aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”,
atk-s0201a0:555_0: Evaṃ pahātabbadhammesu lobhadose tappahānupāyañca dassetvā idāni aññepi pahātabbadhamme tesaṃ pahānupāyañca dassento tatrāvuso,
atk-s0201a0:561_5: sativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānoti evaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:561_7: vitthāro pana “tattha katamo kodho”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:562_0: Visesato cettha āmisadāyādo attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati,
atk-s0201a0:562_3: So evaṃ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi aññassa lābhino guṇe makkheti,
atk-s0201a0:562_6: evaṃ makkhī paḷāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu kiṃ imassa imināti issati padussati,
atk-s0201a0:562_11: Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a0:562_15: So evaṃ paṭipanno sace yathādhippāyaṃ lābhaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:562_19: Sace pana naṃ koci kiñci vadati “nayidaṃ evaṃ kātabba”nti,
atk-s0201a0:562_20: tena sāraddhacitto hoti bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayha bhāṇī,
atk-s0201a0:562_22: Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṃ maññanto mānī hoti.
atk-s0201a0:562_25: So tehi mānātimānehi jātimadādianekarūpaṃ madaṃ janeti.
atk-s0201a0:563_0: Evaṃ āmisadāyādo aparimutto hoti imehi pāpakehi dhammehi aññehi ca evarūpehi.
atk-s0201a0:563_2: Pahānupāyo pāṭhato ca atthato ca sabbattha nibbisesoyeva.
atk-s0201a0:564_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthaṃ panettha ayaṃ bhedo ca kamo ca bhāvanānayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:564_2: ayañhi majjhimā paṭipadā kadāci ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:564_4: Ayañhi lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasena uppajjamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:565_14: Tasmā iminā kamena etāni aṅgāni vuttānīti evamettha kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:566_2: Idhekacco paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:566_4: so tañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a0:566_9: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a0:566_10: so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti,
atk-s0201a0:566_11: tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a0:567_0: Idha panekacco vuttappakāraṃ samathaṃ anuppādetvāva pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vipassati,
atk-s0201a0:567_2: Tassa vipassanāpāripūriyā tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ vossaggārammaṇato uppajjati cittassa ekaggatā,
atk-s0201a0:567_6: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati,
atk-s0201a0:568_0: Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ pana vipassanaṃ bhāvayatopi vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayatopi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā yuganaddhāva honti.
atk-s0201a0:572_5: bhagavato sāvatthiyaṃ vihāre avicchinneyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:573_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:573_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0201a0:573_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:574_2: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:574_3: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0201a0:574_4: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:574_5: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:574_10: kacci bhoto gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0201a0:574_11: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:574_12: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sārāṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:574_16: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgato,
atk-s0201a0:575_2: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti,
atk-s0201a0:575_6: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:576_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:576_3: atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ uparivātaṃ unnatapadesaṃ atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti.
atk-s0201a0:576_4: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:576_13: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi,
atk-s0201a0:577_2: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulassa putto”ti evaṃ āgatā uccākulappasutā jātikulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:577_3: “Ye te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārasampannā ācārakulaputtā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:578_8: evaṃ sabbathāpi anagāriyasaṅkhātaṃ pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā upagatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:578_11: Bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo samādapetāti te kulaputte bhavaṃ gotamo adhisīlādīni gāhetā sikkhāpetā.
atk-s0201a0:578_15: tepi tandiṭṭhikā honti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:579_1: Esa kira pubbe aneke kulaputte agāramajjhe vasante devaputte viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāne anto ca bahi ca susaṃvihitārakkhe disvā,
atk-s0201a0:579_2: te aparena samayena bhagavato madhurarasaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhāya gharā nikkhamma pabbajitvā ghāsacchādanaparamatāya
atk-s0201a0:579_3: santuṭṭhe āraññakesu senāsanesu kenaci arakkhiyamānepi anussaṅkitāparisaṅkite haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe udaggudagge addasa,
atk-s0201a0:579_4: disvā ca imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ “ayaṃ phāsuvihāro kaṃ nissāya uppanno”ti cintento “samaṇaṃ gotama”nti bhagavati pasādaṃ alattha.
atk-s0201a0:579_5: So taṃ pasādaṃ nivedetuṃ bhagavato santikaṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a0:580_0: Athassa bhagavā taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto abbhanumodanto ca evametaṃ brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:580_1: Vacanasampaṭicchanānumodanatthoyeva hi ettha ayaṃ evanti nipāto.
atk-s0201a0:580_8: na sakkā appesakkhehi ajjhogāhitunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:580_12: tathāpi yantaṃ “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āraññikaṅganipphādakaṃ senāsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:581_8: Ettha ca pariyantānanti imamekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi vanapatthāni veditabbānī.
atk-s0201a0:581_14: Kāyaviveke katepi tattha cittaṃ abhiramāpetuṃ dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0201a0:581_16: Haranti maññeti haranti viya ghasanti viya.
atk-s0201a0:581_18: Samādhiṃ alabhamānassāti upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā alabhantassa.
atk-s0201a0:581_20: Īdisassa bhikkhuno tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehi vividhehi ca bhiṃsanakehi vanāni cittaṃ vikkhipanti maññeti,
atk-s0201a0:581_21: sabbaṃ brāhmaṇo saddhāpabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ araññavāse vimhito āha.
atk-s0201a0:583_1: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva “evametaṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādīhi taṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā abbhanumoditvā
atk-s0201a0:583_2: ca yasmā soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇapariggaharahitānaṃyeva tādisāni senāsanāni durabhisambhavāni,
atk-s0201a0:583_4: attanā ca bodhisatto samāno tādiso ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:583_5: tasmā attano tādisānaṃ senāsanānaṃ durabhisambhavataṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:584_3: Bodhisattasseva satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ arahasattasseva sato,
atk-s0201a0:584_5: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato bodhiyā
atk-s0201a0:584_6: satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ amuñcantoyeva āgato,
atk-s0201a0:584_8: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:584_9: Ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti ye keci pabbajjūpagatā vā bhovādino vā.
atk-s0201a0:585_1: Aparisuddhakāyakammantasandosahetūti aparisuddhassa kāyakammantasaṅkhātassa attano dosassa hetu,
atk-s0201a0:585_13: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a0:585_14: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā,
atk-s0201a0:585_16: āgantvā parehi parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a0:585_17: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a0:586_1: paṭisevāmīti ahaṃ kho pana aparisuddhakāyakammanto hutvā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na paṭisevāmi.
atk-s0201a0:586_2: Ye hi voti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:586_3: Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca.
atk-s0201a0:586_5: Tesamahaṃ aññataroti tesaṃ ahampi eko aññataro.
atk-s0201a0:586_6: Bodhisatto hi gahaṭṭhopi pabbajitopi parisuddhakāyakammantova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:586_11: atirekaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ atirekena vā sotthibhāvamāpajjinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:589_3: vacīkammantavāre tāva aparisuddhavacīkammantāti aparisuddhena musāvādādinā vacīkammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:589_6: pisuṇavācāya mittabhedaṃ katvā pharusavācāya paresaṃ parisamajjhe mammāni tuditvā niratthakavācāya parasattānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:589_10: idāni anubandhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a0:589_11: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā idānimhā naṭṭhā”ti tasanti vittasanti āgantvā parehi
atk-s0201a0:589_12: parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti.
atk-s0201a0:589_13: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:590_0: Manokammantavāre aparisuddhamanokammantāti aparisuddhena abhijjhādinā manokammantena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:590_2: Te paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ uppādetvā parassa kujjhitvā parasatte micchādassanaṃ gāhāpetvā mayaṃ ayuttamakamhā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:591_0: Ājīvavāre aparisuddhājīvāti aparisuddhena vejjakammadūtakammavaḍḍhipayogādinā ekavīsatianesanabhedena ājīvena samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:591_3: “sāsanasodhakā kira tepiṭakā bhikkhū sāsanaṃ sodhetuṃ nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a0:591_4: ajja vā sve vā idhāgamissantī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:591_6: Te hi āgantvā parivāretvā gahitā viya odātavatthanivāsitā viya ca hontīti.
atk-s0201a0:592_1: Ito paraṃ abhijjhālūtiādīsu kiñcāpi abhijjhābyāpādā manokammantena saṅgahitā tathāpi nīvaraṇavasena puna vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:592_6: tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ araññe viharantānaṃ divā diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti –
atk-s0201a0:592_8: rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a0:592_10: thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayabyasanaṃ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:593_5: abhadrakena paresaṃ anatthajanakena cittasaṅkappena samannāgatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:593_7: Bhayabheravāvhāyanaṃ ito pabhuti abhijjhāluvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:593_10: Na kho panāhaṃ byāpannacittoti ettha pana mettacitto ahaṃ hitacittoti dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:593_12: Evaṃ sabbattha vuttadosapaṭipakkhavasena bodhisattassa guṇā vaṇṇetabbā.
atk-s0201a0:594_1: Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitāti cittagelaññabhūtena thinena sesanāmakāyagelaññabhūtena middhena ca pariyuṭṭhitā,
atk-s0201a0:595_2: uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe cittaṃ vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṃ vātena paṭākā viya.
atk-s0201a0:596_1: Kaṅkhī vicikicchīti ettha ekamevidaṃ pañcamaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:596_2: Kiṃ nu kho idanti ārammaṇaṃ kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā,
atk-s0201a0:597_1: Attukkaṃsanakā paravambhīti ye attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti ukkhipanti,
atk-s0201a0:597_7: Te parehi “asuko ca kira asuko ca attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti,
atk-s0201a0:597_10: gaṇhatha ne”ti anubaddhā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vāti kāyakammantasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:598_3: gāmadārakā viya bhayabahulā asūrā kātarāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:599_4: paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā ca abhisaṅkharitvā katā sakkārāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:599_5: Yā ca parehi attano gāravakiriyā pupphādīhi vā pūjā.
atk-s0201a0:600_0: Eko kira piyagāmiko nāma bhikkhu samādinnadhutaṅgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhaṃ disvā “ahampi dhutaṅgaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0201a0:600_1: lābhaṃ uppādemī”ti cintetvā sosānikaṅgaṃ samādāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0201a0:600_2: Athekadivasaṃ eko kammamutto jaraggavo divā gocare caritvā rattiṃ tasmiṃ susāne pupphagumbe sīsaṃ katvā romanthayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:600_3: Piyagāmiko rattiṃ caṅkamanā nikkhanto tassa hanusaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “addhā maṃ lābhagiddho esa susāne vasatīti ñatvā devarājā viheṭhetuṃ āgato”ti,
atk-s0201a0:600_4: so jaraggavassa purato añjaliṃ paggahetvā “sappurisa devarāja ajja me ekarattiṃ khama,
atk-s0201a0:600_5: sve paṭṭhāya na evaṃ karissāmī”ti namassamāno sabbarattiṃ yācanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:600_6: Tato sūriye uṭṭhite taṃ disvā kattarayaṭṭhiyā paharitvā palāpesi “sabbarattiṃ maṃ bhiṃsāpesī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:602_5: Duvidhā hi sati paññāsampayuttā paññāvippayuttā ca.
atk-s0201a0:602_10: dubbalāya satiyā satikiccābhāvatoti etamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ “asampajānā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:602_11: Te evaṃ muṭṭhassatī asampajānā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a0:603_3: Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati,
atk-s0201a0:603_4: vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu uddhaccena ekārammaṇe vipphandati.
atk-s0201a0:603_5: Pubbe vuttanayenena te evaṃ asamāhitā vibbhantacittā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a0:604_16: Te duppaññā eḷamūgā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:604_17: Tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ araññe viharantānaṃ divā diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti “te ākulacittā appamattakenapi tasanti vittasanti,
atk-s0201a0:604_18: rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a0:604_20: thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayavyasanaṃ āpāditā viya hontī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:604_21: Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a0:604_22: Paññāsampannohamasmīti ettha paññāsampannoti paññāya sampanno samannāgato,
atk-s0201a0:604_25: apica kho pana imesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇavavatthānapaññāyāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:608_2: Bodhisatto kira imāni soḷasārammaṇāni pariggaṇhanto ca bhayabheravaṃ adisvā bhayabheravaṃ nāma evarūpāsu rattīsu evarūpe senāsane ca paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:608_4: etamatthaṃ bhagavā idāni brāhmaṇassa dassento tassa mayhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:609_0: Tattha yā tāti ubhayametaṃ rattīnaṃyeva uddesaniddesavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:609_2: Tasmā abhiññātāti candapāripūriyā candaparikkhayenāti evamādīhi lakkhaṇehi ñātāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:610_0: Cātuddasīti pakkhassa paṭhamadivasato pabhuti catuddasannaṃ pūraṇī ekā ratti.
atk-s0201a0:610_3: Etā tisso tisso katvā cha rattiyo,
atk-s0201a0:610_4: tasmā sabbattha pakkhavacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ “pakkhassa cātuddasī pakkhassa pañcadasī pakkhassa aṭṭhamī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:610_7: Buddhe kira bhagavati anuppannepi uppajjitvā aparinibbutepi pañcamī anabhilakkhitāyeva,
atk-s0201a0:610_8: parinibbute pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherā cintesuṃ “dhammassavanaṃ cirena hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:611_6: Lokiyā hi dibbādhivatthāti vā maññamānā tesuyeva vā dibbasaññino hutvā ārāmavanarukkhe cittīkaronti, pūjenti,
atk-s0201a0:611_12: Appeva nāma passeyyanti api nāma taṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyyameva.
atk-s0201a0:611_14: “etadahosi yaṃnūnāha”nti evaṃ cintitakālato paṭṭhāya aññena kālena.
atk-s0201a0:612_0: Tattha ca me brāhmaṇa viharatoti tathārūpesu senāsanesu yaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ āyācanaupahārakaraṇārahaṃ
atk-s0201a0:612_3: yaṃ divāpi passantānaṃ hadayaṃ maññe phalati,
atk-s0201a0:612_4: taṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha ca me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:612_6: Mago vā āgacchatīti siṅgāni vā khurāni vā koṭṭento gokaṇṇakhaggadīpivarāhādibhedo mago vā āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:614_0: Magarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:615_0: Moro vā kaṭṭhaṃ pātetīti moro vā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ rukkhato cāletvā pāteti.
atk-s0201a0:615_2: tena yo koci pakkhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:615_3: Atha vā moro vāti vā saddena añño vā koci pakkhīti.
atk-s0201a0:615_5: Vāto vā paṇṇakasaṭaṃ eretīti vāto vā paṇṇakacavaraṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0201a0:615_6: Etaṃ nūna taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchatīti yametaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:615_8: Ito pabhuti ca ārammaṇameva bhayabheravanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:615_9: Parittassa ca adhimattassa ca bhayassa ārammaṇattā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sukhamiva.
atk-s0201a0:615_10: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ aññadatthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmīti ahaṃ kho kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ekaṃseneva bhayaṃ ākaṅkhamāno icchamāno hutvā viharāmi.
atk-s0201a0:616_0: Yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassāti yena yena iriyāpathena bhūtassa bhavitassa sato vattamānassa samaṅgībhūtassa vā.
atk-s0201a0:616_2: Tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūto vāti tena teneva iriyāpathena bhūto bhavito santo vattamāno samaṅgībhūto vāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:616_4: paṭivinemīti bodhisattassa kira caṅkamantassa tasmiṃ magasiṅgakhurasaddādibhede bhayabheravārammaṇe āgate neva mahāsatto tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:616_6: atha kho caṅkamantova parivīmaṃsanto parivicinanto bhayabheravaṃ na passati,
atk-s0201a0:616_9: na bhayabheravanti tato tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā sayati vā.
atk-s0201a0:616_12: Ito parañca iriyāpathapaṭipāṭiyā avatvā āsannapaṭipāṭiyā iriyāpathā vuttāti veditabbā,
atk-s0201a0:616_13: caṅkamantassa hi bhayabherave āgate na ṭhito na nisinno na nipanno ṭhitassāpi āgate na caṅkamīti evaṃ tassa āsannapaṭipāṭiyā vuttāti.
atk-s0201a0:619_1: Evaṃ bhiṃsanakesupi ṭhānesu attano bhayabheravābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni jhāyīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānesu attano asammohavihāraṃ dassetuṃ santi kho pana,
atk-s0201a0:620_7: Idhekacco odātakasiṇalābhī divā parikammaṃ katvā divā samāpanno divāyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:620_8: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:620_10: Odātakasiṇapharaṇavasena cassa visadaṃ hoti vibhūtaṃ suvibhūtaṃ. So,
atk-s0201a0:620_11: divā vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya odātakasiṇapharaṇavisadavibhūtatāya ca rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:620_12: Idha panekacco nīlakasiṇalābhī rattiṃ parikammaṃ katvā rattiṃ samāpanno rattiṃyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:620_13: no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:620_16: So rattiṃ vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya nīlakasiṇapharaṇāvisadāvibhūtatāya ca divāyeva samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:621_0: Sakuṇarutato pana idhekacco antosenāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:621_1: Atha divā ravanakasakuṇā kākādayo candālokena divāti maññamānā rattiṃ ravanti,
atk-s0201a0:621_3: So tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:621_4: Idha panekacco pabbatantare gambhīrāya ghanavanappaṭicchannāya giriguhāya sattāhavaddalikāya vattamānāya antarahitasūriyāloke kāle nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:621_5: Atha rattiṃ ravanakasakuṇā ulūkādayo majjhanhikasamayepi tattha tattha samandhakāre nilīnā rattisaññāya vā aññehi vā kāraṇehi ravanti.
atk-s0201a0:621_6: So tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā divāyeva samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:622_1: sañjānāmīti pākaṭo bodhisattassa rattindivaparicchedo sattāhavaddalepi candimasūriyesu adissamānesupi jānātiyeva “ettakaṃ purebhattakālo gato,
atk-s0201a0:622_7: Anacchariyañcetaṃ yaṃ pūritapāramī bodhisatto evaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:622_8: Padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi hi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:623_0: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre kira godattatthero dvaṅgulakāle bhattaṃ gahetvā aṅgulakāle bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a0:623_1: Sūriye adissamānepi pātoyeva senāsanaṃ pavisitvā tāya velāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a0:623_2: Ekadivasaṃ ārāmikā “sve therassa nikkhamanakāle passāmā”ti bhattaṃ sampādetvā kālatthambhamūle nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:623_4: Tato pabhuti kira sūriye adissamānepi therassa nikkhamanasaññāya eva bheriṃ ākoṭenti.
atk-s0201a0:624_4: Atha nikkhante paṭhame yāme there muggaraṃ gahetvā ṭhitamatteyeva ekaṃ dve vāre paharanteyeva vā yāmayantaṃ patati,
atk-s0201a0:624_5: evaṃ tīsu yāmesu samaṇadhammaṃ katvā thero pātoyeva gāmaṃ pavisitvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0201a0:624_6: bhojanavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā divā vihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:624_7: Bhikkhū kālatthambhaṃ disvā therassa adisvā āgamanatthāya pesenti.
atk-s0201a0:624_8: So bhikkhu theraṃ divā vihāraṭṭhānā nikkhamantameva vā antarāmagge vā passati.
atk-s0201a0:624_9: Evaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:625_1: vadeyyāti ettha pana “yaṃ kho taṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:625_3: sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vacanaṃ vadamāno koci sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:625_6: Mameva taṃ vacanaṃ vadamāno sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:625_8: na vitathavādī assāti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:626_7: mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopayitāti.
atk-s0201a0:626_8: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena ca bhabbapuggalaveneyyasatteyeva gahetvā
atk-s0201a0:626_9: tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya attano uppattiṃ dassetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:626_10: Atthāyāti hi vutte paramatthatthāya nibbānāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:626_11: Hitāyāti vutte taṃ sampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:626_12: nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttari hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:626_15: Vuttañcetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0201a0:629_1: Evaṃ bhagavā buddhaguṇapaṭilābhāvasānaṃ attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ koṭippattaṃ asammohavihāraṃ adhigato,
atk-s0201a0:629_2: taṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:630_0: Keci panāhu “imaṃ asammohavihāraṃ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevaṃ uppannaṃ ‘kāya nu kho paṭipadāya imaṃ patto’ti,
atk-s0201a0:630_1: tassa cittamaññāya imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ uttamaṃ asammohavihāraṃ pattoti dassento evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:631_0: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:631_2: na mayā ayaṃ uttamo asammohavihāro kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena vā adhigato,
atk-s0201a0:631_3: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:631_4: bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:632_0: Upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhāti na kevalañca vīriyameva,
atk-s0201a0:632_3: Passaddho kāyoti kāyacittappassaddhisambhavena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:632_4: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:632_5: tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:632_6: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-s0201a0:632_8: Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:632_9: Samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti,
atk-s0201a0:633_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:633_2: catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsinti ettha tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:633_7: Kiṃ katvā pana bhagavā imāni jhānāni upasampajja vihāsīti,
atk-s0201a0:634_0: Imāni ca pana cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:634_6: Te hi samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmāti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
atk-s0201a0:634_7: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:634_8: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā
atk-s0201a0:634_9: bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a0:634_11: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0201a0:634_12: nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a0:634_14: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmāti nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a0:635_1: taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva ahosi abhiññāpādakañca sabbakiccasādhakañca,
atk-s0201a0:638_2: tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento so evaṃ samāhite cittetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:638_3: Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthārito.
atk-s0201a0:638_7: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇāti ayañca appanāvāro tattha anāgatoti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0201a0:638_10: Abhininnāmesinti ca vacanato soti ettha so ahanti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:639_0: Yasmā cidaṃ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ āgataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:639_1: tasmā “so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti ettha evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:639_2: Ettha hi so tato cutoti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:639_5: Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:639_12: So tato cutoti so ahaṃ tato tusitabhavanato cuto.
atk-s0201a0:639_13: Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-s0201a0:640_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā.
atk-s0201a0:640_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:640_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho,
atk-s0201a0:640_9: Yojanā panettha ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā,
atk-s0201a0:641_4: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa,
atk-s0201a0:641_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0201a0:641_14: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddha”nti.
atk-s0201a0:644_1: Cutūpapātakathāyaṃ yasmā idha bhagavato vasena pāḷi āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:645_3: Yasmā ca pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:645_4: Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatteyeva anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti,
atk-s0201a0:645_6: Tasmā yo tattha parikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhāvanānayo vutto,
atk-s0201a0:648_1: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:648_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:648_8: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ jāniṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:648_9: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti.
atk-s0201a0:648_11: taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti.
atk-s0201a0:648_12: Tassa sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a0:649_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:649_1: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0201a0:649_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:649_9: tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:649_18: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhabhedā jāti,
atk-s0201a0:649_19: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā,
atk-s0201a0:649_20: taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:650_3: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ sattasekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0201a0:650_5: Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:650_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:650_9: Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:651_0: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāya,
atk-s0201a0:651_1: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:651_2: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:651_3: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
atk-s0201a0:651_4: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:652_0: Idāni evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento,
atk-s0201a0:652_7: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe saṅgahetvā pakāsento attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:655_4: atthi nu khvassa aññampi kiñci karaṇīya”nti.
atk-s0201a0:655_5: Athassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā iminā ajjhāsayānusandhinā,
atk-s0201a0:655_7: Tattha siyā kho pana te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:655_10: Na kho panetaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti etaṃ kho pana, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:655_11: tayā mayhaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevanaṃ avītarāgāditāyāti evaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:655_12: Evaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevane akāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kāraṇaṃ dassento dve kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:655_16: dve atthe dve kāraṇāni sampassamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:655_17: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṃ paccakkho attabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:655_19: ekakassa hi araññe antamaso uccārapassāvakiccaṃ upādāya sabbeva iriyāpathā phāsukā honti,
atk-s0201a0:655_21: Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti kathaṃ araññavāsena pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti?
atk-s0201a0:655_22: Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṃ disvā bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni na muñcati,
atk-s0201a0:655_23: yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:655_24: kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti cintetvā tattha vasitabbameva maññissanti.
atk-s0201a0:658_4: Yathā taṃ arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti yathā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho anukampeyya,
atk-s0201a0:659_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca abhikkantaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:659_8: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a0:660_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:664_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:665_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:666_6: abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0201a0:666_7: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-s0201a0:667_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0201a0:667_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0201a0:668_2: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0201a0:668_4: Evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0201a0:668_8: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0201a0:668_9: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0201a0:671_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattayapasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:671_2: Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhavaṃ me gotamo saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:671_4: hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ gacchāmi, bhajāmi, sevāmi,
atk-s0201a0:671_12: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0201a0:671_17: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a0:674_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0201a0:676_0: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:677_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0201a0:680_9: saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho,
atk-s0201a0:681_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati buddho.
atk-s0201a0:681_6: vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi saraṇāni saraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:681_8: Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:682_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca.
atk-s0201a0:682_1: Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
atk-s0201a0:682_2: Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati,
atk-s0201a0:682_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:683_0: Tayidaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti.
atk-s0201a0:683_1: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi,
atk-s0201a0:683_4: Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo,
atk-s0201a0:683_6: saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:683_7: Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko,
atk-s0201a0:683_10: Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomi,
atk-s0201a0:683_11: iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0201a0:683_12: Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:684_7: buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇanti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:684_10: sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:685_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0201a0:687_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:687_1: “Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
atk-s0201a0:688_5: tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati,
atk-s0201a0:688_10: Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0201a0:692_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati,
atk-s0201a0:692_3: so hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0201a0:692_4: Tathā yaṃkiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyaṃ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:693_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:694_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0201a0:698_0: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:700_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:700_5: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
atk-s0201a0:701_0: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:706_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno,
atk-s0201a0:706_2: ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho devānaminda buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:706_3: buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī’ti.
atk-s0201a0:706_4: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi
atk-s0201a0:707_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0201a0:707_4: Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca.
atk-s0201a0:707_10: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññasatthāraṃ na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti.
atk-s0201a0:707_11: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0201a0:711_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci tisaraṇagato gahaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:711_2: “yato kho mahānāma upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0201a0:712_1: So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:713_1: Yathāha “yato kho mahānāma upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti adinnādānā,
atk-s0201a0:713_4: Ettāvatā kho mahānāma upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:714_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:715_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti,
atk-s0201a0:715_2: Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a0:715_4: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti.
atk-s0201a0:715_7: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0201a0:715_13: ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:716_0: Kā sampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca,
atk-s0201a0:716_2: Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā.
atk-s0201a0:716_5: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
atk-s0201a0:717_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati.
atk-s0201a0:717_3: āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0201a0:717_9: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0201a0:718_3: Anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0201a0:718_4: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya,
atk-s0201a0:718_5: neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti vā dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti vā,
atk-s0201a0:718_7: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0201a0:723_6: Tasmā ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma.
atk-s0201a0:724_2: Ettāvatā ca puggalavādī mahātheroti na gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:724_4: so buddhassa bhagavato desanaṃ avilomentoyeva deseti.
atk-s0201a0:726_2: Tattha puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māroti evarūpā sammutidesanā.
atk-s0201a0:726_4: khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānāti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
atk-s0201a0:727_0: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a0:727_2: Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a0:727_5: yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0201a0:727_9: Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:727_11: Tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni.
atk-s0201a0:727_14: Ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:734_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti –
atk-s0201a0:734_9: “Khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:734_11: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:734_12: “Itthī hirīyati ottappati puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:735_0: “Khandhā kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:736_0: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:737_0: “Khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti pitaraṃ arahantaṃ ruhiruppādakammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:737_4: “Khandhā mettāyanti dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:738_0: “Khandhā pubbenivāsamanussaranti dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:738_2: “Khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:738_5: “Puggalā paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:739_1: lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyaṃ lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0201a0:739_2: Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a0:739_3: Tasmā ayampi āyasmā lokavohārakusalatāya buddhassa bhagavato desanaṃ avilomento lokasammutiyaṃ ṭhatvāva cattārome, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:739_5: Tasmā ettha paramatthavasena aggahetvā sammutivaseneva puggalo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:740_2: Sāṅgaṇova samānotiādīsu pana aṅgaṇanti katthaci kilesā vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:740_7: Katthaci yaṃkiñci malaṃ vā paṅko vā,
atk-s0201a0:740_8: yathāha “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:740_12: Tathā hi vakkhati “pāpakānaṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:741_1: Atthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti mayhaṃ attano cittasantāne kileso atthītipi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:741_2: “Ime kilesā nāma kakkhaḷā vāḷā jahitabbā na gahitabbā visaduṭṭhasallasadisā”ti evaṃ yāthāvasarasatopi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:741_5: So “atthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:741_6: Yassa pana na ca maggena samūhatā kilesā,
atk-s0201a0:741_7: na ca uppajjanti yena vā tena vā vāritattā,
atk-s0201a0:741_9: Natthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti “mayhaṃ kilesā yena vā tena vā vāritattā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:741_11: “te uppajjamānā mahāanatthaṃ karissanti kakkhaḷā vāḷā visaduṭṭhasallasadisā”ti evaṃ yāthāvasarasatopi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:741_12: Yo pana “iminā kāraṇena natthī”ti ca jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:741_14: so “natthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:742_3: hetu ko paccayoti ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:742_4: Yenimesanti yena hetunā yena paccayena imesaṃ dvinnaṃ eko seṭṭhapuriso eko hīnapurisoti akkhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:742_5: so ko hetu ko paccayoti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:742_7: pajānanā nappajānanāti idameva ubhayaṃ hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0201a0:743_1: Thero pana attano vicitrapaṭibhānatāya taṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ puna tatrāvusotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:743_2: Tattha tassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhanti tassa puggalassa etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:743_6: “Na chandaṃ janessatī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ achandajananādiṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0201a0:744_0: Tattha ca na chandaṃ janessatīti appajānanto tassa aṅgaṇassa pahānatthaṃ kattukamyatāchandaṃ na janessati.
atk-s0201a0:744_1: Na vāyamissatīti tato balavataraṃ vāyāmaṃ na karissati,
atk-s0201a0:744_2: na vīriyaṃ ārabhissatīti thāmagatavīriyaṃ pana neva ārabhissati,
atk-s0201a0:744_5: Saṃkiliṭṭhacittoti tehiyeva suṭṭhutaraṃ kiliṭṭhacitto malīnacitto vibādhitacitto upatāpitacitto ca hutvā.
atk-s0201a0:745_3: Āpaṇā vā kammārakulā vāti āpaṇato vā kaṃsapātikārakānaṃ kammārānaṃ gharato vā.
atk-s0201a0:745_7: Na ceva paribhuñjeyyunti udakakhādanīyapakkhipanādīhi paribhogaṃ na kareyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:745_8: Na ca pariyodapeyyunti dhovanaghaṃsanādīhi na parisuddhaṃ kārāpeyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:745_11: rajassa āgamanaṭṭhāne vā vuṭṭhānuṭṭhāne vā heṭṭhāmañce vā thusakoṭṭhake vā bhājanantare vā,
atk-s0201a0:745_13: Saṃkiliṭṭhatarā assa malaggahitāti ettha rajāpathe nikkhipanena saṃkiliṭṭhatarā,
atk-s0201a0:745_17: sā kaṃsapāti evaṃ karīyamānā aparena kālena saṃkiliṭṭhatarā ca malaggahitatarā ca mattikapātīti vā kaṃsapātīti vā itipi dujjānā bhaveyya nu kho noti,
atk-s0201a0:745_23: Saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā naparibhuñjanamādiṃ katvā rajāpathanikkhepo viya tassa puggalassa pabbajjaṃ labhamānassa
atk-s0201a0:745_25: Saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā puna saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvo viya tassa puggalassa anukkamena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusikkhato vejjakammādikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:746_0: Saṃkiliṭṭhacitto kālaṃ karissatīti ettha ca akusalacittena kālaṃ karissatīti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:746_1: Sabbasattā hi pakaticittena bhavaṅgacitteneva kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:746_2: Ayaṃ pana avisodhetvā cittasantānaṃ kālaṃ karissatīti etamatthaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:747_1: Na ca naṃ rajāpatheti pubbe vuttappakāre ṭhāne anikkhipitvā karaṇḍamañjūsādīsu vā ṭhapeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:748_2: Kiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā paribhuñjanamādiṃ katvā suddhaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ viya tassa puggalassa pabbajjaṃ labhamānassa
atk-s0201a0:748_4: Ye ovadanti anusāsanti appamattakampi pamādaṃ disvā daṇḍakammaṃ katvā punappunaṃ sikkhāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:748_5: saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā aparakāle parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo viya tassa puggalassa ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusikkhato anukkamena sammāvattapaṭipatti,
atk-s0201a0:748_7: Atha vā anukkamena parisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhāya attano anurūpaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā dhutaṅgāni samādāya
atk-s0201a0:748_8: attano anukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantasenāsanavāsaṃ muñcitvā pantasenāsanavāso,
atk-s0201a0:748_10: Atha vā anukkamena kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattinibbattanena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:748_13: arahattasacchikiriyāti ettha ṭhitassa accantaṃ anaṅgaṇakālakiriyā eva.
atk-s0201a0:749_1: Manasi karissatīti tasmiṃ vipannassati taṃ nimittaṃ āvajjissati.
atk-s0201a0:749_2: Tassa subhanimittassa manasikārāti tassa puggalassa subhanimittamanasikārakāraṇā.
atk-s0201a0:749_4: Rāgo hi uppajjanto kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā sayameva akusalajavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanto kusalacittaṃ anuddhaṃsetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:750_2: Parisuddhakaṃsapātiyā naparibhuñjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā rajāpathe nikkhepo viya tassa puggalassa pabbajjaṃ labhamānassāti
atk-s0201a0:751_0: Catutthavāre subhanimittaṃ na manasi karissatīti tasmiṃ sativirahābhāvato taṃ nimittaṃ nāvajjissati,
atk-s0201a0:752_1: Idāni taṃ aṅgaṇaṃ nānappakārato pākaṭaṃ kārāpetukāmenāyasmatā mahāmoggallānena “aṅgaṇaṃ aṅgaṇa”ntiādinā
atk-s0201a0:752_2: nayena puṭṭho taṃ byākaronto pāpakānaṃ kho etaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:752_5: icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:752_6: Yaṃ idhekaccassāti yena idhekaccassa evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya,
atk-s0201a0:752_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati atthi,
atk-s0201a0:752_10: Na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyunti bhikkhū ca maṃ na jāneyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:752_13: Lābhatthiko hi bhikkhu pakatiyāpi ca katapuñño manussehi sakkato garukato evaṃ cinteti “āpattiṃ āpannaṃ bhikkhuṃ therā ñatvā majjhimānaṃ ārocenti,
atk-s0201a0:752_19: Aho vatāhaṃ āpattiñca vata āpanno assaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:753_0: Yaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhū jāneyyunti yena kāraṇena taṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:753_1: taṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati kho pana atthiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:753_4: Evaṃ so pubbe vuttanayena catūsu parisāsu pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:753_5: Evaṃ pākaṭo ca ayasābhibhūto gāmasatampi pavisitvā ummārasatesu ṭhānesu uñchitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a0:753_6: Tato jānanti maṃ bhikkhū āpattiṃ āpannoti tehi camhi evaṃ nāsitoti cintetvā,
atk-s0201a0:753_7: iti so kupito hoti appatīto so iminā kāraṇena kupito ceva hoti kodhābhibhūto appatīto ca domanassābhibhūto.
atk-s0201a0:754_1: kopo yo ca appaccayo ubhayametaṃ aṅgaṇanti, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:754_4: etaṃ ubhayaṃ aṅgaṇanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:755_0: Anuraho manti purimasadisameva bhikkhuṃ gahetvā vihārapaccante senāsanaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ thaketvā codente icchati.
atk-s0201a0:755_1: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0201a0:755_2: yaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ catuparisamajjhe ānetvā byattā vinītā “tayā asukamhi nāma ṭhāne vejjakammaṃ kata”ntiādinā nayena codeyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:755_4: Evaṃ pākaṭo ca ayasābhibhūtoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0201a0:756_5: taṃ tāva paṭikarohi pacchā maṃ codessasīti vattuṃ sakkāti maññamāno.
atk-s0201a0:756_7: Ayañhi attano jātiyā kulena bāhusaccena byattatāya dhutaṅgenāti evamādīhipi samāneneva codanaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:756_10: Imehi āpattādīhi asadisattā paṭisattu paṭisallo codako bhavituṃ ayuttoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:756_11: Iti so kupitoti iti so imāya appaṭipuggalacodanāya evaṃ kupito hoti.
atk-s0201a0:757_0: Catutthavāre aho vatāti “aho vata re amhākaṃ paṇḍitakā,
atk-s0201a0:757_1: aho vata re amhākaṃ bahussutakā tevijjakā”ti garahāyaṃ dissati.
atk-s0201a0:757_2: “Aho vata maṃ daharaṃyeva samānaṃ rajje abhisiñceyyu”nti patthanāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:757_5: Ayaṃ bhikkhu lābhatthiko bhagavato attānaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:757_7: no maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā antaraṃ katvā.
atk-s0201a0:757_8: Ayañhi passati bhagavantaṃ sāriputtādayo mahāthere “taṃ kiṃ maññasi,
atk-s0201a0:757_11: rāhula cakkhuṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ parisamajjhe paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:757_12: manusse ca “tesa paṇḍitā therā satthu cittaṃ ārādhentī”ti vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇante,
atk-s0201a0:757_14: Tasmā taṃ lābhasakkāraṃ icchanto evaṃ cintetvā nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitakhāṇu viya bhagavato puratova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:758_0: Iti so kupitoti atha bhagavā taṃ amanasikaritvāva aññaṃ theraṃ paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a0:758_1: tena so kupito hoti bhagavato ca therassa ca.
atk-s0201a0:758_3: “Ahaṃ pabbajitakālato pabhuti gandhakuṭipariveṇato bahinikkhamanaṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0201a0:758_6: Taṃmuhuttaṃ diṭṭhamattakameva theraṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ desetī”ti evaṃ bhagavato kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:758_8: “Ayaṃ mahallakatthero bhagavato purato khāṇu viya nisīdati,
atk-s0201a0:758_9: kadā nu kho imaṃ dhammakammikā abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā nīharissanti,
atk-s0201a0:758_10: ayañhi yadi imasmiṃ vihāre na bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:758_11: avassaṃ bhagavā mayā saddhiṃ sallapeyyā”ti evaṃ therassa kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:759_3: ayañhi passati bahussute bhikkhū mahāparivārena gāmaṃ pavisante,
atk-s0201a0:759_5: tesañca taṃ sampattiṃ disvā upāsake pasanne pasannākāraṃ karonte.
atk-s0201a0:759_7: Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati bhikkhūnaṃ therassa ca.
atk-s0201a0:759_9: “Ime yadeva mayhaṃ uppajjati cīvaraṃ vā piṇḍapāto vā,
atk-s0201a0:759_11: mayhaṃ pana pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchantopi natthī”ti evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:759_13: “Eso mahallakatthero tesu tesu ṭhānesu sayameva paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:760_6: Na añño bhikkhu labheyyāti pana atimahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0201a0:760_10: Tena so pubbe laddhapubbaṃ āsanādiṃ pacchā alabhanto evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0201a0:760_11: Na so bhikkhu labheyyāti na so bhikkhu therānaṃ aggāsanādīsu tadanusārena majjhimānaṃ aññesañca navānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:760_12: kadāci yaṃ vā taṃ vā sabbanihīnaṃ āsanādiṃ labhati.
atk-s0201a0:760_13: Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati manussānañca therānañca.
atk-s0201a0:760_15: “Ime maṅgalādīsu maṃ nissāya bhikkhū labhanti, ete, ‘bhante,
atk-s0201a0:760_16: ettake bhikkhū gahetvā amhākaṃ anukampaṃ karothā’ti vadanti,
atk-s0201a0:760_17: idāni taṃmuhuttaṃ diṭṭhamattakaṃ mahallakattheraṃ gahetvā gatā,
atk-s0201a0:760_19: nesaṃ kicce uppanne jānissāmī”ti evaṃ manussānaṃ kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:760_22: maṃyeva manussā nimanteyyu”nti evaṃ therānaṃ kuppati.
