atk-s0201a0:761_1: Ayampi lābhatthiko yaṃ vā taṃ vā khaṇḍānumodanaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:761_3: tā maṃ sañjānitvā tato pabhuti thālakabhikkhaṃ dassantī”ti patthento evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0201a0:761_6: Kupitoti ayampi tīsu ṭhānesu kuppati manussānaṃ therassa dhammakathikassa ca.
atk-s0201a0:761_8: “Ime pubbe maṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā yācanti ‘amhākaṃ nāgatthero amhākaṃ sumanatthero anumodatū’ti,
atk-s0201a0:761_9: ajja pana nāvocu”nti evaṃ manussānaṃ kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:761_12: ayaṃ anumodissatī’ti na bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ therassa kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:761_14: “Therena vuttamatteyeva pahāraṃ laddhakukkuṭo viya turitaturitaṃ vassati,
atk-s0201a0:761_16: imasmiñhi asati ahameva anumodeyya”nti evaṃ dhammakathikassa kuppati.
atk-s0201a0:762_1: Ayampi lābhatthiko yaṃ vā taṃ vā khaṇḍadhammakathaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:762_2: so passati tādisesu ṭhānesu dviyojanatiyojanato sannipatitvā bhikkhū sabbarattikāni dhammassavanāni suṇante,
atk-s0201a0:762_3: tuṭṭhacitte ca dahare vā sāmaṇere vā sādhu sādhūti mahāsaddena sādhukāraṃ dente,
atk-s0201a0:762_4: tato dutiyadivase antogāmagate bhikkhū upāsakā pucchanti “ke, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:762_7: Taṃ sutvā pasannā manussā dhammakathikānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:762_11: Kupitoti catuppadikaṃ gāthampi vattuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamāno kupito hoti attano mandabhāvassa “ahañhi mando duppañño kuto labhissāmi desetu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:763_0: Bhikkhunīnanti ovādatthaṃ vā uddesatthaṃ vā paripucchatthaṃ vā pūjākaraṇatthaṃ vā ārāmaṃ āgantvā sannipatitabhikkhunīnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:763_2: tassevaṃ hoti imā mahākulā pabbajitā bhikkhuniyo,
atk-s0201a0:763_3: tāsu kulesu pavisetvā nisinnāsu manussā pucchissanti “kassa santike ovādaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:763_10: tāsañca bhikkhunīnaṃ “imā pubbe maṃ nissāya uposathappavāraṇādīni labhanti,
atk-s0201a0:763_11: tā idāni taṃmuhuttaṃ diṭṭhamattakamahallakattherassa santikaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:763_12: Dhammakathikassa ca “esa imāsaṃ sahasā ovādaṃ adāsiyevā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:764_3: te puttabhātukānaṃ kammaṃ niyyātetvā dhammaṃ suṇantā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a0:764_7: tato saddhiṃ upāsikāhi mayhameva lābhasakkāraṃ upaharissantīti.
atk-s0201a0:764_13: tesaṃ uppanne kicce jānissāmī”ti dhammakathikassa ca,
atk-s0201a0:765_1: Upāsikā nāma āsanapūjādikaraṇatthaṃ vā uposathadivase vā dhammassavanatthaṃ sannipatitā.
atk-s0201a0:766_2: Iminā attani kāraṃ karīyamānaṃ sakkaccaṃ katañca sundarañca pattheti.
atk-s0201a0:766_4: Iminā bhikkhūhi attānaṃ garuṭṭhāne ṭhapīyamānaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0201a0:766_6: Pūjeyyunti evaṃ sakkarontā garuṃ karontā mānentā paccayehi pūjeyyunti paccayapūjaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0201a0:766_7: Ṭhānanti “piyo garu bhāvaniyo”ti vuttappakāro bahussuto ca sīlavā ca etaṃ vidhiṃ arahati tena bhikkhū evarūpaṃ evaṃ kareyyunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:766_8: Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati bhikkhūnañca “ime etaṃ sakkarontī”ti therassa ca “imasmiṃ asati maṃyeva sakkareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:766_9: Esa nayo ito paresu tīsu vāresu.
atk-s0201a0:767_1: Idhāpi ahameva lābhī assanti icchā nātimahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0201a0:767_2: Na añño bhikkhu lābhī assāti pana mahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0201a0:768_3: Sabbatthāpi ṭhānaṃ bahussutehi puññavantehi ca yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:768_6: dīgharattaṃ ekato vasantassa paṃsukūlatthāya vā piṇḍapātatthāya vā sappitelādikāraṇā vā gharapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0201a0:768_7: carantassāpi me ekadivasampi kiñci paṇītaṃ paccayaṃ na denti.
atk-s0201a0:768_8: Āgantukaṃ mahallakaṃ pana disvāva yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:768_10: therassa ca “ayampi mahallako imesaṃ attānaṃ dassentoyeva carati,
atk-s0201a0:768_12: evaṃ imasmiṃ asati ahameva lābhī assa”nti.
atk-s0201a0:769_0: Imesaṃ kho, etaṃ āvusoti imesaṃ heṭṭhā ekūnavīsativārehi vuttānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:770_1: Dissanti ceva sūyanti cāti na icchāvacarā cakkhunā dissanti,
atk-s0201a0:770_4: Appahīnaicchāvacarassa pana puggalassa icchāvacaravasena pavattakāyakammaṃ disvā diṭṭhā viya vacīkammaṃ sutvā sutā viya ca honti,
atk-s0201a0:771_1: kiñcāpi so bhikkhu gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āraññiko hoti,
atk-s0201a0:771_4: Kiñcāpi so atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-s0201a0:771_5: Kiñcāpi so loluppacāraṃ vajjetvā sapadānacārī hoti.
atk-s0201a0:771_6: Kiñcāpi so gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūliko hoti.
atk-s0201a0:772_0: Lūkhacīvaradharoti ettha pana lūkhanti satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti tīhi kāraṇehi lūkhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:772_1: Tattha satthena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinnaṃ satthalūkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:772_8: ime cassa ettakā icchāvacarā appahīnā dissanti ceva sūyanti ca,
atk-s0201a0:772_9: atha kho naṃ viññū sabrahmacārī neva sakkaronti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:772_11: Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:772_14: sūyanti ca yasmā tassa te pāpakā sūyanti cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:773_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭaṃ karonto seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:773_4: Atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyabhāvato cettha imāneva tīṇi vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:773_5: Aññesañhi sasasūkarādīnaṃ kuṇapaṃ manussā kaṭukabhaṇḍādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā paribhuñjantipi.
atk-s0201a0:773_10: kuṇapaṃ gahetvā kaṃsapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:773_15: Jaññajaññaṃ viyāti cokkhacokkhaṃ viya manāpamanāpaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a0:773_19: ubhayatthāpi ādaravasena vā pasaṃsāvasena vā punaruttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:774_1: Tassa saha dassanena amanāpatā ca saṇṭhaheyyāti tassa kuṇapassa dassanena saheva tassa janassa amanāpatā tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0201a0:774_5: Na bhottukamyatā assāti bhuñjitukāmatā na bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:774_6: Pageva suhitānanti dhātānaṃ pana paṭhamatarameva bhuñjitukāmatā na bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:775_4: kaṃsapātiṃ vivaritvā kuṇapadassanena janassa amanāpatā viya āraññikaṅgādīni anādiyitvā icchāvacaradassanena sabrahmacārīnaṃ asakkārakaraṇāditāti.
atk-s0201a0:776_7: Anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjananti ettha sūpo nāma hatthahāriyo vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:777_1: aparakaṃsapātiyā paṭikujjhanaṃ viya appicchatāsamuṭṭhānehi gāmantavihārādīhi icchāvacarappahānappaṭicchādakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:777_2: kaṃsapātiṃ vivaritvā sālivarabhattadassanena janassa manāpatā viya gāmantavihārādīni anādiyitvā icchāvacarappahānadassanena
atk-s0201a0:778_14: Samantato pana giriparikkhepena vajo viya saṇṭhitattā giribbajanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:778_16: taṃ nissāya ahaṃ viharāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:778_28: na hi so tato pubbe anivattho ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:779_0: Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattaṃ hatthena cīvaraṃ kāyena ādiyitvā.
atk-s0201a0:779_12: yadā yadā yasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāleti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:779_19: attamanabhāvassa vā yuttaṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi udīrayi,
atk-s0201a0:779_21: Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāyāti cittena cittaṃ jānitvā viya.
atk-s0201a0:780_1: Jīvikatthāti iṇabhayādīhi pīḷitā bahi jīvituṃ asakkontā idha jīvikatthikā hutvā.
atk-s0201a0:780_15: Bhojane amattaññunoti bhojane yā mattā jānitabbā pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu yuttatā,
atk-s0201a0:780_20: Sikkhāya na tibbagāravāti sikkhāpadesu bahulagāravā na honti,
atk-s0201a0:781_2: Pivanti maññe ghasanti maññeti pivanti viya ghasanti viya.
atk-s0201a0:781_10: tadā sabrahmacārī sāriputto amhe akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:781_16: Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo,
atk-s0201a0:781_17: koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo,
atk-s0201a0:781_19: idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto,
atk-s0201a0:781_27: tena tena maggena pahīne kilese na āgacchantīti nāgā,
atk-s0201a0:781_30: Vitthāro pana mahāniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Apica –
atk-s0201a0:786_2: aññehi khīṇāsavanāgehi pujjatarā ca pāsaṃsatarā cāti attho.

atk-s0201a0:828_1: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanoyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0201a0:828_4: Sīlesvevāti evaṃ sabbāsave niddhunitvā cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ adhigantukāmopi sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti.
atk-s0201a0:829_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sīlānisaṃsakathaṃ yāva arahattā kathetvā idāni sabbampi taṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassento nigamanaṃ āha “sampannasīlā,
atk-s0201a0:829_7: samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū”ti iti yaṃ taṃ mayā pubbe evaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:829_8: idaṃ sabbampi sampannasīlo bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo,
atk-s0201a0:829_15: heṭṭhimāni tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni pañca lokiyābhiññā āsavakkhayañāṇanti ca ime ca guṇe sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikattā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:829_18: attamanā te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0201a0:833_5: Upamaṃ karonto ca bhagavā katthaci paṭhamaṃyeva upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:834_4: tattha cakkhumā puriso majjhe ṭhito passeyyā”ti sakalampi devadūtasuttaṃ upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:834_6: seyyathāpi ākāse”tiādinā pana nayena sakalampi iddhividhamatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā upamaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:834_7: “Seyyathāpi brāhmaṇapuriso sāratthiko sāragavesī”tiādināva nayena sakalampi cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:834_13: puriso alagaddatthiko”tiādinā nayena sakalampi alagaddasuttaṃ mahāsāropamasuttanti evamādīni suttāni atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:835_0: Svāyaṃ idha paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:835_3: Ye hi puggalā paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā vuccamānamatthaṃ sukhena paṭivijjhanti,
atk-s0201a0:835_6: Yassā ca dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsaṃ patto hoti,
atk-s0201a0:835_10: tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetīti evaṃ iminā puggalajjhāsayena vā desanāvilāsena vā evaṃ dassetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:836_1: Saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ malaggahitanti āgantukena paṃsurajādinā saṃkilesena saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:836_8: Rajako hi nīlakatthāya upasaṃharanto kaṃsanīlapalāsanīlādike nīlaraṅge upasaṃharati.
atk-s0201a0:837_3: Tādisañhi vatthaṃ nīlakumbhiyā pakkhittampi sunīlaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:837_8: Taṃ kissa hetūti taṃ vatthaṃ kissa hetu kiṃ kāraṇā īdisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:837_9: tasmiṃ vā vatthe raṅgajātaṃ kissa hetu īdisaṃ durattavaṇṇaṃ aparisuddhavaṇṇaṃ hotīti?
atk-s0201a0:838_2: Kasmā pana bhagavā saṃkiliṭṭhavatthena opammaṃ akāsīti ce,
atk-s0201a0:838_4: Yathā hi āgantukehi malehi saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ pakatiyā paṇḍarattā puna dhovīyamānaṃ paṇḍaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:838_5: na tattha jātikāḷake viya eḷakalome vāyāmo nipphalo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:838_7: Pakatiyā pana taṃ sakalepi paṭisandhibhavaṅgavāre paṇḍarameva. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:838_12: na tattha vāyāmo nipphaloti evaṃ vāyāmamahapphaladassanatthaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhavatthena opammaṃ akāsīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:839_0: Duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti īdise citte duggati pāṭikaṅkhitabbā,
atk-s0201a0:840_4: So tattha ṭhito kāyassa bhedā nirayampi gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:841_0: Anagāriyopi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito saṃkiliṭṭhacitto dūteyyapahiṇagamanaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:841_5: ayamassa anagāriyapaṭipattiduggati.So tattha ṭhito kāyassa bhedā nirayampi gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:841_7: pettivisayampi gacchati samaṇayakkho nāma hoti samaṇapeto,
atk-s0201a0:841_8: ādittehi saṅghāṭiādīhi sampajjalitakāyo aṭṭassaraṃ karonto vicarati,
atk-s0201a0:842_2: Etthāpi ca sugati nāma paṭipattisugati gatisugatīti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:842_8: So tattha ṭhito kāyassa bhedā manussamahantatampi devamahantatampi upapajjati,
atk-s0201a0:843_0: Anagāriyopi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā parisuddhacitto catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0201a0:843_2: aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu attano anukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pantasenāsane paṭisevamāno kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānasamāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0201a0:843_6: So tattha ṭhito kāyassa bhedā manussaloke vā tīsu mahākulesu,
atk-s0201a0:844_2: asaṃkiliṭṭhe ca sugatīti vatvā idāni yehi upakkilesehi cittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:845_2: Atha vā sakabhaṇḍe vā parabhaṇḍe vā hotu,
atk-s0201a0:845_7: ‘rāgo visamaṃ doso visamaṃ moho visama’nti vacanato na koci lobho avisamo nāma,
atk-s0201a0:845_11: So panesa abhijjhāvisamalobho uppajjitvā cittaṃ dūseti,
atk-s0201a0:846_4: Agāriyassa vā anagāriyassa vā sukatakaraṇavināsano makkho.
atk-s0201a0:846_5: Agāriyopi hi kenaci anukampakena daliddo samāno ucce ṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0201a0:846_6: aparena samayena “kiṃ tayā mayhaṃ kata”nti tassa sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti.
atk-s0201a0:846_7: Anagāriyopi sāmaṇerakālato pabhuti ācariyena vā upajjhāyena vā catūhi paccayehi uddesaparipucchāhi ca
atk-s0201a0:846_9: aparena samayena rājarājamahāmattādīhi sakkato garukato ācariyupajjhāyesu acittīkato caramāno “ayaṃ amhehi daharakāle evaṃ anuggahito saṃvaḍḍhito ca,
atk-s0201a0:846_10: atha panidāni nissineho jāto”ti vuccamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhehi kata”nti tesaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0201a0:846_11: tassa so sukatakaraṇavināsano makkho uppajjitvā cittaṃ dūseti,
atk-s0201a0:847_1: evaṃ bahussutepi puggale ajjhottharitvā “īdisassa ceva bahussutassa aniyatā gati,
atk-s0201a0:847_2: tava vā mama vā ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhagāhī paḷāso.
atk-s0201a0:847_4: Attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahamānaṃ macchariyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:847_8: Āyatanamaccho nāma kira macchānaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ dasseti sappānaṃ sīsaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:847_10: Evameva kerāṭiko puggalo yaṃ yaṃ suttantikaṃ vā ābhidhammikaṃ vā upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0201a0:847_11: taṃ taṃ evaṃ vadati “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ baddhacaro,
atk-s0201a0:847_13: nāhaṃ tumhe muñcāmī”ti “evamete ‘sagāravo ayaṃ amhesu sappatisso’ti maññissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:847_14: Tassetaṃ kerāṭikabhāvena uppajjamānaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ uppajjitvā cittaṃ dūseti,
atk-s0201a0:848_3: So duvidhena labbhati akusalavasena ceva kusalavasena ca.
atk-s0201a0:848_4: Tattha agāriyassa parena kataṃ alaṅkārādiṃ disvā taddiguṇakaraṇena uppajjamāno,
atk-s0201a0:848_5: anagāriyassa ca yattakaṃ yattakaṃ paro pariyāpuṇāti vā katheti vā,
atk-s0201a0:848_7: Agāriyassa pana paraṃ ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ dentaṃ disvā attanā dve vā tīṇi vā dātukāmatāya uppajjamāno,
atk-s0201a0:848_8: anagāriyassa ca parena ekanikāye gahite mānaṃ anissāya kevalaṃ taṃ disvā attanā ālasiyaṃ abhibhuyya dve nikāye gahetukāmatāya uppajjamāno kusalo.
atk-s0201a0:849_1: evaṃ jātiādīni nissāya cittassa uṇṇativasena pavattamāno māno,
atk-s0201a0:849_4: kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggavasena uppajjamāno pamādo uppajjitvā cittaṃ dūseti,
atk-s0201a0:850_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā upakkilesaṃ dassento lobhamādiṃ katvā dassetīti?
atk-s0201a0:850_2: Sabbasattānañhi yattha katthaci upapannānaṃ antamaso suddhāvāsabhūmiyampi sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhavanikantivasena lobho uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:850_3: tato attano attano anurūpapaccayaṃ paṭicca yathāsambhavaṃ itare,
atk-s0201a0:850_4: na ca ete soḷaseva cittassa upakkilesā,
atk-s0201a0:850_5: etena pana nayena sabbepi kilesā gahitāyeva hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:851_1: Ettāvatā saṃkilesaṃ dassetvā idāni vodānaṃ dassento sa kho so,
atk-s0201a0:851_5: Tattha kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyāti dvidhā pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:851_6: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā tāva abhijjhāvisamalobho thambho sārambho māno atimāno madoti ime cha kilesā arahattamaggena pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a0:851_7: Byāpādo kodho upanāho pamādoti ime cattāro kilesā anāgāmimaggena pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a0:851_8: Makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyanti ime cha sotāpattimaggena pahīyantīti.
atk-s0201a0:851_10: sotāpattimaggena makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyanti ime cha pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a0:851_11: Anāgāmimaggena byāpādo kodho upanāho pamādoti ime cattāro.
atk-s0201a0:851_12: Arahattamaggena abhijjhāvisamalobho thambho sārambho māno atimāno madoti ime cha pahīyantīti.
atk-s0201a0:852_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ime kilesā sotāpattimaggavajjhā vā hontu,
atk-s0201a0:852_2: atha kho anāgāmimaggeneva pahānaṃ sandhāya “abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahatī”tiādimāhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:852_4: so ca upari catutthamaggasseva niddiṭṭhattā yujjati,
atk-s0201a0:852_5: tatiyamaggena pahīnāvasesānañhi visamalobhādīnaṃ tena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:852_8: tepi taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittānaṃ appahīnattā anāgāmimaggeneva suppahīnā hontīti.
atk-s0201a0:852_9: Keci pana paṭhamamaggena cettha pahānaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
atk-s0201a0:854_4: so buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hotī”ti evaṃ ekamekena padena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:854_5: Imassa hi bhikkhuno anāgāmimaggena lokuttarappasādo āgato,
atk-s0201a0:854_6: athassa aparena samayena buddhaguṇe dhammaguṇe saṅghaguṇe ca anussarato lokiyo uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:854_7: tamassa sabbampi lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ pasādaṃ dassento bhagavā “buddhe aveccappasādenā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:855_0: Tattha aveccappasādenāti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānaṃ yāthāvato ñātattā acalena accutena pasādena.
atk-s0201a0:855_1: Idāni yathā tassa bhikkhuno anussarato so aveccappasādo uppanno,
atk-s0201a0:855_2: taṃ vidhiṃ dassento “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā nayena tīṇi anussatiṭṭhānāni vitthāresi.
atk-s0201a0:855_3: Tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā sabbākārena visuddhimagge anussatikathāyaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:856_1: Evamassa lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ pasādaṃ dassetvā idāni kilesappahānaṃ aveccappasādasamannāgatañca paccavekkhato
atk-s0201a0:856_2: uppajjamānaṃ somanassādiānisaṃsaṃ dassento yathodhi kho panassātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:856_3: Anāgāmissa hi paccante vuṭṭhitaṃ corupaddavaṃ vūpasametvā taṃ paccavekkhato mahānagare vasantassa rañño
atk-s0201a0:856_4: viya ime cime ca mama kilesā pahīnāti attano kilesappahānaṃ paccavekkhato balavasomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:857_1: yvāyaṃ anāgāmī bhikkhu evaṃ “buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:857_5: tassa yathodhi kho cattaṃ hoti paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:857_7: taṃ taṃ kilesajātaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:857_8: Sakasakaodhivasenāti dve odhī kilesodhi ca maggodhi ca.
atk-s0201a0:857_9: Tattha kilesodhivasenāpi ye kilesā yaṃ maggavajjhā,
atk-s0201a0:857_10: te aññamaggavajjhehi amissā hutvā sakeneva odhinā pahīnā.
atk-s0201a0:857_11: Maggodhivasenāpi ye kilesā yena maggena pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a0:857_13: Evaṃ sakasakaodhivasena taṃ taṃ kilesajātaṃ cattameva hoti paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:857_14: taṃ paccavekkhitvā ca laddhasomanasso tatuttaripi so “buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī”ti labhati atthavedanti sambandho.
atk-s0201a0:858_2: assa bhikkhuno yatodhi kho pana cattaṃ hoti paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:858_5: Odhīti heṭṭhā tayo maggā vuccanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:858_6: Te hi odhiṃ katvā koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā uparimaggena pahātabbakilese ṭhapetvā pajahanti,
atk-s0201a0:858_8: Arahattamaggo pana kiñci kilesaṃ anavasesetvā pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:858_11: Tena vuttaṃ “yatodhi kho panassa cattaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:858_14: Yasmā assa odhi cattaṃ hoti paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:858_15: tasmā taṃ paccavekkhitvā ca laddhasomanasso tatuttaripi so “buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī”ti labhati atthavedanti yathāpāḷi netabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:859_4: Paṭinissaṭṭhanti idaṃ pubbe ādinnapubbassa paṭinissaggadassanavasena paṭimukhaṃ vā nissaṭṭhabhāvadassanavasena
atk-s0201a0:859_6: Labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammavedanti ettha buddhādīsu aveccappasādoyeva araṇīyato attho,
atk-s0201a0:859_16: tasmā “labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammavedanti aveccappasādārammaṇasomanassañca somanassamayañāṇañca labhatī”ti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:860_0: Atha vā atthavedanti aveccappasādaṃ paccavekkhato uppannaṃ vuttappakārameva vedaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:860_1: Dhammavedanti aveccappasādassa hetuṃ odhiso kilesappahānaṃ paccavekkhato uppannaṃ vuttappakārameva vedanti evampi ettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:860_4: Dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjanti tameva atthañca dhammañca atthadhammānisaṃsabhūtaṃ vedañca paccavekkhato uppannaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:860_5: Tañhi anavajjalakkhaṇena paccavekkhaṇākārappavattena dhammena upasañhitanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:860_6: Pamuditassa pīti jāyatīti iminā pāmojjena pamuditassa nirāmisā pīti jāyati.
atk-s0201a0:860_8: Kāyo passambhatīti kāyopi passaddho hoti vūpasantadaratho.
atk-s0201a0:860_9: Passaddhakāyo sukhanti evaṃ vūpasantakāyadaratho cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0201a0:860_10: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti cittaṃ sammā ādhiyati appitaṃ viya acalaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:861_1: Evamassa kilesappahānaṃ aveccappasādasamannāgataṃ paccavekkhato uppajjamānaṃ somanassādiānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0201a0:861_2: idāni “yathodhi kho pana me”ti vārena tassa paccavekkhaṇāya pavattākāraṃ pakāsetvā tasseva anāgāmimaggānubhāvasūcakaṃ
atk-s0201a0:862_0: Tattha evaṃsīloti tassa anāgāmimaggasampayuttaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:862_1: Evaṃdhammo evaṃpaññoti taṃsampayuttameva samādhikkhandhaṃ paññākkhandhañca dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:862_5: Nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāyāti tassa evaṃvidhassa bhikkhuno taṃ vuttappakārapiṇḍapātabhojanaṃ maggassa vā phalassa vā neva antarāyāya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:862_7: Yopissa appaṭiladdho catutthamaggo ca phalaṃ ca tappaṭilābhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhatopi nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāya,
atk-s0201a0:863_0: Yasmā cettha etadeva kāraṇaṃ, tasmā tadanurūpaṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:864_8: ukkaṃ bandhitvā ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:864_10: anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:864_12: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aññesu ca evarūpesu “saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipatī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu suvaṇṇakārānaṃ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:865_1: saṃkiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya hi saṃkiliṭṭhajātarūpaṃ viya ca imassa bhikkhuno puthujjanakāle kāmarāgādimalānugataṃ cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:865_2: Acchodakaṃ viya ukkāmukhaṃ viya ca anāgāmimaggo.
atk-s0201a0:865_3: Taṃ udakaṃ ukkāmukhañca āgamma vatthasuvaṇṇānaṃ parisuddhatā viya tassa bhikkhuno vuttappakārasīladhammapaññāsaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0201a0:866_1: So mettāsahagatena cetasāti yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:866_2: Tayo hi anusandhī pucchānusandhi ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhīti.
atk-s0201a0:866_3: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘siyā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:866_8: ajjāpi nūna samaṇo gotamo avītarāgo”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā vuttassa suttassa vasena ajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:866_9: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0201a0:866_10: tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭipakkhavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati,

atk-s0201a0:867_1: Evaṃ bhagavā abhijjhādīnaṃ upakkilesānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sabbaso ca kāmarāgabyāpādappahānena vihatapaccatthikattā
atk-s0201a0:867_2: laddhapadaṭṭhānaṃ tassa anāgāmino brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ dassetvā idānissa arahattāya vipassanaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0201a0:868_1: so anāgāmī evaṃ bhāvitabrahmavihāro etesaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ yato kutoci vuṭṭhāya te eva brahmavihāradhamme
atk-s0201a0:868_2: nāmavasena tesaṃ nissayaṃ hadayavatthuṃ vatthunissayāni bhūtānīti iminā nayena bhūtupādāyadhamme rūpavasena
atk-s0201a0:868_5: Tato tassa dukkhassa samudayaṃ paṭivijjhanto atthi hīnanti pajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:868_7: Tato tassa pahānupāyaṃ vicinanto atthi paṇītanti pajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:868_9: Tato tena maggena adhigantabbaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto atthi uttari imassa saññāgatassa nissaraṇanti pajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:868_10: imassa mayā adhigatassa brahmavihārasaññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ atthīti evaṃ pajānātīti adhippāyo,
atk-s0201a0:868_12: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa vipassanāpaññāya evaṃ catūhi ākārehi cattāri saccāni jānato,
atk-s0201a0:869_0: Evaṃ yāva arahattā desanaṃ pāpetvā idāni yasmā tassaṃ parisati nhānasuddhiko brāhmaṇo nisinno,
atk-s0201a0:869_1: so evaṃ nhānasuddhiyā vaṇṇaṃ vuccamānaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatīti bhagavatā vidito,
atk-s0201a0:869_4: bhikkhu sināto antarena sinānenā”ti imaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ anusandhimāha.
atk-s0201a0:870_1: Sundarikabhāradvājoti bhāradvājo nāma so brāhmaṇo attano gottavasena,
atk-s0201a0:870_2: sundarikāya pana nadiyā sinātassa pāpappahānaṃ hotīti ayamassa diṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a0:870_4: So taṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “mayaṃ sinānasuddhiṃ vaṇṇema,
atk-s0201a0:870_7: Atha bhagavantaṃ bāhukaṃ nadiṃ gantvā taṃ tattha pāpaṃ pavāhetvā āgataṃ viya maññamāno āha “gacchati pana bhavaṃ gotamo bāhukaṃ nadiṃ sināyitu”nti?
atk-s0201a0:870_8: Bhagavā tassa gacchāmīti vā na gacchāmīti vā avatvāyeva brāhmaṇassa diṭṭhisamugghātaṃ kattukāmo “kiṃ brāhmaṇa bāhukāya nadiyā,
atk-s0201a0:871_3: visuddhibhāvaṃ detīti evaṃ sammatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:871_10: Gāthā ca vuccamānā tadatthadīpanatthameva vā gāthārucikānaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:872_0: Bāhukanti idameva hi ettha vacanaṃ tadatthadīpakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:872_3: evaṃ adhikakkādīnipi loko gacchati nhānena pāpaṃ pavāhetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:872_4: Tattha ye tesaṃ ṭhānānaṃ āsannā honti,
atk-s0201a0:872_5: te divasassa tikkhattuṃ nhāyanti. Ye dūrā,
atk-s0201a0:872_8: Ye pana sabbathāpi gantuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:872_9: te ghaṭehipi tato udakaṃ āharāpetvā nhāyanti.
atk-s0201a0:872_11: tasmā imaṃ visesatthaṃ dīpetuṃ adhikakkādīnipīti āha.
atk-s0201a0:873_0: Tattha adhikakkanti nhānasambhāravasena laddhavohāraṃ ekaṃ titthaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:873_2: Payāgāti etampi gaṅgāya ekaṃ titthameva mahāpanādassa rañño gaṅgāyaṃ nimuggapāsādassa sopānasammukhaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:873_3: bāhukā sundarikā sarassatī bāhumatīti imā pana catasso nadiyo.
atk-s0201a0:874_0: Kiṃ sundarikā karissatīti sundarikā kilesavisodhane kiṃ karissati?
atk-s0201a0:874_3: Imehi ca tīhi padehi vuttehi itarānipi cattāri lakkhaṇāhāranayena vuttāneva honti,
atk-s0201a0:874_4: tasmā yatheva sundarikā payāgā bāhukā na kiñci karonti,
atk-s0201a0:875_2: Na hi naṃ sodhayeti sundarikā vā payāgā vā bāhukā vā na sodhaye,
atk-s0201a0:875_5: lāmakakamme yuttaṃ vā verakibbisabhāvaṃ appattehi khuddakehipi pāpehi yuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:876_3: so saṃvaccharaṃ katapāpaṃ sodhetī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhiko so brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0201a0:876_4: tenassa bhagavā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭihananto āha “suddhassa ve sadā phaggū”ti.
atk-s0201a0:876_7: Uposatho sadāti suddhassa ca cātuddasapannarasādīsu uposathaṅgāni asamādiyatopi niccameva uposatho.
atk-s0201a0:876_8: Suddhassa sucikammassāti nikkilesatāya suddhassa sucīhi ca kāyakammādīhi samannāgatassa.
atk-s0201a0:876_9: Sadā sampajjate vatanti īdisassa ca kusalūpasañhitaṃ vatasamādānampi niccaṃ sampannameva hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:876_10: Idheva sināhīti imasmiṃyeva mama sāsane sināhi.
atk-s0201a0:877_0: Idānissa sappāyadesanāvasena tīsupi dvāresu suddhiṃ dassento sabbabhūtesu karohi khematantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:878_0: Sace musā na bhaṇasīti etenassa vacīdvārasuddhi.
atk-s0201a0:878_1: Sace pāṇaṃ na hiṃsasi sace adinnaṃ nādiyasīti etehi kāyadvārasuddhi.
atk-s0201a0:878_2: Saddahāno amaccharīti etehi pana naṃ evaṃ parisuddhadvāraṃ saddhāsampadāya cāgasampadāya ca niyojesi.
atk-s0201a0:878_4: udapānopi te gayāti ayaṃ pana upaḍḍhagāthā,
atk-s0201a0:878_10: kiṃ kāhasi gayaṃ gantvā udapānopi te gayā,
atk-s0201a0:878_11: gayāyapi hi te nhāyantassa udapānepi imāya eva paṭipattiyā kilesasuddhi,
atk-s0201a0:878_12: sarīramalasuddhi pana ubhayattha samāti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:878_14: tasmā tassa bhagavā “gacchati pana bhavaṃ gotamo bāhuka”nti puṭṭhopi “kiṃ kāhasi bāhukaṃ gantvā”ti avatvā “kiṃ kāhasi gayaṃ gantvā”ti āhāti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:879_1: Evaṃ vutteti evamādi bhayabherave vuttattā pākaṭameva.
atk-s0201a0:879_6: Pahitatto kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya.
atk-s0201a0:879_9: Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca,
atk-s0201a0:879_22: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0201a0:880_3: tathāpi naṃ idha paṭhamapurisavasena yojanānayassa dassanatthaṃ puna saṅkhepato bhaṇāma.
atk-s0201a0:880_10: Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-s0201a0:880_11: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā,
atk-s0201a0:880_12: taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:881_3: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:881_5: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanā natthīti. Atha vā,
atk-s0201a0:881_6: itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:885_4: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallānaṃ nilīyanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:885_8: Ayaṃ pana yasmā paṭisallānānaṃ uttamato phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:885_10: Bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvāti samadasanakhujjalavibhūsitena sirasā bhagavantaṃ sakkaccaṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0201a0:885_13: bhagavā pana kira vandito samāno suvaṇṇadundubhisadisaṃ gīvaṃ paggayha kaṇṇasukhaṃ pemaniyaṃ amatābhisekasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a0:885_14: brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “sukhī hohī”ti tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā vadati,
atk-s0201a0:885_17: devānamindo sāmacco saparijano bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatīti,
atk-s0201a0:885_18: sukhī hotu pañcasikha sakko devānamindo sāmacco saparijano,
atk-s0201a0:885_19: sukhakāmā hi devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā,
atk-s0201a0:885_21: Evañca pana tathāgatā evarūpe mahesakkhe yakkhe abhivadantīti.
atk-s0201a0:886_0: Yā imāti idāni vattabbābhimukhaṃ karonto viya āha.
atk-s0201a0:886_6: Lokavādappaṭisaṃyuttāti “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādinayappavattena lokavādena paṭisaṃyuttā,
atk-s0201a0:886_11: nevantavā nānantavā attā ca loko cāti evaṃ pavattattā.
atk-s0201a0:887_0: Ādimevātiādīsu ayamattho kiṃ nu kho bhante ādimeva manasikarontassa appatvāpi sotāpattimaggaṃ vipassanāmissakapaṭhamamanasikārameva
atk-s0201a0:887_1: manasikarontassa bhikkhuno evametāsaṃ ettakeneva upāyena etāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānañca paṭinissaggo ca hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:887_2: Idañca thero attanā anadhimānikopi samāno adhimānikānaṃ adhimānappahānatthaṃ adhimāniko viya hutvā pucchatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:887_3: Apare panāhu “therassa antevāsikā ādimanasikāreneva diṭṭhīnaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ hotīti evaṃsaññinopi,
atk-s0201a0:888_1: Athassa bhagavā tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānūpāyaṃ dassento yā imātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:888_2: Tattha yattha cetā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantītiādi pañcakkhandhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:888_6: sati rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:888_7: so attā so loko so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a0:888_8: Ārammaṇavasena pana ekavacanaṃ katvā yattha cāti āha,
atk-s0201a0:888_10: Ettha ca uppajjanti anusenti samudācarantīti imesaṃ evaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:888_11: Jātivasena hi ajātā jāyamānā uppajjantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:888_15: Taṃ netaṃ mamātiādīsu taṃ pañcakkhandhappabhedaṃ ārammaṇametaṃ mayhaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:888_17: eso me attāpi na hotīti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passatoti evaṃ tāva padattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:889_0: Yasmā pana ettha etaṃ mamāti taṇhāgāho,
atk-s0201a0:889_6: Tasmā netaṃ mamāti vadanto bhagavā yathāvuttappabhedaṃ taṇhāpapañcaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0201a0:889_10: Evametanti evaṃ “netaṃ mamā”tiādinā ākārena etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:889_14: Mamantiādinā pana gayhamānampi tenākārena nevatthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:889_15: Sammappaññāya passatoti sotāpattimaggapaññāpariyosānāya vipassanāpaññāya suṭṭhu passantassa.
atk-s0201a0:890_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ādimanasikāreneva diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti nu kho noti āyasmatā mahācundena adhimānikānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:890_1: vasena pañhaṃ puṭṭho sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhippahānaṃ dassetvā idāni sayameva adhimānikānaṃ jhānaṃ vibhajanto
atk-s0201a0:890_3: Tattha adhimānikā nāma yesaṃ appatte pattasaññāya adhimāno uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:890_4: svāyaṃ uppajjamāno neva lokavaṭṭānusārīnaṃ bālaputhujjanānaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:890_6: Na hi sotāpannassa “sakadāgāmī aha”nti adhimāno uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:890_9: kārakasseva pana samathavasena vā vipassanāvasena vā vikkhambhitakilesassa niccaṃ yuttapayuttassa āraddhavipassakassa uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:890_10: Tassa hi samathavikkhambhitānaṃ vā vipassanāvikkhambhitānaṃ vā kilesānaṃ samudācāraṃ apassato “sotāpanno ahanti vā,
atk-s0201a0:891_0: Therassa kira acirūpasampannasseva ovāde ṭhatvā bahū bhikkhū visesaṃ adhigacchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:891_1: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tissamahāvihāravāsī bhikkhusaṅgho “na aṭṭhānaniyojako theroti theraṃ ānethā”ti sambahule bhikkhū pāhesi.
atk-s0201a0:891_10: evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ pahitā sabbepi tattheva arahattaṃ patvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:892_0: Tato saṅgho gatagatā nāgacchantīti aññataraṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ pāhesi.
atk-s0201a0:892_2: dhammadinna tikkhattuṃ tissamahāvihāravāsī bhikkhusaṅgho tuyhaṃ santike pesesi,
atk-s0201a0:892_3: tvaṃ nāma saṅghassa āṇaṃ garuṃ na karosi,
atk-s0201a0:892_5: Thero kimetanti paṇṇasālaṃ appavisitvāva pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā tāvadeva nikkhami,
atk-s0201a0:892_7: Tattha ceko mahāthero saṭṭhivassātīto adhimānena arahattaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0201a0:892_8: Thero taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā adhigamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:892_17: Sādhāvusoti thero sabbasetaṃ sattappatiṭṭhaṃ tidhāpabhinnaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ bījayamānaṃ soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a0:892_18: dvīhi dantehi vijjhitukāmaṃ viya paṭimukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ mahāhatthiṃ māpesi.
atk-s0201a0:892_19: So taṃ attanāyeva māpitaṃ hatthiṃ disvā bhīto palāyituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:892_20: Tadāva attānaṃ “nāhaṃ arahā”ti ñatvā dhammadinnassa pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā “patiṭṭhā me hohi,
atk-s0201a0:892_24: kārakānaṃyeva adhimāno uppajjatī”ti theraṃ samassāsetvā kammaṭṭhānamadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:893_13: Etasmiṃ padumagumbe ṭhatvā madhurassarena gāyantaṃ naccantañca ekaṃ itthiviggahaṃ māpethāti.
atk-s0201a0:893_15: punappunaṃ upanijjhāyathāti vatvā sayaṃ pāsādaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a0:893_16: Therassa taṃ upanijjhāyato saṭṭhivassāni vikkhambhitakilesā caliṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:893_17: so tadā attānaṃ ñatvā purimatthero viya dhammadinnattherassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:894_1: Tasmiñca samaye therā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā nisinnā honti,
atk-s0201a0:894_3: Tena nesaṃ ekopi “idha pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapehī”ti dhammadinnaṃ vattā pucchitāpi nāhosi.
atk-s0201a0:894_4: Dhammadinno eso bhaveyyāti ñatvā pana pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:894_5: So pucchitapañhe tiṇhena asinā kumudanāḷakalāpaṃ viya chinditvā pādaṅguliyā mahāpathaviṃ pahari.
atk-s0201a0:894_6: Bhante ayaṃ acetanā mahāpathavīpi dhammadinnassa guṇaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:894_7: Tumhe pana na jānitthāti ca vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0201a0:896_0: Sacetanātha kho bhante, na jānātha guṇāguṇa”nti.
atk-s0201a0:897_0: Tāvadeva ca ākāse abbhuggantvā talaṅgaratissapabbatameva agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:897_2: Tasmā bhagavā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena jhānaṃ vibhajanto ṭhānaṃ kho panetantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:898_3: Yena idhekacco bhikkhu bāhiraparibbājakehi sādhāraṇaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe…

atk-s0201a0:898_11: Na hi so jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati,
atk-s0201a0:898_14: Tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento bhagavā “na kho panete, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:898_16: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā ete ariyassa vinaye vuccantī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:899_3: ekampi hi paṭhamajjhānaṃ punappunaṃ samāpattivasena pavattattā bahuttaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:899_5: ekampi hi paṭhamajjhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu pavattivasena bahuttaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0201a0:899_7: Āruppajhānesu pana ārammaṇabhedābhāvato purimakāraṇadvayavaseneva bahuvacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:900_1: nibbutāni ceva sukhumāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:900_2: tasmā tāni santā ete vihārāti evaṃ vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:900_3: Ayaṃ tāva tesaṃ catunnampi sādhāraṇā vaṇṇanā.
atk-s0201a0:901_1: Evaṃ yasmā adhimānikassa bhikkhuno jhānavihāro avipassanāpādakattā sallekhavihāro na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:901_2: na hi so jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati,
atk-s0201a0:901_4: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento rūpajjhānāni ca arūpajjhānāni ca vibhajitvā idāni ca yattha sallekho kātabbo catucattālīsāya ākārehi,
atk-s0201a0:901_5: tañca vatthuṃ tañca sallekhaṃ dassento idha kho pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:902_0: Kasmā pana “aṭṭhahi samāpattīhi avihiṃsādayo sallekhā”ti vuttā?
atk-s0201a0:902_5: Imināyeva ca suttena veditabbaṃ “yathā bāhirakassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññassāpi dinnadānato
atk-s0201a0:902_7: Idañhi sandhāya dakkhiṇāvisuddhisutte “bāhirake kāmesu vītarāge dānaṃ datvā koṭisatasahassaguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:902_8: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne dānaṃ datvā asaṅkheyyā appameyyā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā,
atk-s0201a0:902_10: Saraṇagamanato paṭṭhāya hi tattha sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno adhippetoti,
atk-s0201a0:903_4: yadetaṃ “pare vihiṃsakā bhavissantī”tiādinā nayena vihiṃsādivatthuṃ vadāma. Idha, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:904_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato vatvā idāni vitthārento “pare vihiṃsakā bhavissanti,
atk-s0201a0:905_0: Tattha pareti ye keci imaṃ sallekhamananuyuttā.
atk-s0201a0:905_1: Vihiṃsakā bhavissantīti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vātiādīhi sattānaṃ vihesakā bhavissanti.
atk-s0201a0:905_2: Mayamettha avihiṃsakā bhavissāmāti mayaṃ pana yattheva vatthusmiṃ pare evaṃ vihiṃsakā bhavissanti,
atk-s0201a0:905_5: Iti sallekho karaṇīyoti evaṃ tumhehi sallekho kātabbo.
atk-s0201a0:905_12: Pare micchādiṭṭhīti ettha kammapathānaṃ antamicchādiṭṭhiñca micchattānaṃ ādimicchādiṭṭhiñca missetvā diṭṭhi vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:905_14: Ettha ca kammapathakathā vitthārato sammādiṭṭhisutte āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:906_11: paresaṃ atthabhañjanakaṃ tucchaṃ alikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāroti attho.
atk-s0201a0:906_13: Paresaṃ mammacchedikā pharusā vācā etesanti pharusavācā.
atk-s0201a0:906_18: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhī,
atk-s0201a0:906_21: Sammā sobhanā viññuppasatthā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhī,
atk-s0201a0:907_3: micchāsaṅkappādayo viya hi micchāsati nāma pāṭiekko koci dhammo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:907_4: atītaṃ pana cintayato pavattānaṃ catunnampi akusalakkhandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:907_17: tampi taṃ taṃ cintentassa satipatirūpakena uppattiṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:907_18: Micchāñāṇīti ettha ca micchāñāṇanti pāpakiriyāsu upāyacintāvasena pāpaṃ katvā “sukataṃ mayā”ti paccavekkhaṇākārena ca uppanno moho veditabbo,
atk-s0201a0:907_20: Sammāñāṇīti ettha pana ekūnavīsatibhedaṃ paccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ “sammāñāṇa”nti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:907_25: micchā pāpikā viparītā vimutti etesaṃ atthīti micchāvimuttī.
atk-s0201a0:907_26: Micchāvimuttīti ca yathāvuttenākārena pavattānaṃ akusalakkhandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:907_27: Phalasampayuttāni pana sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni ṭhapetvā sesadhammā sammāvimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:907_28: Sā ca micchāvimuttiṃ sallikhitvā ṭhitattā sallekhoti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:907_29: Tattha niyojento āha “mayamettha sammāvimuttī bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”ti.
atk-s0201a0:908_1: Abhijjhālū byāpannacittāti evaṃ kammapathesu vuttattā panettha paṭhamāni dve nīvaraṇāni na vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:908_4: Vicinantā kicchanti na sakkonti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātunti vicikicchī.
atk-s0201a0:909_0: Dubbacāti vattuṃ dukkhā kiñci vuccamānā na sahanti.
atk-s0201a0:909_3: Buddhā vā sāriputtādisadisā vā kalyāṇā mittā etesanti kalyāṇamittā.
atk-s0201a0:909_8: Tattha tīsu vatthūsu saddhā etesaṃ natthīti assaddhā.
atk-s0201a0:909_23: tathāgatabhāsitaṃ ekampi gāthaṃ yāthāvato ñatvā anurūpapaṭipannānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:909_36: Vipassanāsambhāro hi paripūro imasmiṃ ṭhāne āgato,
atk-s0201a0:910_0: Idāni ekameva lokuttaraguṇānaṃ antarāyakaraṃ aniyyānikadiṭṭhiṃ tīhākārehi dassento sandiṭṭhiparāmāsītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:910_6: dukkhena kicchena kasirena bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggaṃ kātunti duppaṭinissaggī,
atk-s0201a0:910_7: ye attano uppannaṃ diṭṭhiṃ idameva saccanti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamānā na paṭinissajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:910_9: Tādisā hi puggalā yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā adhammaṃ vā gaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a0:910_11: evaṃ amhehi suta”nti kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahanti,
atk-s0201a0:911_1: Evaṃ catucattālīsāya ākārehi sallekhaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ sallekhe cittuppādassāpi bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ cittuppādampi kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:912_2: yā panetā kāyena ca vācāya ca anuvidhiyanā,
atk-s0201a0:913_0: “Dānaṃ dassāmī”ti hi cittuppādo sayampi ekantahitasukhāvaho anuvidhiyanānampi hetu,
atk-s0201a0:913_1: evañhi uppannacittattāyeva dutiyadivase mahāvīthiṃ pidahitvā mahāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā bhikkhusatassa vā bhikkhusahassassa vā dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:913_3: Evaṃ “saṅghassa cīvaraṃ senāsanaṃ bhesajjaṃ dassāmī”ti cittuppādo sayampi ekantahitasukhāvaho anuvidhiyanānampi hetu,
atk-s0201a0:913_4: evaṃ uppannacittattāyeva hi cīvarādīni abhisaṅkharoti deti dāpeti ca.
atk-s0201a0:914_0: “Saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti hi cittaṃ uppādetvāva pacchā kāyena vā vācāya vā saraṇaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:914_1: Tathā “pañcaṅgaṃ aṭṭhaṅgaṃ dasaṅgaṃ vā sīlaṃ samādiyissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā kāyena vā vācāya vā samādiyati,
atk-s0201a0:914_2: “pabbajitvā catūsu sīlesu patiṭṭhahissāmī”ti ca cittaṃ uppādetvā kāyena vācāya ca pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0201a0:914_3: “Buddhavacanaṃ uggahessāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvāva ekaṃ vā nikāyaṃ dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye vācāya uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:915_0: “Buddho bhavissāmī”ti hi cittuppādo sayampi ekantahitasukhāvaho anuvidhiyanānampi hetu,
atk-s0201a0:915_1: evañhi uppannacittattāyeva aparena samayena kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni kāyena vācāya
atk-s0201a0:915_2: ca pāramiyo pūretvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tārento vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:916_0: Evaṃ kusalesu dhammesu cittuppādassāpi bahūpakārataṃ dassetvā idāni tattha niyojento “tasmā tiha cundā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:917_1: Evaṃ catucattālīsāya ākārehi dassite sallekhe cittuppādassāpi bahūpakārataṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva sallekhassa
atk-s0201a0:918_3: tassa parikkamanāya parivajjanatthāya añño suparikammakato viya bhūmibhāgo samo maggo bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:918_4: yathā ca rukkhamūlapāsāṇapapātakumbhīlamakarādi paribyākulaṃ visamaṃ titthamassa,
atk-s0201a0:918_5: tassa parikkamanāya parivajjanatthāya aññaṃ avisamaṃ anupubbagambhīraṃ sopānaphalakasadisaṃ titthaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:918_6: yaṃ paṭipanno sukheneva taṃ nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā ajjhogāhetvā nhāyeyya vā uttareyya vā,
atk-s0201a0:918_8: visamamaggavisamatitthasadisāya vihiṃsāya samannāgatassa vihiṃsakapuggalassa samamaggasamatitthasadisā avihiṃsā hoti parikkamanāya.
atk-s0201a0:918_9: Yatheva hi visamamaggatitthaparivajjanatthāya samo maggo ca titthañca paṭiyattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:918_11: yaṃ paṭipanno sukheneva manussagatiṃ vā devagatiṃ vā ajjhogāhetvā sampattiṃ vā anubhaveyya uttareyya vā lokā.
atk-s0201a0:919_1: Evaṃ tasseva hitādhigamāya maggabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni uparibhāgaṅgamanīyataṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a0:920_2: ye keci akusalā dhammā paṭisandhiyā janakā vā ajanakā vā,
atk-s0201a0:920_3: dinnāyapi paṭisandhiyā vipākajanakā vā ajanakā vā,
atk-s0201a0:920_4: sabbe te jātivasena adhobhāgaṅgamanīyāti evaṃnāmāva honti,
atk-s0201a0:920_6: Yathā ca ye keci kusalā dhammā paṭisandhiyā janakā vā ajanakā vā dinnāyapi paṭisandhiyā vipākajanakā vā ajanakā vā,
atk-s0201a0:920_7: sabbe te jātivasena uparibhāgaṅgamanīyāti evaṃnāmāva honti,
atk-s0201a0:920_17: Eteneva upāyena akusalaṃ akusalena kusalañca kusalena upametabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:921_1: Evaṃ tasseva sallekhassa uparibhāgaṅgamanīyataṃ dassetvā idāni parinibbāpane samatthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ so vata cundātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:921_3: Tassa yoti imaṃ uddesavacanaṃ āharitvā yo attanā palipapalipanno, so vata, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:921_4: paraṃ palipapalipannaṃ uddharissatīti evaṃ sabbapadesu sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:921_7: Ariyassa pana vinaye palipanti pañca kāmaguṇā vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:921_9: tasmā evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā. Yathā, cunda,
atk-s0201a0:921_10: koci puriso yāva nāsikaggā gambhīre kaddame nimuggo aparaṃ tattheva nimuggaṃ hatthe vā sīse vā gahetvā uddharissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0201a0:921_12: yena so taṃ uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhapeyya,
atk-s0201a0:921_14: so vata paraṃ tatheva palipapalipannaṃ uddharissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0201a0:922_1: puthujjanānampi bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakaupāsikānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā hontiyeva dhammaṃ abhisametāro,
atk-s0201a0:922_5: pasaṃsāmattameva pana dhammakathikā labhanti raññā pahitalekhavācako viya.
atk-s0201a0:922_6: Yathā hi rañño paccantajanapade pahitaṃ lekhaṃ tattha manussā lekhaṃ vācetuṃ ajānantā yo vācetuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:922_7: tena vācāpetvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “rañño āṇā”ti ādarena sampādenti,
atk-s0201a0:922_8: na ca nesaṃ hoti “lekhavācakassa ayaṃ āṇā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:922_9: Lekhavācako pana “vissaṭṭhāya vācāya vācesi anelagaḷāyā”ti pasaṃsāmattameva labhati,
atk-s0201a0:922_10: evameva kiñcāpi sāriputtapabhutayo dhammakathikā dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a0:922_11: atha kho likhitapaṇṇavācako viya te honti.
atk-s0201a0:922_12: Bhagavatoyeva pana sā dhammadesanā rañño āṇā viya.
atk-s0201a0:922_13: Ye ca taṃ sutvā dhammaṃ abhisamenti,
atk-s0201a0:922_15: Dhammakathikā pana “vissaṭṭhāya vācāya dhammaṃ desenti anelagaḷāyā”ti pasaṃsāmattameva labhantīti.
atk-s0201a0:923_0: Adanto avinīto aparinibbutoti ettha pana anibbisatāya adanto.
atk-s0201a0:923_6: parinibbāpessati vā tassa kilese nibbāpessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0201a0:924_3: yathā hi attanā apalipapalipanno paraṃ palipapalipannaṃ uddharissati,
atk-s0201a0:924_15: ayaṃ yā esā vihiṃsakassa parassa vihiṃsā,
atk-s0201a0:924_17: attanā hi avihiṃsako parassa vihiṃsācetanaṃ nibbāpessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0201a0:925_0: Atha vā yathā attanā apalipanno danto vinīto parinibbuto paraṃ palipapalipannaṃ adantaṃ avinītaṃ aparinibbutañca
atk-s0201a0:925_1: uddharissati damessati vinessati parinibbāpessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0201a0:925_2: evameva vihiṃsakassa purisapuggalassa vihiṃsāpahānāya maggaṃ bhāvayato uppannā avihiṃsā hoti parinibbānāya.
atk-s0201a0:925_3: Parinibbuto viya hi aparinibbutaṃ avihiṃsācetanāva vihiṃsācetanaṃ parinibbāpetuṃ samatthā.
atk-s0201a0:926_1: Evaṃ tassa parinibbāpane samatthabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ desanaṃ nigametvā dhammapaṭipattiyaṃ niyojetuṃ iti kho,
atk-s0201a0:926_4: Esa nayo sabbattha ettha avihiṃsādayo eva vihiṃsādīnaṃ sallekhanato sallekhakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:926_14: Kataṃ vo taṃ mayāti taṃ mayā ime pañca pariyāye dassentena tumhākaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:926_17: Ito paraṃ pana paṭipatti nāma sāvakānaṃ kiccaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:927_0: Tattha ca rukkhamūlānīti iminā rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:927_8: Mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthāti ye hi pubbe daharakāle,
atk-s0201a0:927_11: satthu sammukhībhāvakāle ca yonisomanasikāravirahitā rattindivaṃ maṅgulabhattā hutvā seyyasukhaṃ middhasukhamanubhontā pamajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:927_15: satthu parinibbutakāle ca taṃ pubbe pamādavihāraṃ anussarantā,
atk-s0201a0:927_17: tumhe pana tādisā mā ahuvatthāti etamatthaṃ dassento āha “mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:927_18: Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanīti ayaṃ amhākaṃ santikā “jhāyatha mā pamādatthā”ti tumhākaṃ anusāsanī,
atk-s0201a0:931_5: akusala”nti vā evaṃ yattakā therena pucchā vuttā,
atk-s0201a0:932_0: Tattha yasmā jānantāpi sammādiṭṭhīti vadanti ajānantāpi bāhirakāpi sāsanikāpi anussavādivasenāpi attapaccakkhenāpi,
atk-s0201a0:932_1: tasmā taṃ bahūnaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya dvikkhattuṃ āmasanto “sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:932_6: svāyaṃ evaṃ vuccamāno atthañca lakkhaṇañca upādāya kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:932_8: Tattha sammādiṭṭhīti sobhanāya pasatthāya ca diṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:932_9: Yadā pana dhammeyeva ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaddo vattati,
atk-s0201a0:932_10: tadāssa sobhanā pasatthā ca diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:933_0: Sā cāyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi duvidhā hoti lokiyā lokuttarāti.
atk-s0201a0:933_4: Puggalo pana tividho hoti puthujjano sekkho asekkho ca.
atk-s0201a0:933_5: Tattha puthujjano duvidho hoti bāhirako sāsaniko ca.
atk-s0201a0:933_6: Tattha bāhirako kammavādī kammassakatādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhi hoti,
atk-s0201a0:933_11: Idha pana niyatāya niyyānikāya lokuttarakusalasammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato “sammādiṭṭhī”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:933_12: Tenevāha “ujugatāssa diṭṭhi dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato āgato imaṃ saddhamma”nti,
atk-s0201a0:933_14: kāyavaṅkādīni ca sabbavaṅkāni samucchinditvā gatattā ujugatā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:933_15: tāyeva ca diṭṭhiyā samannāgato navappakārepi lokuttaradhamme aveccappasādena acalappasādena samannāgato hoti,
atk-s0201a0:933_16: sabbadiṭṭhigahanāni ca vinibbeṭhento sabbakilese pajahanto jātisaṃsārā nikkhamanto paṭipattiṃ pariniṭṭhapento
atk-s0201a0:933_17: ariyena maggena āgato imaṃ sambuddhappaveditaṃ amatogadhaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saddhammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:934_3: nirodhārammaṇāya pajānanāya kiccavasena “idaṃ dukkha”nti paṭivijjhanto akusalaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:934_4: Akusalamūlañca pajānātīti tassa mūlapaccayabhūtaṃ akusalamūlañca pajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:934_8: evaṃ ito paresu sabbavāresu kiccavaseneva vatthupajānanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:934_10: Sammādiṭṭhi hotīti vuttappakārāya lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0201a0:934_12: imaṃ saddhammanti ettāvatā saṃkhittadesanā niṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:934_14: tesaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ vitthāravaseneva sammāmanasikārappaṭivedho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:935_0: Dutiyavāre pana desanāpi vitthārena manasikārappaṭivedhopi vitthāreneva vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:935_2: vitthāradesanāya dve uparimamaggā kathitā”ti bhikkhū āhaṃsu vitthāradesanāvasāne “sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyā”tiādivacanaṃ sampassamānā.
atk-s0201a0:935_3: Thero panāha “saṃkhittadesanāyapi cattāro maggā rāsito kathitā,
atk-s0201a0:935_5: Yā cāyaṃ idha saṃkhittavitthāradesanāsu vicāraṇā āvikatā,
atk-s0201a0:937_0: Tattha paṭhamavārassa tāva vitthāradesanāya “pāṇātipāto kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:938_4: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0201a0:938_5: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0201a0:938_11: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0201a0:938_24: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:939_4: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti.
atk-s0201a0:939_5: Tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:939_9: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:939_10: Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:939_20: kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a0:940_2: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0201a0:941_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā,
atk-s0201a0:941_18: muhuttikāti etā ca dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo.
atk-s0201a0:941_20: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā,
atk-s0201a0:941_22: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
atk-s0201a0:942_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo vā.
atk-s0201a0:942_2: Aparo nayo musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu.
atk-s0201a0:942_4: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0201a0:942_8: Apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0201a0:942_10: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadīmaññe sandatī”ti purāṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0201a0:942_11: adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0201a0:942_12: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti atathaṃ vatthu,
atk-s0201a0:942_17: So kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā visaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:942_18: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:943_0: Pisuṇā vācātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:943_1: tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:943_3: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusampi karoti,
atk-s0201a0:943_4: sā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayasukhā vā,
atk-s0201a0:943_10: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇā vācā.
atk-s0201a0:943_15: “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti bhedapurekkhāratā vā,
atk-s0201a0:944_0: Parassa mammacchedakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā ekantapharusā cetanā pharusā vācā.
atk-s0201a0:944_2: eko kira dārako mātuvacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:944_3: taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti akkosi.
atk-s0201a0:944_5: Dārako “yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi taṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a0:944_6: yaṃ cittena cintesi taṃ hotū”ti saccakiriyamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:944_8: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusā vācā na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:944_9: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti,
atk-s0201a0:944_10: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0201a0:944_11: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti niddhamatha ne”ti.
atk-s0201a0:944_13: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusā vācā na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:944_14: evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusā vācāpi na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:944_15: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusā vācā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:946_2: Sā “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0201a0:946_3: Adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā ca mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0201a0:946_6: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:946_7: yāva “aho vatīdaṃ mamassā”ti attano na pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0201a0:947_2: pharusā vācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca.
atk-s0201a0:947_5: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:947_6: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ na cinteti.
atk-s0201a0:948_5: Tassā dve sambhārā vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā,
atk-s0201a0:949_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:950_0: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta,
atk-s0201a0:951_1: micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti,
atk-s0201a0:951_4: Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:952_7: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā,
atk-s0201a0:953_1: Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi “gacchatha naṃ ghātethā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0201a0:955_4: imesañca pāṇātipātādīnaṃ akusalānaṃ kesañci sampayuttappabhāvakaṭṭhena kesañci upanissayapaccayaṭṭhena mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:955_5: Vuttampi cetaṃ “ratto kho āvuso rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇampi hanatī”tiādi.
atk-s0201a0:958_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī kusalantiādīsu pāṇātipātādayo vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0201a0:958_8: yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttā kusalacittasampayuttā virati,
atk-s0201a0:958_9: sā bhedato tividho hoti sampattavirati samādānavirati samucchedaviratīti.
atk-s0201a0:958_10: Tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā “ayuttaṃ amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0201a0:958_11: kātu”nti sampattavatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati sampattaviratīti veditabbā sīhaḷadīpe cakkanaupāsakassa viya.
atk-s0201a0:959_0: Tassa kira daharakāleyeva mātuyā rogo uppajji.
atk-s0201a0:959_2: Tato cakkanassa bhātā “gaccha tāta khettaṃ āhiṇḍāhī”ti cakkanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0201a0:959_4: Tasmiñca samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti,
atk-s0201a0:959_5: so taṃ disvā vegena dhāvento valliyā baddho “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:959_6: Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā cintesi “mātu bhesajjaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:959_8: yvāhaṃ mātu jīvitakāraṇā paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya”nti.
atk-s0201a0:959_9: Atha naṃ “gaccha araññe sasehi saddhiṃ tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā”ti muñci.
atk-s0201a0:959_10: Bhātarā ca “kiṃ tāta saso laddho”ti pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0201a0:959_13: nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropetā”ti saccaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:960_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttari ca attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā vatthuṃ
atk-s0201a0:960_1: avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati samādānaviratīti veditabbā uttaravaḍḍhamānapabbatavāsīupāsakassa viya.
atk-s0201a0:961_0: So kira ambariyavihāravāsīpiṅgalabuddharakkhitattherassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā khettaṃ kassati.
atk-s0201a0:961_6: yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadaṃ gahetvā bhindeyya”nti.
atk-s0201a0:961_8: na sikkhāpada”nti aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0201a0:962_1: Yassā uppattito pabhuti “pāṇaṃ ghātessāmī”ti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi na uppajjatīti.
atk-s0201a0:962_2: Sā panāyaṃ virati kosallappavattiyā kusalanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:962_3: Kucchitasayanato vā kusanti laddhavohāraṃ dussīlyaṃ lunātītipi kusalaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:962_4: Katamañcāvuso kusalanti imassa pana pañhassa ananurūpattā kusalāti na vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:963_1: evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:964_0: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti,
atk-s0201a0:965_2: Ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-s0201a0:965_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:966_2: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:966_3: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:967_2: Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:968_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti.
atk-s0201a0:968_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:969_4: imesañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇīādīnaṃ kusalānaṃ kesañci sampayuttappabhāvakaṭṭhena kesañci upanissayapaccayaṭṭhena mūlanti kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:970_0: Idāni sabbampi taṃ saṅkhepena ca vitthārena ca desitamatthaṃ nigamento yato kho āvusotiādiappanāvāramāha.
atk-s0201a0:970_1: Tattha evaṃ akusalaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhadasākusalakammapathavasena akusalaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:970_3: Ettāvatā ekena nayena catusaccakammaṭṭhānikassa yāva arahattā niyyānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:970_4: Ettha hi ṭhapetvā abhijjhaṃ dasa akusalakammapathā ca kusalakammapathā ca dukkhasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:970_5: Abhijjhā ca lobho akusalamūlañcāti ime dve dhammā nippariyāyena samudayasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:970_9: Dukkhaṃ parijānanto samudayaṃ pajahamāno nirodhaṃ pajānanto ariyamaggo maggasaccanti iti dve saccāni sarūpena vuttāni,
atk-s0201a0:971_0: So sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyāti so evaṃ akusalādīni pajānanto sabbākārena rāgānusayaṃ pajahitvā.
atk-s0201a0:971_1: Paṭighānusayaṃ paṭivinodetvāti paṭighānusayañca sabbākāreneva nīharitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:971_3: Asmīti diṭṭhimānānusayaṃ samūhanitvāti pañcasu khandhesu kañci dhammaṃ anavakārīkaritvā “asmī”ti iminā
atk-s0201a0:972_0: Tattha diṭṭhimānānusayanti diṭṭhisadisaṃ mānānusayanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:972_1: Ayañhi mānānusayo asmīti pavattattā diṭṭhisadiso hoti,
atk-s0201a0:972_3: Imañca asmimānaṃ vitthārato viññātukāmena khandhiyavagge khemakasuttaṃ oloketabbanti.
atk-s0201a0:973_1: Vijjaṃ uppādetvāti tassā avijjāya samugghāṭikaṃ arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā.
atk-s0201a0:973_3: Diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti asmiṃyeva attabhāve vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedakaro hoti.
atk-s0201a0:976_2: āgato imaṃ saddhammanti evaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa kusalākusalamukhena catusaccadesanaṃ sutvā taṃ āyasmato
atk-s0201a0:976_3: sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ “sādhāvuso”ti iminā vacanena te bhikkhū abhinanditvā imasseva vacanassa samuṭṭhāpakena
atk-s0201a0:976_4: cittena anumoditvā vacasā sampaṭicchitvā cetasā sampiyāyitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:976_5: Idāni yasmā thero nānappakārena catusaccadesanaṃ desetuṃ paṭibalo,
atk-s0201a0:976_8: pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetu”nti yasmā vā uttarimpi desetukāmova hutvā “ettāvatāpi kho”ti avaca,
atk-s0201a0:976_9: tasmā aparenapi nayena saccadesanaṃ sotukāmā te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:976_10: Tena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjitapañhato uttariṃ siyā kho panāvuso,
atk-s0201a0:976_11: aññopi pariyāyo bhaveyya aññampi kāraṇanti iminā nayena aññaṃ atirekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:976_12: purimapañhassa vā uparibhāge pucchiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:977_0: Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti sañjātā, nibbattā.
atk-s0201a0:977_1: Sambhavesīnanti ye sambhavaṃ jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti.
atk-s0201a0:977_2: Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0201a0:977_4: Aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:977_5: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesino nāma.
atk-s0201a0:977_8: yāva te tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0201a0:978_1: ye bhūtāyeva na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:978_4: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:978_5: Evaṃ sabbathāpi imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0201a0:979_4: Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya.
atk-s0201a0:979_6: Ubhopi cetāni bhūtānaṃ ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca.
atk-s0201a0:979_7: Sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya cāti evaṃ ubhayattha daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:979_8: Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbato kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0201a0:979_10: Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya oḷāriko,
atk-s0201a0:979_12: Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro āhāro sukhumova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:979_13: Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:980_0: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a0:980_4: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a0:980_5: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti.
atk-s0201a0:980_6: Tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamatteneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:980_7: Taracchānampi āhāraṃ upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a0:981_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā,
atk-s0201a0:981_2: Tathā hi ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīvato muhutteneva jighacchito hoti,
atk-s0201a0:981_4: Sappiṃ pana pasaṭamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:981_9: Dve pana ekato hutvā parissamañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0201a0:982_1: Etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo āhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:982_3: Tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo vā tatiyo vāti idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:983_2: atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu imeyeva cattāro vuttāti? Vuccate,
atk-s0201a0:983_4: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro.
atk-s0201a0:986_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamattoyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:986_2: Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:987_0: Phassāhāro pana sukhavedaniyo phasso uppajjamāno sukhavedanaṃ āharati,
atk-s0201a0:987_2: adukkhamasukhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhanti evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0201a0:988_2: Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati.
atk-s0201a0:989_0: Viññāṇāhāro pana ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā,
atk-s0201a0:990_0: Ettha ca manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharatīti sāsavā kusalākusalacetanāva vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:990_2: Avisesena pana taṃsampayuttataṃsamuṭṭhānadhammānaṃ āharaṇato pete āhārāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:991_0: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a0:992_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:992_2: Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthambhito dasapi vassāni vassasatampi yāva āyuparimāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:992_4: Yathā mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni pāyetvā posiyamānova ciraṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:993_0: “Yathā mahārāja gehe patante aññena dārunā upatthambhenti,
atk-s0201a0:993_1: aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na patati,
atk-s0201a0:993_2: evameva kho mahārāja ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko,
atk-s0201a0:994_0: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a0:994_1: Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca.
atk-s0201a0:995_0: Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:995_1: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:995_2: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:996_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:996_7: Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ katvā sītādīnaṃ purekkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:996_8: Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭhepi dhamme gārayhā honti.
atk-s0201a0:996_9: Samparāyepi tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitātiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti.
atk-s0201a0:996_10: Imināva tāva kāraṇena kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantiyeva bhayanti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:997_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti.
atk-s0201a0:997_1: Te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭesu chaḍḍenti.
atk-s0201a0:997_3: Tato ne rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:997_4: Kāyassa ca bhedā duggati nesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:997_5: Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:997_6: Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:998_0: Kusalākusalakammāyūhaneneva pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbamāgataṃyeva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:998_1: Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:999_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ gahetvāva nibbattati,
atk-s0201a0:999_4: iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1000_0: Evaṃ sabhayesu pana imesu āhāresu sammāsambuddho kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantipariyādānatthaṃ “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0201a0:1001_1: dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1001_2: Tesaṃ paññāsa yojanāni gantvā pātheyyaṃ niṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1001_4: Tato puriso bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde ito samantā paññāsa yojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1001_5: tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1001_6: na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1001_7: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1001_8: Sāpi āha “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1001_10: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1001_11: Tato so taṃ āha “bhadde mātugāmamaraṇena dvinnaṃ maraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1001_12: Na hi mando kumāro mātaraṃ vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1001_15: handa dāni puttakaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ gahetvā kantāraṃ nittharāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1002_0: Tato mātā puttamāha “tāta pitu santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1002_2: Athassa pitā “mayā puttakaṃ posessāmīti kasigorakkhādīhi anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1002_4: tvaṃyeva tava puttakaṃ mārehī”ti vatvā “tāta mātusantikameva gacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1002_6: Athassa mātāpi “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi tāva anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1002_8: Na sakkāhaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta pitusantikaṃyeva gacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1002_9: Evaṃ so dvinnaṃ antarā gacchantoyeva mato.
atk-s0201a0:1002_10: Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā pubbe vuttanayeneva maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1002_11: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikulattā neva davāya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1002_12: na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
atk-s0201a0:1003_1: Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya agorasamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0201a0:1003_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ evaṃ puttamaṃsasadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1004_0: Niccammagāvūpamāyaṃ pana yathā sā gāvī gīvato yāva khurā,
atk-s0201a0:1004_1: tāva cammaṃ uddāletvā muttā yaṃ yadeva nissāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1004_3: evaṃ phassopi yaṃ yadeva vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ vā nissāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1004_5: Tasmā yo bhikkhu phassāhāraṃ evaṃ niccammagāvisadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1005_2: Yathā nānābāhāsu gahetvā tattha upakaḍḍhakā dve purisā,
atk-s0201a0:1005_4: Tasmā yo bhikkhu manosañcetanāhāraṃ evaṃ aṅgārakāsūpakaḍḍhakapurisasadisaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1006_0: Sattisatāhatūpamāyaṃ pana yena so puriso pubbaṇhasamaye sattisatena haññati,
atk-s0201a0:1006_1: tamassa sarīre vaṇamukhasataṃ katvā antarā aṭṭhatvā vinivijjhitvā aparabhāgeyeva patati,
atk-s0201a0:1006_3: evamassa patitokāse apatitvā apatitvā gatāhi sattīhi sabbasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1006_4: tassa ekavaṇamukhepi uppannassa dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1006_8: Vaṇamukhesu dukkhavedanuppādo viya jātesu khandhesu vaṭṭamūlakanānāvidhadukkhuppādo.
atk-s0201a0:1006_11: Tassa sattighātehi uppannavaṇamukhāni viya viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1006_12: Vaṇamukhapaccayā tassa purisassa kakkhaḷadukkhuppādo viya nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇassa dvattiṃsakammakāraṇaaṭṭhanavutirogādivasena
atk-s0201a0:1006_14: Tasmā yo bhikkhu viññāṇāhāraṃ evaṃ sattisatāhatasadisaṃ passati.
atk-s0201a0:1007_0: So evaṃ imesu āhāresu nikantiṃ pariyādiyanto cattāropi āhāre parijānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1007_1: yesu pariññātesu sabbampi pariññātaṃ vatthu pariññātameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1008_2: āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1008_3: Pañcakāmaguṇike rāge pariññāte natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1008_4: yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyya. Phasse,
atk-s0201a0:1008_6: āhāre pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1008_7: Tīsu vedanāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1008_10: āhāre pariññāte tisso taṇhā pariññātā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1008_11: Tīsu taṇhāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi. Viññāṇe,
atk-s0201a0:1008_14: Nāmarūpe pariññāte ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1009_0: Taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayoti purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo nibbatto hotīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1009_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi tisantativasena uppannasamatiṃsarūpabbhantare jātā ojā atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1009_3: Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā nibbattā upādinnakaphassamanosañcetanā viññāṇāhārāti.
atk-s0201a0:1009_4: Evaṃ tāva purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1009_5: Yasmā panidha upādinnakāpi anupādinnakāpi āhārā missetvā kathitā,
atk-s0201a0:1009_6: tasmā anupādinnakānampi evaṃ taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1009_9: Lobhasahagatacittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā nibbattā anupādinnakaphassamanosañcetanā viññāṇāhārāti.
atk-s0201a0:1010_0: Taṇhānirodhā āhāranirodhoti imissā upādinnakānañca anupādinnakānañca āhārānaṃ paccayabhūtāya taṇhāya nirodhena āhāranirodho paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1010_7: Sabbavāresu ca “ettāvatāpi kho āvuso”ti idaṃ desanāniyyātanaṃ tattha tattha desitadhammavasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1010_8: Tassa idha tāva ayaṃ yojanā ettāvatāpīti imāya āhāradesanāya vuttamanasikārappaṭivedhavasenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1013_1: Idāni “sādhāvuso”ti purimanayeneva therassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā te bhikkhū uttarimpi pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1013_2: Thero ca nesaṃ aññenapi pariyāyena byākāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1013_4: Tasmā ito paraṃ evarūpāni vacanāni anāmasitvā yena yena pariyāyena byākaroti,
atk-s0201a0:1013_6: Imassa pana vārassa saṅkhepadesanāyaṃ dukkhañca pajānātīti ettha dukkhanti dukkhasaccaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1016_2: Tattha jarāmaraṇavāre tāva tesaṃ tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti ñātabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1016_4: yā somadattassa jarāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:1016_5: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1016_6: Tasmā vuttaṃ “ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1017_0: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena anekesaṃ nikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-s0201a0:1017_6: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-s0201a0:1017_12: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-s0201a0:1017_13: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0201a0:1017_14: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0201a0:1017_15: Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā vātassa vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ sambhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1017_16: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-s0201a0:1017_17: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-s0201a0:1018_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattatāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-s0201a0:1019_0: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1019_2: Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0201a0:1019_3: jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1019_5: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1020_0: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1020_1: Arūpadhammesu pana tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1020_4: taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni
atk-s0201a0:1020_5: gosīsādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a0:1020_6: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1020_7: Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1020_8: viya antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1020_10: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1021_2: Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti cavanakavasena vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1021_6: Antaradhānanti ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1023_5: Atha vā yasmā ca cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva,
atk-s0201a0:1023_9: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakāraṇato maraṇaṃ kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1024_1: Idaṃ vuccatāvusoti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā jarāmaraṇanti kathīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1027_7: Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1028_1: Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0201a0:1028_2: Tattha ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa catuvokārabhave catunnaṃ pañcavokārabhave pañcannampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1028_4: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavaseneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1028_6: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-s0201a0:1028_7: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso jātīti iminā padena vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0201a0:1028_8: Bhavasamudayāti ettha pana jātiyā paccayabhūto kammabhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1031_1: Bhavavāre kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca.
atk-s0201a0:1031_3: Tañhi upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1031_4: Upapattibhavo nāma tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādinnakhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1031_5: Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1031_6: Evaṃ sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapatti ca ubhayampetamidha “kāmabhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1031_8: Upādānasamudayāti ettha pana upādānaṃ kusalakammabhavassa upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1034_3: Kāmo ca so upādānañcāti vā kāmupādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1035_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1035_9: Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ natthi dinna”nti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1036_3: Gosīlagovatādīni hi evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a0:1036_5: ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhī”ti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1037_5: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyati etenāti attavādupādānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1037_9: idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1038_0: Taṇhāsamudayāti ettha taṇhā kāmupādānassa upanissayavasena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatāsevanavasena vā paccayo.
atk-s0201a0:1041_2: dhammataṇhāti evaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyaṃ pavattāya taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a0:1041_6: Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā.
atk-s0201a0:1041_7: Sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā.
atk-s0201a0:1041_8: Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavissatīti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti evaṃ tividhā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1041_10: tathā saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1041_19: ‘iminā itthasmī’ti hotī”ti vā evamādinā bāhirarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa.
atk-s0201a0:1041_23: Puna saṅgahe karīyamāne rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti evaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:1044_0: Vedanāsamudayāti ettha pana vedanāti vipākavedanā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:1044_1: Sā kathaṃ chasu dvāresu taṇhāya paccayo hotīti ce?
atk-s0201a0:1044_3: Sukhāya hi vedanāya assādanena sattā vedanaṃ mamāyantā vedanāya taṇhaṃ uppādetvā vedanārāgarattā hutvā cakkhudvāre iṭṭhameva rūpaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0201a0:1044_6: Tathā sotadvārādīsu iṭṭhe ca saddādayo patthenti,
atk-s0201a0:1044_13: Yathā puttasinehena puttaṃ mamāyantā dhātiyā sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:1044_14: sappāyasappikhīrādīniyeva naṃ pāyenti ceva bhojenti ca.
atk-s0201a0:1047_3: manosamphassajā vedanāti etaṃ “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā atthi kusalā,
atk-s0201a0:1047_5: atthi abyākatā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatattā cakkhudvārādīsu pavattānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatavedanānaṃ “sāriputto,
atk-s0201a0:1047_6: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisavatthuto nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1047_7: Vacanattho panettha cakkhusamphassahetu jātā vedanā cakkhusamphassajā vedanāti.
atk-s0201a0:1047_12: tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1048_0: Phassasamudayāti ettha pana pañcadvāre pañcavatthukavedanānaṃ sahajātacakkhusamphassādisamudayā samudayo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1048_2: Manodvāre tadārammaṇavedanānaṃ advārikānañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivedanānaṃ sahajātamanosamphassasamudayā samudayo hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1051_4: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa samphassā vuttā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1051_6: Saḷāyatanasamudayāti channaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samudayena imassa chabbidhassāpi samphassassa samudayo hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1054_2: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a0:1054_3: Nāmarūpasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ nāmaṃ yañca rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1054_4: yañca nāmarūpaṃ yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1054_5: tassa vasena visuddhimagge paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttanayena nāmarūpasamudayā saḷāyatanasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1057_7: ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi cittesu santi.
atk-s0201a0:1057_9: Cattāri ca mahābhūtānīti ettha cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0201a0:1057_11: Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti,
atk-s0201a0:1058_0: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1058_7: Tena catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya pavattamānaṃ rūpanti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1058_8: Evaṃ sabbatthāpi yāni cattāri pathavīādīni mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0201a0:1058_9: yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ cakkhāyatanādibhedena abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1058_11: Viññāṇasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ viññāṇaṃ yassa nāmassa yassa ca rūpassa yassa ca nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti,
