atk-s0201a0:1058_12: tassa vasena visuddhimagge paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttanayeneva viññāṇasamudayā nāmarūpasamudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1061_6: Saṅkhārasamudayāti ettha pana yo saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1064_6: vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1064_8: kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā raho nisīditvā cintayantassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1064_9: Avijjāsamudayāti ettha pana kusalānaṃ upanissayavasena akusalānaṃ sahajātādivasenāpi avijjāpaccayo hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1067_4: Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0201a0:1067_5: Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe antogadhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1068_0: Samudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0201a0:1068_1: Nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato.
atk-s0201a0:1068_2: Nirodhapaṭipadāya hi paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhanivāraṇena,
atk-s0201a0:1068_12: Purimaṃ pana vañcaniyaṭṭhena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1069_0: Apica dukkheti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā.
atk-s0201a0:1069_1: Dukkhasamudayeti ettāvatā vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca.
atk-s0201a0:1069_3: Avisesato pana aññāṇanti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1069_4: Āsavasamudayāti ettha pana kāmāsavabhavāsavā sahajātādivasena avijjāya paccayā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1072_1: Āsavavāre avijjāsamudayāti ettha avijjā kāmāsavabhavāsavānaṃ sahajātādivasena paccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1072_4: Pubbuppannā avijjāyevassa aparāparuppannassa avijjāsavassa upanissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1072_6: Ayaṃ vāro yā esā paṭiccasamuppādapadesu jeṭṭhikā avijjā,
atk-s0201a0:1072_8: Evaṃ vuttena vārena saṃsārassa anamataggatā sādhitā hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1072_11: Evaṃ āsavā avijjāya avijjāpi āsavānaṃ paccayoti katvā pubbakoṭi na paññāyati avijjāya,
atk-s0201a0:1072_12: tassā apaññāyanato saṃsārassa anamataggatā siddhā hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:1073_0: Evaṃ sabbepime imasmiṃ sutte kammapathavāro āhāravāro dukkhavāro jarā- maraṇa- jāti- bhava- upādāna- taṇhā- vedanā- phassa-
atk-s0201a0:1074_0: Tesu ekekassa vārassa saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā vibhattā dvattiṃsaṭṭhānāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1074_1: Iti imasmiṃ sutte imesu dvattiṃsaṭṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathitāni.
atk-s0201a0:1074_2: Etesaṃyeva vitthāravasena vuttesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1074_3: Therassa pana matena dvattiṃsāyapi ṭhānesu cattāri saccāni cattāro ca maggā kathitāti.
atk-s0201a0:1074_4: Iti sakalepi pañcamahānikāyasaṅgahite buddhavacane natthi taṃ suttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1074_5: yattha dvattiṃsakkhattuṃ cattāri saccāni dvattiṃsakkhattuñca arahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ aññatra imamhā sammādiṭṭhisuttāti.
atk-s0201a0:1075_0: Idamavocāyasmā sāriputtoti idaṃ dvattiṃsāya catusaccapariyāyehi dvattiṃsāya arahattapariyāyehīti catusaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0201a0:1075_1: kāraṇehi alaṅkaritvā sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ āyasmā sāriputto avoca,
atk-s0201a0:1075_2: attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0201a0:1080_2: Tattha kurūsu viharatīti kurunāmakā jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0201a0:1080_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kurūti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1080_6: mandhātukāle tīsu dīpesu manussā jambudīpo nāma buddhapaccekabuddhamahāsāvakacakkavattipabhutīnaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1080_7: uppattibhūmi uttamadīpo atiramaṇīyoti sutvā raññā mandhātucakkavattinā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā cattāro
atk-s0201a0:1085_1: Cattāro mahārājāno “mandhātumahārājā āgato”ti sutvāva “mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo rājā na sakkā yuddhena paṭibāhitu”nti sakarajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1085_7: tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno paricārakā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1085_16: tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paṇṇāsayojanavitthatā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayasumanapupphavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā,
atk-s0201a0:1085_17: yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anupavisatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1086_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri.
atk-s0201a0:1086_1: Taṃ ākāse patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0201a0:1086_2: Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0201a0:1086_4: Sakko “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvāva tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā –
atk-s0201a0:1086_5: “svāgataṃ te, mahārāja, sakaṃ te, mahārāja. Anusāsa,
atk-s0201a0:1086_6: mahārājā”ti vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dvebhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1087_0: Tassa kira sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinnassa akkhinimisamattena nānattaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1087_1: Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1087_2: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno yāva chattiṃsa sakkā uppajjitvā cutā,
atk-s0201a0:1087_3: tāva rajjaṃ kāretvā atittoyeva kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patiṭṭhito vātātapena phuṭṭhagatto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1088_0: Cakkaratane pana pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhite pariṇāyakaratanaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe mandhātuupāhanaṃ likhāpetvā idaṃ mandhāturajjanti rajjamanusāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1088_1: Tepi tīhi dīpehi āgatamanussā puna gantuṃ asakkontā pariṇāyakaratanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva mayaṃ rañño ānubhāvena āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:1088_5: Tattha pubbavidehato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso tāyeva purimasaññāya videharaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0201a0:1088_6: Aparagoyānato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso aparantajanapadoti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0201a0:1088_7: Uttarakuruto āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso kururaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhīti.
atk-s0201a0:1088_8: Bahuke pana gāmanigamādayo upādāya bahuvacanena voharīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1089_6: Tassa kira pāde khāṇukena viddhaṭṭhāne vaṇo ruhanto cittadārusadiso hutvā ruhi,
atk-s0201a0:1089_8: So ca tasmiṃ okāse damito porisādabhāvato paṭisedhito. Kena?
atk-s0201a0:1089_13: Tadā hi mahāsattena kammāsapādo damito. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:1094_2: Kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ kira kuruvattadhammo tasmiṃ kammāso jāto,
atk-s0201a0:1094_3: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ kammāso ettha dhammo jātoti kammāsadhammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1094_7: Bhagavato kira tasmiṃ nigame vasanokāso koci vihāro nāhosi.
atk-s0201a0:1094_8: Nigamato pana apakkamma aññatarasmiṃ udakasampanne ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge mahāvanasaṇḍo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1094_11: tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo “kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo,
atk-s0201a0:1096_5: Kururaṭṭhavāsino kira bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
atk-s0201a0:1096_7: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ pariggahetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1096_8: Tena tesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ sampassanto ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1096_9: arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ satipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1096_10: Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0201a0:1096_11: suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0201a0:1096_12: evaṃ bhagavā kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a0:1096_13: Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ majjhimanikāye sāropamaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1096_14: rukkhūpamaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ māgaṇḍiyaṃ āneñjasappāyanti aññānipi suttāni desesi.
atk-s0201a0:1097_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0201a0:1097_3: Sace kāci itthī “amma tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1097_6: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:1097_7: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaromī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1097_8: Tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1097_14: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1097_15: So bhikkhunupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
atk-s0201a0:1097_18: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha –
atk-s0201a0:1101_1: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:1101_3: tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0201a0:1101_4: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0201a0:1102_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
atk-s0201a0:1102_3: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1102_4: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha –
atk-s0201a0:1104_2: katarasmimpi ṭhāne vippakirissatī”ti evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti.
atk-s0201a0:1105_4: tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva janento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1108_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:1109_17: evaṃ santepi bhagavatova so ayano tena uppāditattā.
atk-s0201a0:1109_30: Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1114_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1114_3: Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1114_4: Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evamatthaṃ yojetvā vucceyya,
atk-s0201a0:1114_6: attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1115_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1115_5: Ācariye punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1115_9: ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci,
atk-s0201a0:1115_11: ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi,
atk-s0201a0:1115_12: lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1115_14: cūḷanāgena diṭṭho pubbabhāgamaggova labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1116_4: Tena dhammāsane nisīditvā vījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa etadahosi “raho nisīditvā na vakkhāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1116_6: na attano rucimeva ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a0:1116_10: So ācariyassa viya saddoti dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1116_11: Āvuso cūḷanāga mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati,
atk-s0201a0:1117_0: Thero cintesi “amhākaṃ ācariyo sabbapariyattiko tepiṭako sutabuddho,
atk-s0201a0:1117_1: evarūpassapi nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti,
atk-s0201a0:1117_2: anāgate mama bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭisambhidāmaggato
atk-s0201a0:1124_2: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0201a0:1124_3: Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ upari ekasmiññeva kappe
atk-s0201a0:1124_4: nibbatte taṇhaṅkaramedhaṅkarasaraṇaṅkaradīpaṅkaranāmake buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0201a0:1124_5: anekasatā paccekabuddhā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0201a0:1128_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0201a0:1130_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya,
atk-s0201a0:1130_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya,
atk-s0201a0:1130_3: paṭācārādīnaṃ viya ca paridevasamatikkamāya ca saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a0:1131_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:1132_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:1133_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:1135_0: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0201a0:1137_1: Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1137_2: tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1138_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0201a0:1138_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa,
atk-s0201a0:1138_3: sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a0:1139_1: sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1139_2: Tassa kaniṭṭhabhātubhariyā “gacchatha naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi.
atk-s0201a0:1139_6: Pāṭibhogaṃ me upāsakā gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa,
atk-s0201a0:1139_8: Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1139_9: Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1139_10: Therassa vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0201a0:1139_11: Tato anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane arahattaṃ patto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0201a0:1144_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ upagantvā “āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1144_2: na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1144_3: Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1144_4: Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a0:1144_5: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1145_0: Atha aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi.
atk-s0201a0:1145_3: Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1145_4: Byaggho bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānaṃ āruyha taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1145_8: bhikkhūnaṃ viseso nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1145_9: So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:1145_12: hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0201a0:1149_0: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, bhakkho kāyo amittānaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:1151_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma rājānaṃ disvā
atk-s0201a0:1151_5: taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti natumhākavaggaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano,
atk-s0201a0:1151_7: So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajito upasampanno dvemātikā
atk-s0201a0:1151_8: paguṇaṃ katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1151_10: Tamenaṃ rattiṃ eko migaluddako migoti maññamāno sattiyā pahari.
atk-s0201a0:1151_12: So taṃ sattiṃ harāpetvā pahāramukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1151_13: kāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1153_0: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0201a0:1156_2: addhā te muddhamatthake hatthaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ parāmaseyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1156_3: Ettāvatā ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a0:1157_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhaṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:1157_1: So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1157_2: Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1158_1: tattha pañcasatā accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye upapannā.
atk-s0201a0:1158_2: So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti upaparikkhanto
atk-s0201a0:1158_3: attanopi āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto ativiya domanassajāto hutvā
atk-s0201a0:1158_4: “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati na añño”ti avasesā pañcasatā accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a0:1161_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:1165_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0201a0:1165_1: Evamayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1166_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0201a0:1166_3: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttarassa maggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a0:1166_5: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0201a0:1166_7: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a0:1167_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva honti,
atk-s0201a0:1167_1: ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni,
atk-s0201a0:1167_2: na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:1167_3: Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:1167_4: Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti,
atk-s0201a0:1167_5: taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1167_6: Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a0:1167_11: Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vatvā “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1168_3: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1168_4: yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1168_7: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkīyanti,
atk-s0201a0:1168_9: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1168_10: evaṃ imassapi ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1169_2: Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1169_6: visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1169_8: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1170_0: Yathā hi satasahassagghanikapaṇḍukambalavāṇijena kambalaṃ gaṇhathāti ugghositepi asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:1170_1: Kesakambalavālakambalādayopi hi duggandhā kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:1170_2: Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1170_9: maggo”ti vuttepi asukamaggoti na tāva pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1170_11: “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati,
atk-s0201a0:1170_12: tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1170_13: imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1171_3: tena na tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0201a0:1171_5: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0201a0:1171_12: Āhārasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1171_24: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti etthāpi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1171_30: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1171_37: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1172_6: Catassopi hi etā satiyo maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:1172_10: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:1172_13: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1172_21: Yadidaṃ sattabojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu viya hi yathā mārasenappamaddanoti ca sattabojjhaṅgāti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1172_23: Evaṃ ekāyanamaggoti ca cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1173_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-s0201a0:1173_2: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu
atk-s0201a0:1173_7: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0201a0:1174_3: tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1174_4: Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0201a0:1174_8: tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsapahānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1174_9: vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1175_1: atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1176_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1176_1: Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1176_2: dakkhiṇato pacchimato uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1177_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1177_1: evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a0:1178_0: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1178_1: evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a0:1179_0: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1179_1: evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a0:1180_0: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1180_1: evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0201a0:1181_0: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1182_7: Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho,
atk-s0201a0:1182_10: Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva honti rājagamanādīsu rājaggahaṇena sesaparisā viya.
atk-s0201a0:1182_12: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1182_13: Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā,
atk-s0201a0:1186_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:1187_1: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:1188_0: “Kāye”ti ca vatvāpi puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1188_3: atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1188_10: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujanako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-s0201a0:1188_11: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1188_12: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
atk-s0201a0:1188_13: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1189_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0201a0:1190_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:1191_6: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī,
atk-s0201a0:1191_11: so satova assasatī”tiādinā nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-s0201a0:1191_12: yo ca “idhekacco pathavikāyaṃ aniccato anupassati āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1191_13: cammakāyaṃ maṃsakāyaṃ ruhirakāyaṃ nahārukāyaṃ aṭṭhikāyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti paṭisambhidāyaṃ kāyo vutto,
atk-s0201a0:1191_14: tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato “kāye kāyānupassī”ti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1192_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato tassa tasseva pana kesālomādikassa
atk-s0201a0:1192_1: nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1192_3: no niccato”tiādinā nayena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0201a0:1193_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0201a0:1193_14: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:1194_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo,
atk-s0201a0:1194_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0201a0:1194_7: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1194_11: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1194_12: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1194_14: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1194_16: tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1194_17: Tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimāti idaṃ vutta”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1195_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1195_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0201a0:1195_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:1195_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:1195_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1195_11: tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1196_5: domanassavinayena ca kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1196_6: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1196_8: yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito ca hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1196_9: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanento yogasamattho hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:1197_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1198_4: Imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:1199_0: Viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. Tena vuccati viharatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1203_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko?
atk-s0201a0:1203_5: Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandīrāgo cittassa sārāgo,
atk-s0201a0:1203_13: Iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā vūpasantā samitā vūpasamitā
atk-s0201a0:1203_14: atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-s0201a0:1203_15: tena vuccati vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti evametesaṃ padānamattho vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1203_16: Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati,
atk-s0201a0:1204_2: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti ettha pana vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1204_5: dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā,
atk-s0201a0:1207_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:1208_4: Yathāha “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1208_9: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattānupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasantāsantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1208_11: Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1208_14: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1208_15: Tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi evaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0201a0:1211_1: Idāni seyyathāpi nāma cheko vilīvakārako thūlakilañjasaṇhakilañjacaṅkoṭakapeḷāpuṭādīni upakaraṇāni kattukāmo
atk-s0201a0:1211_2: ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:1211_3: evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya sattānaṃ anekappakāravisesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0201a0:1211_6: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1211_7: gahetvā vibhajanto “kathañca bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena niddesavāraṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-s0201a0:1212_3: kena ca pakārena bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti?
atk-s0201a0:1212_10: saddo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
atk-s0201a0:1213_2: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1213_4: tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0201a0:1213_5: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya.
atk-s0201a0:1213_6: Athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
atk-s0201a0:1213_7: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0201a0:1213_8: apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ vā pavesetvā tattha satipaṭṭhānārammaṇatthambhe satiyottena
atk-s0201a0:1213_10: Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0201a0:1213_11: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca.
atk-s0201a0:1214_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0201a0:1217_0: Apica yasmā idaṃ kāyānupassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1217_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1217_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a0:1217_4: tadeva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1218_1: So yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
atk-s0201a0:1218_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:1218_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati.
atk-s0201a0:1218_4: Tato tattha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantena yoginā anukkamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0201a0:1219_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1219_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena cattāro magge ceva cattāri ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1223_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1223_1: Ito paraṃ imasmiṃ tāva ānāpānapabbe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:1224_0: Tassa pana imesaṃ “dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:1224_1: passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena sikkhato assāsapassāsanimitte cattāri jhānāni uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:1224_2: So jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāse vā pariggaṇhāti jhānaṅgāni vā.
atk-s0201a0:1224_6: karajakāyo nāma cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañcā”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1224_7: tato tadārammaṇe phassapañcamake nāmanti evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1224_9: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:1224_10: Idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1225_3: karajakāyo rūpa”nti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaccayākāraṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1225_4: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:1225_5: idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1226_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā assāsapassāsakāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1226_4: Etenassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapetvā aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:1226_5: Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0201a0:1227_0: Samudayadhammānupassī vāti yathā nāma kammārabhastañca gaggaranāḷiñca tajjañca vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto aparāparaṃ sañcarati,
atk-s0201a0:1227_1: evaṃ bhikkhuno karajakāyañca nāsāpuṭañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsakāyo aparāparaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0201a0:1227_3: te passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1227_4: Vayadhammānupassī vāti yathā bhastāya apanītāya gaggaranāḷiyā bhinnāya tajje ca vāyāme asati so vāto nappavattati,
atk-s0201a0:1227_5: evameva kāye bhinne nāsāpuṭe viddhaste citte ca niruddhe assāsapassāsakāyo nāma nappavattatīti kāyādinirodhā
atk-s0201a0:1227_6: assāsapassāsanirodhoti evaṃ passanto “vayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1227_9: Atthi kāyoti vā panassāti kāyova atthi, na satto,
atk-s0201a0:1227_12: na attaniyaṃ, nāhaṃ, na mama, na koci,
atk-s0201a0:1227_13: na kassacīti evamassa sati paccupaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1228_4: Atha kho yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya aparāparaṃ uttaruttari ñāṇapamāṇatthāya ceva satipamāṇatthāya ca,
atk-s0201a0:1228_6: Anissito ca viharatīti taṇhānissayadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ vasena anissito viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1228_7: Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti lokasmiṃ kiñci rūpaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:1228_8: viññāṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ me attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1228_10: Iminā pana padena bhagavā ānāpānapabbadesanaṃ niyyātetvā dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1229_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa assāsapassāsavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1232_1: Evaṃ assāsapassāsavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni iriyāpathavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1232_3: Na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1232_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1232_7: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0201a0:1232_12: kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatī”ti evaṃ sampajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1233_0: Tattha ko gacchatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1233_1: Kassa gamananti na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1233_3: Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1233_6: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1234_3: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1234_7: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena heṭṭhimakāyassa samiñjanaṃ uparimakāyassa ussitabhāvo nisajjāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1234_11: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalasarīrassa tiriyato pasāraṇaṃ sayananti vuccatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1235_0: Tassa evaṃ pajānato evaṃ hoti “satto gacchati satto tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1235_1: Atthi pana koci satto gacchanto vā ṭhito vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1235_2: Yathā pana “sakaṭaṃ gacchati sakaṭaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1235_3: na ca kiñci sakaṭaṃ nāma gacchantaṃ vā tiṭṭhantaṃ vā atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1235_4: Cattāro pana goṇe yojetvā chekamhi sārathimhi pājente “sakaṭaṃ gacchati sakaṭaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vohāramattameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1235_8: Gacchāmi tiṭṭhāmīti citte uppanne vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1237_0: Yathā yāti tathā kāyo, yāti vātāhato ayaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1240_0: Ko nāma ettha so satto, yo vinā hetupaccaye;
atk-s0201a0:1241_0: Attano ānubhāvena, tiṭṭhe vā yadi vā vaje”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1242_0: Tasmā evaṃ hetupaccayavaseneva pavattāni gamanādīni sallakkhento esa gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito vā,
atk-s0201a0:1243_0: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1243_3: yena yena vā ākārena tassa kāyo ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1244_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1244_3: kālena parassa catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1244_4: Samudayadhammānupassī vātiādīsu pana “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā nayena pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1245_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catūiriyāpathapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1248_1: Evaṃ iriyāpathavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusampajaññavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1248_2: Tattha abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1248_5: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1248_7: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1248_9: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1249_4: Tattha sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1249_5: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṃ nu me ettha gatena attho atthi natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1249_8: Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:1249_9: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:1250_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1250_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti.
atk-s0201a0:1250_4: Attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatappaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0201a0:1250_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1251_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0201a0:1251_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a0:1251_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1251_6: So “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā.
atk-s0201a0:1251_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1251_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:1251_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1251_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1251_14: Mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṃ sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṃ sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1252_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1252_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvā gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1253_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā
atk-s0201a0:1253_1: paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhime yāme seyyaṃ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1253_2: katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ abhisiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni
atk-s0201a0:1253_4: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā
atk-s0201a0:1253_5: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1253_6: manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1253_9: sopānapādamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-s0201a0:1253_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1253_12: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1253_13: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1253_14: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0201a0:1253_15: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:1254_0: Atha naṃ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāyaṃ vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1254_1: tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0201a0:1254_4: janasaṅgahatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1254_6: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a0:1254_7: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattheva nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1254_8: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1255_0: Porāṇā bhikkhū kira “na amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo”ti mukhaṃ ulloketvā vattaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1255_3: ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃ honti mātupakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhato”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1255_11: edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthīti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1256_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0201a0:1256_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0201a0:1256_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati.
atk-s0201a0:1256_6: Athassa dvattikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādinnakaṃ muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1256_7: Ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbāpanaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0201a0:1256_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0201a0:1256_9: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1256_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-s0201a0:1256_12: sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1257_1: sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1257_2: akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho
atk-s0201a0:1257_4: ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1258_0: Yo panāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto,
atk-s0201a0:1258_2: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1258_3: tumhe na iṇaṭṭhā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā,
atk-s0201a0:1258_5: tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0201a0:1258_8: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1258_15: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0201a0:1258_17: Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti soyeva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:1258_18: Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1258_21: paṭinivattetvā purimapadesaṃ yeva eti āḷindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0201a0:1259_0: So kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1259_1: Manussāpi sudaṃ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathāgacchantaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1259_3: Kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti.
atk-s0201a0:1259_4: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:1259_5: Arahattappattadivaseyevassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1259_6: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1259_7: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi “rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:1259_9: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti maṇiobhāsopī”ti evamādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1259_10: Tato paṭicchādetha tumheti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi kālavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca.
atk-s0201a0:1260_0: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1260_1: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:1260_2: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto viyuttena uddhate paṭinivattanto gāmassa samīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a0:1260_3: “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a0:1260_6: Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vandituṃ vā āgate manusse dīghāyukā hothāti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosīti. Ajja, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1260_7: katimīti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhe vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0201a0:1260_9: nikkhamanavelāya gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvāva yāti kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatapaññāsabhikkhū viya.
atk-s0201a0:1261_0: Te kira āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ katikavattaṃ akaṃsu “arahattaṃ appatvā aññamaññaṃ na ālapissāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1261_1: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1261_6: Evañca cintesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho ete amhehiyeva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0201a0:1261_10: etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhusu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1261_12: so āha “na bho kalahakārakānaṃ okāso īdiso hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1261_17: tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1262_0: Evaṃ kālavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva
atk-s0201a0:1262_1: cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ patvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo
atk-s0201a0:1262_4: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1262_5: Na hi javena piṇḍapātiyadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1262_6: Visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1262_7: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca taṃ dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1262_8: gahetvā antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1262_9: manasikaronto āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā akkhabbhañjanavaṇalepanaputtamaṃsūpamāvasena naṃ paccavekkhanto
atk-s0201a0:1262_11: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya.
atk-s0201a0:1262_12: Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1262_16: ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0201a0:1263_0: Idaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1263_13: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo,
atk-s0201a0:1263_19: dhammakathiko vā seyyathāpi thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto,
atk-s0201a0:1263_22: sikkhākāmo vā seyyathāpi thero rāhulo buddhaputtoti.
atk-s0201a0:1263_23: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca,
atk-s0201a0:1264_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0201a0:1264_5: Tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1264_6: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati,
atk-s0201a0:1264_7: tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0201a0:1264_13: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:1264_18: Tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0201a0:1265_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-s0201a0:1268_0: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotīti padassa attho;
atk-s0201a0:1269_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1269_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti,
atk-s0201a0:1269_5: iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0201a0:1270_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1270_1: Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1270_5: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi,
atk-s0201a0:1270_6: evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyunti iti so tattha sampajāno hoti, sace,
atk-s0201a0:1270_12: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi.
atk-s0201a0:1271_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1271_3: kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1271_4: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1271_5: ālokessāmīti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1271_6: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-s0201a0:1275_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0201a0:1275_8: ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1275_11: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṃ itthī,
atk-s0201a0:1276_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccaṃ nipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1276_1: Taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1276_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1276_3: Evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1277_0: Yāni pana tāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbapanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1277_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1277_2: aññamaññaṃ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1277_3: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇeññeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1277_4: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇeññeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0201a0:1277_5: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1278_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpañca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0201a0:1278_6: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1278_13: Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1278_20: Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1279_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1279_2: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjetvā pasāretvā eva vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1279_6: Kāle samiñjentassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1280_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggahaṇaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1280_4: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0201a0:1280_5: Aparopi bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0201a0:1280_11: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1281_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-s0201a0:1281_2: Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu “kasmā bhante sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjayitthā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1281_5: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0201a0:1281_6: idāni pana tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito,
atk-s0201a0:1281_7: tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1282_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1282_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1283_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ nivāsanapārupanavasena pattassa bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1283_1: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0201a0:1283_2: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1284_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1284_6: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakaraṃ vāpi hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1285_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1285_6: dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya.
atk-s0201a0:1285_7: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1285_9: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:1285_11: na te nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti;
atk-s0201a0:1285_12: evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1285_13: na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasena panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1286_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmīti evaṃ pattagahaṇapaccayā
atk-s0201a0:1287_4: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-s0201a0:1287_5: Nimittakammādivasena laddho pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1288_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1288_6: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1289_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1289_1: nipanne anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti.
atk-s0201a0:1289_6: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1289_7: Vaṇappaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahaṇamatteneva ca kapālakena tesamattho,
atk-s0201a0:1289_8: evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1289_10: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0201a0:1290_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho attho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1290_6: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1291_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1291_2: Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1291_4: Na koci kuñcikāya yantakena ca hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati,
atk-s0201a0:1292_0: Iti taṃ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya bahalakheḷo makkheti.
atk-s0201a0:1292_1: Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-s0201a0:1292_2: vā dabbiyā vā antopavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1292_4: Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasantharaṃ katvā dhārento nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1292_6: Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1292_8: Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1293_0: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti visoseti ca nīharati ca.
atk-s0201a0:1293_1: Pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca.
atk-s0201a0:1293_5: Viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṃpavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1294_0: Apica gamanato pariyesanato paribhogato āsayato nidhānato aparipakkato paripakkato phalato nissandato
atk-s0201a0:1295_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-s0201a0:1295_1: Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-s0201a0:1295_5: Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1295_7: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1295_10: Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1296_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvaṃ karonto natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1296_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:1296_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:1296_4: evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0201a0:1296_5: So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1296_9: Yathā udakakumbhato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1297_10: sayāno vā sayānomhīti pajānātī”ti imasmiñhi ṭhāne addhānairiyāpathā kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:1297_11: “Abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite”ti imasmiṃ majjhimā.
atk-s0201a0:1297_12: “Gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite”ti idha pana khuddakacuṇṇikairiyāpathā kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:1298_1: yo ciraṃ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1298_3: Yo sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto pañhaṃ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno
atk-s0201a0:1298_4: iti paṭisañcikkhati “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1298_6: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati “nisinnakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1298_8: Yo pana nipannako sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā aparabhāge vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a0:1298_9: iti paṭisañcikkhati “sayanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1298_10: ayaṃ sutte jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1298_13: Yo pana bhāsamāno “ayaṃ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca paṭicca cittassa tadanurūpaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1298_14: payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajāno bhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:1298_15: ciraṃ vā pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ vā katvā dhammaṃ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā parivattetvā pañhaṃ vā vissajjetvā
atk-s0201a0:1298_16: aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati “bhāsitakāle uppannā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1298_18: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati “tuṇhībhūtakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-s0201a0:1299_0: Tayidaṃ mahāsīvattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānasutte adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1299_1: Sāmaññaphale pana sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati.
atk-s0201a0:1299_2: Tasmā visesato ettha asammohasampajaññasseva vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1299_3: Sampajānakārī sampajānakārīti ca sabbapadesu satisampayuttasseva sampajaññassa vasenattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1299_6: sato sampajāno paṭikkamatī”ti evametāni padāni vibhattāneva.
atk-s0201a0:1300_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catusampajaññapariggahaṇena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0201a0:1300_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1300_4: Idha samudayavayadhammānupassītiādīsu rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1301_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catusampajaññapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno vasena yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1304_1: Evaṃ catusampajaññavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1304_2: Tattha imameva kāyantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:1304_3: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena vitthārato visuddhimagge kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1304_4: Ubhatomukhāti heṭṭhā ca upari cāti dvīhi mukhehi yuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1305_1: ubhatomukhā putoḷi viya hi cātumahābhūtiko kāyo,
atk-s0201a0:1305_2: tattha missetvā pakkhittanānāvidhadhaññaṃ viya kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā,
atk-s0201a0:1305_4: tassa taṃ putoḷiṃ muñcitvā paccavekkhato nānāvidhadhaññassa pākaṭakālo viya yogino dvattiṃsākārassa vibhūtākāro veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1306_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ kesādipariggahaṇena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0201a0:1306_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati,
atk-s0201a0:1306_5: Kevalañhi idha dvattiṃsākārapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1309_1: Evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhātumanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1309_3: yathā koci goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ vadhitvā vinivijjhitvā catasso
atk-s0201a0:1309_4: disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa,
atk-s0201a0:1309_5: evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1310_1: yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassāpi āghātanaṃ āharantassāpi āharitvā tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassāpi
atk-s0201a0:1310_2: vadhentassāpi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassāpi tāvadeva gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1310_3: yāva naṃ padāletvā bīlaso na vibhajati.
atk-s0201a0:1310_4: Vibhajitvā nisinnassa pana gāvīti saññā antaradhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1310_10: evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle gihibhūtassāpi pabbajitassāpi tāvadeva sattoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1310_11: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1310_16: atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti.
atk-s0201a0:1311_3: bīlaso vibhajitvā nisinnabhāvo viya dhātuso paccavekkhaṇanti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā,
atk-s0201a0:1312_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catudhātupariggahaṇena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0201a0:1312_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1312_5: Kevalañhi idha catudhātupariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1315_1: Evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni navahi sivathikapabbehi vibhajituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1315_9: Bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1315_13: Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0201a0:1315_15: Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi visandamānaṃ pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1316_0: So imameva kāyanti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati upaneti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1316_1: Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti.
atk-s0201a0:1316_3: viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo hoti imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi evaṃdhammo evaṃpūtikasabhāvoyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1317_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ uddhumātādipariggahaṇena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0201a0:1317_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1318_0: Khajjamānanti udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsaakkhikūṭādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā khādiyamānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1318_2: Nimaṃsalohitamakkhitanti maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati,
atk-s0201a0:1318_8: Pūtīnīti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena terovassikāneva pūtīni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1318_11: Sabbattha so imamevāti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1319_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ khajjamānādipariggahaṇena yāva cuṇṇakabhāvā attano vā kāye,
atk-s0201a0:1319_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1321_1: bhikkhaveti idaṃ navasivathikā dassetvā kāyānupassanaṃ niṭṭhapento āha.
atk-s0201a0:1321_6: Evaṃ catusaccavaseneva ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idaṃ navasivathikapariggāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1323_0: Ettāvatā ca ānāpānapabbaṃ iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārapabbaṃ dhātumanasikārapabbaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1324_0: Tattha ānāpānapabbaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārapabbanti imāneva dve appanākammaṭṭhānāni.
atk-s0201a0:1324_1: Sivathikānaṃ pana ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā sesāni dvādasāpi upacārakammaṭṭhānānevāti.
atk-s0201a0:1327_1: Evaṃ bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0201a0:1327_3: Tattha sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1327_4: Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā “sukhaṃ vedayāmā”ti pajānanti,
atk-s0201a0:1327_5: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1327_6: Evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ hi sattūpaladdhiṃ na jahati,
atk-s0201a0:1327_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1327_9: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ jahati,
atk-s0201a0:1327_14: kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1328_0: Tattha ko vedayatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati.
atk-s0201a0:1328_1: Kassa vedanāti na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā.
atk-s0201a0:1328_2: Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti vatthuārammaṇāva panassa vedanā.
atk-s0201a0:1328_4: “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati.
atk-s0201a0:1328_5: Taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vedayāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1328_6: Evaṃ vedanāva vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānātīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1328_8: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati.
atk-s0201a0:1328_13: Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no, bhanteti.
atk-s0201a0:1328_22: Thero vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0201a0:1329_2: nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1329_3: Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1329_6: Tattha bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1330_0: Arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento yebhuyyena vedanāvasena katheti.
atk-s0201a0:1330_1: Tividho hi arūpakammaṭṭhāne abhiniveso phassavasena vedanāvasena cittavasenāti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1330_2: Ekaccassa hi saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1330_3: paṭhamābhinipāto taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno phasso pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1330_4: Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1330_5: Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1330_8: tena saddhiṃ tadeva ārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanāpi uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1330_14: tāya saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1330_20: tena saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1331_0: So “ime phassapañcamakā dhammā kiṃ nissitā”ti upadhārento “vatthuṃ nissitā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1331_2: yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idañca me viññāṇaṃ ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddha”nti.
atk-s0201a0:1331_3: So atthato bhūtāni ceva upādārūpāni ca.
atk-s0201a0:1331_7: nāmaṃ cattāro arūpino khandhāti pañcakkhandhamattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1332_0: So “ime pañcakkhandhā kiṃ hetukā”ti upaparikkhanto “avijjādihetukā”ti passati.
atk-s0201a0:1332_2: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1332_3: suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattamevāti sappaccayanāmarūpavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti sammasanto vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1333_0: So “ajja ajjā”ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhamāno tathārūpe divase utusappāya puggalasappāya bhojanasappāya dhammassavanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1333_1: labhitvā ekapallaṅkena nisinno vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1333_2: Evaṃ imesampi tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1334_0: Idha pana bhagavā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1334_1: Phassavasena vā hi viññāṇavasena vā kathīyamānaṃ na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1334_7: sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ abhisandayamānaṃ satadhotaṃ sappiṃ khādāpayantaṃ viya satapākatelaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1334_8: makkhayamānaṃ viya ghaṭasahassena pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpayamānaṃ viya “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vācaṃ nicchārayamānameva
atk-s0201a0:1334_11: sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ abhisandayamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ pavesentaṃ viya vilīnatambalohena
atk-s0201a0:1334_12: āsiñcantaṃ viya sukkhatiṇavanappatimhi araññe dāruukkākalāpaṃ khipamānaṃ viya “aho dukkhaṃ aho dukkha”nti
atk-s0201a0:1335_1: Sā sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātappaṭikkhepavasena majjhattākārabhūtā adukkhamasukhā vedanāti nayato gaṇhantassa pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1335_3: Yathā antarā piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ ārohitvā palātassa migassa anupathaṃ gacchanto migaluddako piṭṭhipāsāṇassa
atk-s0201a0:1335_4: orabhāgepi parabhāgepi padaṃ disvā majjhe apassantopi “ito āruḷho,
atk-s0201a0:1335_6: majjhe piṭṭhipāsāṇe iminā padesena gato bhavissatī”ti nayato jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1335_7: evaṃ āruḷhaṭṭhāne padaṃ viya hi sukhavedanāya uppatti pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1335_8: Oruḷhaṭṭhāne padaṃ viya dukkhavedanāya uppatti pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1335_9: “Ito āruyha ito oruyha majjhe evaṃ gato”ti nayato gahaṇaṃ viya sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātappaṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0201a0:1335_10: majjhattākārabhūtā adukkhamasukhā vedanāti nayato gaṇhantassa pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1335_11: Evaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nibbattetvāva dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:1336_15: sakale vedanāsaṃyutteti evaṃ anekesu suttesu paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:1336_17: evaṃ imasmimpi satipaṭṭhānasutte paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:1337_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo –
atk-s0201a0:1337_1: sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1337_2: Tena yā pubbe anubhūtapubbā dukkhā vedanā,
atk-s0201a0:1337_3: tassā idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0201a0:1339_1: neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0201a0:1339_6: neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0201a0:1339_9: Sukhāpi kho aggivessana vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
atk-s0201a0:1339_13: Evaṃ passaṃ aggivessana sutavā ariyasāvako sukhāyapi vedanāya dukkhāyapi vedanāya adukkhamasukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati,
atk-s0201a0:1340_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā cha gehasitasomanassavedanā.
atk-s0201a0:1340_4: Sāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma cha gehasitaupekkhā vedanā.
atk-s0201a0:1340_5: Nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma cha nekkhammasitaupekkhā vedanā.
atk-s0201a0:1341_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sukhavedanādipariggahaṇena attano vā vedanāsu,
atk-s0201a0:1341_3: kālena vā parassa vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1341_4: Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti ettha pana “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādīhi pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi
atk-s0201a0:1341_5: vedanānaṃ samudayañca vayañca passanto samudayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharati,
atk-s0201a0:1341_8: kālena vayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1342_0: Kevalañhi idha vedanāpariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā vedanāpariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1345_1: Evaṃ navavidhena vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0201a0:1345_5: Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1345_6: tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0201a0:1346_6: Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi upacārasamādhi vā atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1347_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sarāgādipariggahaṇena yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0201a0:1347_1: taṃ taṃ sallakkhento attano vā citte,
atk-s0201a0:1347_4: kālena vā parassa citte cittānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1347_5: Samudayavayadhammānupassīti ettha pana “avijjāsamudayā viññāṇasamudayo”ti evaṃ pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi viññāṇassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1348_0: Kevalañhi idha cittapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā cittapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1351_1: Evaṃ soḷasavidhena cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0201a0:1352_1: Asantanti asamudācāravasena vā pahīnattā vā avijjamānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1352_2: Yathā cāti yena kāraṇena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1353_0: Tattha subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1353_3: Ayonisomanasikāro nāma anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro anicce niccanti vā dukkhe sukhanti vā anattani attāti vā asubhe subhanti vā manasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:1353_4: taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1353_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1354_2: Yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro pathamanasikāro anicce aniccanti vā dukkhe dukkhanti vā anattani anattāti vā asubhe asubhanti vā manasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:1354_3: taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1354_8: ayamanāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1355_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti asubhanimittassa uggaho asubhabhāvanānuyogo indriyesu
atk-s0201a0:1355_5: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi.
atk-s0201a0:1358_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise asubhabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:1358_2: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1358_3: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa kāmacchandassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1359_0: Paṭighanimitte ayonisomanasikārena pana byāpādassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1359_4: Taṃ tasmiṃ nimitte bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1359_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1360_0: Mettāya pana cetovimuttiyā yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1360_1: Tattha tattha “mettā”ti vutte appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:1360_4: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1360_9: ayamanāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1361_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti mettānimittassa uggaho mettābhāvanānuyogo kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0201a0:1361_2: Odhisakaanodhisakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:1361_6: nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi,
atk-s0201a0:1361_12: esa attano kammeneva āgantvā attano kammena gamissati,
atk-s0201a0:1361_13: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0201a0:1361_14: evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-s0201a0:1361_16: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1361_18: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1361_19: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1362_6: Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1362_8: arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso līnattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1362_10: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1363_2: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavataraṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1363_3: Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1363_4: Imasmiṃ tippabhede vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1363_8: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1364_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0201a0:1364_1: atibhojane nimittaggāho iriyāpathasamparivattanatā ālokasaññāmanasikāro abbhokāsavāso kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0201a0:1364_3: nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1364_4: Catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1364_9: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1364_11: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1364_12: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1365_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1365_3: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati.
