atk-s0201a0:1365_8: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1366_0: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1366_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1367_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā paripucchakatā vinaye pakataññutā vuddhasevitā kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0201a0:1367_1: Bāhusaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1367_5: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1367_9: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1368_0: Vicikicchāṭṭhānīyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1368_1: Vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva.
atk-s0201a0:1368_2: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato vicikicchā uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1368_6: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1369_0: Kusalādīsu dhammesu yonisomanasikārena panassā pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1369_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā sevitabbāsevitabbā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā,
atk-s0201a0:1369_4: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya anuppādāya uppannāya vā vicikicchāya pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1370_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā paripucchakatā vinaye pakataññutā adhimokkhabahulatā kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0201a0:1370_2: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1370_6: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1370_10: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1371_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇapariggahaṇena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0201a0:1371_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1371_4: Samudayavayā panettha subhanimitta asubhanimittādīsu ayonisomanasikārayonisomanasikāravasena pañcasu nīvaraṇesu vuttanayena nīharitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1372_0: Kevalañhi idha nīvaraṇapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā nīvaraṇapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1375_1: Evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni pañcakkhandhavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1375_2: Tattha pañcasu upādānakkhandhesūti upādānassa khandhā upādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0201a0:1375_8: na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī”ti sabhāvato rūpaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1375_11: Vitthārena pana rūpādīni visuddhimagge khandhakathāyameva vuttāni.
atk-s0201a0:1375_12: Iti rūpassa samudayoti evaṃ avijjāsamudayādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa samudayo.
atk-s0201a0:1375_13: Iti rūpassa atthaṅgamoti evaṃ avijjānirodhādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa atthaṅgamo,
atk-s0201a0:1376_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcakkhandhapariggahaṇena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0201a0:1376_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1376_4: Samudayavayā panettha “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādīnaṃ pañcasu khandhesu vuttānaṃ paññāsāya lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena nīharitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1377_0: Kevalañhi idha khandhapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā khandhapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1380_1: Evaṃ pañcakkhandhavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni āyatanavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1380_2: Tattha chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesūti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo manoti imesu chasu ajjhattikesu
atk-s0201a0:1380_3: rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammāti imesu chasu bāhiresu.
atk-s0201a0:1380_4: Cakkhuṃ ca pajānātīti cakkhupasādaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1380_5: Rūpe ca pajānātīti bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1380_6: Yañca tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṃyojananti yañca taṃ cakkhuṃ ceva rūpe cāti ubhayaṃ paṭicca kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭigha- māna- diṭṭhi-
atk-s0201a0:1381_1: Cakkhudvāre tāva āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_3: “Ṭhapetvā maṃ na koci añño etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samattho atthī”ti maññato mānasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_4: “Etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuva”nti gaṇhato diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_6: sattassa nu kho”ti vicikicchato vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_7: “Sampattibhave vata no idaṃ sulabhaṃ jāta”nti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_8: “Āyatimpi evarūpaṃ sīlabbataṃ samādiyitvā sakkā laddhu”nti sīlabbataṃ samādiyantassa sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_9: “Aho vata etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññe na labheyyu”nti usūyato issāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1381_10: Attanā laddhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññassa maccharāyato macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1382_0: Yathā ca anuppannassāti yena kāraṇena asamudācāravasena anuppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa uppādo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1382_2: Yathā ca uppannassāti appahīnaṭṭhena pana samudācāravasena vā uppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1382_4: Yathā ca pahīnassāti tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena pahīnassāpi tassa dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1382_6: Kena kāraṇena panassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti?
atk-s0201a0:1382_7: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsaissāmacchariyabhedassa tāva pañcavidhassa saṃyojanassa sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1383_0: Sotañca pajānāti sadde cā tiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:1383_1: Apicettha āyatanakathā vitthārato visuddhimagge āyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1384_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ ajjhattikāyatanapariggahaṇena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0201a0:1384_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1385_0: Kevalañhi idha āyatanapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā āyatanapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1388_1: Evaṃ cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni bojjhaṅgavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparanti ādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1388_5: Ettha hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhi,
atk-s0201a0:1388_6: yāya vā so satiādikāya sattadhammasāmaggiyā sambujjhati kilesaniddāto uṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1389_1: Yathā ca anuppannassātiādīsu pana satisambojjhaṅgassa tāva – “atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1389_6: uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1389_9: taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1390_0: Apica cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0201a0:1390_2: Abhikkantādīsu hi sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññena bhattanikkhittakākasadise muṭṭhassatipuggale parivajjanena
atk-s0201a0:1390_5: Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1391_6: uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1392_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā vatthuvisadakiriyā
atk-s0201a0:1393_3: tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1393_4: Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1393_6: tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1393_7: Tasmā kesādicchedāpanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena ucchādananhāpanena ca ajjhattikaṃ vatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1394_1: Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhire vatthusmiṃ avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1394_2: aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0201a0:1394_3: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1394_4: parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0201a0:1395_7: Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1395_11: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1395_15: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1396_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ ca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0201a0:1396_5: Cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1396_7: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ adhibhavati.
atk-s0201a0:1396_8: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ adhibhavati.
atk-s0201a0:1396_9: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a0:1396_10: Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a0:1397_2: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:1397_8: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-s0201a0:1397_10: Tasmā sā loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:1397_15: na ca vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1398_0: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññānaṃ dummedhapuggalānaṃ ārakāva parivajjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1398_2: Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-s0201a0:1398_4: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1399_5: uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1400_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā ānisaṃsadassāvitā
atk-s0201a0:1401_0: Tattha nirayesu pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanakālepi,
atk-s0201a0:1401_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturitakālepi,
atk-s0201a0:1401_6: Ayameva te bhikkhu kālo vīriyakaraṇāyāti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1402_1: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso vīriyassā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1402_3: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1402_7: nāpi ‘taṃ nissāya jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti,
atk-s0201a0:1402_8: atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti,
atk-s0201a0:1402_9: satthārāpi ‘ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī’ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0201a0:1402_10: atha kho ‘ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0201a0:1402_11: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissasi,
atk-s0201a0:1402_12: āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati mahāmittattherassa viya.
atk-s0201a0:1403_1: Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0201a0:1403_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha –
atk-s0201a0:1403_7: tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0201a0:1403_9: ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjikena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1403_11: Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi ammāti.
atk-s0201a0:1404_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi –
atk-s0201a0:1404_4: taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0201a0:1404_6: tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi na sakkhissasīti,
atk-s0201a0:1404_7: ayaṃ kho pana piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitunti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a0:1404_8: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a0:1404_9: arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:1404_10: Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva arahattaṃ patvā vikasitaṃ

atk-s0201a0:1475_11: Ito bāhirānaṃ paresaṃ vādā parappavādā nāma.

atk-s0201a0:1475_15: catūhi pana maggaṭṭhakasamaṇehipi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya āraddhavipassakehipīti dvādasahipi samaṇehi suññā eva.
atk-s0201a0:1475_16: Imameva atthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā mahāparinibbāne vuttaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:1483_1: Tasmā sotāpattimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā samaṇopi natthīti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1483_2: Sakadāgāmimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā dutiyopi samaṇo natthīti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1484_2: Yathā hi na āragge sāsapo tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1484_5: evameva bāhiresu titthāyatanesu na ime samaṇā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1484_8: Tesaṃ akhettatā ca khettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvato ca bhāvato ca veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1485_1: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
atk-s0201a0:1485_12: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, idheva, subhadda, samaṇo,
atk-s0201a0:1486_2: tasmā yathā surattahatthapādo sūrakesarako sīho migarājā na susāne vā saṅkārakūṭe vā paṭivasati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_3: tiyojanasahassavitthataṃ pana himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā maṇiguhāyaṃyeva paṭivasati.
atk-s0201a0:1486_4: Yathā ca chaddanto nāgarājā na gocariyahatthikulādīsu navasu nāgakulesu uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_6: Yathā ca valāhako assarājā na gadrabhakule vā ghoṭakakule vā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_8: Yathā ca sabbakāmadadaṃ manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ na saṅkārakūṭe vā paṃsupabbatādīsu vā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_10: Yathā ca timirapiṅgalo maccharājā na khuddakapokkharaṇīsu uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_12: Yathā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko supaṇṇarājā na gāmadvāre eraṇḍavanādīsu paṭivasati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_14: Yathā ca dhataraṭṭho suvaṇṇahaṃso na gāmadvāre āvāṭakādīsu paṭivasati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_16: Yathā ca catuddīpissaro cakkavattirājā na nīcakule uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1486_18: Evameva imesu samaṇesu ekasamaṇopi na aññatitthāyatane uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1487_0: Sammā sīhanādaṃ nadathāti ettha sammāti hetunā nayena kāraṇena.
atk-s0201a0:1487_2: Imesañhi catunnaṃ samaṇānaṃ idheva atthitāya ayaṃ nādo seṭṭhanādo nāma hoti uttamanādo.
atk-s0201a0:1487_3: “Ime samaṇā idheva atthī”ti vadantassa aññato bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā natthīti abhītanādo nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1487_4: “Amhākampi sāsane ime samaṇā atthī”ti pūraṇādīsu ekassāpi uṭṭhahitvā vattuṃ asamatthatāya ayaṃ nādo appaṭinādo nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1488_1: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti idaṃ kho pana kāraṇaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0201a0:1488_7: Ettha hi sattā taranti uppalavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:1488_10: Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1488_15: Yena tumheti yena assāsena vā balena vā evaṃ vadetha.
atk-s0201a0:1489_1: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0201a0:1489_2: yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0201a0:1489_3: tena bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā,
atk-s0201a0:1489_4: hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā.
atk-s0201a0:1489_7: Tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-s0201a0:1489_10: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatāni vāpi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā passatā.
atk-s0201a0:1489_13: Arīnaṃ hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā ca arahatā,
atk-s0201a0:1489_19: evaṃ catuvesārajjavasena catūhi ākārehi thomitena cattāro dhammā akkhātā,
atk-s0201a0:1489_20: ye mayaṃ attani sampassamānā evaṃ vadema,
atk-s0201a0:1490_0: Satthari pasādoti “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā nayena buddhaguṇe anussarantānaṃ uppannappasādo.
atk-s0201a0:1490_1: Dhamme pasādoti “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā nayena dhammaguṇe anussarantānaṃ uppannappasādo.
atk-s0201a0:1490_4: Tāni hi bhavantaragatopi ariyasāvako attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi na vītikkamati.
atk-s0201a0:1490_6: “imaṃ sakalaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ sampaṭicchitvā khuddakamakkhikaṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1490_9: Evaṃ ariyānaṃ sīlāni kantāni piyāni manāpāni.
atk-s0201a0:1491_0: Sahadhammikā kho panāti bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero sāmaṇerī upāsako upāsikāti ete satta sahadhammacārino.
atk-s0201a0:1491_1: Etesu hi bhikkhu bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sahadhammaṃ carati samānasikkhatāya.
atk-s0201a0:1491_10: tasmā te accantaṃ ekadhammacāritāya sahadhammikā. Iminā,
atk-s0201a0:1491_11: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā nayena saṅghaṃ anussarantānaṃ uppannappasādo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:1491_12: Ettāvatā cattāri sotāpannassa aṅgāni kathitāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1492_1: ime cattāro dhammā tena bhagavatā amhākaṃ assāso ceva balañcāti akkhātā,
atk-s0201a0:1492_2: ye mayaṃ attani sampassamānā evaṃ vadema.
atk-s0201a0:1493_1: Yo amhākaṃ satthāti iminā pūraṇakassapādike cha satthāro apadissanti.
atk-s0201a0:1493_2: Yathā pana idāni sāsane ācariyupajjhāyādīsu “amhākaṃ ācariyo,
atk-s0201a0:1493_9: tasmā titthiyā ‘amhākaṃ satthā’ ti ekapadeneva satthāraṃ visuṃ katvā imināva padena viruddhā parājitā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1493_10: Dhamme pasādoti idaṃ pana yathā idāni sāsane “amhākaṃ dīghanikāyo amhākaṃ majjhimanikāyo”ti mamāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:1493_11: evaṃ attano attano pariyattidhamme gehasitapemaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1493_13: Idha no āvusoti ettha idhāti pasādaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1493_15: Yadidanti yamidaṃ tumhākañceva amhākañca nānākaraṇaṃ vadeyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:1493_19: Nanu etasmiṃ pasāde tumhe ca amhe ca dvedhā bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti vācāya samadhurā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1494_0: Atha nesaṃ taṃ samadhurataṃ bhindanto bhagavā evaṃ vādinotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1494_1: Tattha ekā niṭṭhāti yā tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtā niṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a0:1494_4: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1494_12: Tasmā attano attano laddhivasena ekameva niṭṭhaṃ paññapenti,
atk-s0201a0:1495_1: titthiyānampi ekā niṭṭhāti dvīsu aṭṭakārakesu viya ṭhitesu bhagavā anuyogavattaṃ dassento sā panāvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1495_4: Tattha yasmā rāgarattādīnaṃ niṭṭhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1495_6: soṇasiṅgālādīnampi siyāti imaṃ dosaṃ passantānaṃ titthiyānaṃ “vītarāgassa āvuso sā niṭṭhā”tiādinā nayena byākaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1496_2: Papañcārāmassa papañcaratinoti ettha āramanti etthāti ārāmo.
atk-s0201a0:1496_5: Papañcoti ca mattapamattākārabhāvena pavattānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhimānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1496_7: Sarāgassātiādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso āgato.
atk-s0201a0:1496_18: Ekoyeva hi ayaṃ lobho rajjanavasena rāgoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1497_0: 142. Idāni imesaṃ kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ diṭṭhivādaṃ dassento dvemā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1498_5: Vibhavadiṭṭhiyā te paṭiviruddhāti te sabbe ucchedavādīhi saddhiṃ –
atk-s0201a0:1498_8: nāyaṃ loko ucchijjatī”ti paṭiviruddhā niccaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanapasutā viharanti.
atk-s0201a0:1499_0: Samudayañcātiādīsu dve diṭṭhīnaṃ samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca.
atk-s0201a0:1499_9: “Khandhā hetu khandhā paccayo diṭṭhīnaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
atk-s0201a0:1499_10: Evaṃ khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjā… phasso… saññā… vitakko…
atk-s0201a0:1499_17: Khaṇikatthaṅgamo nāma khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1500_10: So vaggulivataṃ ukkuṭikappadhānaṃ kaṇṭakāpassayatā pañcātapatappanaṃ sānupapātapatanaṃ kesamassuluñcanaṃ appoṇakaṃ jhānantiādīnaṃ vasenaṃ veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1500_12: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti ye etaṃ sabbaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:1500_13: Na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti sakalavaṭṭadukkhato na parimuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:1500_14: Iminā etesaṃ niṭṭhā nāma natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1500_16: Iminā etesaṃ niṭṭhā nāma atthīti dvinnaṃ aṭṭakārakānaṃ aṭṭaṃ chindanto viya sāsanasmiṃyeva niṭṭhāya atthitaṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a0:1502_0: Sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānāti mayaṃ sabbesaṃ upādānānaṃ pariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ vadāmāti evaṃ paṭijānamānā.
atk-s0201a0:1502_1: Na sammā sabbupādānapariññanti sabbesaṃ upādānānaṃ samatikkamaṃ sammā na paññapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1502_5: Attavādupādānassa pana pariññaṃ paññapento nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1502_6: Tesaṃ pana bhedaṃ dassento kāmupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapentītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1502_8: channavuti pāsaṇḍāpi hi “kāmā kho pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti vatthupaṭisevanaṃ kāmaṃ kappatīti na paññapenti,
atk-s0201a0:1503_7: Taṃ kissa hetūti taṃ apaññāpanaṃ etesaṃ kissa hetu,
atk-s0201a0:1503_9: Imāni hi te bhontoti yasmā te bhonto imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni yathāsabhāvato na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1503_10: Ye panettha dvinnaṃ pariññānaṃ paññāpanakāraṇaṃ diṭṭhiñceva sīlabbatañca “etaṃ pahātabba”nti yathāsabhāvato jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:1503_11: Te sandhāya parato dve vārā vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1503_18: Attavādupādānassa pariññaṃ pana ekopi paññapetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1503_19: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinopi hi candimasūriye pāṇinā parimajjitvā caramānāpi ca titthiyā tisso pariññā paññapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1504_5: “Kasmā mameva upari sabbairiyāpathe kappento uccārapassāvaṃ karonto maṃ na jānāsī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1504_7: mayā akkantaṭṭhānampi aṅgulaggehi phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1504_13: alaṃ mayhaṃ tayā”ti uppatitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne patito.
atk-s0201a0:1504_15: “are dūraṃ gatopi nanu mayhaṃ upariyeva patitosī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1504_16: So puna taṃ jigucchanto uppatitvā aññattha patito,
atk-s0201a0:1504_17: evaṃ vassasahassampi uppatitvā patamāno sasako pathaviṃ muñcituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1504_18: Evamevaṃ titthiyā sabbūpādānapariññaṃ paññapentopi kāmupādānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃyeva samatikkamaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1505_0: Evaṃ yaṃ titthiyā samatikkamituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:1505_1: tassa vasena diṭṭhicchedavādaṃ vatvā idāni pasādapacchedavādaṃ dassento evarūpe kho,
atk-s0201a0:1505_4: Tattha dhammavinayeti dhamme ceva vinaye ca,
atk-s0201a0:1505_6: “Yo satthari pasādo so na sammaggato”ti aniyyānikasāsanamhi hi satthā kālaṃ katvā sīhopi hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1505_9: Sāvakā panassa migāpi sūkarāpi pasadāpi honti,
atk-s0201a0:1505_10: so “ime mayhaṃ pubbe upaṭṭhākā paccayadāyakā”ti khantiṃ vā mettaṃ vā anuddayaṃ vā akatvā tesaṃ upari patitvā lohitaṃ pivati,
atk-s0201a0:1505_14: Atha ne vuttanayeneva anukampaṃ akatvā khādati.
atk-s0201a0:1505_17: So “ime mayhaṃ pubbe upaṭṭhākā paccayadāyakā”ti anukampaṃ akatvā vividhā kammakāraṇā karoti,
atk-s0201a0:1505_22: Sāvakā vā pana kālaṃ katvā sīhādayo honti,
atk-s0201a0:1505_24: Te “imaṃ mayaṃ pubbe catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahimhā,
atk-s0201a0:1505_25: satthā no aya”nti tasmiṃ khantiṃ vā mettaṃ vā anuddayaṃ vā akatvā vuttanayeneva anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:1506_0: Yo dhamme pasādoti aniyyānikasāsanasmiñhi dhamme pasādo nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1506_5: so punappunaṃ vaṭṭameva gambhīraṃ karotīti sāsanasmiṃ asammaggato asabhāvato akkhāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1507_0: Yā sīlesu paripūrakāritāti yāpi ca aniyyānikasāsane ajasīlādīnaṃ vasena paripūrakāritā,
atk-s0201a0:1507_1: sāpi yasmā vaṭṭamokkhaṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ na sampāpeti,
atk-s0201a0:1507_6: tesu yasmā ekacce kālaṃ katvā sīhādayopi honti,
atk-s0201a0:1507_8: tattha sīhādibhūtā “ime amhākaṃ sahadhammikā ahesu”nti migādibhūtesu khantiādīni akatvā pubbe vuttanayeneva nesaṃ mahādukkhaṃ uppādenti.
atk-s0201a0:1507_9: Tasmā ettha sahadhammikesu piyamanāpatāpi asammaggatā akkhāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1508_0: Idaṃ pana sabbampi kāraṇabhedaṃ ekato katvā dassento bhagavā taṃ kissa hetu?
atk-s0201a0:1508_7: yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “yo satthari pasādo so na sammaggato akkhāyatī”tiādi,
atk-s0201a0:1508_11: ettha hi yathā tanti kāraṇatthe nipāto.
atk-s0201a0:1508_14: So panesa yasmā maggaphalatthāya na niyyāti,
atk-s0201a0:1508_19: Ettāvatā bhagavā titthiyesu pasādo surāpītasiṅgāle pasādo viya niratthakoti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1509_0: Eko kira kāḷasiṅgālo rattiṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭho surājallikaṃ khāditvā punnāgavane nipajjitvā niddāyanto
atk-s0201a0:1509_1: sūriyuggamane pabujjhitvā cintesi “imasmiṃ kāle na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1509_4: So ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā imaṃ vañcessāmīti “ayya brāhmaṇā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1509_16: Uttarāsaṅgena gaṇṭhikaṃ katvā aṃse laggetvā gaṇhāhīti.
atk-s0201a0:1509_17: Brāhmaṇo taṃ tathā gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārasamīpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ettha otāremīti pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:1509_20: kiṃ tava ñātakā antaradvāre kahāpaṇaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a0:1509_22: So punappunaṃ thokaṃ thokaṃ gantvā “ettha otāremi ettha otāremī”ti pucchitvā tena tajjito khemaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1509_23: gantvā tattha otārehīti vutto otāretvā sāṭakaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0201a0:1509_24: Kāḷasiṅgālo āha “ahaṃ te dve kahāpaṇasatāni dassāmīti avocaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1509_28: tāva tvaṃ sūriyaṃ olokento tiṭṭhā”ti vatvā thokaṃ gantvā nivattetvā puna brāhmaṇaṃ āha “ayya brāhmaṇa mā ito olokehi,
atk-s0201a0:1509_30: Evañca pana vatvā ketakavanaṃ pavisitvā yathāruciṃ pakkanto.
atk-s0201a0:1509_31: Brāhmaṇassapi sūriyaṃ olokentasseva nalāṭato ceva kacchehi ca sedā mucciṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1511_0: Sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, kuto kaṃsasatā duve”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:1512_0: Evaṃ yathā kāḷasiṅgāle pasādo niratthako, evaṃ titthiyesupīti.
atk-s0201a0:1513_1: Aniyyānikasāsane pasādassa niratthakabhāvaṃ dassetvā niyyānikasāsane tassa sātthakataṃ dassetuṃ tathāgato ca kho,
atk-s0201a0:1513_3: Tattha kāmupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapetīti arahattamaggena kāmupādānassa pahānapariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti,
atk-s0201a0:1513_4: itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upādānānaṃ sotāpattimaggena pariññaṃ paññapeti.
atk-s0201a0:1513_11: Satthari pasādoti evarūpe sāsane yo satthari pasādo,
atk-s0201a0:1514_2: Atheko ulūkasakuṇo bhagavati gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisante upaḍḍhamaggaṃ anugacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1514_4: So ekadivasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ sāyanhasamaye bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ nisinnaṃ pabbatā oruyha vanditvā pakkhe
atk-s0201a0:1514_5: paṇāmetvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīsaṃ heṭṭhā katvā dasabalaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1514_8: hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti pucchi.

atk-s0201a0:1521_2: Evaṃ niyyānikasāsane satthari pasādo sammaggato hoti.

atk-s0201a0:1535_9: Yasmā taṃ tato jāyati samudeti pabhavati,
atk-s0201a0:1535_17: Yasmā pana tesaṃ taṇhā yathāvuttena atthena nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti ca pabhavo ca,

atk-s0201a0:1541_3: Taṃ kira aparāparaṃ visālībhūtatāya “vesālī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.

atk-s0201a0:1541_8: Sā sammā pariharīyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle vijāyanagharaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a0:1541_13: aggamahesī maṃsapesinti rañño purato mama avaṇṇo uppajjeyyā”ti cintetvā tena avaṇṇabhayena taṃ maṃsapesiṃ
atk-s0201a0:1541_14: ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā paṭikujjitvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā gaṅgāya sote pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:1541_16: Suvaṇṇapaṭṭakañcettha jātihiṅgulakena “bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā pajā”ti likhitvā bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1541_17: Tato taṃ bhājanaṃ ūmibhayādīhi anupaddutaṃ gaṅgāsotena pāyāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1542_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso gopālakakulaṃ nissāya gaṅgātīre viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1542_1: So pātova gaṅgaṃ otiṇṇo taṃ bhājanaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya aggahesi.
atk-s0201a0:1542_2: Athettha taṃ akkharapaṭṭikaṃ rājamuddikālañchanaṃ ca disvā muñcitvā taṃ maṃsapesiṃ addasa,
atk-s0201a0:1542_8: Tato puna aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekamekissā maṃsapesiyā hatthapādasīsānamatthāya pañca pañca piḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1542_9: Atha tato aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekā maṃsapesi suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako,
atk-s0201a0:1543_3: so bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khīraṃ dārakānaṃ mukhe āsiñcati.
atk-s0201a0:1543_5: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ maṇibhājanagataṃ viya dissati,
atk-s0201a0:1543_7: Apare āhu “sibbetvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi ahosī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1543_8: Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā licchavīti paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1544_0: Tāpaso dārake posento ussūre gāmaṃ sikkhāya pavisati,
atk-s0201a0:1544_2: Tassa taṃ byāpāraṃ ñatvā gopālakā āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1544_8: Gopālakā dutiyadivase maggaṃ samaṃ katvā pupphehi okiritvā dhajapaṭākā ussāpetvā tūriyehi vajjamānehi assamaṃ āgatā. Tāpaso –
atk-s0201a0:1544_11: pañcagorasena rājānaṃ tosetvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā nagaraṃ māpetha,
atk-s0201a0:1544_12: tattha kumāraṃ abhisiñcathā”ti vatvā dārake adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1544_13: Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā dārake netvā posesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1545_0: Dārakā vuddhimanvāya kīḷantā vivādaṭṭhānesu aññe gopālakadārake hatthenapi pādenapi paharanti.
atk-s0201a0:1545_2: “Kissa rodathā”ti ca mātāpitūhi vuttā “ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā amhe atipaharantī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1545_3: Tato tesaṃ mātāpitaro “ime dārakā aññe dārake vināsenti dukkhāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:1545_6: Tato pabhuti kira so padeso vajjīti vuccati yojanasatiko parimāṇena.
atk-s0201a0:1545_7: Atha taṃ padesaṃ gopālakā rājānaṃ tosetvā aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1545_8: Tattha ca nagaraṃ māpetvā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ kumāraṃ abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1545_9: Tāya cassa dārikāya saddhiṃ vivāhaṃ katvā katikaṃ akaṃsu “bāhirakadārikā na ānetabbā,
atk-s0201a0:1545_11: Tesaṃ paṭhamasaṃvāsena dve dārakā jātā dhītā ca putto ca.
atk-s0201a0:1545_13: Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaḍḍhantānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ gahetuṃ appahontā
atk-s0201a0:1545_15: Tassa punappunaṃ visālīkatattā vesālītveva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1546_2: Ayaṃ pana jīvakambavanaṃ viya nagarassa bahiddhā vanasaṇḍo.
atk-s0201a0:1546_6: Vanasaṇḍeti so kira vanasaṇḍo nagarassa pacchimadisāyaṃ gāvutamatte ṭhāne.
atk-s0201a0:1546_7: Tattha manussā bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ katvā taṃ parivāretvā bhikkhūnaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamaleṇakuṭimaṇḍapādīni patiṭṭhapesuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1546_17: Vesāliyañhi bahū manussā ratanattaye pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā.
atk-s0201a0:1546_18: Te dasakusalakammapathamattampi natthi samaṇassa gotamassāti vutte tvaṃ kattha bhagavantaṃ pāṇaṃ hanantaṃ addasa,
atk-s0201a0:1546_19: kattha adinnaṃ ādiyantantiādīni vatvā attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi?
atk-s0201a0:1546_20: Kiṃ dantā me atthīti pāsāṇasakkharā khādasi,

atk-s0201a0:1549_0: Tato uttariṃ pana visesādhigamaṃ paṭisedhento uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1550_3: Alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
atk-s0201a0:1550_4: Ñāṇadassananti dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1550_5: “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1550_7: “Abhabbā te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo.
atk-s0201a0:1550_8: “Ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsu vihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1550_13: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kāḷāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1551_2: samaṇena gotamena ācariye upasaṅkamitvā sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ gahitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1551_3: takkapariyāhataṃ pana takketvā evaṃ bhavissati evaṃ bhavissatīti takkapariyāhataṃ dhammaṃ desetīti.
atk-s0201a0:1551_6: so taṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ indavajirūpamaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ evaṃ vaṭṭissati,
atk-s0201a0:1551_7: evaṃ vaṭṭissatīti ito cito ca anucarāpetvā vīmaṃsāya anucaritaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:1551_10: samaṇassa gotamassa sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ vipassanā vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇā vā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1551_12: rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ viya naṃ cattāro vaṇṇā parivārenti,
atk-s0201a0:1551_18: taṃ taṃ gahetvā sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ kathento mahājanaṃ rañjetīti.
atk-s0201a0:1552_0: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desitoti yassa ca kho atthāya assa dhammo desito.
atk-s0201a0:1553_0: So niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti so dhammo yo taṃ yathādesitaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:1553_1: tassa takkarassa sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena vaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya niyyāti gacchati tamatthaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a0:1553_2: Idaṃ panesa na attano ajjhāsayena vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1553_9: Te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “sunakkhatta tvaṃ bhagavatā desitadhammo aniyyānikoti vadasi,
atk-s0201a0:1553_11: imasmiṃ nagare ime kasmā ettakā sotāpannā jātā,
atk-s0201a0:1553_13: ettakā anāgāmīti pubbe vuttanayena upārambhaṃ kareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:1553_14: So iminā upārambhabhayena aniyyānikoti vattuṃ asakkonto ajjunena vissaṭṭhakaṇḍaṃ viya assa dhammo amogho niyyāti,
atk-s0201a0:1554_0: Assosi khoti vesāliyaṃ brāhmaṇakulaseṭṭhikulādīsu tattha tattha parisamajjhe evaṃ bhāsamānassa taṃ vacanaṃ suṇi,
atk-s0201a0:1554_3: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi ayaṃ kuddho jhāyamānaṃ veḷuvanaṃ viya pakkhittaloṇaṃ uddhanaṃ viya ca kodhavasena paṭapaṭāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1554_4: mayā paṭibāhito pana mayipi āghātaṃ bandhissati,
atk-s0201a0:1554_5: evamassa tathāgate ca mayi cāti dvīsu janesu āghāto atibhāriyo bhavissatīti kāruññatāya na paṭisedhesi.
atk-s0201a0:1554_9: Sayameva kheḷe pacchinne mukhe sukkhe oramissatīti iminā kāraṇena na paṭisedhesi.
atk-s0201a0:1555_3: Yassa hi tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1555_5: Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapuriso”ti vadantiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1555_6: Imassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo samucchinnoyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1555_8: Kodhā ca panassa esā vācā bhāsitāti esā ca panassa vācā kodhena bhāsitā.
atk-s0201a0:1556_1: Ayañhi pubbe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:1556_3: So dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devaloke olokento nandanavanacittalatāvanaphārusakavanamissakavanesu
atk-s0201a0:1556_4: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne devaputte ca devadhītaro ca disvā etesaṃ evarūpāya attabhāvasampattiyā ṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1556_5: kīvamadhuro nu kho saddo bhavissatīti saddaṃ sotukāmo hutvā dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:1556_6: Bhagavā panassa dibbasotadhātuyā upanissayo natthīti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1556_7: Na hi buddhā upanissayavirahita tassa parikammaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:1556_8: So bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā cintesi “ahaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṭhamaṃ dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1556_9: so ‘mayhaṃ taṃ sampajjatu vā mā vā sampajjatū’ti kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1556_10: Ahaṃ pana paccattapurisakārena taṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1556_12: Addhāssa evaṃ hoti ‘ayaṃ rājapabbajito dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā cetopariyañāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1556_13: nibbattetvā āsavānaṃ khayañāṇaṃ nibbattetvā mayā samasamo bhavissatī’ti issāmacchariyavasena mayhaṃ na
atk-s0201a0:1556_15: Bhiyyoso āghātaṃ bandhitvā kāsāyāni chaḍḍetvā gihibhāvaṃ patvāpi na tuṇhībhūto vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1556_16: Dasabalaṃ pana asatā tucchena abbhācikkhanto vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1556_17: Tenāha bhagavā “kodhā ca panassa esā vācā bhāsitā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1557_3: tathāgatena satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentena etadatthameva vāyāmo kato “desanādhammo me niyyāniko bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1558_0: Ayampi hi nāma sāriputtātiādinā kiṃ dasseti?
atk-s0201a0:1558_1: Sunakkhattena paṭisiddhassa uttarimanussadhammassa attani atthitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1558_4: sunakkhatto moghapuriso natthi tathāgatassa uttarimanussadhammoti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1558_15: Evarūpesu uttarimanussadhammesu ekassāpi vijānanasamatthaṃ dhammanvayamattampi nāma etassa moghapurisassa
atk-s0201a0:1558_16: na bhavissatīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ayampi hi nāma sāriputtātiādinā nayena imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1558_21: “Itipi so bhagavā”tiādīhi evarūpampi nāma mayhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ vijjamānameva
atk-s0201a0:1558_22: atthīti jānituṃ tassa moghapurisassa dhammanvayopi na bhavissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1561_1: Ettha ca kiñcāpi cetopariyañāṇānantaraṃ tisso vijjā vattabbā siyuṃ,

atk-s0201a0:1561_3: tasmā tā avatvā tathāgatassa dasabalañāṇaṃ paripūraṃ katvā dassento dasa kho panimāni sāriputtātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1561_4: Tattha tathāgatabalānīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatasseva balāni.
atk-s0201a0:1561_5: Yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññussayasampattiyā āgatāni,
atk-s0201a0:1564_22: Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa.

atk-s0201a0:1565_6: Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānīti evaṃ aññānipi anekāni ñāṇasahassāni,

atk-s0201a0:1566_14: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,

atk-s0201a0:1566_16: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:1566_17: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,

atk-s0201a0:1567_8: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso iti rūpantiādinā

atk-s0201a0:1572_8: Dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya vā yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1573_0: Idāni yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1573_4: tāni vitthārato dassetuṃ katamāni dasa? Idha,
atk-s0201a0:1573_8: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttiyāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
atk-s0201a0:1573_10: Taṃ bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
atk-s0201a0:1573_12: Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
atk-s0201a0:1573_13: taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1573_15: “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vitthāritameva.
atk-s0201a0:1573_18: tathāgatassāti idampi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1574_2: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca.
atk-s0201a0:1574_5: Imassa pana ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1575_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:1575_3: imassa cetanā tiracchānayonigāminīti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1575_4: Imassa ca ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1575_5: Idha tathāgato ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā nirayagāmīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1576_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1576_3: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0201a0:1576_4: Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1576_5: idha tathāgato khandhanānattaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0201a0:1577_2: “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1577_3: idha tathāgato pajānāti santi sattā hīnādhimuttikā”ti ādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0201a0:1578_7: “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1578_8: idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ pajānāti anusayaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1579_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ rūpī rūpāni passatītiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1579_1: vimokkhānaṃ savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiādīnañca navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1579_5: Tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttapaguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattiyo ca.
atk-s0201a0:1579_6: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1579_10: Taṃ sandhāya “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1579_11: Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1579_13: atthekacco jhāyī sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ vipattīti paccetī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1579_14: Sattannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vitthārakathāvinicchayo sammohavinodaniyaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1580_1: Imāni kho sāriputtāti yāni pubbe “dasa kho panimāni,
atk-s0201a0:1580_23: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1580_24: Etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:1580_25: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1580_27: maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1580_29: “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma etaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttara”nti?
atk-s0201a0:1580_30: Jānanto paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇāni savitakkasavicārānīti vakkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1580_38: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana savitakkasavicārameva kāmāvacarameva lokiyamevāti vakkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1581_0: Evamettha anupadavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena veneyyasattānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1581_1: āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1581_7: Evaṃ anāvaraṇānaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇena anukūladhammadesanatthaṃ cariyavisesaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1581_11: Athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1581_13: Evaṃ pariññātindriyaparopariyattā pana te sace dūre honti,
atk-s0201a0:1581_14: paṭhamajjhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena te khippaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1581_16: dibbacakkhuñāṇānubhāvato pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampati cittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena
atk-s0201a0:1581_17: āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:1581_18: Tasmā iminā anukkamena imāni dasabalāni vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:1582_2: vācaṃ appahāyātiādīsu puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmīti vadanto taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1582_3: Puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmīti cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1582_4: Puna evarūpaṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmīti pajahanto diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1582_7: So yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito,
atk-s0201a0:1583_6: so evaṃ sīlādisampanno bhikkhu yathā diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aññaṃ ārādheti arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:1583_10: Yathā hi maggānantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva phalaṃ nibbattati,
atk-s0201a0:1583_11: evameva imassāpi puggalassa cutianantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva niraye paṭisandhi hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1583_12: Sakalasmiñhi buddhavacane imāya upamāya gāḷhataraṃ katvā vuttaupamā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1584_2: catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1584_4: sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhāti evaṃ paṭijānato tava.
atk-s0201a0:1584_5: Anabhisambuddhāti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā.
atk-s0201a0:1584_6: Tatra vatāti tesu vata anabhisambuddhāti evaṃ dassitadhammesu.
atk-s0201a0:1584_7: Sahadhammenāti sahetunā sakāraṇena vacanena sunakkhatto viya vippalapanto appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1584_8: Nimittametanti ettha puggalopi dhammopi nimittanti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:1584_12: yaṃ dassetvā ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddhoti maṃ paṭicodessatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1584_16: Dasabalassa hi ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddhoti codakaṃ puggalaṃ vā codanākāraṇaṃ anabhisambuddhadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1584_17: vā apassato sabhāvabuddhoyeva vā samāno ahaṃ buddhosmīti vadāmīti paccavekkhantassa balavataraṃ somanassaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1585_0: Antarāyikā dhammāti ettha pana antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā,
atk-s0201a0:1585_1: te atthato sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā.
atk-s0201a0:1585_5: Methunaṃ sevato hi yassa kassaci nissaṃsayameva maggaphalānaṃ antarāyo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1585_6: Yassa kho pana tesu atthāyāti rāgakkhayādīsu yassa atthāya.
atk-s0201a0:1585_8: Tatra vata manti tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme maṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1588_1: “Aṭṭha kho imā sāriputtā”ti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1588_3: Yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1588_4: evaṃ imā aṭṭha parisā patvā vesārajjañāṇassa vesārajjabhāvo sakkā ñātunti vesārajjañāṇassa balaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a0:1589_2: Mārakāyikānaṃ pana sannipatitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ māraparisā veditabbā,
atk-s0201a0:1589_5: Manussā hi “ettha rājā nisinno”ti pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:1589_11: Tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ nāma ativiya bhāro.
atk-s0201a0:1589_13: Amanussoti hi vuttamattepi manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ saṅkampati,
atk-s0201a0:1589_14: tesaṃ rūpaṃ vā disvā saddaṃ vā sutvā sattā visaññino honti.
atk-s0201a0:1590_3: Kiṃ pana bhagavā aññāni cakkavāḷānipi gacchatīti?
atk-s0201a0:1590_14: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi.
atk-s0201a0:1590_15: Bhāsamānañca maṃ na jānanti ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
atk-s0201a0:1590_16: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1590_17: Antarahitañca maṃ na jānanti ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā”’ti.
atk-s0201a0:1591_0: Khattiyā keyūraṅgadamālāgandhādivibhūsitā nānāvirāgavasanā āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā moḷidharā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1591_2: Te ca odātāpi honti kāḷāpi maṃgulacchavīpi.
atk-s0201a0:1591_7: tesaṃ “ajja amhākaṃ rājā ativiya virocatī”ti hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1591_8: Te ca bhinnassarāpi honti gaggassarāpi kākassarāpi.
atk-s0201a0:1591_10: Tādisako mayhaṃ saro hotīti idaṃ pana bhāsantaraṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1591_11: Manussānaṃ pana taṃ sutvā “ajja rājā madhurena sarena kathetī”ti hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1591_12: Kathetvā pakkante ca bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā “ko nu kho aya”nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1592_1: ko nu kho ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurena sarena kathento antarahito, kiṃ devo,
atk-s0201a0:1592_5: Evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hotiyevāti anāgataṃ paṭicca desetīti.
atk-s0201a0:1593_3: Anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisantiādīnampi soṇadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena ceva aññacakkavāḷavasena ca sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1596_3: yoniyoti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1596_4: “Catasso nāgayoniyo catasso supaṇṇayoniyo”ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1596_5: “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1596_12: Vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppatitvā viya nibbattā abhinibbattāti opapātikā.
atk-s0201a0:1596_16: Devātiādīsu cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā opapātikāva honti.
atk-s0201a0:1596_18: Ekacce ca manussāti manussesu keci devā viya opapātikā ca honti.
atk-s0201a0:1596_22: evaṃ vinipātikesu nijjhāmataṇhikapetā nerayikā viya opapātikāyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1596_24: Yathā te evaṃ yakkhāpi sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayopi sabbe catuyonikāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1599_4: Apica gatigati nibbattigati ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1599_7: devā gandhabbamānusā”ti ca ayaṃ gatigati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1599_8: “Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi gatiṃ vā agatiṃ vā”ti ayaṃ nibbattigati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1599_9: “Evampi kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiṃ ca pajānāmi jutiñca pajānāmī”ti ayaṃ ajjhāsayagati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1599_11: nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti ayaṃ vibhavagati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1599_12: “Dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā”ti ayaṃ nipphattigati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1600_5: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano attano ānubhāvehi ca dibbantīti devā.
atk-s0201a0:1600_9: Maggaṃ paṭipadanti ubhayenāpi vuttagatisaṃvattanika kammameva dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1600_10: Yathā ca paṭipannoti yena maggena yāya paṭipadāya paṭipannoti ubhayampi ekato katvā niddisati.
atk-s0201a0:1600_11: Apāyantiādīsu vaḍḍhisaṅkhātā sukhasaṅkhātā vā ayā apetattā apāyo.
atk-s0201a0:1600_14: Nibbānañcāhanti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ gatigatimeva,
atk-s0201a0:1600_16: Idha maggo paṭipadāti ubhayenāpi ariyamaggova vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1603_1: Idāni yathāvuttesu sattasu ṭhānesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu attano ñāṇappavattākāraṃ dassento idhāhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1606_0: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ kāsuyā karissasī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:1609_3: Tattha sādhikaṃ porisaṃ pamāṇaṃ assāti sādhikaporisā,
atk-s0201a0:1609_5: Vītaccikānaṃ vītadhūmānanti etaṃ pariḷāhassa balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1609_6: acciyā vā sati dhūme vā sati,
atk-s0201a0:1609_15: aṅgārakāsuṃ ārabbha pana iriyāpathassa ṭhapitattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1610_5: Yathā so puriso maggāruḷhaṃ disvā vijānāti “ayaṃ iminā maggena gantvā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patissatī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1610_6: evamevaṃ bhagavā pāṇātipātādīsu yaṃkiñci kammaṃ āyūhantaṃ evaṃ jānāti “ayaṃ imaṃ kammaṃ katvā niraye nibbattissattī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1610_7: Yathā so puriso aparabhāge taṃ aṅgārakāsuyā patitaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1610_8: evameva bhagavā aparabhāge “so puriso taṃ kammaṃ katvā kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0201a0:1610_9: olokento niraye nibbattaṃ passati pañcavidhabandhanādimahādukkhaṃ anubhavantaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1610_10: Tattha kiñcāpi tassa kammāyūhanakāle añño vaṇṇo,
atk-s0201a0:1610_12: Athāpi “so satto taṃ kammaṃ katvā kattha nibbatto”ti olokentassa anekasahassānaṃ sattānaṃ majjhe ṭhitopi “ayaṃ so”ti soyeva satto āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1611_0: Dutiyaupamāyaṃ yasmā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ viya gūthakūpe pariḷāho natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1611_3: Imampi hi puggalaṃ bhagavā hatthiyoniādīsu yattha katthaci nibbattaṃ vadhabandhanaākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanādīhi mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamānaṃ passatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1612_0: Tatiyaupamāyaṃ tanupattapalāsoti na abbhapaṭalaṃ viya tanupaṇṇo,
atk-s0201a0:1613_2: Sukhabahulā vedanāti manussaloke khattiyakulādīsu sukhabahulā vedanā vedayitabbā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1613_3: tā vedayamānaṃ nipannaṃ vā nisinnaṃ vā passāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1614_1: Ullittāvalittanti anto ceva ullittaṃ bahi ca avalittaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1614_7: Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1614_10: Ubhatolohitakūpadhānoti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno.
atk-s0201a0:1615_1: yathā so puriso maggāruḷhameva jānāti “ayaṃ etena maggena gantvā pāsādaṃ āruyha kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā pallaṅke nisīdissati vā nipajjissati vā”ti,
atk-s0201a0:1615_2: evamevaṃ bhagavā dānādīsu puññakiriyavatthūsu yaṃkiñci kusalakammaṃ āyūhantaṃyeva puggalaṃ disvā “ayaṃ imaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattissatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:1615_3: Yathā so puriso aparabhāge taṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā pallaṅke nisinnaṃ vā nipannaṃ vā ekantasukhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1615_5: evamevaṃ bhagavā aparabhāge “so taṃ kalyāṇaṃ katvā kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā olokento devaloke nibbattaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1618_6: Ekantasukhā vedanāti idaṃ kiñcāpi devalokasukhena saddhiṃ byañjanato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1618_8: Devalokasukhañhi rāgapariḷāhādīnaṃ atthitāya na ekanteneva sukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1618_9: Nibbānasukhaṃ pana sabbapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamāya sabbākārena ekantasukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1618_11: Taṃ maggapariḷāhassa avūpasantatāya chātajjhattatāya pipāsābhibhūtatāya ca na ekantameva sukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1618_12: Vanasaṇḍe pana pokkharaṇiyaṃ oruyha rajojallassa pavāhitattā maggadarathassa vūpasantatāya bhisamūlakhādanena
atk-s0201a0:1618_13: ceva madhurodakapānena ca khuppipāsānaṃ vinītatāya udakasāṭakaṃ parivattetvā maṭṭhadukūlaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0201a0:1618_14: taṇḍulatthavikaṃ ussīsake katvā udakasāṭakaṃ pīḷetvā hadaye ṭhapetvā mandamandena ca vātena bījayamānassa
atk-s0201a0:1619_6: Yathā so puriso maggāruḷhaṃ disvāva jānāti “ayaṃ iminā maggena gantvā pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe
atk-s0201a0:1619_8: evamevaṃ bhagavā paṭipadaṃ pūrentameva nāmarūpaṃ paricchindantameva paccayapariggahaṃ karontameva lakkhaṇārammaṇāya
atk-s0201a0:1619_9: vipassanāya kammaṃ karontameva jānāti “ayaṃ imaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā sabbaāsave khepetvā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ
atk-s0201a0:1619_10: paññāvimuttinti evaṃ vuttaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ upasampajja viharissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1619_11: Yathā so puriso aparabhāge tāyaṃ pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā nisinnaṃ vā nipannaṃ vā ekantasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ passati,
atk-s0201a0:1619_12: evameva bhagavā aparabhāge taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikatvā nirodhasayanavaragataṃ
atk-s0201a0:1619_13: nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā ekantasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ passati.
atk-s0201a0:1622_5: Ayaṃ kira sunakkhatto dukkarakārikāya suddhi hotīti evaṃ laddhiko.
atk-s0201a0:1622_6: Athassa bhagavā mayā ekasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1622_8: Dukkarakārena suddhiyā sati ahameva suddho bhaveyyanti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1622_12: sunakkhatto licchaviputto acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ catukkuṇḍikaṃ chamānikiṇṇaṃ bhakkhasaṃ mukhena khādantaṃ mukhena bhuñjantaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1622_14: ayaṃ samaṇo catukkuṇḍiko chamānikiṇṇaṃ bhakkhasaṃ mukheneva khādati,
atk-s0201a0:1622_15: mukheneva bhuñjatī”’ti evamādinā pāthikasutte āgatanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1623_1: mayā ca etasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1623_2: dukkarakāre pasīdantenāpi anena mayi pasīditabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:1623_3: sopissa pasādo mayi natthīti dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1624_0: Tatra brahmacariyanti dānampi veyyāvaccampi sikkhāpadampi brahmavihārāpi dhammadesanāpi methunaviratipi
atk-s0201a0:1624_1: sadārasantosopi uposathopi ariyamaggopi sakalasāsanampi ajjhāsayopi vīriyampi vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1633_0: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1639_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0201a0:1640_0: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
atk-s0201a0:1641_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:1642_3: tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1642_4: “Taṃ kho pana me pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya,
atk-s0201a0:1642_5: yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte brahmavihārā brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1642_7: sahassaṃ maccuhāyina”nti ettha dhammadesanā brahmacariyanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1642_9: mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti sallekhasutte methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1646_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:1650_0: Evaṃ nimijātake attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho brahmacariyanti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1650_4: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasuttasmiññeva ariyamaggo brahmacariyanti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1650_5: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita”nti
atk-s0201a0:1653_3: Tadetaṃ ekasmiṃ attabhāve catubbidhassa dukkarassa katattā caturaṅgasamannāgatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1654_6: Pavivitto sudaṃ homīti pavivitto ahaṃ homi.
atk-s0201a0:1654_8: sāriputtāti tatra caturaṅge brahmacariye idaṃ mama tapassitāya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1654_9: tapanissitakabhāve mayhaṃ idaṃ acelakāditapassitakattaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1655_6: Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalikhāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1655_7: uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalikhāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1655_10: Bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ ehi bhaddanteti vutto na etīti na ehibhaddantiko.
atk-s0201a0:1655_11: Tena hi tiṭṭha bhaddanteti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti na tiṭṭhabhaddantiko.
atk-s0201a0:1655_12: Tadubhayampi titthiyā evaṃ etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatīti na karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1655_15: Uddissakatanti idaṃ tumhe uddissa katanti evaṃ ārocitabhikkhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1655_16: Na nimantananti asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthāti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyāmi na gaṇhāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1656_0: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1656_1: Na kaḷopimukhāti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā.
atk-s0201a0:1656_3: Kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantīti.
atk-s0201a0:1656_4: Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1656_7: Na dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1656_9: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati,
atk-s0201a0:1656_13: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti.
atk-s0201a0:1657_0: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho piṇḍaṃ labhissāmīti upaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1657_1: tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1657_4: sace hi acelakaṃ disvā imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmāti mānusakā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0201a0:1657_5: Tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti.
atk-s0201a0:1657_6: Tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1658_0: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiññeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati.
atk-s0201a0:1658_9: Ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena ābhataṃ bhattabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1659_2: Nīvārādīsu nīvārā nāma tāva araññe sayaṃjātavīhijāti.
atk-s0201a0:1660_25: gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1660_26: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karomīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1660_29: Pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmīti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_5: Yāva udakabindumhipīti yāva udakathevakepi mama dayā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1661_7: Te kira udakabinduṃ ca ete ca sakkharakaṭhalādayo khuddakapāṇāti paññapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_8: Tenāha “yāva udakabindumhipi me dayā paccupaṭṭhitā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_11: Māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesinti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_12: Ninnathalatiṇaggarukkhasākhādīsu visamaṭṭhāne gate udakabindusaṅkhāte khuddakapāṇe saṅghātaṃ vadhaṃ mā āpādesinti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_14: Acelakesu kira bhūmiṃ akkantakālato pabhuti sīlavā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1661_16: upaṭṭhākānaṃ gehe bhuñjantāpi dussīlāva hutvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0201a0:1661_18: Yadā pana morapiñchena phalakaṃ sammajjitvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:1662_6: Bodhisatto kira pāsaṇḍapariggaṇhaṇatthāya taṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbaji,
atk-s0201a0:1662_8: bodhisattā hi yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upenti,
atk-s0201a0:1662_10: pabbajitvā pana mā maṃ koci addasāti tatova araññaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:1662_11: Tenevāha “mā maṃ te addasaṃsu ahañca mā te addasa”nti.
atk-s0201a0:1663_2: Tattha catukkuṇḍikoti vananteyeva ṭhito gopālakānaṃ gāvīhi saddhiṃ apagatabhāvaṃ disvā dve hatthe dve
atk-s0201a0:1663_3: ca jaṇṇukāni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā evaṃ catukkuṇḍiko upasaṅkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1663_4: Tāni sudaṃ āhāremīti mahallakavacchakānaṃ gomayāni kasaṭāni nirojāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1663_5: tasmā tāni vajjetvā yāni taruṇavacchakānaṃ khīrapāneneva vaḍḍhantānaṃ saojāni gomayāni tāni kucchipūraṃ khāditvā puna vanasaṇḍameva pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:1663_7: Yāvakīvañca meti yattakaṃ kālaṃ mama sakaṃ muttakarīsaṃ aparikkhīṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1663_10: Kāle pana gacchante gacchante parikkhīṇamaṃsalohito upacchinnadvāravaḷañjo vacchakānaṃ gomayāni āhāremi.
atk-s0201a0:1664_8: tatrāti yaṃ vuttaṃ aññataraṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ vanasaṇḍanti,
atk-s0201a0:1664_9: tatra yo so bhiṃsanako vanasaṇḍo vutto,
atk-s0201a0:1665_2: Kiṃ su nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇātiādīsu viya.
atk-s0201a0:1665_3: Idanti adhippetamatthaṃ paccakkhaṃ viya katvā dassanavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1665_6: Cakkhundriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ kiṃ sūdhavittantiādīsu viya.
atk-s0201a0:1665_13: bhiṃsanakatāya iti vā vattabbe liṅgavipallāso kato,
atk-s0201a0:1665_19: Yo koci avītarāgo taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:1665_20: Yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti bahutarāni lomāni haṃsanti,
atk-s0201a0:1665_21: uddhaṃ mukhāni sūcisadisāni kaṇṭakasadisāni ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1666_1: phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ antare aṭṭharatti.
atk-s0201a0:1666_2: Abbhokāseti mahāsatto himapātasamaye rattiṃ abbhokāse viharati,
atk-s0201a0:1666_3: athassa lomakūpesu āvutamuttā viya himabindūni tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1666_5: Divā vanasaṇḍeti divā himabindūsu sūriyātapasamphassena vigatesu assāsopi bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:1666_6: ayaṃ pana sūriye uggacchanteyeva vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0201a0:1666_7: tatrāpissa sūriyātapena paggharantaṃ himaṃ sarīreyeva patati.
atk-s0201a0:1666_8: Divā abbhokāse viharāmi rattiṃ vanasaṇḍeti gimhakāle kiresa divā abbhokāse vihāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1666_11: ayaṃ pana sūriye atthaṃ gacchanteyeva vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:1666_12: Athassa divā gahitausme vanasaṇḍe aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pakkhitto viya attabhāvo paridayhittha.
atk-s0201a0:1667_0: Sotattoti divā ātapena rattiṃ vanausmāya sutatto.
atk-s0201a0:1667_1: Sosinnoti rattiṃ himena divā himodakena suṭṭhu tinto.
atk-s0201a0:1667_4: Nivāsanapārupane hi sati sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā na atibādheyya,
atk-s0201a0:1668_2: evaṃ santharitvā tattha seyyaṃ kappemīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1668_4: Te kira bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā, sumedha,
atk-s0201a0:1668_9: Atha naṃ te akathetuṃ na dassāmāti parivāretvā oṭṭhubhanti sarīre kheḷaṃ pātenti.
atk-s0201a0:1668_11: Atha naṃ tvaṃ na kathesīti omuttenti passāvamassa upari vissajjenti.
atk-s0201a0:1668_13: Tato naṃ kathehi kathehīti paṃsukena okiranti.
atk-s0201a0:1668_15: Athassa na kathesīti daṇḍakasalākā gahetvā kaṇṇasotesu pavesenti.
atk-s0201a0:1668_16: Bodhisatto dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā adhivāsento kassaci kiñci na karissāmīti matako viya acchati.
atk-s0201a0:1668_20: Na mayā tesu pāpakaṃ cittampi uppāditanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1668_23: Teneva ca “idaṃsu me”ti etthāpi ayaṃsu meti evaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1668_24: Iminā nayena aññānipi evarūpāni padāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:1668_25: Iminā ito ekanavutikappe pūritaṃ upekkhāvihāraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1669_0: “Sukhapatto na rajjāmi, dukkhe na homi dummano;
atk-s0201a0:1670_0: Sabbattha tulito homi, esā me upekkhāpāramī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1673_1: Āhārena suddhīti kolādinā ekaccena parittakaāhārena sakkā sujjhitunti evaṃdiṭṭhino honti.
atk-s0201a0:1673_6: Etaparamoti etaṃ pamāṇaṃ paramaṃ assāti etaparamo.
atk-s0201a0:1673_7: Tadā ekanavutikappamatthake pana na beluvapakkatālapakkapamāṇo kolo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1674_2: Āsītikapabbāni vā kāḷapabbāni vāti yathā āsītikavalliyā vā kāḷavalliyā vā sandhiṭṭhānesu milāyitvā majjhe unnatunnatāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1674_4: Oṭṭhapadanti yathā oṭṭhassa padaṃ majjhe gambhīraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1674_5: evamevaṃ bodhisattassa milāte maṃsalohite vaccadvārassa antopaviṭṭhattā ānisadaṃ majjhe gambhīraṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1674_6: Athassa bhūmiyaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ sarapoṅkhena akkantaṃ viya majjhe unnataṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1674_7: Vaṭṭanāvaḷīti yathā rajjuyā āvunitvā katā vaṭṭanāvaḷī vaṭṭanānaṃ antarantarā ninnā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1674_16: tassa hi lohite chinne maṃse milāte phāsuḷantarehi cammāni heṭṭhā otiṇṇāni,
atk-s0201a0:1675_1: Tassa kira lohite chinne maṃse milāte akkhiāvāṭakā matthaluṅgaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:1675_4: so hi vātātapena saṃphusati ceva milāyati ca.
atk-s0201a0:1675_8: mayhaṃ udaracchavi yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1675_12: mayhaṃ udaracchavi yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnā ahosīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1675_15: Avakujjo papatāmīti tassa hi uccārapassāvatthāya nisinnassa passāvo neva nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:1675_16: vaccaṃ pana ekaṃ dve kaṭakaṭṭhimattaṃ nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a0:1675_22: Mahāsaccakasutte pana pacchimabhavikakāyaṃ sandhāya imameva kāyanti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1675_23: Pūtimūlānīti maṃse vā lohite vā sati tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1675_24: Tassa pana abhāve cammakhaṇḍe lomāni viya hattheyeva lagganti,
atk-s0201a0:1676_2: Yāyaṃ ariyāti yā ayaṃ maggapaññā adhigatā.
atk-s0201a0:1676_4: yathā etarahi vipassanāpaññāya adhigatattā maggapaññā adhigatā,
atk-s0201a0:1676_5: evaṃ ekanavutikappamatthake vipassanāpaññāya anadhigatattā lokuttaramaggapaññaṃ nādhigatosmīti,
atk-s0201a0:1676_7: imissāyevāti vuttapaññāpi yāyaṃ ariyāti vuttapaññāpi maggapaññāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1676_8: Atha ne bhikkhū āhaṃsu “evaṃ sante maggassa anadhigatattā maggaṃ nādhigatosmīti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1676_13: Itarathā hi yā ayanti niddeso ananurūpo siyā.
atk-s0201a0:1679_1: Saṃsārena suddhīti bahukaṃ saṃsaritvā sujjhantīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1679_2: Upapattiyā suddhīti bahukaṃ upapajjitvā sujjhantīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1679_3: Āvāsena suddhīti bahūsu ṭhānesu vasitvā sujjhantīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1679_8: Muddhāvasittenāti tīhi saṅkhehi khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisittena.
atk-s0201a0:1680_4: Bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatoti imināssa yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā,
atk-s0201a0:1680_6: Paṭhamena vayasāti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni,
atk-s0201a0:1680_13: Vayo anuppattoti vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ pacchimavayaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0201a0:1680_14: Āsītiko me vayo vattatīti imaṃ kira suttaṃ bhagavā parinibbānasaṃvacchare kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1680_17: Satiyātiādīsu padasatampi padasahassampi vadantasseva gahaṇasamatthatā sati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1680_19: Evaṃ gahitaṃ dhāritaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ samatthavīriyaṃ dhiti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1680_20: Tassa atthañca kāraṇañca dassanasamatthatā paññāveyyattiyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1681_0: Daḷhadhammā dhanuggahoti daḷhaṃ dhanuṃ gahetvā ṭhito issāso.
atk-s0201a0:1681_2: dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati.
atk-s0201a0:1681_3: Sikkhitoti dasa dvādasa vassāni ācariyakule uggahitasippo.
atk-s0201a0:1681_8: Lahukena asanenāti anto susiraṃ katvā tūlādīni pūretvā katalākhāparikammena sallahukakaṇḍena.
atk-s0201a0:1681_9: Evaṃ katañhi ekausabhagāmī dve usabhāni gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1681_13: Evaṃ adhimattasatimantoti yathā so dhanuggaho taṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulachāyaṃ sīghaṃ eva atikkameti,
atk-s0201a0:1681_14: evaṃ padasatampi padasahassampi uggahetuṃ upadhāretuṃ sajjhāyituṃ atthakāraṇāni ca upaparikkhituṃ samatthāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1681_15: Aññatra asitapītakhāyitasāyitāti asitapītādīni hi bhagavatāpi kātabbāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1682_1: Sace hi eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0201a0:1682_5: Iminā puṭṭhaṃ ahaṃ pucchissāmīti eko ekaṃ na oloketi.
atk-s0201a0:1682_7: Evaṃ buddhānaṃ pana vāro na paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1682_8: vidatthicaturaṅgulachāyaṃ atikkamato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1682_21: Sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhaṃ puccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1682_23: Yāvatā hi lokiyamahājanā ekaṃ padaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:1682_25: Ānandatthere pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasapadāni katheti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1682_26: Bhagavato hi jivhā mudukā dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ vacanaṃ agalitaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko.
atk-s0201a0:1683_5: Tathāgato pubbe daharakāle akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā padaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1683_7: catuakkharehi vā aṭṭhaakkharehi vā soḷasaakkharehi vā padehi yuttāya gāthāya atthaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1683_8: Idāni pana mahallakakāle akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā padaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:1683_10: gāthāya atthaṃ vā vattuṃ na sakkotīti evaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1683_11: Daharakāle ca mahallakakāle ca sabbametaṃ tathāgatassa apariyādinnamevāti imaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1683_12: Mañcakena cepi manti idaṃ buddhabaladīpanatthameva parikappetvā āha.
atk-s0201a0:1683_13: Dasabalaṃ pana mañcake āropetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo pariharaṇakālo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1683_14: Tathāgatā hi pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse khaṇḍiccādīhi anabhibhūtā suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīrassa vevaṇṇiye ananuppatte
atk-s0201a0:1684_2: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi vīsativassabbhantare upavānanāgitameghiyattherā viya ayampi bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1684_3: Bījayamānoti mandamandena tālavaṇṭavātena bhagavato utusukhaṃ samuṭṭhāpayamāno.
atk-s0201a0:1684_4: Etadavocāti sakalasuttantaṃ sutvā bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ dukkarakārakaṃ āgamma pasanno etaṃ “acchariyaṃ bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a0:1684_8: Ko nāmo ayaṃ bhanteti idaṃ bhaddako vatāyaṃ dhammapariyāyo,
atk-s0201a0:1684_9: handassa bhagavantaṃ āyācitvā nāmaṃ gaṇhāpemīti adhippāyena āha.
atk-s0201a0:1684_10: Athassa bhagavā nāmaṃ gaṇhanto tasmā tiha tvantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1684_12: yasmā idaṃ suttaṃ sutvā tava lomāni haṭṭhāni,
atk-s0201a0:1689_2: Tattha vinayapariyāyena tayo janā sambahulāti vuccanti,
atk-s0201a0:1689_10: Yathā gāmaṃ gamissāmīti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ appattopi “kuhiṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1689_11: Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti jetavanato avidūre aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1689_12: taṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu. Samaṇo, āvusoti, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1689_14: Kāmānaṃ pariññanti kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti.
atk-s0201a0:1690_0: Tattha titthiyā sakasamayaṃ jānantā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeyyuṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ vadamānā,
atk-s0201a0:1690_3: Te pana “idaṃ nāma paṭhamajjhānaṃ ayaṃ rūpabhavo ayaṃ arūpabhavo”tipi na jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:1690_4: Te paññapetuṃ asakkontāpi kevalaṃ “paññapema paññapemā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1690_7: Te evaṃ mahante visese vijjamānepi idha no, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1691_1: Dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesananti yadidaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1691_2: amhākaṃ vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vuccetha,
atk-s0201a0:1691_5: Iti vemajjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sāsanena saddhiṃ attano laddhivacanamattena samadhuraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1691_9: jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā katheyyunti nābhinandiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:1691_10: pariññanti vacanena īsakaṃ sāsanagandho atthīti nappaṭikkosiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1691_11: Janapadavāsino vā te sakasamayaparasamayesu na suṭṭhu kusalātipi ubhayaṃ nākaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1692_1: Na ceva sampāyissantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0201a0:1692_2: Uttariñca vighātanti asampāyanato uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti.
atk-s0201a0:1692_3: Sampādetvā kathetuṃ asakkontānaṃ nāma hi dukkhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1692_8: Yasmā avisaye pañho pucchito hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1692_11: Evaṃ tīṇi ṭhānāni loke pakkhipitvā dve pajāyāti pañcahipi sattalokameva pariyādiyitvā etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede
atk-s0201a0:1692_12: loke taṃ devaṃ vā manussaṃ vā na passāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a0:1692_13: Ito vā pana sutvāti ito vā pana mama sāsanato sutvā atathāgatopi atathāgatasāvakopi ārādheyya paritoseyya.
atk-s0201a0:1693_1: Idāni attano tesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittārādhanaṃ dassento ko ca,
atk-s0201a0:1693_7: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ dviguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:1693_9: vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:1693_11: “Antaṃ antaguṇaṃ kayirā mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:1693_16: Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā,
atk-s0201a0:1693_21: Kāmūpasaṃhitāti ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā.
atk-s0201a0:1694_1: Yadi muddāyātiādīsu muddāti aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā hatthamuddā.
atk-s0201a0:1694_4: Yāya khettaṃ oloketvā idha ettakā vīhī bhavissanti,
atk-s0201a0:1694_5: rukkhaṃ oloketvā idha ettakāni phalāni bhavissanti,
atk-s0201a0:1694_6: ākāsaṃ oloketvā ime ākāse sakuṇā ettakā nāma bhavissantīti jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:1695_2: Gorakkhanti attano vā paresaṃ vā gāvo rakkhitvā pañcagorasavikkayena jīvanakammaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1695_6: Sītassa purakkhatoti lakkhaṃ viya sarassa sītassa purato,
atk-s0201a0:1695_17: ayaṃ muddādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ āgamma sītādipaccayo ābādho.
atk-s0201a0:1695_22: Kāmahetūtiādīsu paccayaṭṭhena kāmā assa hetūti kāmahetu.
atk-s0201a0:1696_10: Sammohaṃ āpajjatīti visaññī viya sammūḷho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1696_15: Yampi meti yampi mayhaṃ kasikammādīni katvā uppāditaṃ dhanaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1696_16: Tampi no natthīti tampi amhākaṃ idāni natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1697_4: Tattha kāmahetūti kāmapaccayā rājānopi rājūhi vivadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1697_9: Kāmānameva hetūti gāmanigamanagarasenāpatipurohitaṭṭhānantarādīnaṃ kāmānameva hetu vivadantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1697_12: Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti dhanuṃ gahetvā sarakalāpaṃ sannayhitvā.
atk-s0201a0:1698_0: Addāvalepanā upakāriyoti cettha manussā pākārapādaṃ assakhurasaṇṭhānena iṭṭhakāhi cinitvā upari sudhāya limpanti.
atk-s0201a0:1698_2: Tā tintena kalalena sittā addāvalepanā nāma honti.
atk-s0201a0:1698_3: Pakkhandantīti tāsaṃ heṭṭhā tikhiṇaayasūlādīhi vijjhīyamānāpi pākārassa picchilabhāvena ārohituṃ asakkontāpi upadhāvantiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1698_6: Taṃ aṭṭhadantākārena katvā “nagaradvāraṃ bhinditvā pavisissāmā”ti āgate uparidvāre ṭhitā tassa bandhanayottāni chinditvā tena abhivaggena omaddanti.
atk-s0201a0:1699_3: Ekāgārikanti paṇṇāsamattāpi saṭṭhimattāpi parivāretvā jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā āharāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:1699_5: Aḍḍhadaṇḍakehīti muggarehi pahārasādhanatthaṃ vā catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ dvedhā chetvā gahitadaṇḍakehi.
atk-s0201a0:1699_7: taṃ karontā sīsakapālaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti,
atk-s0201a0:1699_10: taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagaḷavāṭaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena vallitvā uppāṭenti,
atk-s0201a0:1699_12: Tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_1: taṃ karontā saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_2: Kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khaṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_5: Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya jālenti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_7: taṃ karontā gīvato paṭṭhāya cammabaddhe kantitvā gopphake ṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_9: So attano cammabaddhe akkamitvā akkamitvā patati.
atk-s0201a0:1700_11: taṃ karontā tatheva cammabaddhe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_15: Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca jāṇūsu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti.
atk-s0201a0:1700_19: Taṃ kālena kālaṃ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanhārūni uppāṭenti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_1: Kahāpaṇikanti sakalasarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ kahāpaṇamattaṃ pātentā koṭṭenti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_2: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_5: Palighaparivattikanti ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇacchidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_7: Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipanti.
atk-s0201a0:1701_11: Sunakhehipīti katipayāni divasāni āhāraṃ adatvā chātakehi sunakhehi khādāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:1702_2: Nibbānañhi āgamma kāmesu chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca,
atk-s0201a0:1702_3: tasmā nibbānaṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1702_4: Sāmaṃ vā kāme parijānissantīti sayaṃ vā te kāme tīhi pariññāhi parijānissanti.
atk-s0201a0:1703_1: Khattiyakaññā vātiādi aparittena vipulena kusalena gahitapaṭisandhikaṃ vatthālaṅkārādīni labhanaṭṭhāne nibbattaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1703_6: Mātugāmassa hi duggatakule nibbattassāpi etasmiṃ kāle thokaṃ thokaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasīdati.
atk-s0201a0:1703_7: Purisānaṃ pana vīsativassakāle pañcavīsativassakāle pasannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1706_1: Neva tasmiṃ samaye attabyābādhāyāti tasmiṃ samaye attanopi dukkhatthāya na ceteti.
atk-s0201a0:1707_5: tasmā ayaṃ aniccādiākārova vedanāya ādīnavoti attho,
atk-s0201a0:1711_3: So hi janapado sakyānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā sakyātveva saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:1711_6: Tañhi kapilassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne katattā kapilavatthūti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1711_9: so ñātisamāgamakāle kapilavatthuṃ āgate bhagavati attano ārāme vihāraṃ kāretvā bhagavato niyyātesi,
atk-s0201a0:1711_12: Suddhodano sukkodano sakkodano dhotodano amitodanoti ime pañca janā bhātaro.
atk-s0201a0:1711_15: Tathāgato ca nandatthero ca suddhodanassa puttā,
atk-s0201a0:1712_0: Dīgharattanti mayhaṃ sakadāgāmiphaluppattito paṭṭhāya cirarattaṃ jānāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1712_5: Idañhi pariyādānaṃ nāma “sabbaṃ hatthikāyaṃ pariyādiyitvā sabbaṃ assakāyaṃ sabbaṃ rathakāyaṃ sabbaṃ pattikāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1712_6: pariyādiyitvā jīvantaṃyeva naṃ osajjeyya”nti ettha gahaṇe āgataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1712_9: bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”ti ettha khepane.
atk-s0201a0:1713_0: Yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpīti yena mayhaṃ ekekasmiṃ kāle lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:1713_1: Ayaṃ kira rājā “sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā niravasesā pahīyantī”ti saññī ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:1713_3: appahīnakaṃ upādāya pahīnakampi puna pacchatovāvattatīti saññī hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1713_7: “Ayaṃ kileso asukamaggavajjho”ti imissā paṇṇattiyā akovidassa hi ariyasāvakassapi evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1713_9: Sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1713_15: Imāsu pana pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:1714_1: So eva kho teti soyeva lobho doso moho ca tava santāne appahīno,
atk-s0201a0:1714_3: So ca hi teti so tuyhaṃ lobhadosamohadhammo.
atk-s0201a0:1714_5: Na paribhuñjeyyāsīti mayaṃ viya pabbajeyyāsīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1715_5: Ettha bhiyyoti etesu kāmesu ayaṃ ādīnavoyeva bahu.
atk-s0201a0:1715_6: Assādo pana himavantaṃ upanidhāya sāsapo viya appo,
atk-s0201a0:1715_8: Iti cepi mahānāmāti mahānāma evaṃ cepi ariyasāvakassa.
atk-s0201a0:1715_10: Sammā nayena kāraṇena paññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1715_13: So cāti so eva maggadvayena diṭṭhakāmādīnavo ariyasāvako.
atk-s0201a0:1715_14: Pītisukhanti iminā sappītikāni dve jhānāni dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1715_15: Aññaṃ vā tato santataranti tato jhānadvayato santataraṃ aññaṃ uparijhānadvayañceva maggadvayañca.
atk-s0201a0:1715_16: Neva tāva anāvaṭṭī kāmesu hotīti atha kho so dve magge paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitopi ariyasāvako upari jhānānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1715_17: vā maggānaṃ vā anadhigatattā neva tāva kāmesu anāvaṭṭī hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1716_3: Paññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ hotīti ettha orodhanāṭakā pajahanapaññā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:1716_4: Pītisukhaṃ nājjhagamanti sappītikāni dve jhānāni na paṭilabhiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1716_5: Aññaṃ vā tato santataranti idha upari jhānadvayaṃ ceva cattāro ca maggā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:1717_6: Kāmasukhallikānuyogo hi eko anto attakilamathānuyogo ekoti imehi antehi muttaṃ mama sāsananti upari phalasamāpattisīsena
atk-s0201a0:1718_0: Gijjhakūṭe pabbateti tassa pabbatassa gijjhasadisaṃ kūṭaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1718_2: Gijjhā vā tassa kūṭesu nivasantītipi gijjhakūṭoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1718_5: Ubbhaṭṭhakā hontīti uddhaṃyeva ṭhitakā honti anisinnā.
atk-s0201a0:1718_6: Opakkamikāti ubbhaṭṭhakādinā attano upakkamena nibbattitā. Nigaṇṭho,
atk-s0201a0:1718_7: āvusoti aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattuṃ asakkontā nigaṇṭhassa upari pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1718_8: Sabbaññū sabbadassāvīti so amhākaṃ satthā atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti passatīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1718_9: Aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātīti so amhākaṃ satthā aparisesaṃ dhammaṃ jānanto aparisesasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1718_10: paṭijānanto ca evaṃ paṭijānāti “carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca…pe…
atk-s0201a0:1719_2: nigaṇṭhā jānātha ettakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇanti idaṃ bhagavā puriso nāma yaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:1719_4: Vīsatikahāpaṇe iṇaṃ gahetvā dasa datvā “dasa me dinnā dasa avasiṭṭhā”ti jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1719_13: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānanti iminā akusalaṃ pahāya kusalaṃ bhāvetvā suddhantaṃ patto nigaṇṭho nāma tumhākaṃ sāsane atthīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:1720_0: Evaṃ santeti tumhākaṃ evaṃ ajānanabhāve sati.
atk-s0201a0:1720_2: Lohitapāṇinoti pāṇe jīvitā voropentā lohitena makkhitapāṇino.
atk-s0201a0:1720_3: Pāṇaṃ hi hanantassapi yassa lohitena pāṇi na makkhiyati,
atk-s0201a0:1721_1: gotamāti idaṃ nigaṇṭhā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ vāde dosaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:1721_4: gotama yathā tumhe paṇītacīvarāni dhārentā sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantā devavimānavaṇṇāya gandhakuṭiyā vasamānā sukhena sukhaṃ adhigacchatha,
atk-s0201a0:1721_6: Yathā pana mayaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi nānappakāraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāma,
atk-s0201a0:1721_8: Sukhena ca hāvusoti idaṃ sace sukhena ca sukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ siyā.
