atk-s0201a0:1721_13: So tassa sārabhūto dassanīyo pāsādiko attabhāvasamiddhiyā bimbisāroti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1721_14: Sukhavihāritaroti idaṃ te nigaṇṭhā rañño tīsu pāsādesu tividhavayehi nāṭakehi saddhiṃ sampattianubhavanaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1721_17: appaccavekkhitvāva yathā ratto rāgavasena duṭṭho dosavasena mūḷho mohavasena bhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:1722_1: Yathā vo khameyyāti yathā tumhākaṃ rucceyya.
atk-s0201a0:1723_4: ekantasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī”ti idaṃ attano phalasamāpattisukhaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0201a0:1723_5: Ettha ca kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ rājavāre satta ādiṃ katvā pucchā katā.
atk-s0201a0:1723_6: Satta rattindivāni nappahotīti hi vutte cha pañca cattārīti sukhaṃ pucchituṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1723_7: Suddhavāre pana sattāti vutte puna cha pañca cattārīti vuccamānaṃ anacchariyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1723_8: tasmā ekaṃ ādiṃ katvā desanā katā.
atk-s0201a0:1727_5: Tassa kira nagarassa vatthupariggahadivase avidūre udakarahade suṃsumāro saddamakāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1727_7: Atha nagare niṭṭhite suṃsumāragiraṃ tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1727_10: Migadāyeti taṃ vanaṃ migapakkhīnaṃ abhayadinnaṭṭhāne jātaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1728_5: So ca hoti dubbacoti so ca dukkhena vattabbo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1728_7: Dovacassakaraṇehīti dubbacabhāvakārakehi upari āgatehi soḷasahi dhammehi.
atk-s0201a0:1728_8: Appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti yo hi vuccamāno tumhe maṃ kasmā vadatha,
atk-s0201a0:1728_9: ahaṃ attano kappiyākappiyaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ atthānatthaṃ jānāmīti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1729_3: apasādetīti kiṃ nu kho tuyhaṃ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena,
atk-s0201a0:1729_4: tvampi nāma bhaṇitabbaṃ maññissasīti evaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0201a0:1730_0: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā paṭicchādeti.
atk-s0201a0:1730_6: “Evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upaneti.
atk-s0201a0:1730_7: Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti “itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭho “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
atk-s0201a0:1730_11: Tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddhantiādīni vadanto kathaṃ bahiddhā vikkhipati.
atk-s0201a0:1731_4: yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi “mayā esa āpattiṃ āpajjanno diṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1731_7: kattha vā tvaṃ acchasi kattha vā ayantiādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭho sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:1732_3: Attanāva attānaṃ evaṃ anuminitabbanti evaṃ attanāva attā anumetabbo tuletabbo tīretabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1733_3: ratiñca divā ca kusalesu dhammesu sikkhantena pītipāmojjameva uppādetabbanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1734_0: Acche vā udakapatteti pasanne vā udakabhājane.
atk-s0201a0:1734_3: Aṅgaṇanti tattha jātakaṃ tilakaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a0:1734_4: Sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme pahīneti iminā sabbappahānaṃ kathesi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1734_5: Ettakā akusalā dhammā pabbajitassa nānucchavikāti paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppādayato hi paṭisaṅkhānappahānaṃkathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1734_6: Sīlaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ ārabhitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattentassa vikkhambhanappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1734_7: Samāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa tadaṅgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1734_8: Vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaṃ bhāventassa samucchedappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1734_10: nibbāne āgate nissaraṇappahānanti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte sabbappahānaṃ kathitaṃva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1735_0: Idañhi suttaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ nāmāti porāṇā vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1735_2: Pāto eva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnena “ime ettakā kilesā atthi nu kho mayhaṃ natthī”ti paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1735_7: Bhattakiccaṃ katvā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisīditvāpi paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1735_10: Dve vāre asakkontena pana avassaṃ ekavāraṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1739_2: Tattha cetokhilāti cittassa thaddhabhāvā kacavarabhāvā khāṇukabhāvā.
atk-s0201a0:1739_3: Cetaso vinibandhāti cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetaso vinibandhā.
atk-s0201a0:1739_10: Satthari kaṅkhatīti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_11: Sarīre kaṅkhamāno dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati,
atk-s0201a0:1739_12: guṇe kaṅkhamāno atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_17: Na sampasīdatīti guṇesu otaritvā nibbicikicchabhāvena pasīdituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1739_22: Ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhiloti ayaṃ satthari vicikicchāsaṅkhāto paṭhamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo,
atk-s0201a0:1739_27: atthi nu kho etaṃ natthīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_31: Taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_32: Saṅghe kaṅkhatīti suppaṭipannotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannā cattāro maggaṭṭhā
atk-s0201a0:1739_33: cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto saṅgho nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1739_34: so atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_35: Sikkhāya kaṅkhamāno adhisīlasikkhā nāma adhicittasikkhā nāma adhipaññāsikkhā nāmāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1739_36: Sā atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a0:1739_37: Ayaṃ pañcamoti ayaṃ sabrahmacārīsu kopasaṅkhāto pañcamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo kacavarabhāvo khāṇukabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:1740_9: Passasukhanti yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassavāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1741_5: Devo vā bhavissāmīti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1742_1: Iddhipādesu chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi chandasamādhi.
atk-s0201a0:1742_10: Iti imehi catūhi iddhipādehi vikkhambhanappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1742_11: Ussoḷhīyeva pañcamīti ettha ussoḷhīti sabbattha kattabbavīriyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1742_12: Ussoḷhīpannarasaṅgasamannāgatoti pañca cetokhilappahānāni pañca vinibandhappahānāni cattāro iddhipādā
atk-s0201a0:1742_13: ussoḷhīti evaṃ ussoḷhiyā saddhiṃ pannarasahi aṅgehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:1743_0: Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1743_5: Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni.
atk-s0201a0:1743_6: Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gāhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni usmīkatāni.
atk-s0201a0:1743_7: Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni,
atk-s0201a0:1743_9: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyāti tassā kukkuṭiyā imaṃ tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya.
atk-s0201a0:1743_10: Atha kho bhabbāva teti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva.
atk-s0201a0:1743_11: Te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripālīyamānāni na pūtīni honti.
atk-s0201a0:1743_17: kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1743_18: tasmā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimhā,
atk-s0201a0:1743_20: ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-s0201a0:1743_23: Atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1744_2: tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ussoḷhīpannarasehi aṅgehi samannāgatabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:1744_3: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya pannarasaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0201a0:1744_5: Tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1744_6: Aṇḍakalāpānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:1744_7: Kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhamutuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:1744_8: Kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1744_9: Kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0201a0:1744_10: abhinikkhamanakālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1744_11: vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1744_12: vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0201a0:1744_14: Yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0201a0:1744_15: evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi –
atk-s0201a0:1747_0: Ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati,
atk-s0201a0:1747_1: so gāthāpariyosāne avijjāṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:1747_2: Tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha tattha vicaranti,
atk-s0201a0:1747_3: evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānarammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā saṅghārāmaṃ upasobhayamāno vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1748_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte cattāri pahānāni kathitāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:1753_1: Vanapatthaṃ upanissāya viharatīti manussūpacārātikkantaṃ vanasaṇḍasenāsanaṃ nissāya samaṇadhammaṃ karonto viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1753_2: Anupaṭṭhitātiādīsu pubbe anupaṭṭhitā sati taṃ upanissāya viharatopi na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1753_4: pubbe aparikkhīṇā āsavā na parikkhayaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:1753_5: pubbe ananuppattaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemasaṅkhātaṃ arahattañca na pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1753_9: Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā.
atk-s0201a0:1753_10: Ettha ca rattibhāge paṭisañcikkhamānena ñatvā rattiṃyeva pakkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1753_11: rattiṃ caṇḍavāḷādīnaṃ paribandhe sati aruṇuggamanaṃ āgametabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1754_2: Anantaravāre pana saṅkhāpīti evaṃ samaṇadhammassa nipphajjanabhāvaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0201a0:1755_0: 194. Yāvajīvanti yāva jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva vatthabbameva.
atk-s0201a0:1756_1: So puggaloti padassa nānubandhitabboti iminā sambandho.
atk-s0201a0:1756_2: Anāpucchāti idha pana taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1757_1: Saṅkhāpīti evaṃ samaṇadhammassa anipphajjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā so puggalo nānubandhitabbo,
atk-s0201a0:1758_2: Evarūpo hi puggalo sacepi dārukalāpasataṃ vā udakaghaṭasataṃ vā vālikambaṇasataṃ vā daṇḍaṃ āharāpeti,
atk-s0201a0:1762_2: Tattha mahāvananti himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ aropimaṃ jātivanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1762_13: pabbatadassanādīnaṃ atthāya ito cito ca vicaramāno.
atk-s0201a0:1762_14: Adhiccanikkhamano kiresa kadāci deva nikkhamitvā evaṃ vicarati.
atk-s0201a0:1762_15: Daṇḍamolubbhāti daṇḍaṃ olumbhitvā gopālakadārako viya daṇḍaṃ purato ṭhapetvā daṇḍamatthake dve hatthe
atk-s0201a0:1762_16: patiṭṭhāpetvā piṭṭhipāṇiṃ hanukena uppīḷetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1763_3: Ayaṃ rājā bhagavantaṃ avanditvā paṭisanthāramattakameva katvā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:1763_7: Devadatto attano santikaṃ āgacchamāne tathāgate bhindati.
atk-s0201a0:1763_8: So kira evaṃ vadeti “samaṇo gotamo amhākaṃ kulena saddhiṃ verī,
atk-s0201a0:1763_12: Bhāgineyyopi me cakkavattibījanti ñatvā amhākaṃ kulassa vaḍḍhiyā atussanto ‘nassateta’nti tampi daharakāleyeva pabbājesi.
atk-s0201a0:1763_13: Ahaṃ pana tena vinā vattituṃ asakkonto anupabbajito.
atk-s0201a0:1763_14: Evaṃ pabbajitampi maṃ pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya na ujukehi akkhīhi oloketi.
atk-s0201a0:1763_15: Parisamajjhe bhāsantopi mahāpharasunā paharanto viya āpāyiko devadattotiādīni bhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1764_0: Atha bhagavā yathā ayaṃ rājā mayā pañhe pucchite na kathetīti vattuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0201a0:1764_1: yathā ca bhāsitassa atthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1764_2: evamassa kathessāmīti tassānucchavikaṃ kathento yathāvādī khotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1765_0: Tattha na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhatīti loke kenaci saddhiṃ viggāhikakathaṃ na karoti na vivadati.
atk-s0201a0:1765_1: Tathāgato hi lokena saddhiṃ na vivadati;
atk-s0201a0:1765_2: loko pana tathāgatena saddhiṃ aniccanti vutte niccanti vadamāno, dukkhaṃ, anattā,
atk-s0201a0:1765_19: Chinnakukkuccanti vippaṭisārakukkuccassa ceva hatthapādakukkuccassa ca chinnattā chinnakukkuccaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1765_22: paṇīto hi bhavo vuddhippatto abhavoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1765_25: tasmā yena kāraṇena kāmehi visaṃyuttaṃ viharantaṃ taṃ loke ninnāvādiṃ khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ kilesasaññā nānusenti,
atk-s0201a0:1765_26: tañca kāraṇaṃ ahaṃ vadāmīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1765_30: Nalāṭikanti valibhaṅgaṃ nalāṭe tisso rājiyo dassento valibhaṅgaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1766_4: tathā mayā kathitanti vutte kinti nu kho bhagavatā aviññeyyaṃ katvā pañho kathitoti anusandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a0:1766_5: dasabalaṃ yācitvā imaṃ pañhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
atk-s0201a0:1767_1: yena kāraṇena yasmiṃ kāraṇe satīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1767_7: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbanti yasmiṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhāte kāraṇe sati papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti,
atk-s0201a0:1767_8: ettha ekāyatanampi ce abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1767_13: Esevantoti ayaṃ abhinandanādīnaṃ natthibhāvova rāgānusayādīnaṃ anto.
atk-s0201a0:1768_0: Daṇḍādānādīsu pana yāya cetanāya daṇḍaṃ ādiyati,
atk-s0201a0:1768_7: Tuvaṃ tuvanti evaṃ pavattaṃ tuvaṃ tuvaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1768_11: Ettheteti ettha dvādasasu āyatanesu ete kilesā.
atk-s0201a0:1768_12: Kilesā hi uppajjamānāpi dvādasāyatanāni nissāya uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1769_0: “Sā kho panesā taṇhā kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1769_6: Cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa”ntiādinā nayena dvādasasuyeva āyatanesu tassā uppatti ca nirodho ca vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1769_7: Yatheva ca taṇhā dvādasasu āyatanesu uppajjitvā nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi āyatanesu puna samudācārassa abhāvato āyatanesuyeva niruddhāti vuttā,
atk-s0201a0:1769_8: evamimepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā āyatanesu nirujjhantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1769_9: Atha vā yvāyaṃ abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvova rāgānusayādīnaṃ antoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1769_10: Etthete rāgānusayādīnaṃ antoti laddhavohāre nibbāne pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1769_14: Vuttañhetaṃ “dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā hontī”tiādi.
atk-s0201a0:1770_1: Satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇitoti satthārā ca pasaṃsito.
atk-s0201a0:1771_1: Atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkamma khandhanti sāro nāma mūle vā khandhe vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:1771_8: Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1771_15: Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto.
atk-s0201a0:1771_17: Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūtoti evametesu padesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1771_22: Agaruṃ katvāti punappunaṃ āyācāpentopi hi garuṃ karoti nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1771_23: attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā sinerūpādato vālukaṃ uddharamāno viya dubbiññeyyaṃ katvā kathentopi garuṃ karotiyeva nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1771_24: Evaṃ akatvā amhe punappunaṃ ayācāpetvā suviññeyyampi no katvā kathehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1772_1: Yaṃ kho no āvusoti ettha kiñcāpi “yaṃ kho vo”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:1772_2: te pana bhikkhū attanā saddhiṃ saṅgaṇhanto “yaṃ kho no”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1772_6: yaṃ kho amhākaṃ bhagavā tumhākaṃ saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1773_1: nissayabhāvena cakkhupasādañca ārammaṇabhāvena catusamuṭṭhānikarūpe ca paṭicca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1773_2: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1773_3: Taṃ phassaṃ paṭicca sahajātādivasena phassapaccayā vedanā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1773_11: Purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantīti taṃ apariññātakāraṇaṃ purisaṃ papañcakoṭṭhāsā abhibhavanti,
atk-s0201a0:1773_18: Yatheva hi etarahi cakkhudvāriko papañco cakkhuñca rūpe ca phassavedanāsaññāvitakke ca paṭicca uppanno,
atk-s0201a0:1773_19: evamevaṃ atītānāgatesupi cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu tassuppattiṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:1774_6: Javane gahite sahāvajjanakaṃ bhavaṅga mano nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1774_8: Manodvāre pana yasmā atītādibhedaṃ sabbampi ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1775_0: Idāni vaṭṭaṃ dassento so vatāvusoti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1775_1: Phassapaññattiṃ paññapessatīti phasso nāma eko dhammo uppajjatīti evaṃ phassapaññattiṃ paññapessati,
atk-s0201a0:1775_4: Evaṃ imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti dvādasāyatanavasena sakalaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni dvādasāyatanapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0201a0:1775_5: vivaṭṭaṃ dassento so vatāvuso cakkhusmiṃ asatīti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1776_0: Evaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni sāvakena pañho kathitoti mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha,
atk-s0201a0:1776_2: icchamānā tameva upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkhā hothāti uyyojento ākaṅkhamānā ca panātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1777_1: Imehi ākārehīti imehi kāraṇehi papañcuppattiyā pāṭiyekkakāraṇehi ceva vaṭṭavivaṭṭakāraṇehi ca.
atk-s0201a0:1777_5: Catūhi vā kāraṇehi paṇḍito dhātukusalo āyatanakusalo paccayākārakusalo kāraṇākāraṇakusaloti.
atk-s0201a0:1777_6: Mahāpaññoti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggahaṇasamatthāya mahāpaññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:1777_7: Yathā taṃ mahākaccānenāti yathā mahākaccānena byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1778_2: Sappiphāṇitamadhusakkarādīsu idaṃ nāmettha mandaṃ idaṃ bahukanti na vattabbaṃ samayojitarasaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1778_5: Ko nāmo ayanti idaṃ thero atibhaddako ayaṃ dhammapariyāyo,
atk-s0201a0:1778_6: dasabalassa sabbaññutaññāṇenevassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmīti cintetvā āha.
atk-s0201a0:1782_2: Tattha dvidhā katvā dvidhā katvāti dve dve bhāge katvā.
atk-s0201a0:1782_6: Ekaṃ bhāganti ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā sabbo pāyaṃ vitakko akusalapakkhikoyevāti
atk-s0201a0:1782_8: Kāmehi nissaṭo nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1782_11: so mettāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:1782_13: so karuṇāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:1782_14: Dutiyaṃ bhāganti sabbopāyaṃ kusalapakkhikoyevāti dutiyaṃ koṭṭhāsamakāsiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1783_0: Bodhisattassa hi chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantassa nekkhammavitakkādayo puñjapuñjā mahānadiyaṃ oghā viya pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1783_1: Satisammosena pana sahasā kāmavitakkādayo uppajjitvā kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā sayaṃ akusalajavanavārā hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1783_4: handāhaṃ ime vitakke dve bhāge katvā viharāmī”ti kāmavitakkādayo akusalapakkhikāti ekaṃ bhāgaṃ karoti nekkhammavitakkādayo kusalapakkhikāti ekaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1783_6: “akusalapakkhato āgataṃ vitakkaṃ mantena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya amittaṃ gīvāya akkamanto viya ca niggahessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1783_8: Kusalapakkhato āgataṃ vitakkaṃ meghasamaye meghaṃ viya sukhette sālakalyāṇipotakaṃ viya ca sīghaṃ vaḍḍhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1783_11: Evaṃ iminā bodhisattassa vitakkaniggahaṇanakālo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1784_8: Uppajjati kāmavitakkoti bodhisattassa chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahato rajjasukhaṃ vā ārabbha,
atk-s0201a0:1784_9: pāsāde vā nāṭakāni vā orodhe vā kiñcideva vā sampattiṃ ārabbha kāmavitakko nāma na uppannapubbo.
atk-s0201a0:1784_10: Dukkarakārikāya panassa āhārūpacchedena adhimattakasimānaṃ pattassa etadahosi –
atk-s0201a0:1784_16: tasmā sayameva āgato”ti paṇītapaṇītaṃ āhāraṃ upahariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1784_18: Jarājiṇṇattabhāvo hi sappāyabhojanaṃ labhitvāpi pākatiko na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1784_20: Tenassa sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjato attabhāvo na cirasseva pākatiko jāto,
atk-s0201a0:1784_24: So taṃ oloketvā “tāva kilanto nāma attabhāvo evaṃ paṭipākatiko jāto”ti cintetvā attano paññāmahantatāya
atk-s0201a0:1784_25: evaṃ parittakampi vitakkaṃ gahetvā kāmavitakkoti akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1785_0: Paṇṇasālāya purato nisinno camarapasadagavayarohitamigādike magagaṇe manuññasaddaravane moravanakukkuṭādike
atk-s0201a0:1785_1: pakkhigaṇe nīluppalakumudakamalādisañchannāni pallalāni nānākusumasañchannaviṭapā vanarājiyo maṇikkhandhanimmalajalapavāhañca
atk-s0201a0:1785_3: Tassa evaṃ hoti “sobhanā vatime migajātā pakkhigaṇā pallalāni vanarājiyo nadī nerañjarā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1785_4: So tampi evaṃ parittakaṃ vitakkaṃ gahetvā kāmavitakkamakāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1786_2: Kiṃ pana mahāsattassa ubhayadukkhāya saṃvattanakavitakko nāma atthīti? Natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1786_3: Apariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa pana vitakko yāva ubhayabyābādhāya saṃvattatīti etāni tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0201a0:1786_5: Paññānirodhikoti anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a0:1786_6: lokiyapaññaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattipañcābhiññāvasena uppannampi samucchinditvā khipatīti paññānirodhiko.
atk-s0201a0:1786_9: taṃ paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ na detīti anibbānasaṃvattaniko.
atk-s0201a0:1786_14: Byantameva naṃ akāsinti vigatantaṃ nissesaṃ parivaṭumaṃ paricchinnameva naṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1787_1: Byāpādavitakkoti na bodhisattassa parūpaghātappaṭisaṃyutto nāma vitakko citte uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1787_2: athassa ativassaaccuṇhaatisītādīni pana paṭicca cittavipariṇāmabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1787_4: Vihiṃsāvitakkoti na mahāsattassa paresaṃ dukkhuppādanappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1787_7: Paṇṇasālādvāre nisinno hi sīhabyagghādike vāḷamige sūkarādayo khuddamige vihiṃsante passati.
atk-s0201a0:1787_8: Atha bodhisatto imasmimpi nāma akutobhaye araññe imesaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ paccatthikā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:1787_12: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho manusse rājakammikehi upaddute vadhabandhādīni anubhavante attano kasivaṇijjādīni
atk-s0201a0:1787_13: kammāni katvā jīvituṃ na labhantīti kāruññaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:1787_19: tena tene cassākārena kāmavitakkādibhāvo cetaso na hi hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:1787_22: Tassa taṃ kāmavitakkāya cittanti tassa taṃ cittaṃ kāmavitakkatthāya.
atk-s0201a0:1788_0: Idāni atthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpī tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1788_5: Sannivāreyyāti ito cito ca gantuṃ na dadeyya.
atk-s0201a0:1788_7: evaṃ arakkhitānaṃ gunnaṃ paresaṃ sassakhādanakāraṇenāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1788_8: Bālo hi gopāloko evaṃ gāvo arakkhamāno “ayaṃ amhākaṃ bhattavetanaṃ khādati,
atk-s0201a0:1788_10: kulehi saddhiṃ veraṃ gaṇhāpetī”ti gosāmikānampi santikā vadhādīni pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:1788_12: Paṇḍito pana imāni cattāri bhayāni sampassanto gāvo sādhukaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0201a0:1788_21: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ nekkhammamhi visuddhipakkhaṃ addasanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1789_8: paṇḍitagopālakassa catubbidhaṃ bhayaṃ disvā kiṭṭhasambādhe appamādena gorakkhaṇaṃ viya bodhisattassa
atk-s0201a0:1789_9: chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahato attabyābādhādibhayaṃ disvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yathā kāmavitakkādayo na
atk-s0201a0:1789_18: anuvitakkeyyanti sakalarattiṃ cepi taṃ vitakkaṃ pavatteyyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1789_28: mā me cittaṃ samādhimhā dūre hotūti ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi,
atk-s0201a0:1789_34: Mā me cittaṃ ūhaññīti mā mayhaṃ cittaṃ ugghātīyittha,
atk-s0201a0:1790_2: avihiṃsāvitakkoti ettha yo so imāya heṭṭhā vuttataruṇavipassanāya saddhiṃ uppannavitakko kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhena nekkhammavitakkoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1790_3: Soyeva byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena abyāpādavitakkoti ca vihiṃsāpaccanīkaṭṭhena avihiṃsāvitakkoti ca vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1791_0: Ettāvatā bodhisattassa samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanāpaṭṭhapanakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:1791_3: Tassa vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aticiraṃ nisinnassa kāyo kilamati,
atk-s0201a0:1791_8: So puna samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paridametvā mudukaṃ katvā samassāsetvā puna vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a0:1791_9: Tassa puna aticiraṃ nisinnassa tatheva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1791_10: So puna samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tatheva karoti.
atk-s0201a0:1792_0: Yathā yodhassa phalakakoṭṭhako nāma bahūpakāro hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1792_2: tattha hatthīhipi assehipi yodhehipi saddhiṃ kammaṃ katvā āvudhesu vā khīṇesu bhuñjitukāmatādibhāve vā
atk-s0201a0:1792_3: sati nivattitvā phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā āvudhānipi gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1792_8: taṃ taṃ katvā puna saṅgāmaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0201a0:1792_9: tattha kammaṃ katvā puna uccārādipīḷito vā kenacideva vā karaṇīyena phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:1792_11: evaṃ yodhassa phalakakoṭṭhako viya vipassanāya bahūpakārā samāpatti.
atk-s0201a0:1793_0: Samāpattiyā pana saṅgāmanittharaṇakayodhassa phalakakoṭṭhakatopi vipassanā bahūpakāratarā.
atk-s0201a0:1793_1: Kiñcāpi hi samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti,
atk-s0201a0:1794_0: Yathā hi thale nāvampi nāvāya bhaṇḍampi sakaṭabhāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1794_1: Udakaṃ patvā pana sakaṭampi sakaṭabhaṇḍampi yuttagoṇepi nāvābhāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:1794_2: Nāvā tiriyaṃ sotaṃ chinditvā sotthinā supaṭṭanaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1794_3: evamevaṃ kiñcāpi samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti,
atk-s0201a0:1794_6: Thalaṃ patvā sakaṭaṃ viya hi samāpatti.
atk-s0201a0:1794_8: Iti bodhisattassa ettāvatā samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanāpaṭṭhapanakālo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1795_3: Satikaraṇīyameva hotīti etā gāvoti satiuppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1795_4: Ito cito ca gantvā ākoṭanādikiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1795_5: Ete dhammāti ete samathavipassanā dhammāti satuppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1795_7: Tadā kirassa samāpattiṃ appanatthāya nisinnassa aṭṭha samāpattiyo ekāvajjanena āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:1795_8: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinno satta anupassanā ekappahāreneva āruḷho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1796_3: sattānañhi hitūpacāraṃ attano satthubhāvasampadañca dassento bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1796_8: Ayogakkhemakāmoti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ anicchanto bhayameva icchanto.
atk-s0201a0:1796_15: Odaheyya okacaranti tesaṃ oke caramānaṃ viya ekaṃ dīpakamigaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapeyya.
atk-s0201a0:1797_0: Migaluddako hi araññaṃ migānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “idha vasanti,
atk-s0201a0:1797_4: iminā maggena pavisantī”ti sallakkhetvā maggaṃ pidhāya kummaggaṃ vivaritvā okacarañca okacārikañca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a0:1797_6: Atha sāyanhasamaye migā akutobhaye araññe caritvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā migapotakehi saddhiṃ kīḷamānā vasanaṭṭhānasantikaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1797_7: āgantvā okacarañca okacārikañca disvā “sahāyakā no āgatā bhavissantī”ti nirāsaṅkā pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:1797_13: tato sabbe uttasitvā “bhayaṃ uppanna”nti purato olokentā udakena vā vanena vā pabbatena vā sanniruddhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1797_14: maggaṃ disvā ubhohi passehi aṅgulisaṅkhalikaṃ viya gahanavanaṃ pavisituṃ asakkontā paviṭṭhamaggeneva
atk-s0201a0:1797_16: Luddako tesaṃ nivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ādito paṭṭhāya tiṃsampi cattālīsampi mige ghāteti.
atk-s0201a0:1797_19: mahāmigasaṅgho aparena samayena anayabyasanaṃ āpajjeyyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1798_1: avijjāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha yasmā ime sattā avijjāya aññāṇā hutvā nandīrāgena ābandhitvā rūpārammaṇādīni
atk-s0201a0:1799_0: Migaluddako hi ekadāpi tesaṃ sākhābhaṅgena sarīraṃ puñchitvā manussagandhaṃ apanetvā okacaraṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a0:1799_1: ṭhāne ṭhapetvā okacārikaṃ saha rajjuyā vissajjetvā attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā sattiṃ ādāya okacarassa santike tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1799_3: Taṃ disvā migā sīsāni ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1799_6: Sāpi tiṇāni khādantī viya saṇikaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1799_7: Āraññiko yūthapatimigo tassā vātaṃ labhitvā sakabhariyaṃ vissajjetvā tadabhimukho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1800_1: Okacārikā āraññikassa migassa accāsannabhāvaṃ adatvā tadabhimukhīva pacchato paṭikkamitvā okacarassa santikaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:1800_4: āraññiko migo okacaraṃ disvā okacārikāya sammatto hutvā okacare usūyaṃ katvā piṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā sīsaṃ kampento tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1800_5: tasmiṃ khaṇe sattiṃ jivhāya lehantopi “kiṃ eta”nti na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1800_6: okacaropi sacassa uparibhāgena taṃ migaṃ paharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1800_10: Atha luddako āraññikaṃ migaṃ sattiyā paharitvā tattheva ghātetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1800_11: Evameva yathā so migo okacārikāya sammatto okacare usūyaṃ katvā sattiṃ jivhāya lehantopi kiñci na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1800_12: tathā ime sattā avijjāya sammattā andhabhūtā kiñci ajānantā rūpādīsu nandīrāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭadukkhasattiyā
atk-s0201a0:1801_2: vivaṭo mayā khemo maggoti iti kho,
atk-s0201a0:1801_4: mayā imesaṃ sattānaṃ hitacaraṇena sammāsambodhiṃ patvā ahaṃ buddhosmīti tuṇhībhūtena anisīditvā dhammacakkappavattanato
atk-s0201a0:1801_5: paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ desentena vivaṭo khemo ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0201a0:1801_7: aññātakoṇḍaññādīnaṃ bhabbapuggalānaṃ ūhato okacaro nandīrāgo dvedhā chetvā pātito,
atk-s0201a0:1801_8: nāsitā okacārikā avijjā sabbena sabbaṃ samugghātitāti attano hitūpacāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:1805_2: Tattha adhicittamanuyuttenāti dasakusalakammapathavasena uppannaṃ cittaṃ cittameva,
atk-s0201a0:1805_3: vipassanāpādakaaṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ tato cittato adhikaṃ cittanti adhicittaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1806_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto nisīdanaṃ ādāya asukasmiṃ
atk-s0201a0:1806_1: rukkhamūle vā vanasaṇḍe vā pabbatapāde vā pabbhāre vā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmīti nikkhamantopi,
atk-s0201a0:1806_2: tattha gantvā hatthehi vā pādehi vā nisajjaṭṭhānato tiṇapaṇṇāni apanentopi adhicittaṃ anuyuttoyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1806_3: Nisīditvā pana hatthapāde dhovitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantopi adhicittaṃ anuyuttoyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1807_2: Na nu ca kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma muhuttampi achaḍḍetvā nirantaraṃ manasikātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1807_5: tesu bhikkhunā attano cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnena yāva kocideva upakkileso nuppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:1807_8: tadā imāni gahetvā citte uppannaṃ abbudaṃ nīharitabbanti dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:1808_1: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ vitakkānaṃ khettañca ārammaṇañca jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1808_5: Vicikicchāuddhaccasampayuttacittāni pana dve etesaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ khettaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1808_6: Sabbesampi sattā ceva saṅkhārā ca ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1808_7: iṭṭhāniṭṭhaasamapekkhitesu hi sattesu ca saṅkhāresu ca te uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:1808_8: Aññampi nimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ kusalūpasaṃhitanti tato nimittato aññaṃ kusalanissitaṃ nimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1808_9: Tattha aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma chandūpasañhite vitakke sattesu uppanne asubhabhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1808_10: Saṅkhāresu uppanne aniccamanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1808_11: Dosūpasañhite sattesu uppanne mettābhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1808_12: Saṅkhāresu uppanne dhātumanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1808_13: Mohūpasañhite yattha katthaci uppanne pañcadhammūpanissayo aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1809_0: Imassa hatthā vā sobhanā pādā vātiādinā nayena hi sattesu lobhe uppanne asubhato upasaṃharitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1809_5: Ayaṃ attabhāvo nāma tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussāpito,
atk-s0201a0:1809_10: navahi vaṇamukhehi navanavutilomakūpasahassehi ca asuci paggharati,
atk-s0201a0:1809_14: natthettha sāraṃ vā varaṃ vāti evaṃ asubhato upasaṃharantassa sattesu uppanno lobho pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:1809_15: tenassa asubhato upasaṃharaṇaṃ aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1810_0: Pattacīvarādīsu saṅkhāresu lobhe uppanne dvīhākārehi saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1810_2: Tenassa aniccato manasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1810_3: Sattesu dose uppanne pana āghātavinayakakacopamovādādīnaṃ vasena mettā bhāvetabbā,
atk-s0201a0:1810_5: tenassa mettābhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1810_6: Khāṇukaṇṭakatiṇapaṇṇādīsu pana dose uppanne tvaṃ kassa kuppasi,
atk-s0201a0:1810_10: kiṃ pathavīdhātu udāhu āpodhātūtiādinā nayena dhātumanasikāraṃ karontassa doso pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1810_11: Tenassa dhātumanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1815_2: “ācariyo gāmappavesanaṃ anāpucchantassa pattakāle vattaṃ akarontassa ghaṭasataudakāharaṇādidaṇḍakammaṃ karotī”ti yattappaṭiyatto hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1815_5: “ācariyo uddesakāle uddesaṃ aggaṇhantassa asādhukaṃ sajjhāyantassa ca daṇḍakammaṃ karotī”ti yattappaṭiyatto hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1815_7: Garubhāvanīye bhikkhū upasaṃkamitvā “idaṃ bhante kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti paripucchanto kaṃkhaṃ vinodeti,
atk-s0201a0:1815_9: Kālena dhammasavanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassāpi tesu tesu ṭhānesu attho pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1815_12: idaṃ na kāraṇanti ṭhānāṭṭhānavinicchaye cheko hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1815_14: Tenassa pañcadhammūpanissayo aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1816_0: Apica aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yaṃkiñci bhāventassāpi ime vitakkā pahīyanti eva.
atk-s0201a0:1816_3: Yathā hi aggiṃ allakaṭṭhehipi paṃsūhipi sākhādīhipi pothetvā nibbāpentiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1816_6: evamimehi nimittehi pahīnā rāgādayo suppahīnā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1817_3: Sukhumāya āṇiyāti yaṃ āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1817_5: Oḷārikaṃ āṇinti candaphalake vā sāraphalake vā ākoṭitaṃ visamāṇiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1817_8: Abhinivaseyyāti idāni bahu nikkhantāti ñatvā hatthena cāletvā nikkaḍḍheyya.
atk-s0201a0:1817_12: sukhumāṇiyā oḷārikāṇinīharaṇaṃ viya asubhabhāvanādīhi kusalanimittehi tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ nīharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1818_2: Kaṇṭhe āsattenāti kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena paṭimukkena.
atk-s0201a0:1819_0: Pahīyantīti evaṃ imināpi kāraṇena ete akusalā dhammā sāvajjā dukkhavipākāti attano paññābalena upaparikkhato
atk-s0201a0:1819_2: Yo pana attano paññābalena upaparikkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1819_3: tena ācariyaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ saṅghattheraṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a0:1819_4: ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā bhikkhusaṅghameva vā sannipātetvā ārocetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1819_6: svāyaṃ evaṃ etesu ādīnavo daṭṭhabboti kathessati,
atk-s0201a0:1819_7: kāyavicchindanīyakathādīhi vā pana te vitakke niggaṇhissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1820_1: Asatiamanasikāro āpajjitabboti neva so vitakko saritabbo na manasikātabbo,
atk-s0201a0:1820_3: Yathā hi rūpaṃ apassitukāmo puriso akkhīni nimīleyya,
atk-s0201a0:1820_4: evameva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnena bhikkhunā cittamhi vitakke uppanne aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1820_6: tasmiṃ pahīne puna kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1821_3: Evampi ce aññavihitakassa sato so na pahīyati.
atk-s0201a0:1821_5: yattha ca buddhavaṇṇāpi dhammavaṇṇāpi likhitā honti,
atk-s0201a0:1821_8: thavikato araṇisahitāni nīharitvā “ayaṃ uttarāraṇī ayaṃ adharāraṇī”ti āvajjentena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1821_13: ayaṃ sūci nāmā”ti parikkhāraṃ samannānentena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1821_15: sūciṃ gahetvā cīvare jiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ sibbantena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1821_17: tāva taṃ taṃ kusalakammaṃ karontena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1821_20: Vitakke pacchinne kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa okāso na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1822_0: Porāṇakapaṇḍitā pana navakammaṃ katvāpi vitakkaṃ pacchindiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1822_4: Atha naṃ thero “imasmiṃ vihāre nhānaudakaṃ dullabhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1822_7: Tattha naṃ thero āha “ayaṃ vihāro accantasaṅghiko,
atk-s0201a0:1822_9: So sādhu bhanteti ādito paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyaṃ pabbhārasodhanaṃ tejodhātukasiṇaparikammanti tīṇīpi ekato ārabhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpesi,
atk-s0201a0:1822_15: So taṃ rattiṃ leṇe vasanto utusappāyaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā tattheva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0201a0:1823_1: Imasmiṃ ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhituṃ asakkonto idha ṭhatvā niggaṇhissatīti vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabbaṃ dassento puna tassa ce bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1823_2: Tattha vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ manasikātabbanti saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, paccayo,
atk-s0201a0:1823_8: ayaṃ vitakko kiṃ hetu kiṃ paccayā kiṃ kāraṇā uppannoti vitakkānaṃ mūlañca mūlamūlañca manasikātabbanti.
atk-s0201a0:1823_9: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ sīghaṃ gacchāmīti kena nu kho kāraṇena ahaṃ sīghaṃ gacchāmi?
atk-s0201a0:1823_10: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ saṇikaṃ gaccheyyanti kiṃ me iminā sīghagamanena,
atk-s0201a0:1823_12: So saṇikaṃ gaccheyyāti so evaṃ cintetvā saṇikaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0201a0:1824_0: Tattha tassa purisassa sīghagamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno vitakkasamāruḷhakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1824_2: Tassa ṭhitakālo viya imassa vitakkacāre pacchinne mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ cittotaraṇakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1824_3: Tassa nisinnakālo viya imassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappattakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1824_4: Tassa nipannakālo viya imassa nibbānārammaṇāya phalasamāpattiyā divasaṃ vītivattanakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1824_5: Tattha ime vitakkā kiṃ hetukā kiṃ paccayāti vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassa vitakkacāro sithilo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1824_6: Tasmiṃ sithilībhūte matthakaṃ gacchante vitakkā sabbaso nirujjhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1825_0: Sasakassa kira beluvarukkhamūle niddāyantassa beluvapakkaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā kaṇṇamūle patitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1825_1: So tassa saddena “pathavī bhijjatī”ti saññāya uṭṭhahitvā vegena palāyi.
atk-s0201a0:1825_2: Taṃ disvā purato aññepi catuppadā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1825_8: So hatthināgato paṭṭhāya yāva sasakaṃ pucchi “tayā, tāta,
atk-s0201a0:1825_14: mā bhāyī”ti saṇhamudukena gahetvā gato saso rukkhassa avidūre ṭhatvā –
atk-s0201a0:1828_1: Bodhisatto “tvaṃ ettheva tiṭṭhā”ti rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā sasakassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ addasa,
atk-s0201a0:1828_5: niddāyamāno imassa kaṇṇamūle patitassa saddena ‘pathavī bhijjatī’ti evaṃsaññī hutvā palāyī”ti ñatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sasaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:1831_1: Evaṃ vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassa vitakkā pahīyanti.
atk-s0201a0:1832_1: Imasmiṃ vitakkamūlabhedapabbe ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhituṃ asakkontena pana evaṃ niggaṇhitabbāti aparampi kāraṇaṃ dassento puna tassa ce,
atk-s0201a0:1833_2: Balavā purisoti yathā thāmasampanno mahābalo puriso dubbalaṃ purisaṃ sīse vā gale vā khandhe vā gahetvā
atk-s0201a0:1833_3: abhiniggaṇheyya abhinippīḷeyya abhisantāpeyya santattaṃ kilantaṃ mucchāparetaṃ viya kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:1833_4: evameva bhikkhunā vitakkehi saddhiṃ paṭimallena hutvā “ke ca tumhe ko cāha”nti abhibhavitvā –
atk-s0201a0:1833_5: “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita”nti evaṃ mahāvīriyaṃ paggayha
atk-s0201a0:1833_6: vitakkā niggaṇhitabbāti dassento ima atthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0201a0:1834_3: Yathā pana satthācariyo tiroraṭṭhā āgataṃ rājaputtaṃ pañcāvudhasippaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0201a0:1834_7: Sace te dhanu nassati vā bhijjati vā sattiyā asinā”ti evaṃ pañcahipi āvudhehi kattabbaṃ dassetvā uyyojeti.
atk-s0201a0:1834_8: So tathā katvā sakaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā rajjasiriṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0201a0:1834_9: Evamevaṃ bhagavā adhicittamanuyuttaṃ bhikkhuṃ arahattagahaṇatthāya uyyojento –
atk-s0201a0:1834_11: aññanimittapabbe ṭhatvā te niggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0201a0:1834_15: tatrāpi asakkonto abhiniggaṇhanapabbe ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti imāni pañca pabbāni desesi.
atk-s0201a0:1835_0: Vasī vitakkapariyāyapathesūti vitakkacārapathesu ciṇṇavasī paguṇavasīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1835_1: Yaṃ vitakkaṃ ākaṅkhissatīti idaṃ assa vasībhāvākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1835_2: Ayañhi pubbe yaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1835_6: Idāni pana vasībhūtattā yaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1845_0: 222. Evaṃ me sutanti kakacūpamasuttaṃ. Tattha moḷiyaphaggunoti moḷīti cūḷā vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:1850_14: Bhikkhuniyo hi ovadituṃ kālo nāma atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1850_15: so atthaṅgatepi sūriye ovadanto taṃ kālavelampi atikkami.
atk-s0201a0:1850_16: Bhikkhunīnaṃ ovāde pamāṇaṃ nāma atthi sīmā mariyādā.
atk-s0201a0:1850_17: So uttarichappañcavācāhi ovadanto taṃ sīmavelampi atikkami.
atk-s0201a0:1850_18: Kathento pana davasahagataṃ katvā duṭṭhullāpattipahonakaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a0:1851_2: Avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti tā pana pacanakoṭṭanādīni karontiyo disvā natthi imāsaṃ anāpatti nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1851_3: imā bhikkhuniyo anācārā dubbacā pagabbhāti aguṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a0:1851_4: Adhikaraṇampi karotīti imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imā bhikkhuniyo diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya akkhīni dayhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1851_5: imasmiṃ vihāre pupphapūjā vā āsanadhovanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇādīni vā imāsaṃ vasena vattanti.
atk-s0201a0:1851_9: vinayadharānaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā vinicchayaṃ me dethāti adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
atk-s0201a0:1852_0: Moḷiyaphaggunassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti natthi imassa bhikkhuno anāpatti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1852_1: Niccakālaṃ imassa pariveṇadvāraṃ asuññaṃ bhikkhunīhīti aguṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a0:1852_2: Adhikaraṇampi karontīti imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ moḷiyaphaggunattherassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya akkhīni dayhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1852_3: Imasmiṃ vihāre aññesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ oloketumpi na sakkā.
atk-s0201a0:1852_4: Vihāraṃ āgatabhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ vā paṭisanthāraṃ vā uddesapadaṃ vā therameva nissāya labhanti,
atk-s0201a0:1852_7: etha vinayadharānaṃ santike vinicchayaṃ dethāti adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1853_0: So bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena,
atk-s0201a0:1853_3: “imassa bhikkhussa evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato ayaso uppajjissati.
atk-s0201a0:1853_5: Aññena pana kathito ayaṃ na oramissati,
atk-s0201a0:1853_6: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desetvā ovadito oramissatī”ti tassa atthakāmatāya bhagavantaṃ etaṃ, “āyasmā,
atk-s0201a0:1855_2: Tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ kulaputto ceva saddhāpabbajito ca,
atk-s0201a0:1855_3: yasmā vā te etāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato ye tā akkosissanti vā,
atk-s0201a0:1856_4: bhagavatā pana saddhiṃ paṭāṇī viya paṭiviruddho aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1856_5: athassa bhagavato yathā nāma jighacchitassa bhojane,
atk-s0201a0:1856_7: sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhe dukkhitassa sukhe patthanā uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1856_8: Evameva imaṃ dubbacaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ subbacā bhikkhū āpāthaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1856_9: Atha tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo hutvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1857_3: Sūriyuggamanato hi yāva majjhanhikā sattakkhattuṃ bhuttabhojanampi idha ekāsanabhojananteva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1857_11: Bhaddālisutte pana rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ pajahāpitakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:1857_12: Imāni hi dve bhojanāni bhagavā na ekappahārena pajahāpesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1857_13: Imāneva hi dve bhojanāni vaṭṭe sattānaṃ āciṇṇāni.
atk-s0201a0:1857_15: te ekato dvepi bhojanāni pajahantā kilamanti.
atk-s0201a0:1857_16: Tasmā ekato apajahāpetvā ekasmiṃ kāle divā vikālabhojanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1857_18: Tesu idha divā vikālabhojanaṃ pajahāpitakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:1857_19: Tattha yasmā buddhā na bhayaṃ dassetvā tajjetvā pajahāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:1857_22: Tasmā ānisaṃsaṃ dassento ime pañca guṇe dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:1857_23: Anusāsanī karaṇīyāti punappunaṃ sāsane kattabbaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0201a0:1858_0: Idāni nesaṃ subbacabhāvadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āharanto seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1858_2: “Subhūmyaṃ sukhette vihatakhāṇuke bījāni patiṭṭhapeyyā”ti ettha pana maṇḍabhūmi subhūmīti āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:1858_5: Odhastapatodoti yathā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhitena sakkā hoti gaṇhituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1859_0: Evameva khoti yathā hi so yoggācariyo yena yena maggena gamanaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1859_4: Rathaṃ pesetvā assā neva vāretabbā na vijjhitabbā honti.
atk-s0201a0:1859_5: Kevalaṃ tesaṃ same bhūmibhāge khuresu nimittaṃ ṭhapetvā gamanameva passitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1859_6: Evaṃ mayhampi tesu bhikkhūsu punappunaṃ vattabbaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0201a0:1859_7: Idaṃ karotha idaṃ mā karothāti satuppādanamattameva kattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1859_10: Tasmāti yasmā subbacā yuttayānapaṭibhāgā hutvā satuppādanamatteneva pajahiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:1859_14: Visodheyyāti elaṇḍe ceva aññā ca valliyo chinditvā bahi nīharaṇena sodheyya.
atk-s0201a0:1859_16: Sammā parihareyyāti mariyādaṃ bandhitvā udakāsiñcanenapi kālenakālaṃ mūlamūle khaṇanenapi valligumbādicchedanenapi
atk-s0201a0:1860_16: taṃ taṃ bhindati vā chiddaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0201a0:1861_0: Divā uṭṭhāsīti pātova kattabbāni dhenuduhanādikammāni akatvā ussūre uṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a0:1861_2: Kiṃ je divā uṭṭhāsīti kiṃ te kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1861_4: No vata re kiñcīti are yadi te na kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1861_7: atha kasmā pāpi dāsi divā uṭṭhāsīti kupitā anattamanā bhākuṭimakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1861_9: Anattamanavācanti are pāpi dāsi attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi;
atk-s0201a0:1861_11: idāni taṃ sikkhāpessāmītiādīni vadamānā kupitavacanaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a0:1862_9: sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahā nu khoti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1863_0: Atha bhikkhu soratoti veditabboti atha adhivāsanakkhantiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu soratoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1863_2: parikkhārahetūti yo etāni cīvarādīni paṇītapaṇītāni labhanto pādaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammādīni ekavacaneneva karoti.
atk-s0201a0:1863_5: Dhammaññeva sakkarontoti dhammaṃyeva sakkāraṃ sukatakāraṃ karonto.
atk-s0201a0:1863_9: Apacāyamānoti dhammaṃyeva apacāyamāno apacitiṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassento.
atk-s0201a0:1864_1: Evaṃ akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassetvā idāni ye adhivāsenti,
atk-s0201a0:1864_2: te evaṃ adhivāsentīti pañca vacanapathe dassento pañcime,
atk-s0201a0:1864_14: Tadārammaṇañcāti kathaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karoti?
atk-s0201a0:1864_15: Pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgataṃ puggalaṃ mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā puna tasseva mettacittassa avasesasatte
atk-s0201a0:1864_16: ārammaṇaṃ karonto sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1864_26: Pharitvā viharissāmāti evarūpena mettāsahagatena cetasā tañca puggalaṃ sabbañca lokaṃ tassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā adhimuccitvā viharissāma.
atk-s0201a0:1865_4: Vikireyyāti pacchiyā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā bījāni viya vikireyya.
atk-s0201a0:1865_6: Apathaviṃ kareyyāti evaṃ kāyena ca vācāya ca payogaṃ katvāpi sakkuṇeyya apathaviṃ kātunti?
atk-s0201a0:1865_7: Gambhīrāti bahalattena dviyojanasatasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni gambhīrā.
atk-s0201a0:1865_11: Kudālapiṭakaṃ gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a0:1865_12: Yathā so kudālapiṭakena mahāpathaviṃ apathaviṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1865_13: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1866_4: dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ seyyānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ selānaṃ vā antaraṃ paricchinnākāsarūpanti āgataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1866_13: Tulikapañcamā cattāro raṅgajātā viya pañca vacanapathā,
atk-s0201a0:1866_14: tulikapañcame raṅge gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a0:1866_15: Yathā so tulikapañcamehi raṅgehi ākāse rūpapātubhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1866_16: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosuppattiṃ dassetuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1867_2: Gambhīrā appameyyāti imissā gaṅgāya gambhīraṭṭhānaṃ gāvutampi atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1867_8: Etena payogena parivattetvā uddhane udakaṃ viya tāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato.
atk-s0201a0:1867_9: Ṭhitodakaṃ pana kenaci upāyena aṅgulamattaṃ vā aḍḍhaṅgulamattaṃ vā evaṃ tāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:1867_13: tiṇukkaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a0:1867_14: Yathā so ādittāya tiṇukkāya gaṅgaṃ tāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1867_15: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1868_3: Suparimadditāti anto ca bahi ca samantato suparimadditā.
atk-s0201a0:1868_8: kaṭṭhakaṭhalaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo.
atk-s0201a0:1868_9: Yathā so kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā biḷārabhastaṃ sarasaraṃ bharabharaṃ saddaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1868_10: evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosānugatabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:1869_3: Yo mano padūseyyāti yo bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mano padūseyya,
atk-s0201a0:1869_5: Na me so tena sāsanakaroti so tena anadhivāsanena mayhaṃ ovādakaro na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1870_1: Aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vāti appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a0:1870_2: Yaṃ tumhe nādhivāseyyāthāti yo tumhehi adhivāsetabbo na bhaveyyāti attho. No hetaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1870_3: anadhivāsetabbaṃ nāma vacanapathaṃ na passāmāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:1870_4: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti iti bhagavā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a0:1874_15: te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti, tāvadeva,
atk-s0201a0:1874_17: Sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā āṇāvītikkamantarāyikā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1875_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1875_1: vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:1875_3: ime āgārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti.
atk-s0201a0:1875_10: Evaṃ rasena rasaṃ saṃsandetvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ upanento viya,
atk-s0201a0:1875_13: “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1875_14: natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge
atk-s0201a0:1875_15: khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto methunadhamme doso natthīti jinassa āṇācakke pahāraṃ adāsi. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:1876_0: Evaṃ byā khoti evaṃ viya kho.
atk-s0201a0:1876_4: Kena kāraṇena evaṃ vadasīti kāraṇaṃ pucchantā samanubhāsanti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1876_17: Abhinivissa voharatīti adhiṭṭhahitvā voharati dīpeti vā.
atk-s0201a0:1877_1: Yato kho te bhikkhūti yadā te bhikkhū.
atk-s0201a0:1877_3: bhagavatāti idaṃ esa attano ajjhāsayena natthīti vattukāmopi bhagavato ānubhāvena sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0201a0:1877_4: buddhānaṃ kira sammukhā dve kathā kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1878_1: Kassa kho nāma tvaṃ moghapurisāti tvaṃ moghapurisa kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessassa vā suddassa
atk-s0201a0:1878_2: vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā devassa vā manussassa vā mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1878_3: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a0:1878_6: na kho pana moghapurisāti vuttamattakena maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1878_11: Thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto cha abhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1878_12: Ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1878_13: Athassa bhagavā bandhanā pavuttassa paṇḍupalāsassa viya aviruḷhibhāvaṃ dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:1879_3: ayaṃ ariṭṭho evaṃladdhiko sabbaññutaññāṇena paṭivirujjhitvā vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā tathāgatassa āṇācakke
atk-s0201a0:1879_4: pahāraṃ dadamāno api nu imasmiṃ dhammavinaye usmīkatopi?
atk-s0201a0:1879_5: Yathā nibbutepi mahante aggikkhandhe khajjupanakamattāpi aggipapaṭikā hotiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1879_7: Kiṃ nu kho evaṃ imassa appamattikāpi ñāṇusmā atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1879_8: yaṃ nissāya vāyamanto maggaphalāni nibbatteyyāti? No hetaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1879_10: Maggaphalānaṃ paccayasamatthāya ñāṇusmāya usmīkatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipantā vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1879_13: Appaṭibhānoti kiñci paṭibhānaṃ apassanto bhinnapaṭibhāno evarūpampi nāma niyyānikasāsanaṃ labhitvā aviruḷhidhammo
atk-s0201a0:1879_14: kiramhi samugghātitapaccayo jātoti attano abhabbataṃ paccavekkhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ khaṇamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:1880_3: na kho pana buddhā saupanissayānaṃyeva dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a0:1880_5: ahaṃ satthu santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā attano sampattūpagaṃ kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1880_10: mama santikā tuyhaṃ sugatovādo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1881_1: Atha kho bhagavāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a0:1881_4: Sace hi parisagatānaṃ kassaci evaṃ bhaveyya –
atk-s0201a0:1881_5: “ayaṃ ariṭṭho bhagavatā akathitaṃ kathetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0201a0:1881_6: kacci nu kho parisamajjhe bhagavatā kathāya samāraddhāya sahasā kathita”nti.
atk-s0201a0:1881_7: Evaṃ kathitaṃ pana na ariṭṭhova suṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:1881_10: mampi evaṃ niggaṇheyyāti sutvāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1881_15: Parisāya pana laddhisodhaneneva ariṭṭho gaṇato nissārito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1882_0: Idāni ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsento so vata,
atk-s0201a0:1882_5: so vata kilesakāmehi ceva kilesakāmasampayuttehi saññāvitakkehi ca aññatra,
atk-s0201a0:1883_1: Evaṃ bhagavā ayaṃ ariṭṭho yathā nāma rajako sugandhānipi duggandhānipi jiṇṇānipi navānipi suddhānipi asuddhānipi vatthāni ekato bhaṇḍikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:1883_2: evameva bhikkhūnaṃ nicchandarāgapaṇītacīvarādiparibhogañca anibaddhasīlānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ antarāyakaraṃ
atk-s0201a0:1883_3: sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nibaddhasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āvaraṇakaraṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogañca sabbaṃ ekasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1883_4: karotīti ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsetvā idāni duggahitāya pariyattiyā dosaṃ dassento idha,
atk-s0201a0:1883_10: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1883_15: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1883_20: suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1883_26: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:1884_0: Atthaṃ na upaparikkhantīti atthatthaṃ kāraṇatthaṃ na passanti na pariggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1884_2: Na nijjhānaṃ khamantīti na upaṭṭhahanti na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:1884_3: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ samādhi vipassanā maggo phalaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1884_4: Te upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti te paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā hutvā pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1884_6: parehi sakavāde dose āropite taṃ dosaṃ evaṃ mocessāmāti imināva kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1884_7: Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti yassa ca maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāya kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-s0201a0:1884_8: tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ ete duggahitaggāhino nānubhonti.
atk-s0201a0:1884_9: Apica parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādaṃ mocetuṃ asakkontāpi tañca atthaṃ nānubhontiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1885_3: taṃ tassa alaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ atthīti alagaddo.
atk-s0201a0:1885_7: ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti nittharaṇapariyattivasena uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:1885_8: Tisso hi pariyattiyo alagaddapariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-s0201a0:1886_0: Tattha yo buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā evaṃ cīvarādīni vā labhissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1886_1: catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantīti lābhasakkārahetu pariyāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:1886_3: Evaṃ pariyāpuṇato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varataraṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1887_0: Yo pana buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhigabbhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1887_1: gaṇhāpetvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne maggaṃ bhāvessāmi
atk-s0201a0:1887_3: tassa sā pariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1888_1: Tassa hi apariññātaṃ appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ asacchikataṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:1888_2: So hi pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo sacchikataphalo,
atk-s0201a0:1888_3: tasmā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanto tantidhārako paveṇipālako vaṃsānurakkhakova hutvā uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1888_4: Itissa sā pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1889_0: Yo pana puthujjano chātabhayādīsu ganthadharesu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ bhikkhācārena
atk-s0201a0:1889_8: Puthujjanassa hi pariyatti nāma alagaddā vā hoti nittharaṇā vā,
atk-s0201a0:1890_0: Nijjhānaṃ khamantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhānesu idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1890_7: Tañcassa atthaṃ anubhontīti yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atthāya pariyāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:1890_8: Suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikarontā tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0201a0:1890_9: Paravāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ sakkontāpi sakavāde āropitaṃ dosaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā mocetuṃ sakkontāpi anubhontiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:1890_10: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi,
atk-s0201a0:1890_13: arahattaṃ patvā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi
atk-s0201a0:1891_0: Evaṃ suggahite buddhavacane ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni tattheva niyojento tasmā tiha,
atk-s0201a0:1891_2: Tattha tasmāti yasmā duggahitapariyatti duggahitaalagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a0:1891_3: suggahitapariyatti suggahitaalagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a0:1891_5: Tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthāti tatheva naṃ dhāreyyātha,
atk-s0201a0:1891_7: Ye vā panāssu viyattā bhikkhūti ye vā pana aññe sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapamahākaccānādikā byattā paṇḍitā bhikkhū assu,
atk-s0201a0:1891_9: Ariṭṭhena viya pana mama sāsane na kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1892_3: Udakaṇṇavanti yañhi udakaṃ gambhīraṃ na puthulaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1892_8: Tasmā mahantaṃ udakaṇṇavanti mahantaṃ puthulaṃ gambhīraṃ udakanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1892_9: Sāsaṅkaṃ nāma yattha corānaṃ nivutthokāso dissati.
atk-s0201a0:1892_13: Sappaṭibhayaṃ nāma yattha corehi manussā hatā dissanti,
atk-s0201a0:1892_17: Kullaṃ bandhitvāti kullo nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā baddho.
atk-s0201a0:1892_18: Pattharitvā baddhā pana padaracāṭiādayo uḷumpoti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:1892_22: Dhammāpi vo pahātabbāti ettha dhammāti samathavipassanā.
atk-s0201a0:1892_25: Samathe chandarāgaṃ kattha pajahāpesi? “Iti kho, udāyi,
atk-s0201a0:1892_28: taṃ saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:1892_29: yassāhaṃ no pahānaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha samathe chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:1892_32: diṭṭhiṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ na allīyetha na kelāyetha na dhanāyethā”ti ettha vipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:1892_33: Idha pana ubhayattha pajahāpento “dhammāpi vo pahātabbā,
atk-s0201a0:1893_2: ahaṃ evarūpesu santappaṇītesu dhammesu chandarāgappahānaṃ vadāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1893_3: kiṃ pana imasmiṃ asaddhamme gāmadhamme vasaladhamme duṭṭhulle odakantike,
atk-s0201a0:1893_4: yattha ayaṃ ariṭṭho moghapuriso niddosasaññī pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgaṃ nālaṃ antarāyāyāti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:1893_5: Ariṭṭhena viya na tumhehi mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbanti evaṃ bhagavā imināpi ovādena ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:1894_1: Idāni yo pañcasu khandhesu tividhaggāhavasena ahaṃ mamanti gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1894_2: so mayhaṃ sāsane ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento chayimāni,
atk-s0201a0:1894_7: Rūpaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu etaṃ mamāti taṇhāggāho.
atk-s0201a0:1894_18: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1894_19: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1895_0: Atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1895_3: Sabbaṃ vā etaṃ manasā anuvicaritattā manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1895_6: Yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānanti yampi etaṃ so lokotiādinā nayena pavattaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1896_0: So loko so attāti yā esā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena pavattā diṭṭhi loko ca attā cāti gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1896_2: So pecca bhavissāmīti so ahaṃ paralokaṃ gantvā nicco bhavissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1896_5: Tampi etaṃ mamāti tampi dassanaṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a0:1896_9: Vipassanāya paṭivipassanākāle viya pacchimadiṭṭhiyā purimadiṭṭhiggahaṇakāle evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1897_0: Sukkapakkhe rūpaṃ netaṃ mamāti rūpe taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhā paṭikkhittā.
atk-s0201a0:1897_2: Samanupassatīti imassa pana padassa taṇhāsamanupassanā mānasamanupassanā diṭṭhisamanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanāti catasso samanupassanāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1897_5: Asati na paritassatīti avijjamāne bhayaparitassanāya taṇhāparitassanāya vā na paritassati.
atk-s0201a0:1897_6: Iminā bhagavā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassento desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:1898_1: Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhūti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte aññataro anusandhikusalo bhikkhu –
atk-s0201a0:1898_2: “bhagavatā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassantaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā,
atk-s0201a0:1898_3: ajjhattaṃ aparitassante kho pana sati ajjhattaṃ paritassakena bahiddhā parikkhāravināse paritassakena aparitassakena cāpi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1898_4: Iti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ pañho pucchitabbo”ti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0201a0:1898_6: Ahu vata meti ahosi vata me bhaddakaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1898_7: Taṃ vata me natthīti taṃ vata idāni mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1898_12: Siyā vata meti bhaveyya vata mayhaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ sāli vīhi yavo godhumo.
atk-s0201a0:1898_13: Taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmīti tamahaṃ alabhamāno tadanucchavikaṃ kammaṃ akatvā nisinnattā idāni na labhāmīti socati,
atk-s0201a0:1899_0: Aparitassanāvāre na evaṃ hotīti yehi kilesehi evaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:1899_9: Tadeva ca āgamma khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi,
atk-s0201a0:1899_15: iti sabbeheva imehi padehi nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthāya dhammaṃ desentassāti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0201a0:1899_16: Tassevaṃ hotīti tassa diṭṭhigatikassa ucchijjissāmi nāmassu,
atk-s0201a0:1899_19: Diṭṭhigatikassa hi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ katvā desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassa tāso uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1900_1: Ettāvatā bahiddhāparikkhāravināse tassanakassa ca notassanakassa ca ajjhattakkhandhavināse tassanakassa
atk-s0201a0:1900_2: ca notassanakassa cāti imesaṃ vasena catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:1900_3: Idāni bahiddhā parikkhāraṃ pariggahaṃ nāma katvā,
atk-s0201a0:1900_5: sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhinissayaṃ nāma katvā tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetuṃ taṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1901_1: Evaṃ tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattakkhandhe attāti bahiddhā parikkhāre attaniyanti katvā dvikoṭikaṃ dassento attani vā,
atk-s0201a0:1901_6: attani vā sati idaṃ me parikkhārajātaṃ attaniyanti assa,
atk-s0201a0:1901_7: attaniyeva vā parikkhāre sati ayaṃ me attā imassa parikkhārassa sāmīti,
atk-s0201a0:1902_0: Idāni ime pañcakkhandhe aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tiparivaṭṭavasena aggaṇhanto ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya
atk-s0201a0:1902_1: mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0201a0:1902_7: Uppādavayavattito vipariṇāmatāvakālikaniccapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena vāti catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. Dukkhaṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1902_11: Kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a0:1902_13: eso me attāti yuttaṃ nu kho taṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ vasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ gahetuṃ. No hetaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1902_14: bhanteti iminā te bhikkhū avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1903_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci aniccavasena anattattaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:1903_6: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1903_7: attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1903_8: tasmā taṃ na upapajjati cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:1903_9: iti cakkhu anattā”ti imasmiñhi chachakkasutte aniccavasena anattataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1903_14: labbhetha ca rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a0:1903_20: na ca labbhati rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a0:1903_21: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”’ti imasmiṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte dukkhavasena anattataṃ dasseti. “Rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1903_27: na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba”nti imasmiṃ arahattasutte ubhayavasena anattataṃ dasseti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1904_0: Paribhogabhājanādīsu hi bhinnesu aho aniccanti vadanti,
atk-s0201a0:1904_2: Sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu kaṇṭakena vā viddhā aho dukkhanti vadanti,
atk-s0201a0:1904_3: aho anattāti pana vattā nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1904_4: Idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1904_5: Tena taṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena vā ubhayavasena vā dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:1905_3: yasmā etarahi aññadāpi rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
atk-s0201a0:1907_6: pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1907_9: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1907_12: nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā,
atk-s0201a0:1907_13: taṃ abhinivajjetvā yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā,
atk-s0201a0:1907_14: taṃ nissāya taṃ āgamma evametissā pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1907_15: evametissā samatikkamo hotī”ti evaṃ tammayatāpariyādānanti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1907_19: ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1907_21: anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:1907_22: Imasmiṃ pana alagaddasutte nibbindatīti nibbidānāmena āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:1908_0: Nibbidā virajjatīti ettha virāgoti maggo virāgā vimuccatīti ettha virāgena maggena vimuccatīti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1908_1: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti idha paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:1909_0: Evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa yathābhūtehi pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ gaṇhanto ayaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1909_6: samūlaṃ vā tālaṃ uddharitvā tālassa vatthu viya katā,
atk-s0201a0:1909_7: yathā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ puna so tālo na paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:1909_10: Jātisaṃsārotiādīsu jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca evaṃ laddhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a0:1909_11: So hi punappunaṃ uppattikaraṇavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā parikkhāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1909_12: tenesa tassā saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā saṃkiṇṇaparikkhoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_15: Tenesa tassā abbūḷhattā luñcitvā chaḍḍitattā abbūḷhesikoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_17: Etāni hi kavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā aggaḷāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:1909_18: Tenesa tesaṃ nirākatattā bhinnattā niraggaḷoti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_22: Apica idha mānabhārasseva oropitattā pannabhāroti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_23: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_24: Idha pana mānasaṃyogeneva visaṃyuttattā visaṃyuttoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:1909_25: Asmimānoti rūpe asmīti māno, vedanāya… saññāya…
atk-s0201a0:1910_0: Ettāvatā bhagavatā maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharato khīṇāsavassa kālo dassito.
atk-s0201a0:1910_1: Yathā hi dve nagarāni ekaṃ coranagaraṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1910_6: coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0201a0:1910_7: ussāpite esikatthambhe khaggena chinditvā sadvārabāhakaṃ kavāṭaṃ chinditvā palighaṃ ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ
atk-s0201a0:1910_8: bhindanto parikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā nagarasobhanatthāya ussite dhaje pātetvā nagaraṃ agginā jhāpetvā khemanagaraṃ
atk-s0201a0:1910_9: pavisitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha ñātigaṇaparivuto surasabhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya,
atk-s0201a0:1910_16: So mahāyodho viya sannāhaṃ sīlasannāhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0201a0:1910_17: paññākhaggaṃ gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ luñcitvā,
atk-s0201a0:1910_18: so yodho sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanaggaḷaṃ ugghāṭetvā,
atk-s0201a0:1910_21: so yodho pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ viya kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ bhindanto jātisaṃsāraparikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā,
atk-s0201a0:1910_22: so yodho nagarasobhanatthāya ussāpite dhaje viya mānaddhaje pātetvā sakkāyanagaraṃ jhāpetvā,
atk-s0201a0:1910_23: so yodho khemanagare uparipāsāde surasabhojanaṃ viya kilesanibbānaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā amatanirodhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1911_1: Idāni evaṃ vimuttacittassa khīṇāsavassa parehi anadhigamanīyaviññāṇataṃ dassento evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ khotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:1911_7: Tathāgatoti hi satte gahite asaṃvijjamānoti attho vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:1912_2: ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva khīṇāsavaṃ tathāgato satto puggaloti na paññapemi.
atk-s0201a0:1912_3: Appaṭisandhikaṃ pana parinibbutaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ sattoti vā puggaloti vā kiṃ paññapessāmi?
atk-s0201a0:1912_5: Na hi paramatthato satto nāma koci atthi,
atk-s0201a0:1912_6: tassa avijjamānassa idaṃ nissitaṃ viññāṇanti anvesantāpi kiṃ adhigacchissanti?
atk-s0201a0:1912_10: ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva khīṇāsavaṃ viññāṇavasena indādīhi avindiyaṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0201a0:1912_11: Na hi saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā anvesantāpi khīṇāsavassa vipassanācittaṃ vā maggacittaṃ vā phalacittaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:1912_12: idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya vattatīti jānituṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:1913_13: Yathā cāhaṃ na vadāmīti yena vā kāraṇena ahaṃ sattavināsaṃ na paññapemi.
atk-s0201a0:1913_17: tathā maṃ te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā “venayiko samaṇo gotamo”ti vadantā sattavināsako samaṇo gotamoti ca,
atk-s0201a0:1913_18: “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapetī”ti vadantā sattavināsaṃ paññapetīti ca asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantīti.
atk-s0201a0:1914_3: dukkhassa ca nirodhanti dhammacakkaṃ appavattetvā bodhimaṇḍe viharantopi dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a0:1914_5: Ettha hi dukkhaggahaṇena tassa mūlabhūto samudayo,
atk-s0201a0:1914_6: nirodhaggahaṇena taṃsampāpako maggo gahitova hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1914_11: Rosenti vihesentīti rosessāma vihesessāmāti adhippāyena ghaṭṭenti dukkhāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:1915_6: Yaṃ kho idaṃ pubbe pariññātanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ pubbe bodhimaṇḍe tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1915_9: Tatrāpi tathāgatassa ime sakkārā mayi karīyantīti vā ahaṃ ete anubhavāmīti vā na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1915_10: Pubbe pariññātakkhandhapañcakaṃyeva ete sakkāre anubhotīti ettakameva hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:1915_11: Tasmāti yasmā saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā tathāgatampi akkosanti, tasmā.
atk-s0201a0:1916_3: yaṃ na tumhākanti yasmā attaniyepi chandarāgappahānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0201a0:1916_6: Yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyyāti yathā yathā iccheyya tathā tathā kareyya.
atk-s0201a0:1916_9: etaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ amhākaṃ neva attā na amhākaṃ rūpaṃ na viññāṇanti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1916_10: Attaniyaṃ vāti amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi na hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1916_13: yaṃ na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahathāti bhagavā,
atk-s0201a0:1917_1: Evaṃ svākkhātoti ettha tiparivaṭṭato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:1917_2: paṭilomena pemamattakena saggaparāyaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:1917_5: Chinnapilotikoti pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha tattha sibbitaṃ gaṇṭhikataṃ jiṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1917_7: aṭṭhahatthaṃ vā navahatthaṃ vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho,
atk-s0201a0:1917_12: Imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ nāma patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a0:1923_0: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1923_1: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāyāti tesaṃ vaṭṭaṃ apaññattibhāvaṃ gataṃ nippaññattikaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1923_2: Evarūpo mahākhīṇāsavo evaṃ svākkhāte sāsaneyeva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1924_0: Tattha dhammānusārino saddhānusārinoti ime dve sotāpattimaggaṭṭhā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:1924_2: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1924_8: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1924_13: Yesaṃ mayi saddhāmattaṃ pemamattanti iminā yesaṃ añño ariyadhammo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1924_16: Vipassakabhikkhūnañhi evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānaṃ dasabale ekā saddhā ekaṃ pemaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:1924_17: Tāya saddhāya tena pemena hatthe gahetvā sagge ṭhapitā viya honti,
atk-s0201a0:1924_19: Porāṇakattherā pana evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ cūḷasotāpannoti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1928_6: idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte,
atk-s0201a0:1928_7: katarassa kassapassāti kumārakassapassāti evaṃ gahitanāmattā tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi “kumārakassapo” tveva vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1929_0: Thero kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1929_1: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrakathiṃ ekaṃ attano sāvakaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavato sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā,
atk-s0201a0:1929_2: “ahampi bhagavā anāgate ekassa buddhassa ayaṃ thero viya citrakathī sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a0:1929_3: puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0201a0:1930_0: Tadā kira parinibbutassa bhagavato sāsane osakkante pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1930_3: Itare tayo visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1930_4: Tesaṃ ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhontānaṃ eko takkasilāyaṃ rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0201a0:1930_5: pukkusāti nāma rājā hutvā bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitvā rājagahaṃ gacchanto kumbhakārasālāyaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0201a0:1930_7: Eko ekasmiṃ samuddapaṭṭane kulaghare nibbattitvā nāvaṃ āruyha bhinnanāvo dārucīrāni nivāsetvā lābhasampattiṃ patto,
atk-s0201a0:1930_10: gaccha satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchā”ti atthakāmāya devatāya codito tathā katvā arahattaphalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:1931_0: Eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno.
atk-s0201a0:1931_1: Sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatā gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1931_3: Tassā gabbhininimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:1931_7: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento, –
atk-s0201a0:1931_12: taṃ gahetvā rājā pasenadi kosalo posāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:1931_13: “Kassapo”ti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0201a0:1932_1: Taṃ kira vanaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ kāle avijahitanāmaṃ andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1932_10: te me dhātuyo ādāya tattha tattha pūjentā saggaparāyaṇā bhavissantī”ti parinibbānakāle,
atk-s0201a0:1932_12: Dīghāyukabuddhānaṃ pana suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanaṃ dhātusarīraṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:1933_3: kiṃ karissāmā”ti sammantayitvā ekagghanameva cetiyaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a0:1933_13: ekayojanaṃ hotūti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā iṭṭhakā kīdisā hontūti bāhirante iṭṭhakā rattasuvaṇṇamayā ekagghanā satasahassagghanikā hontu,
atk-s0201a0:1933_16: telena udakakiccanti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā cattāri mukhāni catudhā vibhajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1934_0: Tattha dhanasampannatāya rājāpi suvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpetvā attanā gahitamukhe kammaṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0201a0:1934_4: Tato yasorato nāma eko upāsako tepiṭako bhāṇako anāgāmī ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a0:1934_5: so kammaṃ olīyatīti ñatvā pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā janapadaṃ gantvā “kassapasammāsambuddho vīsativassasahassāni ṭhatvā parinibbuto.
atk-s0201a0:1934_7: yo yaṃ dātuṃ ussahati suvaṇṇaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā sattaratanaṃ vā haritālaṃ vā manosilaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:1934_9: Manussā attano attano thāmena hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1935_0: Cetiye kammaṃ niṭṭhitanti cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ pahiṇiṃsu –
atk-s0201a0:1935_7: Ācariyassa paṇṇato pana cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ paṭhamataraṃ ācariyassa hatthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1935_8: So paṇṇaṃ vācetvā cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti ekakova nikkhami.
atk-s0201a0:1935_10: Tatrekacce taṃ disvā iminā sakalajambudīpato hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1935_11: nidhikumbhī no pavaṭṭamānā āgatāti avasesānaṃ ārocetvā taṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1935_22: mayhaṃ pana nivatthasāṭakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vittaṃ kākaṇikampi natthīti.
atk-s0201a0:1936_3: amhesu kañcideva nagaravīthiyaṃ disvā rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ ārocetvā anayavyasanaṃ pāpuṇāpeyyā”ti āhaṃsu. Upāsako, “tātā,
atk-s0201a0:1936_7: Atha tesu gahetabbo vissajjetabboti vivadantesu gahetabboti laddhikā eva bahutarā hutvā jīvitā voropayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1937_0: Tesaṃ balavaguṇe ariyasāvake aparādhena nibbutadīpasikhā viya akkhīni antaradhāyiṃsu. Te,
atk-s0201a0:1937_2: kahaṃ bho cakkhū”ti vippalapantā ekacce ñātakehi gehaṃ nītā.
atk-s0201a0:1937_3: Ekacce noñātakā anāthāti tattheva aṭaviyaṃ rukkhamūle paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:1937_4: Aṭaviṃ āgatamanussā kāruññena tesaṃ taṇḍulaṃ vā puṭabhattaṃ vā paribbayaṃ vā denti.
atk-s0201a0:1937_5: Dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya gantvā āgatā manussā kuhiṃ gatatthāti vutte andhavanaṃ gatamhāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:1937_6: Evaṃ dvinnampi buddhānaṃ kāle taṃ vanaṃ andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1937_8: Amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyā avidūre jetavanassa piṭṭhibhāge pavivekakāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ padhānagharaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:1937_9: tattha āyasmā kumārakassapo tena samayena sekhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharati.
atk-s0201a0:1938_0: Aññatarā devatāti nāmagottavasena apākaṭā ekā devatāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1938_2: bhagavā ahuñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti ettha pana abhiññāto sakkopi devarājā aññataroti vutto.
atk-s0201a0:1938_3: Devatāti ca idaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1938_5: Abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu dissati. Tattha –
atk-s0201a0:1938_9: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0201a0:1938_10: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a0:1939_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:1941_4: Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti parikkhīṇāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1941_11: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1941_23: Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ pajahitvā oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1941_24: atirekaiddhiṃ māpetvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:1942_5: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti evamādīsu yebhuyyatā.
atk-s0201a0:1942_8: “Āyasmato anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0201a0:1943_0: Kappasaddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahana- vohāra- kāla- paññatti- chedana- vikappa- lesa-
atk-s0201a0:1943_5: yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
atk-s0201a0:1943_8: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
atk-s0201a0:1943_16: Tasmā kevalakappaṃ andhavananti ettha anavasesaṃ samantato andhavananti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1944_1: candimā viya ca sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:1944_9: Ahaṃ pana asmi tato kālato paṭṭhāya brahmacārī”ti samaṇasaññāvassa samudācarati,
atk-s0201a0:1944_14: Yo hi pubbayoge āgatesu pañcasu sahāyesu anuthero catutthadivase anāgāmī ahosīti vutto, ayaṃ so.
atk-s0201a0:1944_15: Tadā kira tesu saṅghattherassa arahatteneva saddhiṃ abhiññā āgamiṃsu. So,
atk-s0201a0:1944_16: “mayhaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya āgantvā, “imaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:1944_17: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā appamattā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1944_22: Tumhe attano upanissayena kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpayittha.
atk-s0201a0:1945_2: Sopi tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā tehi paṭikkhitto yathāphāsukaṃ gantvā āyupariyosāne suddhāvāse nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:1945_3: So suddhāvāse ṭhatvā te sahāye olokento,
atk-s0201a0:1945_5: eko adhunā bhagavato santike ariyabhūmiṃ patto,
atk-s0201a0:1945_7: “ahaṃ arahā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā suppārakapaṭṭane vasatīti disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a0:1945_10: gaccha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0201a0:1945_12: “tasmā tiha te bāhiya evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ hotū”ti bhagavatā saṃkhittena ovadito ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a0:1946_1: so kuhinti olokento andhavane sekkhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharatīti disvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a0:1946_3: gacchantena pana tucchahatthena agantvā kiñci paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:1946_4: sahāyo kho pana me nirāmiso pabbatamatthake vasanto mayā ākāse ṭhatvā dinnaṃ piṇḍapātampi aparibhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0201a0:1946_6: Dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti brahmaloke ṭhitova ratanāvaḷiṃ ganthento viya pannarasa pañhe vibhajitvā
atk-s0201a0:1946_7: taṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā sahāyassa avidūre ṭhatvā attano samaṇasaññāsamudācāravasena taṃ anabhivādetvāva,
atk-s0201a0:1946_9: Tattha turitālapanavasena bhikkhu bhikkhūti āmeḍitaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1946_10: Yathā vā ekaneva tilakena nalāṭaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0201a0:1946_11: taṃ parivāretvā aññesupi dinnesu phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhati,
atk-s0201a0:1946_12: evaṃ ekeneva padena vacanaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0201a0:1946_13: parivārikapadena saddhiṃ phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhatīti taṃ parivārikapadavasena vacanaṃ phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya karontopi evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:1947_0: Ayaṃ vammikoti purato ṭhito vammiko nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:1947_1: desanāvasena pana purato ṭhitaṃ dassento viya ayanti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1947_2: Laṅginti satthaṃ ādāya khaṇanto palighaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:1947_3: Ukkhipa laṅgiṃ abhikkhaṇa sumedhāti tāta, paṇḍita,
atk-s0201a0:1947_4: laṅgī nāma rattiṃ dhūmāyati divā pajjalati.
atk-s0201a0:1947_12: Nāganti sumanapupphakalāpasadisaṃ mahāphaṇaṃ tividhasovatthikaparikkhittaṃ ahināgaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:1947_13: Mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesīti daṇḍakakoṭiyā vā vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇaṃ vā pana khipamāno mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭayi.
atk-s0201a0:1947_14: Namo karohi nāgassāti uparivātato apagamma suddhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā nāgassa namakkāraṃ karohi.
atk-s0201a0:1947_15: Nāgena adhisayitaṃ dhanaṃ nāma yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā khādato na khīyati,
