atk-s0201a0:1947_18: Ito vā pana sutvāti yathā dukkhakkhandhe itoti sāsane nissakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1947_21: tasmā ito vā panāti mama vā pana santikā sutvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1948_4: vamatīti vantakoti vantussayoti vantasinehasambandhoti catūhi kāraṇehi vammikoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:1948_5: So hi ahimaṅgusaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_7: Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_8: Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakiriyati,
atk-s0201a0:1948_9: nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sineho nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:1948_12: “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā nayena nānappakārakaṃ asucikalimalaṃ vamatīti vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_13: Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ attabhāve nikantipariyādānena attabhāvaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatāti ariyehi vantakotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_14: Yehi cāyaṃ tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussito nhārusambaddho maṃsāvalepano allacammapariyonaddho chavirañjito satte vañceti,
atk-s0201a0:1948_15: taṃ sabbaṃ ariyehi vantamevāti vantussayotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_17: cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti evaṃ taṇhāya janitattā ariyehi vanteneva taṇhāsinehena sambaddho ayanti vantasinehena sambaddhotipi vammiko.
atk-s0201a0:1948_18: Yathā ca vammikassa anto nānappakārā pāṇakā tattheva jāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:1948_22: Iti so tesaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1948_23: Evaṃ khattiyamahāsālādīnampi kāyo ayaṃ gopitarakkhito maṇḍitappasādhito mahānubhāvānaṃ kāyoti acintetvā
atk-s0201a0:1948_24: chavinissitā pāṇā cammanissitā pāṇā maṃsanissitā pāṇā nhārunissitā pāṇā aṭṭhinissitā pāṇā aṭṭhimiñjanissitā
atk-s0201a0:1948_25: pāṇāti evaṃ kulagaṇanāya asītimattāni kimikulasahassāni antokāyasmiṃyeva jāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:1948_29: iti ayampi tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hotīti “vammiko” tveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:1949_0: Mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena sambhūtassa.
atk-s0201a0:1949_1: Odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa.
atk-s0201a0:1949_2: Aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassāti ettha ayaṃ kāyo hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccadhammo.
atk-s0201a0:1949_5: Daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammo.
atk-s0201a0:1949_6: Evaṃ pariharatopi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca,
atk-s0201a0:1949_10: Evaṃ sattahipi padehi cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa uccāvacabhāvo vaḍḍhiparihāni samudayatthaṅgamo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1950_1: Dhūmāyanāti ettha ayaṃ dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāya pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
atk-s0201a0:1950_2: “Kodho dhūmo bhasmanimosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
atk-s0201a0:1950_4: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
atk-s0201a0:1953_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsitā;
atk-s0201a0:1956_0: Tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacananti tathāgato hi sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:1956_4: Rāgo bāhito hoti, doso… moho… māno…
atk-s0201a0:1956_8: Imesaṃ bhikkhu sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1957_0: Paññāya adhivacananti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1958_0: Eko kira jānapado brāhmaṇo pātova māṇavakehi saddhiṃ gāmato nikkhamma divasaṃ araññe mante vācetvā sāyaṃ gāmaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1958_8: bhinditvā naṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1958_9: So sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya tathā akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1958_16: bhinditvā naṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti brāhmaṇena vuttakālo viya,
atk-s0201a0:1958_17: “bhikkhu cātumahābhūtikaṃ kāyaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā pariggaṇhāhī”ti bhagavatā vuttakālo.
atk-s0201a0:1958_18: Tassa sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā tathākaraṇaṃ viya sekkhassa bhikkhuno,
atk-s0201a0:1958_26: ayaṃ vāyodhātū”ti evaṃ catudhātuvavatthānavasena kāyapariggaho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1959_1: bhikkhūti kasmā bhagavā avijjaṃ laṅgīti katvā dassesīti?
atk-s0201a0:1959_2: Yathā hi nagarassa dvāraṃ pidhāya palighe yojite mahājanassa gamanaṃ pacchijjati,
atk-s0201a0:1959_9: Pajaha avijjanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena avijjāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1960_1: bhikkhūti ettha uddhumāyikamaṇḍūko nāma no mahanto,
atk-s0201a0:1960_3: purāṇapaṇṇantare vā gacchantare vā valliantare vā vasati.
atk-s0201a0:1960_4: So daṇḍakoṭiyā vā vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇakena vā ghaṭṭito āyamitvā mahanto parimaṇḍalo beluvapakkappamāṇo
atk-s0201a0:1960_5: hutvā cattāro pāde ākāsagate katvā pacchinnagamano hutvā amittavasaṃ yāti,
atk-s0201a0:1960_7: Evameva ayaṃ kodho paṭhamaṃ uppajjanto cittāvilamattakova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1960_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe aniggahito vaḍḍhitvā mukhavikulanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:1960_17: “yato ayaṃ kodho paraṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghāteti,
atk-s0201a0:1960_19: Tattha yathā uddhumāyikāya catūsu pādesu ākāsagatesu gamanaṃ pacchijjati,
atk-s0201a0:1960_21: evameva kodhasamaṅgīpuggalo kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1961_1: yathā puriso sadhano sabhogo kantāraddhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a0:1961_3: iminā gantabba”nti nicchetuṃ asakkonto tattheva tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:1961_4: atha naṃ corā uṭṭhahitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:1961_5: evameva kho mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhu buddhādīsu kaṅkhāya uppannāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:1961_6: atha naṃ kilesamārādayo sabbe mārā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:1961_11: Pajaha vicikicchanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena vicikicchāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1962_1: yathā rajakehi khāraparissāvanamhi udake pakkhitte eko udakaghaṭo dvepi dasapi vīsatipi ghaṭasatampi paggharatiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1962_3: evameva nīvaraṇasamaṅgino puggalassa abbhantare kusaladhammo na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:1962_7: Pajaha pañcanīvaraṇeti ettha vikkhambhanatadaṅgavasena nīvaraṇappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1963_1: yathā kacchapassa cattāro pādā sīsanti pañceva aṅgāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:1963_2: evameva sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammā gayhamānā pañceva khandhā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a0:1963_6: Pajaha pañcupādānakkhandheti ettha pañcasu khandhesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1964_1: yathā sūnāya upari maṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā asinā koṭṭenti,
atk-s0201a0:1964_2: evamime sattā vatthukāmatthāya kilesakāmehi ghātayamānā vatthukāmānaṃ upari katvā kilesakāmehi kantitā koṭṭitā ca honti.
atk-s0201a0:1964_6: Pajaha pañca kāmaguṇeti ettha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1965_1: bhikkhūti ettha ayaṃ maṃsapesi nāma bahujanapatthitā khattiyādayo manussāpi naṃ patthenti kākādayo tiracchānāpi.
atk-s0201a0:1965_2: Ime hi sattā avijjāya sammattā nandirāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
atk-s0201a0:1965_10: Pajaha nandīrāganti ettha catutthamaggena nandīrāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1966_1: khīṇāsavassetaṃ bhikkhuno adhivacananti ettha yenatthena khīṇāsavo nāgoti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:1966_5: danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a0:1966_6: santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a0:1966_7: tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a0:1966_8: parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evaṃ namakkāraṃ karohīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:1966_9: Iti idaṃ suttaṃ therassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1966_10: Theropi idameva suttaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:1966_11: Ayametassa atthoti ayaṃ etassa pañhassa attho.
atk-s0201a0:1966_12: Iti bhagavā ratanarāsimhi maṇikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto viya yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a0:1970_6: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1970_9: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1970_10: taṃ kira veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena,
atk-s0201a0:1971_0: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ upagato supi.
atk-s0201a0:1971_2: “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi,
atk-s0201a0:1971_3: atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā raññābhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:1971_5: “rañño jīvitaṃ dammī”ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1971_9: “imāya mama jīvitaṃ dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a0:1971_11: Tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti kalandakanivāpanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:1972_2: Taṃ kho panetaṃ neva kosalamahārājādīnaṃ na caṅkībrāhamaṇādīnaṃ na sakkasuyāmasantusitādīnaṃ na asītimahāsāvakādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1972_5: nandanavanaṃ virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha,
atk-s0201a0:1974_23: Atha kho attanā ca dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ parañca tattha samādapetāraṃ paṭipattisampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchanto idaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:1975_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā suddhodanādīnaṃ ārogyaṃ apucchitvā evarūpaṃ bhikkhumeva pucchati? Piyatāya.
atk-s0201a0:1975_1: Buddhānañhi paṭipannakā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo ca piyā honti manāpā.
atk-s0201a0:1975_8: Dhammagarutāyeva hi bhagavā mahākassapattherassa abhinikkhamanadivase paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1975_9: Atirekatiyojanasataṃ maggaṃ gantvā gaṅgātīre dhammaṃ desetvā mahākappinaṃ saparisaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:1975_10: Ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ maggaṃ gantvā kumbhakārassa nivesane tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a0:1975_14: Anuruddhatthero pācīnavaṃsadāye nisinno mahāpurisavitakkaṃ vitakketīti ñatvā tattha ākāsena gantvā therassa purato oruyha sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1975_15: Koṭikaṇṇasoṇattherassa ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapāpetvā paccūsakāle dhammadesanaṃ ajjhesitvā sarabhaññapariyosāne sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1975_16: Tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne gosiṅgasālavane sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:1975_18: “anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito ariyasāvako aya”nti vissāsaṃ uppādetvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesanaṃ gantvā sahatthā āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0201a0:1976_0: Amhākaṃyeva bhagavā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya jetavanato bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0201a0:1976_3: Atha naṃ puṇṇā nāma dāsī domanassappattosi sāmīti āha. “Āma je,
atk-s0201a0:1976_5: atha me imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1976_6: yathādhippāyaṃ vā dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhissāmī”ti cintā uppannāti.
atk-s0201a0:1976_10: Sā gantvā dasabalassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “nivattatha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:1976_11: Puṇṇe tvaṃ parapaṭibaddhajīvikā kiṃ me karissasīti.
atk-s0201a0:1976_12: Bhagavā mayhaṃ deyyadhammo natthīti tumhepi jānātha,
atk-s0201a0:1976_13: tumhākaṃ nivattanapaccayā panāhaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahissāmīti.
atk-s0201a0:1976_14: Bhagavā sādhu sādhu puṇṇeti sādhukāraṃ katvā nivattetvā jetavanameva paviṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:1976_16: Seṭṭhi sutvā puṇṇāya kira bhagavā nivattitoti taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:1976_19: Athassā satthā āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ vissajjesi –
atk-s0201a0:1979_0: Gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātā sāvikā ahosīti. Evaṃ dhammagaruno tathāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:1980_0: Nandakatthere upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ dhammaṃ desentepi bhagavā anahātova gantvā tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakova dhammakathaṃ sutvā desanāpariyosāne sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1980_13: Paṭipannako ca nāma attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya,
atk-s0201a0:1980_15: no attahitāya ca paṭipanno no parahitāya ca,
atk-s0201a0:1980_16: attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya cāti catubbidho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:1981_0: Tattha yo sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī hoti,
atk-s0201a0:1981_1: paraṃ tattha na ovadati na anusāsati āyasmā bākulo viya.
atk-s0201a0:1981_2: Ayaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno nāma no parahitāya paṭipanno,
atk-s0201a0:1981_3: evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1982_1: paraṃ tehi ovadati tena katavattasādiyanatthaṃ upanando sakyaputto viya,
atk-s0201a0:1982_2: ayaṃ parahitāya paṭipanno nāma no attahitāya,
atk-s0201a0:1983_3: ayaṃ neva attahitāya paṭipanno na parahitāya,
atk-s0201a0:1983_5: Assa anto kilesā pharasuchejjā viya mahantāti.
atk-s0201a0:1984_0: Yo pana sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī,
atk-s0201a0:1984_2: ayaṃ attahitāya ceva parahitāya ca paṭipanno nāma sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapādayo asītimahātherā viya,
atk-s0201a0:1985_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā puṭṭhānaṃ pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavā attano jātibhūmiyaṃ ubhayahitāya paṭipannaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchati,
atk-s0201a0:1985_1: ko nu kho tattha evarūpoti na aññamaññaṃ cintanā vā samantanā vā ahosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:1985_2: Āyasmā hi mantāṇiputto tasmiṃ janapade ākāsamajjhe ṭhito cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a0:1985_3: Tasmā te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ sutvā ekajjhaṃ sannipatitamoraghaṭā viya ghanasajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1985_4: āraddhabhikkhū viya ca attano ācariyaṃ puṇṇattheraṃ bhagavato ārocentā therassa ca guṇaṃ bhāsituṃ appahontehi mukhehi ekappahāreneva puṇṇo nāma, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1987_3: Na hi tassa anto aṇumattāpi pāpikā icchā nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a0:1987_5: Apicettha atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatā appicchatāti ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:1988_0: Tattha sakalābhe atittassa paralābhe patthanā atricchatā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1988_1: Tāya samannāgatassa ekabhājena pakkapūvopi attano patte patito na supakko viya khuddako viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1988_2: Sveva parassa patte pakkhitto supakko viya mahanto viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0201a0:1988_3: Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma, sā,
atk-s0201a0:1988_4: “idhekacco assaddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1988_6: Santaguṇasambhāvanā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma. Sāpi,
atk-s0201a0:1988_7: “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1988_8: sīlavā samāno sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva,
atk-s0201a0:1991_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1991_1: tāya samannāgato puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya,
atk-s0201a0:1991_2: “saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti na icchati. Sīlavā,
atk-s0201a0:1991_7: khīṇāsavo samāno khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1992_2: so asokassa dhammarañño vihāramahadivase saṅghatthero ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:1992_5: “mādise khīṇāsave rañño saṅgahaṃ akaronte añño ko karissatī”ti pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā saṅghattherassa ukkhittapiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantoyeva ummujji.
atk-s0201a0:1992_8: Evaṃ appiccho pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:1992_11: yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:1992_12: tathā tathā tassa vatte pasannā manussā bahū denti.
atk-s0201a0:1993_2: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho nāma,
atk-s0201a0:1994_0: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa attani atthibhāvaṃ najānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:1994_2: sosānikamahāsumanatthero kira saṭṭhi vassāni susāne vasi,
atk-s0201a0:1996_0: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyya, aho sosānikuttamo”ti.
atk-s0201a0:1997_1: Tesu kaniṭṭho upaṭṭhākena pesitā ucchukhaṇḍikā gahetvā jeṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:1997_4: Therassa ca bhattakiccaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhālanakālo ahosi. So alaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:1997_8: ucchukhaṇḍikāti paññāsa vassāni ekāsaniko samānopi dhutaṅgaṃ nigūhamāno paribhogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā puna dhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gato.
atk-s0201a0:1998_0: Yo pana sāketakatissatthero viya bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1998_2: Thero kira khaṇo natthīti uddesaparipucchāsu okāsaṃ akaronto maraṇakkhayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:1998_3: labhissathāti codito gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā kaṇikāravālikasamuddavihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:1998_4: Tattha antovassaṃ theranavamajjhimānaṃ upakāro hutvā mahāpavāraṇāya uposathadivase dhammakathāya janataṃ khobhetvā gato.
atk-s0201a0:1999_0: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0201a0:1999_2: tayo kulaputtā viya ghaṭikārakumbhakāro viya ca.
atk-s0201a0:2000_0: Āyasmā pana puṇṇo atricchataṃ pāpicchataṃ mahicchatañca pahāya sabbaso icchāpaṭipakkhabhūtāya alobhasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0201a0:2000_1: parisuddhāya appicchatāya samannāgatattā appiccho nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2000_3: atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatāti ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabbanti appicchakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2000_4: Tena vuttaṃ “attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2002_0: Idāni attanā ca santuṭṭhotiādīsu visesatthameva dīpayissāma.
atk-s0201a0:2003_0: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā.
atk-s0201a0:2003_1: So teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti,
atk-s0201a0:2003_4: Atha yo pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0201a0:2003_6: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2003_9: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2003_10: idaṃ gilānānaṃ idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotūti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā
atk-s0201a0:2003_11: tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2004_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2004_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2004_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2004_10: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2005_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2005_1: so tena neva somanassaṃ na paṭighaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0201a0:2005_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2005_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2005_8: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2005_9: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2005_13: niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0201a0:2005_14: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2006_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2006_6: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2006_7: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā tehi bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2006_10: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatakena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2006_11: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ, “gaṇha, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2006_12: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0201a0:2006_13: atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2007_0: Imesaṃ pana paccekaṃ paccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0201a0:2007_1: Āyasmā puṇṇo ekekasmiṃ paccaye imehi tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2007_2: Santuṭṭhikathañcāti bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ santuṭṭhikathaṃ kattāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2009_0: Pavivittoti kāyapaviveko cittapaviveko upadhipavivekoti imehi tīhi pavivekehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:2009_16: Pavivekakathanti bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ pavivekakathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a0:2011_1: Savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo sambhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti pañcavidho saṃsaggo.
atk-s0201a0:2011_3: “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārikā vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2011_4: So taṃ sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2011_5: sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti evaṃ parehi vā kathīyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2011_6: suṇantassa sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2011_7: So anitthigandhapaccekabodhisattassa ca pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsītissadaharassa ca vasena veditabbo –
atk-s0201a0:2012_0: Daharo kira ākāsena gacchanto girigāmavāsikammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi saddhiṃ padumasaraṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a0:2012_1: nhatvā padumāni ca pilandhitvā madhurassarena gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena viddho visesā parihāyitvā
atk-s0201a0:2012_3: Idha bhikkhu na heva kho suṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:2012_4: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2012_5: So taṃ disvā saṃsīdati visīdati na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2012_6: sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti evaṃ visabhāgarūpaṃ olokentassa pana cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2013_0: Eko kira daharo kāladīghavāpidvāravihāraṃ uddesatthāya gato.
atk-s0201a0:2013_1: Ācariyo tassa antarāyaṃ disvā okāsaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2013_5: So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā uddese niṭṭhite ācariyaṃ vanditvā gacchanto ācariyo me imasmiṃ gāme carituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a0:2013_6: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇanti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0201a0:2013_7: ekā kuladhītā pītakavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gehe ṭhitā daharaṃ disvā sañjātarāgā uḷuṅkena yāguṃ āharitvā tassa patte pakkhipitvā nivattitvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0201a0:2013_8: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro kiṃ ammāti pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2013_11: Mātāpitaro vegena gantvā gāmadvāre daharaṃ patvā vanditvā,
atk-s0201a0:2013_21: “na mayhaṃ iminā palibodhena attho”ti anādiyitvāva pakkanto.
atk-s0201a0:2014_4: uṭṭhehi khāda ca piva cā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2014_5: Sā anicchantī sattāhaṃ nirāhārā hutvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2014_6: Mātāpitaro tassā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pītakavatthaṃ dhuravihāre bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2014_8: Eko mahallako attano koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kalyāṇīvihāraṃ āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2014_9: Sopi daharo cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti tattheva gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2014_15: “evarūpāya nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti rāgagginā daḍḍho tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2015_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2015_2: bhikkhuniyā vā bhikkhussa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogakaraṇavasena uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2015_4: maricavaṭṭivihāramahe kira bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ navutisahassāni eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2015_5: Eko sāmaṇero uṇhayāguṃ gahetvā gacchanto sakiṃ cīvarakaṇṇe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a0:2015_7: Ekā sāmaṇerī disvā ettha pattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāhīti thālakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2015_8: Te aparabhāge ekasmiṃ bhaye uppanne parasamuddaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2015_10: “eko kira sīhaḷabhikkhu āgato”ti sutvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisinnā, – “bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2015_14: Ahaṃ sattavassikasāmaṇerīyeva ekassa sāmaṇerassa uṇhayāguṃ gahetvā gacchantassa pattaṭhapanatthaṃ thālakamadāsinti. Thero,
atk-s0201a0:2015_16: Te ettakeneva saṃsaggena brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontā dvepi saṭṭhivassakāle vibbhamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2016_4: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento ekissā daharabhikkhuniyā kāyaṃ chupi.
atk-s0201a0:2016_5: Sā taṃ hatthaṃ gahetvā attano urasmiṃ ṭhapesi,
atk-s0201a0:2016_6: ettakena saṃsaggena dvepi vibbhamitvā gihibhāvaṃ pattā.
atk-s0201a0:2018_0: Imesu pana pañcasu saṃsaggesu bhikkhuno bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ savanadassanasamullapanasambhogakāyaparāmāsā niccampi hontiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2018_1: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ṭhapetvā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sesā kālena kālaṃ honti;
atk-s0201a0:2018_2: tathā upāsakaupāsikāhi saddhiṃ sabbepi kālena kālaṃ honti.
atk-s0201a0:2019_0: Tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ manussāpi āmisena upalāpetvā gahaṇavasena upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0201a0:2019_6: Yassa manussā dakkhiṇeyyavasena cattāro paccaye denti,
atk-s0201a0:2019_9: Yassa manussāpi dakkhiṇeyyavasena cattāro paccaye denti,
atk-s0201a0:2020_0: Theraṃ kira ekā upāsikā dvādasa vassāni upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0201a0:2020_1: Ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ gāme aggi uṭṭhahitvā gehāni jhāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2020_4: api kiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ arogaṃ kātuṃ asakkhitthā”ti paṭisanthāraṃ akaṃsu. Manussā,
atk-s0201a0:2020_7: Upāsikā koṭṭhacchāyāya nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2020_8: There bhattakiccaṃ katvā pakkante manussā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0201a0:2020_12: Āyasmā pana mantāṇiputto imehi pañcahi saṃsaggehi catūhipi parisāhi saddhiṃ asaṃsaṭṭho gāhamuttako ceva muttamuttako ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2020_14: evaṃ bhikkhūnampi taṃ asaṃsaggakathaṃ kattā ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2021_2: Yo hi bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a0:2021_4: nisajjāya uppannakilesaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0201a0:2021_6: amittaṃ gīvāya akkamanto viya ca vicarati,
atk-s0201a0:2022_5: Thero sayampi sīlādīhi sampanno ahosi bhikkhūnampi sīlādikathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a0:2022_8: sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvā jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2022_10: Thero pana tāni dasa kathāvatthūni viññāpetīti viññāpako.
atk-s0201a0:2022_17: Evaṃ samādapetvā pana tesu kathāvatthūsu ussāhajananavasena bhikkhū samuttejetīti samuttejako.
atk-s0201a0:2024_3: yassa satthu sammukhā evaṃ vaṇṇo abbhuggatoti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2024_4: Apica apaṇḍitehi vaṇṇakathanaṃ nāma na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a0:2024_6: Gihī hi vā vaṇṇakathanaṃ na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a0:2024_9: vihāraṃ āgatānaṃ yāgubhattaphāṇitādīhi saṅgahaṃ karotī”ti kathento avaṇṇameva katheti.
atk-s0201a0:2024_10: “Avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti “ayaṃ thero mandamando viya abalabalo viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya natthi iminā saddhiṃ vissāso”ti kathento vaṇṇameva katheti.
atk-s0201a0:2024_11: Sabrahmacārīhipi satthu parammukhā vaṇṇakathanaṃ na tathā lābho,
atk-s0201a0:2024_12: satthu sammukhā pana atilābhoti imampi atthavasaṃ paṭicca “suladdhalābhā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2024_13: Anumassa anumassāti dasa kathāvatthūni anupavisitvā anupavisitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2024_14: Tañca satthā abbhanumodatīti tañcassa vaṇṇaṃ evametaṃ appiccho ca so bhikkhu santuṭṭho ca so bhikkhūti anumodati.
atk-s0201a0:2024_19: satthārā abbhanumodanaṃ ekoti ime pañca lābhe sandhāya “suladdhalābhā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2024_22: Appeva nāma siyā kocideva kathāsallāpoti api nāma koci kathāsamudācāropi bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2024_23: Therena kira āyasmā puṇṇo neva diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0201a0:2024_25: Iti so tassa dassanampi dhammakathampi patthayamāno evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2026_2: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakādivipattiṃ vā apphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2026_3: manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2026_4: Tesaṃ sampattiyā “idha phāsu viharāmā”ti abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2026_5: Yattha pana tathāgate viharante sattā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a0:2026_8: tato sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ vā pana tesaṃ upanissayo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2026_9: Tattha buddhā satte tāsu sampattīsu patiṭṭhāpanaajjhāsayena vasanti;
atk-s0201a0:2026_14: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca,
atk-s0201a0:2027_0: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2027_2: Bhagavā hi mahākassapaṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2028_6: Tato dutiyadivase vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto ākāse uppatitvā vīsayojanasatamatthake tassa gocaragāmadvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupi.
atk-s0201a0:2028_7: Kammantaṃ gacchamānā manussā disvā, “satthā, bho, āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2028_8: mā kammantaṃ agamitthā”ti vatvā āsanāni paññapetvā yāguṃ datvā pānavattaṃ karontā, “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2028_12: Te “amhākaṃ kira kulūpakattherassa dassanatthāya satthā āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2028_13: no vata no thero oramattako”ti somanassajātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2029_0: Atha bhagavato bhattakiccapariyosāne sāmaṇero gāmaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā “upāsakā mahā bhikkhusaṅgho”ti pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2029_4: Satthā tassa pattaṃ hatthena gahetvā, “alaṃ, tissa,
atk-s0201a0:2029_6: Tato upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā attano pattāsane nisīditvā bhattakiccamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2029_7: Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne satthā maṅgalaṃ vatvā nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre ṭhatvā,
atk-s0201a0:2029_12: Bhagavā kira sadevakassa lokassa maggadesako samānopi “sakalatigāvute magge sāmaṇeraṃ daṭṭhuṃ lacchāmī”ti taṃ maggadesakamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2030_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhagavato vattamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2030_3: caṅkamo”ti pucchitvā tattha gantvā sāmaṇerassa nisīdanapāsāṇe nisīditvā, “tissa,
atk-s0201a0:2030_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sukhaṃ vasasī”ti pucchi. So āha – “āma, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2030_5: imasmiṃ me ṭhāne vasantassa sīhabyagghahatthimigamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇato araññasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2030_9: buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0201a0:2031_0: Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaḍḍhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2031_2: Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati.
atk-s0201a0:2031_10: itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a0:2031_11: Tatra bhagavā tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasanto mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanto dhammadānena
atk-s0201a0:2031_12: cassa vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhento navahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2032_0: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2032_1: mahāpavāraṇāya apavāretvā pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāya pavāretvā migasirassa paṭhamadivase
atk-s0201a0:2032_3: Aññenapi kāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmo catumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a0:2032_4: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro majjhimamaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a0:2032_5: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2033_0: Sace pana catumāsaṃ vuṭṭhavassassāpi bhagavato veneyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2033_1: tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno aparampi ekaṃ māsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tattheva vasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a0:2033_2: Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro antomaṇḍale osarati.
atk-s0201a0:2033_3: Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2033_4: Iti imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ caranto na cīvarādihetu carati.
atk-s0201a0:2033_5: Atha kho ye duggatā bālā jiṇṇā byādhitā,
atk-s0201a0:2033_7: Mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatadassanaṃ labhissati,
atk-s0201a0:2033_12: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti evaṃ lokānukampāya cārikaṃ carati.
atk-s0201a0:2034_0: Apica catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a0:2034_5: Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a0:2034_9: mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmīti vāti.
atk-s0201a0:2034_10: Aparehi pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a0:2034_15: Aparehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a0:2034_19: Aparehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0201a0:2034_27: Tattha yaṃ ekasseva bodhaneyyasattassa atthāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2035_1: Taṃ pana paṭisāmento thero na cūḷapattamahāpatta-
atk-s0201a0:2035_4: dukūlacīvarādīnaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā sappitelādīnaṃ vā pana ghaṭe pūrāpetvā gabbhe nidahitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya kuñcikamuddikādīni yojāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2035_5: “Sace na hoti bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā upāsako vā,
atk-s0201a0:2035_6: catūsu pāsāṇesu mañce mañcaṃ āropetvā pīṭhe pīṭhaṃ āropetvā cīvaravaṃse vā cīvararajjuyā vā upari puñjaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2035_7: katvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā pakkamitabba”nti vacanato pana nevāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchanamattakeneva
atk-s0201a0:2036_0: Yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmīti satthu dassanakāmo hutvā yena disābhāgena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2036_1: Pakkamanto ca na suddhodanamahārājassa ārocāpetvā sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā pakkanto.
atk-s0201a0:2036_2: Yūthaṃ pahāya nikkhanto pana mattahatthī viya,
atk-s0201a0:2036_5: Kasmā panesa pañcasatehi attano antevāsikehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ agantvā idāni nikkhantoti?
atk-s0201a0:2036_8: Satthā rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ āgantvā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0201a0:2036_9: idāni āsanno jātoti sutvā nikkhamīti akāraṇametaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2036_10: Buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto hi esa yojanasahassampi gaccheyya,
atk-s0201a0:2036_11: tadā pana kāyaviveko na sakkā laddhunti.
atk-s0201a0:2036_12: Bahūhi saddhiṃ gamanakāle hi ekasmiṃ gacchāmāti vadante eko idheva vasāmāti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2036_13: Ekasmiṃ vasāmāti vadante eko gacchāmāti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2036_14: Tasmā icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ vā phāsukasenāsane kāyavivekaṃ laddhuṃ vā na sakkā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2036_15: ekakassa pana taṃ sabbaṃ sulabhaṃ hotīti tadā agantvā idāni pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2037_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti ettha kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati,
atk-s0201a0:2037_1: buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhīsaddena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi kataṃ bījanampi tālavaṇṭaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a0:2037_2: Yena bhagavāti sāvatthiyā avidūre ekasmiṃ gāmake piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco jetavanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a0:2037_3: sāriputtattherassa vā mahāmoggallānattherassa vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2037_4: vā pānakaṃ vā pivitvā thokaṃ vissamitvā satthāraṃ passissāmīti cittampi anuppādetvā ujukaṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇameva agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2037_5: Therassa hi satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmassa aññena bhikkhunā kiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2037_6: Tasmā rāhulaṃ vā ānandaṃ vā gahetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā satthāraṃ passissāmīti evampi cittaṃ na uppādesi.
atk-s0201a0:2038_0: Thero hi sayameva buddhasāsane vallabho rañño saṅgāmavijayamahāyodho viya.
atk-s0201a0:2038_1: Yathā hi tādisassa yodhassa rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmassa aññaṃ sevitvā dassanakammaṃ nāma natthi;
atk-s0201a0:2038_4: tassa aññaṃ sevitvā satthudassanakiccaṃ natthīti pāde dhovitvā pādapuñchanamhi puñchitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2038_6: Tasmā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sūcighaṭikaṃ adatvāva darathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā uṭṭhāya nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2038_7: Thero kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2038_8: Dhammiyā kathāyāti bhagavā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathento cūḷagosiṅgasutte tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi;
atk-s0201a0:2038_13: upakkilesasutte bhaguttherassa dhammakathaṃ kathento ekībhāve ānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2038_14: Imasmiṃ pana rathavinīte āyasmato puṇṇassa kathento dasakathāvatthunissayaṃ anantanayaṃ nāma dassesi puṇṇa,
atk-s0201a0:2038_16: Paṭisambhidāpattassa sāvakassa velante ṭhatvā mahāsamudde hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2039_0: Yena andhavananti tadā kira pacchābhatte jetavanaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2039_8: “sāyanhasamaye āgantvā mahāthere disvā puna dasabalaṃ passissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2039_11: tato satthāraṃ vanditvā mama vasanaṭṭhānameva gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2041_1: Abhiṇhaṃ kittayamāno ahosīti punappunaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kittayamāno vihāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2041_2: Thero kira tato paṭṭhāya divase divase saṅghamajjhe “puṇṇo kira nāma mantāṇiputto catūhi parisāhi saddhiṃ asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0201a0:2041_4: kacci nu kho maṃ adisvāva gamissatī”ti theranavamajjhimānaṃ satikaraṇatthaṃ āyasmato puṇṇassa guṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0201a0:2041_7: guṇakathāya panassa kathitāya yo ca naṃ bhikkhuṃ passissati;
atk-s0201a0:2041_9: Athāyaṃ therasseva saddhivihāriko taṃ āyasmantaṃ mantāṇiputtaṃ pattacīvaramādāya gandhakuṭiṃ pavisantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2041_10: Kathaṃ pana naṃ esa aññāsīti? Puṇṇa,
atk-s0201a0:2041_11: puṇṇāti vatvā kathentassa bhagavato dhammakathāya aññāsi –
atk-s0201a0:2041_13: yassa me upajjhāyo abhiṇhaṃ kittayamāno hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2041_15: Nisīdanaṃ ādāyāti nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccati avāyimaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2041_18: Sīsānulokīti yo unnataṭṭhāne piṭṭhiṃ passanto ninnaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ passanto gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2041_21: Thero hi kiñcāpi saṃyatapadasaddatāya accāsanno hutvā gacchantopi padasaddena na bādhati,
atk-s0201a0:2041_26: puṇṇāti aphāsukasaddo kātabbo hotīti nisinnaṭṭhānajānanatthaṃ nātidūre hutvā sīsānulokī agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2042_10: Iti ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_11: ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_12: ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_13: ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_14: ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_15: ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilaṃ abhinisinnā dve sakkā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2042_16: ekavimānabbhantaragatā dve hāritamahābrahmāno viya ca te dvepi brāhmaṇajaccā dvepi suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dvepi
atk-s0201a0:2042_17: samāpattilābhino dvepi abhinīhārasampannā dvepi paṭisambhidāpattā mahākhīṇāsavā ekaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ anupaviṭṭhā
atk-s0201a0:2043_2: kiṃ amhākaṃ bhagavato santike āyasmatā brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti?
atk-s0201a0:2043_3: Idaṃ āyasmā sāriputto tassa bhagavati brahmacariyavāsaṃ jānantopi kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2043_4: Purimakathāya hi appatiṭṭhitāya pacchimakathā na jāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2043_7: Athassa pañhavissajjanaṃ sotukāmo āyasmā sāriputto “kiṃ nu kho āvuso sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2043_10: Āyasmā pana puṇṇo yasmā catupārisuddhisīlādīsu ṭhitassāpi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tasmā,
atk-s0201a0:2044_0: Kimatthaṃ carahāvusoti yadi sīlavisuddhiādīnaṃ atthāya brahmacariyaṃ na vussati,
atk-s0201a0:2044_6: paccayūpādānaṃ nāma avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti evaṃ vuttapaccayā.
atk-s0201a0:2044_7: Tattha gahaṇūpādānavādino ācariyā anupādāparinibbānanti catūsu upādānesu aññatarenāpi kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0201a0:2044_9: Tañhi na ca upādānasampayuttaṃ hutvā kañci dhammaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0201a0:2044_12: Paccayavasena anuppannaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amatadhātumeva anupādāparinibbānanti kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:2044_16: Appaccayaparinibbānaṃ pattassa hi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ patto nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2044_18: Atha naṃ anuyuñjanto āyasmā sāriputto “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2045_1: Theropi sabbaparivattesu tatheva paṭikkhipitvā pariyosāne dosaṃ dassento sīlavisuddhiṃ ce,
atk-s0201a0:2045_4: Saupādānaṃyeva samānaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ paññapeyyāti saṅgahaṇadhammameva niggahaṇadhammaṃ sappaccayadhammameva
atk-s0201a0:2045_6: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ pana sappaccayadhammameva appaccayadhammaṃ saṅkhatadhammameva asaṅkhatadhammanti paññapeyyāti ayameva attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2045_9: So hi catupārisuddhisīlamattassāpi abhāvato sabbaso aññatra imehi dhammehi.
atk-s0201a0:2045_10: Tena hīti yena kāraṇena ekacce paṇḍitā upamāya atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0201a0:2045_11: tena kāraṇena upamaṃ te karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2047_1: Satta rathavinītānīti vinītaassājāniyayutte satta rathe. Yāvadeva,
atk-s0201a0:2047_13: cittavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa hi sīlavisuddhikiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:2048_1: rājā pasenadi kosalo viya hi jarāmaraṇabhīruko yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2048_4: rañño sākete vaḍḍhiāvahassa sīghaṃ gantvā pāpuṇitabbassa accāyikassa kiccassa uppādakālo viya yogino
atk-s0201a0:2048_7: paṭhamaṃ rathavinītaṃ āruḷhakālo viya sīlavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0201a0:2048_8: paṭhamarathavinītādīhi dutiyādīni āruḷhakālo viya sīlavisuddhiādīhi cittavisuddhiādīsu ṭhitakālo.
atk-s0201a0:2048_9: Sattamena rathavinītena sākete antepuradvāre oruyha uparipāsāde ñātimittagaṇaparivutassa surasabhojanaparibhogakālo
atk-s0201a0:2048_10: viya yogino ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā sabbakilese khepetvā dhammavarapāsādaṃ āruyha paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammaparivārassa
atk-s0201a0:2048_11: nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nirodhasayane nisinnassa lokuttarasukhānubhavanakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2049_0: Iti āyasmantaṃ puṇṇaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2049_2: Evaṃ pucchanto pana dhammasenāpati kiṃ jānitvā pucchi,
atk-s0201a0:2049_4: Titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a0:2049_8: Titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0201a0:2049_10: Jānitvā titthakusalo hutvā visaye pucchīti hi vadamāno dhammasenāpatiṃyeva vadeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2049_11: Jānitvā titthakusalo hutvā visaye vissajjesīti vadamāno puṇṇattheraṃyeva vadeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2050_0: Visuddhīsu hi ekā sīlavisuddhi cattāri kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā asaṃsaggakathā,
atk-s0201a0:2050_2: Ekā cittavisuddhi tīṇi kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā –
atk-s0201a0:2050_8: Kathāvatthūsu pana ekā paññākathā pañca visuddhiyo hutvā āgatā –
atk-s0201a0:2050_16: Tasmā sāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchanto na aññaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a0:2050_18: Puṇṇattheropi satta visuddhiyo vissajjento na aññaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0201a0:2050_20: Iti ubhopete jānitvā titthakusalā hutvā visayeva pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu ceva vissajjesuṃ cāti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2051_1: Ko nāmo āyasmāti na thero tassa nāmaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2051_3: Kathañca panāyasmantanti idaṃ pana thero sammodamāno āha.
atk-s0201a0:2051_8: Anumassa anumassāti dasa kathāvatthūni ogāhetvā anupavisitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2051_11: Vatthacumbaṭakaṃ sīse katvā āyasmantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā pariharantāpi sabrahmacārī dassanāya labheyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2051_12: evaṃ laddhadassanampi tesaṃ lābhāyevāti aṭṭhānaparikappena abhiṇhadassanassa upāyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2051_13: Evaṃ apariharantena hi pañhaṃ vā pucchitukāmena dhammaṃ vā sotukāmena “thero kattha ṭhito kattha nisinno”ti pariyesantena caritabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2051_14: Evaṃ pariharantā pana icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva sīsato oropetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā sakkā honti pañhaṃ vā pucchituṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2052_0: Sāriputtoti ca pana manti sāriyā brāhmaṇiyā puttoti ca pana evaṃ maṃ sabrahmacārī jānanti.
atk-s0201a0:2052_2: Iti ekapadeneva āyasmā puṇṇo sāriputtattheraṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ āhacca ṭhapento viya ukkhipi.
atk-s0201a0:2052_3: Therassa hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantadhammakathikabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2052_4: Amaccañhi purohitaṃ mahantoti vadamāno rājasadisoti vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2052_8: ito paraṃ etesaṃ mahantabhāvakathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2052_10: ito paraṃ tassa mahantabhāvakathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2052_11: Iccāyasmā puṇṇo ekapadeneva theraṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ āhacca ṭhapento viya ukkhipi.
atk-s0201a0:2053_0: Ettakampi no nappaṭibhāseyyāti paṭisambhidāpattassa appaṭibhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2053_4: Upamā hi ajānantānaṃ āharīyatīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:2053_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana idampi paṭikkhipitvā upamā nāma buddhānampi santike āharīyati,
atk-s0201a0:2054_0: Anumassa anumassa pucchitāti dasa kathāvatthūni ogāhetvā ogāhetvā pucchitā.
atk-s0201a0:2054_5: Sahetukaṃ vā sakāraṇaṃ katvā pucchanampi vissajjanampi bhāriyameva.
atk-s0201a0:2058_2: Tattha nevāpikoti yo migānaṃ gahaṇatthāya araññe tiṇabījāni vapati “idaṃ tiṇaṃ khādituṃ āgate mige sukhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2058_8: taṇhāya hadayaṃ pavisitvā mucchanākāraṃ pāpitāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2058_14: Ekaṃ kira nivāpatiṇaṃ nāma atthi nidāghabhaddakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2058_16: tathā tathā nīvāravanaṃ viya meghamālā viya ca ekagghanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_17: taṃ luddakā ekasmiṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne kasitvā vapitvā vatiṃ katvā dvāraṃ yojetvā rakkhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2058_18: Atha yadā mahānidāghe sabbatiṇāni sukkhāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_20: tadā migajātā sukkhatiṇāni ceva purāṇapaṇṇāni ca khādantā kampamānā viya vicarantā nivāpatiṇassa gandhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2058_21: ghāyitvā vadhabandhanādīni agaṇayitvā vatiṃ ajjhottharantā pavisanti.
atk-s0201a0:2058_22: Tesañhi nivāpatiṇaṃ ativiya piyaṃ hoti manāpaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2058_23: Nevāpiko te disvā dve tīṇi divasāni pamatto viya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_26: migā vivaṭadvārena pavisitvā khāditamattakaṃ pivitamattakameva katvā pakkamanti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_27: punadivase kiñci na karontīti kaṇṇe cālayamānā khāditvā pivitvā ataramānā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_28: punadivase koci kiñci kattā natthīti yāvadatthaṃ khāditvā pivitvā maṇḍalagumbaṃ pavisitvā nipajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2058_29: Luddakā tesaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ jānitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya samparivāretvā koṭito paṭṭhāya koṭṭetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2058_30: evaṃ te tasmiṃ nivāpe nevāpikassa yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a0:2059_6: Bhagavā pana āgatapaṭipāṭivasena kappetvā paṭhamā, dutiyā, tatiyā,
atk-s0201a0:2059_9: vasībhāvoyeva hi ettha iddhīti ca ānubhāvoti ca adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:2060_0: 263. Bhayabhogāti bhayena bhogato. Balavīriyanti aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇavāyodhātu, sā parihāyīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2061_1: Upanissāya āsayaṃ kappeyyāmāti anto nipajjitvā khādantānampi bhayameva,
atk-s0201a0:2061_3: mayaṃ pana amuṃ nivāpaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya ekamante āsayaṃ kappeyyāmāti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2061_4: Upanissāya āsayaṃ kappayiṃsūti luddakā nāma na sabbakālaṃ appamattā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2061_5: Mayaṃ tattha tattha maṇḍalagumbesu ceva vatipādesu ca nipajjitvā etesu mukhadhovanatthaṃ vā āhārakiccakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2061_6: vā pakkantesu nivāpavatthuṃ pavisitvā khāditamattaṃ katvā amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisissāmāti nivāpavatthuṃ
atk-s0201a0:2061_8: Bhuñjiṃsūti vuttanayena luddakānaṃ pamādakālaṃ ñatvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ pavisitvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2061_13: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti iminā nāma ṭhānena āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2061_14: amutra gacchantīti idaṃ nesaṃ na jānāma.
atk-s0201a0:2061_18: santikeyeva nipannā bhavissantīti nivāpakkhettassa samantā sappadesaṃ mahantaṃ okāsaṃ anuparivāresuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2061_19: Addasaṃsūti evaṃ parivāretvā vākarajālaṃ samantato cāletvā olokentā addasaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2061_20: Yattha teti yasmiṃ ṭhāne te gāhaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2062_1: Yaṃnūna mayaṃ yattha agatīti te kira evaṃ cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0201a0:2062_3: bāhirato āgantvā khādantānampi santike vasitvā khādantānampi bhayameva,
atk-s0201a0:2062_6: “yaṃnūna mayaṃ yattha nevāpikassa ca nevāpikaparisāya ca agati avisayo,
atk-s0201a0:2062_8: Aññe ghaṭṭessantīti tato tato dūrataravāsino aññe ghaṭṭessanti.
atk-s0201a0:2062_9: Te ghaṭṭitā aññeti tepi ghaṭṭitā aññe tato dūrataravāsino ghaṭṭessanti.
atk-s0201a0:2062_10: Evaṃ imaṃ nivāpaṃ nivuttaṃ sabbaso migajātā parimuccissantīti evaṃ imaṃ amhehi nivuttaṃ nivāpaṃ sabbe
atk-s0201a0:2062_13: yathā tathā āgacchantesu hi taruṇapotako vā mahallako vā dubbalo vā yūthaparihīno vā sakkā honti laddhuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2063_1: Amuṃ nivāpaṃ nivuttaṃ mārassa amūni ca lokāmisānīti ettha nivāpoti vā lokāmisānīti vā vaṭṭāmisabhūtānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2063_2: Māro na ca bījāni viya kāmaguṇe vapento āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0201a0:2063_4: tasmā kāmaguṇā mārassa nivāpā nāma honti.
atk-s0201a0:2063_7: Na parimucciṃsu mārassa iddhānubhāvāti mārassa vasaṃ gatā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2064_1: Cetovimutti parihāyīti ettha cetovimutti nāma araññe vasissāmāti uppannaajjhāsayo;
atk-s0201a0:2064_3: Tathūpame ahaṃ ime dutiyeti ayaṃ brāhmaṇadhammikapabbajjāya upamā.
atk-s0201a0:2064_4: Brāhmaṇā hi aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṃ caritvā vaṭṭupacchedabhayena paveṇiṃ ghaṭayissāmāti
atk-s0201a0:2064_5: dhanaṃ pariyesitvā bhariyaṃ gahetvā agāramajjhe vasantā ekasmiṃ putte jāte “amhākaṃ putto jāto vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2064_6: na ucchinnaṃ paveṇi ghaṭitā”ti puna nikkhamitvā pabbajanti vā tameva vā sa’kalattavāsaṃ vasanti.
atk-s0201a0:2065_3: tatiyāpi samaṇabrāhmaṇā na parimucciṃsūti purimā viya tepi mārassa iddhānubhāvā na mucciṃsu;
atk-s0201a0:2065_6: Gāmanigamarājadhāniyo osaritvā tesu tesu ārāmauyyānaṭṭhānesu assamaṃ māpetvā nivasantā kuladārake hatthiassarathasippādīni
atk-s0201a0:2065_8: Iti te vākarajālena tatiyā migajātā viya mārassa pāpimato diṭṭhijālena parikkhipitvā yathākāmakaraṇīyā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2066_0: 270. Tathūpame ahaṃ ime catuttheti ayaṃ imassa sāsanassa upamā āhaṭā.
atk-s0201a0:2067_1: Andhamakāsi māranti na mārassa akkhīni bhindi.
atk-s0201a0:2067_2: Vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpannassa pana bhikkhuno imaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya cittaṃ vattatīti māro passituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2067_5: Apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhunti teneva pariyāyena yathā mārassa cakkhu apadaṃ hoti nippadaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2067_9: Adassanaṃ gato pāpimatoti teneva pariyāyena mārassa pāpimato adassanaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:2067_10: Na hi so attano maṃsacakkhunā tassa vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno ñāṇasarīraṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2067_11: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti maggapaññāya cattāri ariyasaccāni disvā cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2067_12: Tiṇṇo loke visattikanti loke sattavisattabhāvena visattikāti evaṃ saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2067_24: visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe”ti visattikā.
atk-s0201a0:2067_25: Evaṃ visattikāti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ taṇhaṃ tiṇṇo nittiṇṇo uttiṇṇo.
atk-s0201a0:2071_4: Ete kira pañcasatā bhikkhū janapadavāsino “dasabalaṃ passissāmā”ti sāvatthiṃ anuppattā.
atk-s0201a0:2071_13: mahāaggikkhandho viya ca durāsadā vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0201a0:2073_0: Nāgova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2074_0: Evaṃ durāsadaṃ satthāraṃ te bhikkhū sayaṃ yācituṃ asakkontā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ yācamānā “sādhu mayaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2075_1: Kasmā pana thero te bhikkhū “rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamaṃ upasaṅkameyyāthā”ti āha?
atk-s0201a0:2075_3: Dasabalassa hi kiriyā therassa pākaṭā hoti;
atk-s0201a0:2075_5: “ajja satthā jetavane vasitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ karissati;
atk-s0201a0:2075_6: ajja pubbārāme vasitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karissati;
atk-s0201a0:2075_8: ajja bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto imasmiṃ kāle janapadacārikaṃ nikkhamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2075_9: Kiṃ panassa evaṃ jānanatthaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2075_11: Yañhi divasaṃ bhagavā jetavane vasitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ kātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2075_14: Pubbārāme vasitvā jetavanaṃ divāvihārāya āgamanakālepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:2076_0: Yadā pana ekako piṇḍāya pavisitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2076_1: tadā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdati.
atk-s0201a0:2076_2: Thero “ajja bhagavā bodhaneyyabandhavaṃ disvā nisinno”ti tāya saññāya ñatvā “ajja, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2076_4: tumhe bhikkhācārasajjā hothā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2076_6: tadā gandhakuṭidvāraṃ upaḍḍhapidahitaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdati,
atk-s0201a0:2076_7: thero tāya saññāya ñatvā pattacīvaraggahaṇatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2076_9: tadā ekaṃ dve ālope atirekaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0201a0:2076_13: tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2077_0: Bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2077_1: pacchā pañcavīsati vassāni abbokiṇṇaṃ sāvatthiṃyeva upanissāya vasanto ekadivase dve ṭhānāni paribhuñjati.
atk-s0201a0:2077_2: Jetavane rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā
atk-s0201a0:2077_4: Pubbārāme rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase pācīnadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2077_6: Manussattabhāve ṭhitena hi anāthapiṇḍikena viya aññena kenaci,
atk-s0201a0:2077_7: mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya ca visākhāya viya aññāya itthiyā tathāgataṃ uddissa dhanapariccāgo kato nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2077_8: tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ anukampāya ekadivase imāni dve ṭhānāni paribhuñjati.
atk-s0201a0:2077_11: “ajja bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhakāle gattāni parisiñcanatthāya pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ gamissati;
atk-s0201a0:2077_12: athāhaṃ gattāni parisiñcitvā ṭhitaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācitvā rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamaṃ gahetvā gamissāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2077_13: Evamime bhikkhū bhagavato sammukhā labhissanti dhammakathaṃ savanāyā”ti cintetvā te bhikkhū evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2078_1: Sā hi migārena seṭṭhinā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapitattā migāramātāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2078_2: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tasmiṃ kira pāsāde dvinnaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃ sirigabbhānaṃ majjhe bhagavato sirigabbho ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2078_3: Thero dvāraṃ vivaritvā antogabbhaṃ sammajjitvā mālākacavaraṃ nīharitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā satthu saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2078_4: Satthā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ upagamma darathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā
atk-s0201a0:2078_5: uṭṭhāya phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīditvā sāyanhasamaye tato vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2079_0: Parisiñcitunti yo hi cuṇṇamattikādīhi gattāni ubbaṭṭento mallakamuṭṭhādīhi vā ghaṃsanto nhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2079_4: Bhagavatopi sarīre tathā haritabbaṃ rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
atk-s0201a0:2079_5: utuggahaṇatthaṃ pana bhagavā kevalaṃ udakaṃ otarati. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2080_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira vihāro kadāci mahā hoti kadāci khuddako.
atk-s0201a0:2080_1: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato kāle yojaniko ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2080_8: Tampi nagaraṃ tassa vihārassa kadāci pācīnato hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2080_12: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ pana catunnaṃ mañcapādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalameva.
atk-s0201a0:2081_0: Cattāri hi acalacetiyaṭṭhānāni nāma mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ isipatane dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0201a0:2081_2: Ayaṃ pana pubbakoṭṭhako kassapadasabalassa vīsatiusabhavihārakāle pācīnadvāre koṭṭhako ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2081_4: Kassapadasabalassa kāle aciravatī nagaraṃ parikkhipitvā sandamānā pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ patvā udakena bhinditvā
atk-s0201a0:2081_9: ekaṃ buddhānanti evaṃ pāṭiyekkāni nhānatitthāni honti ramaṇīyāni vippakiṇṇarajatapaṭṭasadisavālikāni.
atk-s0201a0:2081_10: Iti bhagavā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ yena ayaṃ evarūpo pubbakoṭṭhako tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2081_13: Thero dupaṭṭena saddhiṃ mahācīvaraṃ attano hatthagatamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2081_15: Sahotaraṇenevassa udake macchakacchapā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2081_16: Yantanālikāhi suvaṇṇarasadhārānisiñcamānakālo viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāraṇakālo viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2081_17: Atha bhagavato nhānavattaṃ dassetvā nhatvā paccuttiṇṇassa thero rattadupaṭṭaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0201a0:2081_18: Bhagavā taṃ nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā mahācīvaraṃ antantena saṃharitvā padumagabbhasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2081_19: katvā upanītaṃ dvīsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2082_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitakamaluppalasaraṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ pāricchattakaṃ tārāmarīcivikasitaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2082_1: ca gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasamānaṃ viya virocittha.
atk-s0201a0:2082_2: Byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthetvā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsacandamālā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2082_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsacakkavatti dvattiṃsadevarājā dvattiṃsamahābrahmāno viya ca ativiya virocittha,
atk-s0201a0:2082_6: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ vā guṇavaṇṇaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthāhi vā atthañca upamāyo
atk-s0201a0:2082_7: ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā paṭibalena dhammakathikena pūretvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpesu ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa
atk-s0201a0:2083_1: Gattāni pubbāpayamānoti pakatibhāvaṃ gamayamāno nirudakāni kurumāno,
atk-s0201a0:2083_3: Sodakena gattena cīvaraṃ pārupantassa hi cīvare kaṇṇikā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a0:2083_5: Buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati;
atk-s0201a0:2083_6: padumapatte pakkhittaudakabindu viya udakaṃ vinivattetvā gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2083_8: “pabbajitavattaṃ nāmeta”nti mahācīvaraṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā purato kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2083_10: “bhagavā mahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā migāramātupāsādaṃ ārabbha gamanābhihārato paṭṭhāya dunnivattiyo bhavissati;
atk-s0201a0:2083_11: buddhānañhi adhippāyakopanaṃ nāma ekacārikasīhassa gahaṇatthaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya;
atk-s0201a0:2083_13: uggatejassa āsīvisassa gīvāya gahaṇaṃ viya ca bhāriyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2083_14: Idheva rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tattha gamanatthāya bhagavantaṃ yācissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2084_0: Tattha anukampaṃ upādāyāti bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sossāmāti taṃ assamaṃ gatānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca,
atk-s0201a0:2084_2: Dhammiyā kathāyāti dasasu pāramitāsu aññatarāya pāramiyā ceva mahābhinikkhamanassa ca vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānā sannisinnā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2084_4: Ahaṃ buddhoti sahasā appavisitvā yāva sā kathā niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2084_6: Aggaḷaṃ ākoṭesīti agganakhena kavāṭe saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2084_7: Vivariṃsūti sotaṃ odahitvāva nisinnattā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva āgantvā vivariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2085_0: Paññatte āsaneti buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati,
atk-s0201a0:2085_2: Bhagavā kira attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti “asuko mayhaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gato,
atk-s0201a0:2085_3: sakkhissati nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ no vā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2085_4: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakke vitakkayamānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2085_5: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
atk-s0201a0:2085_6: abhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
atk-s0201a0:2085_7: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2085_9: “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti;
atk-s0201a0:2085_17: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālikapuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
atk-s0201a0:2085_18: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṅkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a0:2086_0: Kāya nutthāti katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2086_5: Antarā kathāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārauddesaparipucchādīnaṃ antarā aññā ekā kathā.
atk-s0201a0:2086_6: Vippakatāti mama āgamanapaccayā apariniṭṭhitā sikhaṃ appattā.
atk-s0201a0:2086_7: Atha bhagavā anuppattoti atha etasmiṃ kāle bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2086_8: Dhammī vā kathāti dasakathāvatthunissitā vā dhammī kathā.
atk-s0201a0:2086_9: Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvoti ettha pana dutiyajjhānampi ariyo tuṇhībhāvo mūlakammaṭṭhānampi.
atk-s0201a0:2086_11: mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnopi bhikkhu ariyena tuṇhībhāvena nisinnoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2087_3: Te bhikkhū sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sossāmāti therassa bhāraṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2087_5: Te tattha nisīditvā atiracchānakathikā hutvā dhammiyā kathāya nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2087_6: Atha bhagavā “ayaṃ tumhākaṃ pariyesanā ariyapariyesanā nāmā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2087_9: anariyapariyesanāti ettha yathā maggakusalo puriso paṭhamaṃ vajjetabbaṃ apāyamaggaṃ dassento “vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2087_10: Evaṃ bhagavā desanākusalatāya paṭhamaṃ vajjetabbaṃ anariyapariyesanaṃ ācikkhitvā pacchā itaraṃ ācikkhissāmīti uddesānukkamaṃ bhinditvā evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2088_9: na hetassa sīsarogādayo byādhayo nāma honti,
atk-s0201a0:2088_12: Ayādīhi pana saṃkilesehi saṃkilissatīti saṃkilesadhammavāre gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2089_4: ayaṃ niddosatāyapi ariyehi pariyesitabbatāyapi ariyapariyesanāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2090_7: Svāhaṃ taṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:2090_9: Te taṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesitvā khīṇāsavabhūmiṃ pattā.
atk-s0201a0:2090_10: Tumhepi mama ceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ āruḷhā.
atk-s0201a0:2090_11: Ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā”ti mūlato paṭṭhāya attano mahābhinikkhamanaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2091_15: Yena āḷāro kālāmoti ettha āḷāroti tassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2091_20: Yattha viññū purisoti yasmiṃ dhamme paṇḍito puriso.
atk-s0201a0:2091_24: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ tesaṃ samayaṃ tantiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2092_6: Ahañceva aññe cāti na kevalaṃ ahaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2092_8: Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakenāti paññāya asacchikatvā suddhena saddhāmattakeneva.
atk-s0201a0:2092_11: addhā esa sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhī”ti aññāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2093_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pavedesīti ākiñcaññāyatanapariyosānā satta samāpattiyo maṃ jānāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2093_1: Saddhāti imāsaṃ sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ nibbattanatthāya saddhā.
atk-s0201a0:2093_4: Nacirasseva taṃ dhammaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsinti bodhisatto kira vīriyaṃ paggahetvā
atk-s0201a0:2093_5: katipāhaññeva satta suvaṇṇanisseṇiyo pasārento viya satta samāpattiyo nibbattesi;
atk-s0201a0:2094_3: kinti katvā imaṃ dhammaṃ nibbattesī”ti usūyaṃ akatvā pasanno pasādaṃ pavedento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2094_4: Ubhova santā imaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāmāti “mahā ayaṃ gaṇo,
atk-s0201a0:2094_5: dvepi janā pariharāmā”ti vatvā gaṇassa saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2094_8: ettakā janā mahāpurisassa santike parikammaṃ uggaṇhatha,
atk-s0201a0:2094_11: Pūjāyāti kālāmassa kira upaṭṭhākā itthiyopi purisāpi gandhamālādīni gahetvā āgacchanti. Kālāmo –
atk-s0201a0:2094_14: Te taṃ pūjetvā yaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2094_17: tānipi mahāpurisassa dāpetvā yadi avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2094_19: Gatagataṭṭhāne varasenāsanaṃ bodhisattassa jaggāpetvā sesakaṃ attanā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2094_21: Nāyaṃ dhammo nibbidāyātiādīsu ayaṃ sattasamāpattidhammo neva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya,
atk-s0201a0:2095_0: Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanūpapattiyāti yāva saṭṭhikappasahassāyuparimāṇe ākiñcaññāyatanabhave upapatti,
atk-s0201a0:2095_6: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana mahāsatto yathā nāma chātajjhattapuriso manuññabhojanaṃ labhitvā sampiyāyamānopi
atk-s0201a0:2095_7: bhuñjitvā pittavasena vā semhavasena vā makkhikāvasena vā chaḍḍetvā puna ekaṃ piṇḍampi bhuñjissāmīti
atk-s0201a0:2095_9: evameva imā satta samāpattiyo mahantena ussāhena nibbattetvāpi,
atk-s0201a0:2095_11: puna imaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjissāmi vā samāpajjissāmi vā adhiṭṭhahissāmi vā vuṭṭhahissāmi vā paccavekkhissāmi vāti cittameva na uppādesi.
atk-s0201a0:2096_1: Na kho rāmo imaṃ dhammanti idhāpi bodhisatto taṃ dhammaṃ uggaṇhantoyeva aññāsi –
atk-s0201a0:2097_1: Yena uruvelā senānigamoti ettha uruvelāti mahāvelā,
atk-s0201a0:2097_5: velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2097_6: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassā kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0201a0:2097_9: Tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0201a0:2097_11: so attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālikaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu,
atk-s0201a0:2097_13: Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi,
atk-s0201a0:2097_16: Tato taṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi;
atk-s0201a0:2097_23: Velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2098_1: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira tasmiṃ ṭhāne senāniveso ahosi;
atk-s0201a0:2098_9: Nadiñca sandantinti sandamānañca maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ vimalanīlasītalasalilaṃ nerañjaraṃ nadiṃ addasaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2098_13: Samantā ca gocaragāmanti tassa padesassa samantā avidūre gamanāgamanasampannaṃ sampattapabbajitānaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ gocaragāmañca addasaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2098_19: Alamidaṃ padhānāyāti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ padhānatthāya samatthanti evaṃ cintetvā nisīdinti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2099_2: Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2099_3: Akuppā me vimuttīti mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppatāya ca akuppārammaṇatāya ca akuppā,
atk-s0201a0:2099_4: sā hi rāgādīhi na kuppatīti akuppatāyapi akuppā,
atk-s0201a0:2099_7: Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni me puna paṭisandhi nāma natthīti evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi me uppannanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2100_12: Atakkāvacaroti takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2100_23: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
atk-s0201a0:2100_29: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2101_5: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0201a0:2101_8: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-s0201a0:2101_10: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2101_14: tasmā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2101_16: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2101_18: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2101_21: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2102_3: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2102_7: kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti evamādīni dentassa,
atk-s0201a0:2102_8: aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamaniyapaṭipadaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2102_13: evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2103_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti evaṃ gataṃ catusaccadhammaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2103_1: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
atk-s0201a0:2103_2: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
atk-s0201a0:2103_3: te apassante ko sakkhissati evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2107_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0201a0:2107_2: tadevaṃ paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a0:2107_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2107_4: dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0201a0:2107_8: añjanamakkhitahattho viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā,
atk-s0201a0:2107_9: te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a0:2108_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
atk-s0201a0:2108_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanaṃ viya duranubodho.
atk-s0201a0:2108_3: Nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2108_6: Tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha,
atk-s0201a0:2108_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0201a0:2108_10: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho,
atk-s0201a0:2108_11: taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ paṭivijjhissantī”ti dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ namīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2109_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a0:2109_2: “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0201a0:2109_4: te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2109_9: Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
atk-s0201a0:2110_0: Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0201a0:2110_5: bhoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi,
atk-s0201a0:2110_7: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-s0201a0:2110_8: Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2110_9: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2110_12: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā paripākagatapadumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2110_13: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
atk-s0201a0:2111_1: Samalehi cintitoti samalehi chahi satthārehi cintito.
atk-s0201a0:2111_2: Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2111_3: visaṃ siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2111_5: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2111_6: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2112_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathā ṭhitova.
atk-s0201a0:2112_1: Na hi tassa ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2112_4: yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2112_7: sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2112_10: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2112_12: atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2112_17: Evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa,
atk-s0201a0:2112_19: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2112_22: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2112_23: so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
atk-s0201a0:2114_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2115_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati.
atk-s0201a0:2116_6: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2117_46: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2117_48: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0201a0:2118_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0201a0:2118_5: tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
atk-s0201a0:2118_10: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi,
atk-s0201a0:2119_1: evameva ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0201a0:2119_2: Tattha “yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2119_4: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2119_6: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2119_8: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2119_10: Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento “ajja pupphanakāni viya ugghaṭitaññū,
atk-s0201a0:2119_16: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2120_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a0:2120_2: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0201a0:2120_3: sabbepi tīsu bhavesu satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2120_6: ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā
atk-s0201a0:2120_7: acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2120_12: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā “ettakā rāgacaritā,
atk-s0201a0:2120_13: ettakā dosamohacaritā vitakkasaddhābuddhicaritā”ti cha koṭṭhāse akāsi;
atk-s0201a0:2121_5: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu,
atk-s0201a0:2121_8: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2121_9: Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
atk-s0201a0:2122_4: kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti ayaṃ dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko udapādīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2123_1: bodhisatto kira mahābhinikkhamanadivase vivaṭaṃ itthāgāraṃ disvā saṃviggahadayo,
atk-s0201a0:2123_2: “kaṇḍakaṃ āharā”ti channaṃ āmantetvā channasahāyo assarājapiṭṭhigato nagarato nikkhamitvā kaṇḍakanivattanacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2123_3: nāma dassetvā tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rājagahe piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a0:2123_4: caritvā paṇḍavapabbate nisinno magadhissarena raññā nāmagottaṃ pucchitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2123_8: ahaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya lokahitatthāya padhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā loke vivaṭacchado bhavissāmīti nikkhanto”ti vatvā,
atk-s0201a0:2123_9: “tena hi buddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ mayhaṃ vijitaṃ osareyyāsī”ti paṭiññaṃ gahito kālāmañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a0:2123_10: tesaṃ dhammadesanāya sāraṃ avindanto tato pakkamitvā uruveḷāya chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi amataṃ
atk-s0201a0:2124_0: Tadā ca uruvelagāme sujātā nāma kuṭumbiyadhītā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanamakāsi –
atk-s0201a0:2124_1: “sacāhaṃ samānajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2124_4: Sā visākhapuṇṇamadivase pātova balikammaṃ karissāmīti rattiyā paccūsasamaye eva pāyasaṃ paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0201a0:2124_5: Tasmiṃ pāyase paccamāne mahantamahantā pupphuḷā uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭā hutvā sañcaranti.
atk-s0201a0:2124_10: Devatā catūsu dīpesu ojaṃ saṃharitvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2124_11: Bodhisatto bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2124_12: Rukkhamūle sodhanatthāya gatā dhātī āgantvā sujātāya ārocesi –
atk-s0201a0:2124_14: sabbaṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā satasahassagghanike suvaṇṇathāle pāyasaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0201a0:2124_15: pidahitvā ukkhipitvā gatā mahāpurisaṃ disvā saheva pātiyā hatthe ṭhapetvā vanditvā “yathā mayhaṃ manoratho
atk-s0201a0:2125_0: Bodhisatto nerañjarāya tīraṃ gantvā suvaṇṇathālaṃ tīre ṭhapetvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā ekūnapaṇṇāsapiṇḍe
atk-s0201a0:2125_1: karonto pāyasaṃ paribhuñjitvā “sacāhaṃ ajja buddho bhavāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2125_3: Thālaṃ paṭisotaṃ gantvā thokaṃ ṭhatvā kālanāgarājassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ thālāni ukkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2126_0: Mahāsatto vanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2126_1: So padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya akampittha.
atk-s0201a0:2126_3: “ayaṃ mama guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkotī”ti pacchimadisābhāgaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2126_8: tattha pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sunikhātaindakhilo viya niccalamahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2126_9: Mahāsatto “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ kilesabhañjanaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0201a0:2126_10: Tāni cittakārena tūlikaggena paricchinnāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2126_12: “bodhiṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmī”ti caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2127_0: Taṅkhaṇaññeva māro bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma hatthiṃ āruyha navayojanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2127_1: mārabalaṃ gahetvā addhakkhikena olokayamāno pabbato viya ajjhottharanto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2127_3: “mayhaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūrentassa añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā sakkhi natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2127_4: vessantarattabhāve pana mayhaṃ sattasu vāresu mahāpathavī sakkhi ahosi;
atk-s0201a0:2127_5: idānipi me ayameva acetanā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamā mahāpathavī sakkhī”ti hatthaṃ pasāreti.
atk-s0201a0:2127_6: Mahāpathavī tāvadeva ayadaṇḍena pahataṃ kaṃsathālaṃ viya ravasataṃ ravasahassaṃ muñcamānā viravitvā parivattamānā
atk-s0201a0:2127_8: Mahāsatto sūriye dharamāneyeva mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2127_9: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ sammasitvā aruṇodaye buddho hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2127_10: “mayā anekakappakoṭisatasahassaṃ addhānaṃ imassa pallaṅkassa atthāya vāyāmo kato”ti sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2127_12: “kiṃ nu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti kaṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2128_0: Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā
atk-s0201a0:2128_1: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā
atk-s0201a0:2128_2: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañceva bodhirukkhañca
atk-s0201a0:2129_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0201a0:2129_3: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0201a0:2129_5: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0201a0:2129_6: tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi,
atk-s0201a0:2129_7: dhammaṃ vicinanto cettha evaṃ abhidhamme nayamaggaṃ sammasi –
atk-s0201a0:2130_0: Tatthassa saṇhasukhumapaṭṭhānamhi citte otiṇṇe pīti uppajji;
atk-s0201a0:2130_3: Chaviyā pasannāya puratthimakāyato kūṭāgārādippamāṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ākāse pakkhandachaddantanāgakulaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2130_7: vāmaṃsakūṭato uṭṭhahitvā uttaradisāya anantāni cakkavāḷāni pakkhandā,
atk-s0201a0:2130_8: pādatalehi pavāḷaṅkuravaṇṇā rasmiyo nikkhamitvā mahāpathaviṃ vinivijjhitvā udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā vātakkhandhaṃ padāletvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā,
atk-s0201a0:2130_9: sīsato samparivattiyamānaṃ maṇidāmaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇā rasmivaṭṭi uṭṭhahitvā cha devaloke vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0201a0:2130_10: nava brahmaloke vehapphale pañca suddhāvāse ca vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā.
atk-s0201a0:2130_11: Tasmiṃ divase aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2130_12: Taṃ divasañca pana bhagavato sarīrā nikkhantā yāvajjadivasāpi tā rasmiyo anantā lokadhātuyo gacchantiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2131_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ajapālanigrodhe sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ mucalinde nisīdi,
atk-s0201a0:2131_1: nisinnamattasseva cassa sakalaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento mahāakālamegho udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2131_2: Evarūpo kira mahāmegho dvīsuyeva kālesu vassati cakkavattimhi vā uppanne buddhe vā.
atk-s0201a0:2131_4: Tasmiṃ pana uppanne mucalindo nāgarājā cintesi –
atk-s0201a0:2131_5: “ayaṃ megho satthari mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhamatteva uppanno,
atk-s0201a0:2131_7: So sattaratanamayaṃ pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi evaṃ kate mayhaṃ mahapphalaṃ na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2131_8: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmīti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2131_9: Parikkhepassa anto okāso heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2131_10: Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatīti nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2131_16: Evaṃ bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ tattha vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2132_0: Aṭṭhame sattāhe sakkena devānamindena ābhataṃ dantakaṭṭhañca osadhaharītakañca khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a0:2132_1: catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamaye patte tapussabhallikānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā puna paccāgantvā
atk-s0201a0:2132_2: ajapālanigrodhe nisinnassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo ayaṃ vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2133_5: Ñāṇañca pana meti mayhampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0201a0:2133_6: Bhagavā kira devatāya kathiteneva niṭṭhaṃ agantvā sayampi sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento ito sattamadivasamatthake
atk-s0201a0:2133_10: Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāniyo.
atk-s0201a0:2133_11: Akkhaṇe nibbattattā gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotappasādo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2133_15: Ñāṇañca pana meti mayhampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2133_16: Idhāpi kira bhagavā devatāya vacanena sanniṭṭhānaṃ akatvā sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento “hiyyo aḍḍharatte
atk-s0201a0:2133_17: kālaṅkatvā udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbatto”ti addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2133_21: Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pariveṇasammajjanena pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a0:2133_23: Ke pana te pañcavaggiyā nāma? Yete –
atk-s0201a0:2138_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapaṭiggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0201a0:2138_2: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0201a0:2138_9: Te attanā laddhaṃ puṇṇapattaṃ ñātakānaṃ vissajjetvā “ayaṃ mahāpuriso agāraṃ na ajjhāvasissati,
atk-s0201a0:2138_10: ekantena buddho bhavissatī”ti nibbitakkā bodhisattaṃ uddissa samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbajitā.
