atk-s0201a0:2139_0: Ete kira daharakāleyeva bahū mante jāniṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2139_2: Te pacchā amhehi puttadārajaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā na sakkā bhavissati pabbajitunti daharakāleyeva pabbajitvā ramaṇīyāni senāsanāni paribhuñjantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2139_6: tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakamajjhe devo viya sampattiṃ anubhotī”ti vadanti. Te sutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2139_7: “na tāva mahāpurisassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatī”ti appossukkā vihariṃsuyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2139_13: Paricayavasena hesa āḷārañceva kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0201a0:2139_14: Etasmiṃ pana buddhakkhette ṭhapetvā aññāsikoṇḍaññaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2140_0: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2140_2: Tattha jeṭṭhakassa “ekasmiṃ sasse navavāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2140_3: So vappakāle bījaggaṃ nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi –
atk-s0201a0:2140_6: Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappiphāṇitehi yojetvā adāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2140_8: lāyane lāyanaggaṃ veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ kalāpādīsu kalāpaggaṃ khaḷaggaṃ bhaṇḍaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse navavāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2140_12: Iti ekasmiṃ sasse navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā ṭhapetvā theraṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2140_13: “Bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyā”ti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakeneva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2141_0: Isipatane migadāyeti tasmiṃ kira padese anuppanne buddhe paccekasambuddhā gandhamādanapabbate sattāhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2141_1: nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a0:2141_3: Tattha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā gamanakālepi tatoyeva uppatitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2141_4: Iti isayo ettha nipatanti uppatanti cāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ isipatananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2141_5: Migānaṃ pana abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2142_1: Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhissa ca vivare tigāvutantare ṭhāne.
atk-s0201a0:2142_4: Upako bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2142_6: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2142_12: Addhānamaggagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge “addhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2143_2: Sabbesu dhammesu anupalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu kilesalepanena anupalitto.
atk-s0201a0:2143_3: Sabbaṃ jahoti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a0:2143_4: Taṇhākkhaye vimuttoti taṇhākkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0201a0:2143_5: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ attanāva jānitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2143_6: Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2144_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2144_1: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ paṭibhāgapuggalo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2144_2: Sammāsambuddhoti sahetunā nayena cattāri saccāni sayaṃ buddho.
atk-s0201a0:2144_6: Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkapaṭilābhāya amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2145_4: migaluddako dūre migavaṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahante mā pamajjī”ti chāvaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi.
atk-s0201a0:2145_5: Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā.
atk-s0201a0:2145_6: Dutiyadivase upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā rāgena abhibhūto
atk-s0201a0:2145_7: bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā sace
atk-s0201a0:2145_10: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2145_12: Māgaviko āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmīti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva gantvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2145_23: kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātunti.
atk-s0201a0:2146_4: “amhākampi etadeva ruccatī”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2146_8: migaluddakassa putta mā rodī”tiādīni vadamānā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi.
atk-s0201a0:2146_12: Chāvā evamayaṃ aṭṭīyatīti ñatvā punappunaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a0:2147_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0201a0:2147_1: Atha kho bhagavā paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “yo,
atk-s0201a0:2147_5: Upakopi kho “kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī”ti pucchanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā kuhiṃ anantajinoti pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2147_15: So kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu nibbatto.
atk-s0201a0:2147_17: Avihesu nibbattamattā hi satta janā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2151_0: Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
atk-s0201a0:2152_0: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bahuraggi ca saṅgiyo;
atk-s0201a0:2153_0: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upajjhagu”nti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2154_5: Apica kho āsanaṃ ṭhapetabbanti apica kho panassa uccakule nibbattassa āsanamattaṃ ṭhapetabbanti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2154_6: Nāsakkhiṃsūti buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā abhibhūtā attano katikāya ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2154_7: Nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācarantīti gotamāti,
atk-s0201a0:2154_10: mayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhānakāle tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarimhā,
atk-s0201a0:2154_14: kacci amhesu pakkantesu na cintayitthāti evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2154_19: Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha nu mama.
atk-s0201a0:2154_20: Evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametanti etaṃ evarūpaṃ vākyabhedanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2154_21: Api nu ahaṃ uruvelāya padhāne tumhākaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ rattiṃ vā divā vā āgantvā, – “āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2154_23: mayhaṃ obhāso vā nimittaṃ vā paññāyatī”ti evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ akāsinti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:2154_25: “handa addhā esa buddho jāto”ti saddahitvā no hetaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2154_31: pañcavaggiye bhikkhū buddho ahanti jānāpetuṃ asakkhiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2154_33: Attano buddhabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā koṇḍaññattheraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2154_34: Suttapariyosāne thero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2155_2: bhikkhū ovadāmītiādi pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya piṇḍapātatthāyapi gāmaṃ appavisanadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2155_3: Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānesu uppannamalavisodhanatthaṃ bhagavā antovihāreyeva ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2155_4: Uppanne uppanne kammaṭṭhānamale tepi bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā pucchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2155_5: Bhagavāpi tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā malaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0201a0:2155_6: Atha nesaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ nīhaṭabhattena ovadiyamānānaṃ vappatthero pāṭipadadivase sotāpanno ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2155_10: Pakkhassa pana pañcamiyaṃ sabbeva te ekato sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0201a0:2155_17: Ettakaṃ kathāmaggaṃ bhagavā yaṃ pubbe avaca –
atk-s0201a0:2155_19: ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā”ti imaṃ ekameva anusandhiṃ dassento āhari.
atk-s0201a0:2156_1: Idāni yasmā na agāriyānaṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇapariyesanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2156_2: anagāriyānampi cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantānaṃ pañcakāmaguṇavasena anariyapariyesanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2156_6: Tattha navarattesu pattacīvarādīsu cakkhuviññeyyā rūpātiādayo cattāro kāmaguṇā labbhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2156_8: Manuññe piṇḍapāte bhesajje ca pañcapi labbhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2156_13: Evaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe dassetvā idāni ye evaṃ vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2156_16: tesaṃ paṭisedhanatthāya “pabbajitānampi catūsu paccayesu appaccavekkhaṇaparibhogo anariyapariyesanā evā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2157_0: Idāni tassatthassa sādhakaṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0201a0:2157_4: luddakena araññe ṭhapitapāso viya cattāro paccayā,
atk-s0201a0:2157_5: tassa luddassa pāsarāsiṃ ajjhottharitvā sayanakālo viya tesaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhogakālo.
atk-s0201a0:2157_6: Luddake āgacchante magassa yena kāmaṃ agamanakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyakālo,
atk-s0201a0:2157_8: Magassa pana abaddhassa pāsarāsiṃ adhisayitakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ catūsu paccayesu paccavekkhaṇaparibhogo,
atk-s0201a0:2157_9: luddake āgacchante magassa yena kāmaṃ gamanaṃ viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ māravasaṃ anupagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2162_11: setāya sudaṃ vālabījaniyā bījiyatī”ti evaṃ vuttena sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0201a0:2163_8: Tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti evaṃ aṭṭha vā dasa vā sukhena ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:2164_0: Sāvatthiyā niyyātīti so kira channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2164_1: Ito ettakehi divasehi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatīti puretarameva ghosanā karīyati;
atk-s0201a0:2164_2: taṃ sutvā ye nagarato na pakkantā,
atk-s0201a0:2164_7: tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi abhippakiritvā puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0201a0:2164_8: ṭhapetvā kadaliyo ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2164_9: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0201a0:2164_10: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti;
atk-s0201a0:2164_11: tato mahājanassa sannipātanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva taruṇadārakānaṃ phalāphalāni vikiritvā tadanantaraṃ māsakarūpāni;
atk-s0201a0:2164_15: Atha brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā nagaraṃ anuvicarati.
atk-s0201a0:2164_16: Puññavantā manussā ekabhūmakādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti.
atk-s0201a0:2164_17: Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2165_2: Pilotikaṃ paribbājakanti pilotikāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavohāravasena laddhanāmaṃ paribbājakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2165_3: So kira paribbājako daharo paṭhamavaye ṭhito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo buddhupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0201a0:2165_4: pātova tathāgatassa ceva mahātherānañca upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā tidaṇḍakuṇḍikādiparikkhāraṃ ādāya jetavanā nikkhamitvā nagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2165_6: Etadavocāti anukkamena santikaṃ āgataṃ sañjānitvā etaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2165_7: “handa kuto nu bhavaṃ vacchāyano āgacchatī”ti gottaṃ kittento vacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a0:2165_8: Paṇḍito maññeti bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati,
atk-s0201a0:2166_1: samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānane ahaṃ ko nāma?
atk-s0201a0:2166_2: Ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmīti kuto cāhaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2166_5: Sopi nūnassa tādisovāti yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyya,
atk-s0201a0:2166_6: sopi nūna dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto tādiso buddhoyeva bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2166_7: Sineruṃ vā himavantaṃ vā pathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā pametukāmena tappamāṇova daṇḍo vā rajju vā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2166_8: Samaṇassa gotamassa paññaṃ jānantenapi tassa ñāṇasadisameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2166_10: Uḷārāyāti uttarāya seṭṭhāya. Ko cāhaṃ, bhoti, bho,
atk-s0201a0:2166_11: ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa pasaṃsane ko nāma?
atk-s0201a0:2166_12: Ko ca samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsissāmīti kena kāraṇena pasaṃsissāmi?
atk-s0201a0:2166_13: Pasatthapasatthoti sabbaguṇānaṃ uttaritarehi sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho,
atk-s0201a0:2166_15: Yathā hi campakapupphaṃ vā nīluppalaṃ vā padumaṃ vā lohitacandanaṃ vā attano vaṇṇagandhasiriyāva pāsādikañceva sugandhañca,
atk-s0201a0:2166_16: na tassa āgantukehi vaṇṇagandhehi thomanakiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2166_17: Yathā ca maṇiratanaṃ vā candamaṇḍalaṃ vā attano ālokeneva obhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:2166_19: Evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho thomito sabbalokassa seṭṭhataṃ pāpito,
atk-s0201a0:2167_6: aññepi te te khattiyā tehi tehi jānapadehi pasatthā.
atk-s0201a0:2168_1: Athassa paribbājako attano pasādakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto seyyathāpi, bho,
atk-s0201a0:2168_4: Parato pana uggahitasippo puriso nāgavanikoti āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2169_4: Kataparappavādeti viññātaparappavāde ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye ca.
atk-s0201a0:2169_6: Te bhindantā maññe carantīti vālavedhi viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2169_7: Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharontīti dupadampi tipadampi catuppadampi pañhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2169_9: Na ceva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti;
atk-s0201a0:2169_11: Bhagavā kira parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento parisāya ajjhāsayaṃ oloketi,
atk-s0201a0:2169_13: “ime khattiyapaṇḍitā guḷhaṃ rahassaṃ pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2169_14: So tehi apuṭṭhoyeva evarūpe pañhe pucchāya ettakā dosā,
atk-s0201a0:2169_16: atthe pade akkhare ettakāti ime pañhe pucchanto evaṃ puccheyya,
atk-s0201a0:2169_18: iti ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānīte pañhe dhammakathāya antare pakkhipitvā viddhaṃseti.
atk-s0201a0:2169_20: ye mayaṃ ime pañhe na pucchimhā,
atk-s0201a0:2169_22: appatiṭṭheva no katvā samaṇo gotamo khipeyyā”ti attamanā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a0:2170_0: Apica buddhā nāma dhammaṃ desentā parisaṃ mettāya pharanti,
atk-s0201a0:2170_2: buddhā ca nāma rūpaggappattā honti dassanasampannā madhurassarā mudujivhā suphusitadantāvaraṇā amatena hadayaṃ siñcantā viya dhammaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:2170_3: Tatra nesaṃ mettāpharaṇena pasannacittānaṃ evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0201a0:2170_4: “evarūpaṃ advejjhakathaṃ amoghakathaṃ niyyānikakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā saddhiṃ na sakkhissāma paccanīkaggāhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2171_8: iminā thokena anupasaṅkamanamattena apayirupāsanamatteneva naṭṭhā bhaveyyāma.
atk-s0201a0:2172_2: Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2172_5: yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2172_8: Evameva yaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2172_9: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a0:2172_12: Hatthipadopamoti hatthipadaṃ upamā assa dhammassāti hatthipadopamo.
atk-s0201a0:2172_13: So na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2172_15: Atha kasmā idha kusaloti na vuttoti?
atk-s0201a0:2172_20: Tasmā idha kusaloti avatvā parato vutto.
atk-s0201a0:2173_1: Vāmanikāti rassā āyāmatopi na dīghā mahākucchihatthiniyo.
atk-s0201a0:2173_2: Uccā ca nisevitanti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2173_3: Uccā kāḷārikāti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisapādā hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2173_5: Tāsaṃ kira eko danto unnato hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2173_9: Uccā ca dantehi ārañjitānīti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese pharasunā pahataṭṭhānaṃ viya dāṭṭhāhi chinnaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2173_10: Uccā kaṇerukā nāmāti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisadīghapādā hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2173_14: So niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti so nāgavaniko yassa vatāhaṃ nāgassa anupadaṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2173_16: Yañhi ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ padaṃ disvā vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ idaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhaṃ na gato,
atk-s0201a0:2173_17: yampi tato orabhāge disvā kāḷārikānaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2173_19: sabbaṃ taṃ imasseva mahāhatthino padanti mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2174_1: nāgavanaṃ viya hi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2174_5: Nāgavanikassa tattha tattha hatthipadaṃ disvāpi vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2174_6: kāḷārikānaṃ kaṇerukānaṃ padaṃ bhavissatīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo viya yogino,
atk-s0201a0:2174_7: imā jhānābhiññā nāma bāhirakaparibbājakānampi santīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo.
atk-s0201a0:2174_9: tattha tattha mayā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ imasseva mahāhatthino,
atk-s0201a0:2174_10: na aññassāti mahāhatthiṃ disvā niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa arahattaṃ patvāva niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2174_11: Idañca pana opammasaṃsandanaṃ matthake ṭhatvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2174_13: Anukkamāgataṃ pana pāḷipadaṃ gahetvā idheva kataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2174_15: Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:2176_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2177_3: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2177_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brāhmaṇa imasmiṃ loke tathāgato uppajjati arahaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2178_2: Loke uppajjatīti ettha pana lokoti okāsaloko sattaloko saṅkhāralokoti tividho.
atk-s0201a0:2178_4: Sattaloke uppajjamānopi ca tathāgato na devaloke,
atk-s0201a0:2178_25: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimapadese uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2178_27: paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2178_28: Tattha tathāgato sujātāya dinnamadhupāyasabhojanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggo,
atk-s0201a0:2178_36: Idha sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2178_37: tathāgato loke uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:2179_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2179_15: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko,
atk-s0201a0:2180_4: Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko avasesasabbasattaloko vā.
atk-s0201a0:2181_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassa lokassa sacchikatabhāvamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2181_7: ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2181_8: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a0:2181_15: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2181_16: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0201a0:2181_23: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipetvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussa”nti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2181_24: Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
atk-s0201a0:2182_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti sayanti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā.
atk-s0201a0:2182_7: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2182_8: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2182_9: Ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti. Majjhepi…
atk-s0201a0:2182_10: pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2183_2: Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2183_10: majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva.
atk-s0201a0:2183_17: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2183_21: etaṃ pariyosāna”nti hi ettha phalaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2183_24: brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2183_26: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2186_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanā nissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2186_2: Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2186_4: Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhasabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā,
atk-s0201a0:2186_5: tassa damiḷakirāsavarādimilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2188_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:2189_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2190_6: Yo hi idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmīti deseti,
atk-s0201a0:2190_8: Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2190_10: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2190_11: Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2190_13: evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2190_15: Brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2191_1: Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti?
atk-s0201a0:2191_3: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2191_4: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2191_5: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:2191_6: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2191_7: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2191_8: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā,
atk-s0201a0:2191_10: iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-s0201a0:2192_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2192_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a0:2192_4: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0201a0:2192_9: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati.
atk-s0201a0:2192_13: Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato.
atk-s0201a0:2193_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2193_3: Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2193_5: idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2193_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0201a0:2193_7: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti.
atk-s0201a0:2193_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2193_13: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2194_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
atk-s0201a0:2194_2: yattha cete saha jīvanti ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti,
atk-s0201a0:2194_3: taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
atk-s0201a0:2194_5: sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2194_6: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva.
atk-s0201a0:2194_8: Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2194_9: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2194_10: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2194_11: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a0:2194_17: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2195_6: athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2196_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-s0201a0:2197_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-s0201a0:2197_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0201a0:2197_8: jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0201a0:2197_13: assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2197_14: Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhilo viya ca thirakatho hoti;
atk-s0201a0:2197_15: asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na katheti;
atk-s0201a0:2197_19: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2197_21: asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2197_30: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2198_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2198_2: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnampi mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2198_3: ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a0:2198_6: “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2198_13: te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2198_15: Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2199_6: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0201a0:2199_17: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0201a0:2199_18: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0201a0:2200_9: Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:2200_13: Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2200_15: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2200_16: yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-s0201a0:2200_17: tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0201a0:2200_18: na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2201_1: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa
atk-s0201a0:2201_2: ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0201a0:2201_7: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2201_11: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṃgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2201_13: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2201_14: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca,
atk-s0201a0:2201_15: antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā.
atk-s0201a0:2201_16: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0201a0:2201_22: Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2201_24: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2202_4: Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2202_12: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:2203_3: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:2203_5: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2203_7: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0201a0:2203_14: gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2203_15: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2203_17: tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2204_2: Tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2204_3: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2204_5: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0201a0:2204_7: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2204_9: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2204_13: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2204_14: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva addhakulaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2204_15: “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2204_16: Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte –
atk-s0201a0:2204_17: “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2205_2: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena,
atk-s0201a0:2205_3: “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti;
atk-s0201a0:2205_4: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0201a0:2205_6: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2205_7: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0201a0:2205_9: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0201a0:2206_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2206_1: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2206_3: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2206_7: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, “na me, bho,
atk-s0201a0:2206_10: Tena hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho,
atk-s0201a0:2206_14: evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2206_15: So kāraṇaṃ vadatīti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0201a0:2207_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0201a0:2207_5: tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2207_6: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2207_12: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0201a0:2207_18: gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2208_1: So santuṭṭho hotīti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2208_2: Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti
atk-s0201a0:2208_3: tīṇi cīvarāni patto dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi ekā sūci kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti.
atk-s0201a0:2209_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:2211_0: Te sabbepi kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:2211_1: Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2211_2: cīvarakaṇṇena udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalaggahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2211_3: Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nahānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2211_5: Vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2211_8: pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0201a0:2211_13: pānīyaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihārikaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2212_0: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2212_1: Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2212_2: Ekādasaparikkhārikassa kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2212_3: Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2212_7: Etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova.
atk-s0201a0:2212_8: Bhagavā pana nayimaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi,
atk-s0201a0:2212_10: So hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā
atk-s0201a0:2212_11: ticīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0201a0:2212_13: iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā,
atk-s0201a0:2213_2: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2213_3: “mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”tissa saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2213_5: yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2219_4: sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti.
atk-s0201a0:2219_5: “Idaṃ ajjatanāya idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti nesaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2219_6: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a0:2219_7: na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a0:2219_8: atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:2219_11: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati.
atk-s0201a0:2220_1: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2220_6: Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2220_7: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
atk-s0201a0:2221_3: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2221_5: tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2221_9: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0201a0:2221_12: so hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati,
atk-s0201a0:2221_13: araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0201a0:2221_14: itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2222_6: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2222_17: Apica “vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā”ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2222_24: “Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī”ti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2222_26: Imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2223_1: sabbametaṃ arañña”nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2223_2: “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2223_6: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena vījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2223_14: Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0201a0:2223_15: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2223_26: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-s0201a0:2223_27: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:2224_4: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0201a0:2224_6: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2224_11: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2224_14: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0201a0:2224_19: tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2225_0: Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko,
atk-s0201a0:2225_1: tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:2225_4: Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti.
atk-s0201a0:2225_9: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikammāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti byāpādo.
atk-s0201a0:2225_16: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divā diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasamatthatāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:2225_17: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:2225_24: kathamime kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2225_26: imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a0:2226_1: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0201a0:2226_2: uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā pātenti;
atk-s0201a0:2226_4: Tathāgatapadaṃ itipīti idampi tathāgatassa ñāṇapadaṃ ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2227_2: Natveva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti imā jhānābhiññā bāhirakehipi sādhāraṇāti na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2227_3: Maggakkhaṇepi apariyositakiccatāya na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2227_4: Apica kho niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti apica kho pana maggakkhaṇe mahāhatthiṃ passanto nāgavaniko viya sammāsambuddho
atk-s0201a0:2227_5: bhagavāti iminā ākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2227_6: Niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti evaṃ maggakkhaṇe niṭṭhaṃ gacchanto arahattaphalakkhaṇe pariyositasabbakiccatāya sabbākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2231_9: Ye keci kusalā dhammāti ye keci lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā kusalā dhammā.
atk-s0201a0:2231_15: Tattha “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu sabbe brāhmaṇā”ti evaṃ samānajātivasena saṅgaho sajātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2231_16: “Sabbe kosalakā sabbe māgadhakā”ti evaṃ sañjātidesavasena saṅgaho sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2231_17: “Sabbe rathikā sabbe dhanuggahā”ti evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho kiriyasaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2231_21: tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti,
atk-s0201a0:2232_0: Nanu ca “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatāti pañhassa vissajjane samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2232_5: siyā abyākata”nti āgatattā catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ diyaḍḍhameva saccaṃ bhajati.
atk-s0201a0:2232_6: Atha kasmā mahāthero catūsu ariyasaccesu gaṇanaṃ gacchatīti āhāti?
atk-s0201a0:2232_14: sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhā”ti ettha sādhikamidaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ ekā adhisīlasikkhāva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2232_15: taṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti dassito,
atk-s0201a0:2232_17: Yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassa catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse otiṇṇānipi dvīsu tīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0201a0:2232_18: otiṇṇānipi siṅgālasasamigādīnaṃ pādāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gatāneva honti.
atk-s0201a0:2232_20: Evameva ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi catūsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammā catūsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatāva honti;
atk-s0201a0:2232_21: saccānaṃ antogadhattāti diyaḍḍhasaccagaṇanaṃ gatepi kusaladhamme “sabbe te catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2232_22: “Dukkhe ariyasacce”tiādīsu uddesapadesu ceva jātipi dukkhātiādīsu niddesapadesu ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2233_1: Yathā hi cheko vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chetvā tato tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā pañcadhā bhindeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2233_2: tatopi cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā phālento pañca pesiyo kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:2233_3: tato catasso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phāletvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a0:2233_4: kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya tato samuggabījanitālavaṇṭādinānappakāraṃ veḷuvikatiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:2233_5: so piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca catasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse kammāya na upanessatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2233_8: Evameva ayaṃ mahātheropi vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā cattāro koṭṭhāse viya,
atk-s0201a0:2233_9: imaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catuariyasaccavasena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2233_10: Vilīvakārassa tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā tassa pañcadhā karaṇaṃ viya therassa tīṇi ariyasaccāni
atk-s0201a0:2233_11: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ gahetvā bhājentassa khandhavasena pañcadhā karaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2233_12: Tato yathā so vilīvakāro cattāro koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā pañcadhā phālesi,
atk-s0201a0:2233_13: evaṃ thero cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā rūpakkhandhaṃ vibhajanto cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpanti pañcadhā akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2233_14: Tato yathā so vilīvakāro catasso pesiyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phālesi,
atk-s0201a0:2233_15: evaṃ thero upādāya rūpañca tisso ca dhātuyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajanto ajjhattikabāhiravasena dvidhā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2233_16: Yathā so vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya nānappakāraṃ vilīvavikatiṃ akāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2233_17: evaṃ thero bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vīsatiyā ākārehi vibhajitvā dassetuṃ katamā cāvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2234_0: Yathā pana vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca cattasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse anupubbena kammāya upanessati,
atk-s0201a0:2234_2: evaṃ theropi bāhirañca pathavīdhātuṃ itarā ca tisso dhātuyo upādārūpañca itare ca cattāro arūpino khandhe
atk-s0201a0:2234_3: itarāni ca tīṇi ariyasaccāni anupubbena vibhajitvā dassessati,
atk-s0201a0:2235_2: So tesaṃ piḷandhanaparikkhāraṃ catūsu peḷāsu ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhaputtassa appesi – “idaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0201a0:2235_3: bhātikānaṃ piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ tathārūpe chaṇe sampatte piḷandhanaṃ no dehīti yācantānaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2235_5: tathārūpe chaṇadivase rājaputtā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “piḷandhanaṃ no, tāta, detha,
atk-s0201a0:2235_7: jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2235_9: Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2235_13: catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā tisso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā,
atk-s0201a0:2235_14: tato pañca samugge nīharitvā cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā,
atk-s0201a0:2235_15: tato pañcasu karaṇḍesu nīharitesu cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā tato hatthūpagapādūpagādīni
atk-s0201a0:2235_17: So kiñcāpi itarehi catūhi karaṇḍehi itarehi catūhi samuggehi itarāhi tīhi peḷāhi na tāva bhājetvā deti,
atk-s0201a0:2236_9: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jāto dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadāyādo,
atk-s0201a0:2236_10: no āmisadāyādo’ti sāriputtameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2239_0: Rañño tesaṃ puttānaṃ piḷandhanaṃ catūsu peḷāsu pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe ṭhapitakālo viya bhagavato
atk-s0201a0:2239_5: pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetuṃ paññāpetuṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2239_6: Tathārūpe khaṇe tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piḷandhanaṃ yācanakālo viya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0201a0:2239_8: Upakaṭṭhāya kira vassūpanāyikāya idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ. Rañño, “tātā,
atk-s0201a0:2239_9: jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathā”ti vuttakālo viya sambuddhenāpi, “sevetha,
atk-s0201a0:2239_14: Paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā sabrahmacārīna”nti evaṃ dhammasenāpatino santike bhikkhūnaṃ pesitakālo.
atk-s0201a0:2240_0: Rājaputtehi rañño kathaṃ sutvā jeṭṭhabhātikassa santikaṃ gantvā piḷandhanaṃ yācitakālo viya bhikkhūhi
atk-s0201a0:2240_1: satthukathaṃ sutvā dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ āyācitakālo.
atk-s0201a0:2240_2: Jeṭṭhabhātikassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā ṭhapanaṃ viya dhammasenāpatissa imaṃ suttantaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2240_3: ārabhitvā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ vasena mātikāya ṭhapanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2240_4: Tisso peḷāyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcasamugganīharaṇaṃ viya tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2240_6: Cattāro samugge ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcakaraṇḍanīharaṇaṃ viya cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a0:2241_1: Cattāro karaṇḍe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā hatthūpagapādūpagādipiḷandhanadānaṃ viya
atk-s0201a0:2241_2: tīṇi mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajantassa bāhiraṃ tāva pidhānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a0:2241_3: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi dassanatthaṃ “katamā cāvuso ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū”tiādivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2242_0: Tassa pana rājaputtassa tehi catūhi karaṇḍehi catūhi samuggehi tīhi ca peḷāhi pacchā anupubbena nīharitvā
atk-s0201a0:2242_1: piḷandhanadānaṃ viya therassāpi itaresañca tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpānañca catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānañca
atk-s0201a0:2242_2: tiṇṇaṃ ariyasaccānañca pacchā anupubbena bhājetvā dassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2242_15: udariyaṃ karīsanti idaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa kulaputtassa ajjhattikapathavīdhātuvasena tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2242_16: Ettha pana manasikāraṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gahetukāmena yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2242_21: “ayampi acetanā abyākatā suññā thaddhā pathavīdhātu evā”ti manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2242_22: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti idaṃ itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu anugatāya pathavīdhātuyā gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2242_23: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātūti yā ca ayaṃ vuttappakārā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a0:2242_24: Yā ca bāhirāti yā ca vibhaṅge,
atk-s0201a0:2242_25: “ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsa”ntiādinā nayena āgatā bāhirā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a0:2243_0: Ettāvatā therena ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi vitthārena dassitā,
atk-s0201a0:2243_2: Yasmiñhi ṭhāne sattānaṃ ālayo nikanti patthanā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmāso balavā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2243_3: tattha tesaṃ ālayādīnaṃ uddharaṇatthaṃ buddhā vā buddhasāvakā vā vitthārakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:2243_6: Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasamāno yattha mūlasantānakānaṃ balavatāya naṅgalaṃ laggati,
atk-s0201a0:2243_7: tattha goṇe ṭhapetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā mūlasantānakāni chetvā chetvā uddharanto bahuṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2243_9: tattha balavaṃ payogaṃ katvā goṇe piṭṭhiyaṃ paharamāno kasatiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2244_0: Pathavīdhāturevesāti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena kakkhaḷaṭṭhena pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātuyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2244_1: āvusoti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2244_4: tasmā sā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggaho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2244_6: Yathā dantena goṇena saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visūkāyati vipphandati,
atk-s0201a0:2244_8: Evaṃ ajjhattikāpi bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanābhāvo na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2244_9: atha na cirenevassā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2244_10: Taṃ netaṃ mamāti taṃ ubhayampi na etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a0:2244_12: na eso me attāti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2244_15: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2245_2: Bāhiraāpodhātuvasena bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā vināsaṃ dassetvā tato visesatarena upādinnāya sarīraṭṭhakapathavīdhātuyā vināsadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2245_4: Antarahitā tasmiṃ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hotīti tasmiṃ samaye koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe khārodakena
atk-s0201a0:2245_5: vilīyamānā udakānugatā hutvā sabbā pabbatādivasena saṇṭhitā pathavīdhātu antarahitā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2248_6: iti sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2248_10: taṃ anattāti tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni āgatāneva honti.
atk-s0201a0:2248_12: tattha dvīhākārehi imassa kāyassa parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā ṭhitiparittatāya ca sarasaparittatāya ca.
atk-s0201a0:2251_0: Idaṃ etasseva parittaṭṭhitidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ṭhitiparittatāya parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2253_0: Taṇhupādinnassāti taṇhāya ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā.
atk-s0201a0:2253_1: Atha khvāssa notevettha hotīti atha kho assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā passantassa ettha
atk-s0201a0:2253_2: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā ahanti vātiādi tividho taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho noteva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2253_5: evaṃ tejodhātuvāyodhātuvasenapi bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2254_1: āvusoti idha tassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno sotadvāre pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapento balaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2254_4: evañca evañca taṃ karissāmāti vācāya paribhāsanti.
atk-s0201a0:2254_8: So evanti so dhātukammaṭṭhāniko evaṃ sampajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2254_9: Uppannā kho me ayanti sampativattamānuppannabhāvena ca samudācāruppannabhāvena ca uppannā.
atk-s0201a0:2254_11: phasso aniccoti sotasamphasso hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passati.
atk-s0201a0:2254_22: Ayañhi sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagate mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikavasena pariggahaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2255_0: Evaṃ katapariggahassa hi dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balavavipassakassa sacepi cakkhudvārādīsu ārammaṇe āpāthagate ayoniso āvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2255_1: voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otarati,
atk-s0201a0:2255_4: Aparassa rāgādivasena ekaṃ vāraṃ javanaṃ javati,
atk-s0201a0:2255_5: javanapariyosāne pana rāgādivasena evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2255_7: Aparassa ekavāraṃ evaṃ āvajjato puna dutiyavāraṃ rāgādivasena javanaṃ javatiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2255_8: dutiyavārāvasāne pana evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2256_0: Evaṃ sotadvāre pariggahitavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balaṃ dassetvā idāni kāyadvāre dīpento tañce,
atk-s0201a0:2256_2: Aniṭṭhārammaṇañhi patvā dvīsu vāresu kilamati sotadvāre ca kāyadvāre ca.
atk-s0201a0:2256_3: Tasmā yathā nāma khettassāmī puriso kudālaṃ gahetvā khettaṃ anusañcaranto yattha vā tattha vā mattikapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2256_4: adatvā dubbalaṭṭhānesuyeva kudālena bhūmiṃ bhinditvā satiṇamattikapiṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2256_5: Evameva mahāthero anāgate sikkhākāmā padhānakammikā kulaputtā imesu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippameva
atk-s0201a0:2256_6: jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantīti imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu gāḷhaṃ katvā saṃvaraṃ desento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2257_6: Evaṃ buddhaṃ anussaratotiādīsu itipi so bhagavātiādinā nayena anussarantopi buddhaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a0:2257_7: vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2257_8: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammotiādinā nayena anussarantopi dhammaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a0:2257_11: kakacokantanaṃ adhivāsayamānassa bhikkhuno guṇaṃ anussaramānopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2258_0: Upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti idha vipassanupekkhā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a0:2258_2: sā panesā kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu arajjanādivasena pavattati,
atk-s0201a0:2258_3: ayaṃ pana bhikkhu vīriyabalena bhāvanāsiddhiyā attano vipassanaṃ khīṇāsavassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapetīti vipassanāva chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0201a0:2259_3: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2259_9: uddhane āropitaudakaṃ viya khayaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a0:2260_2: Tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti tejogataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2260_3: Purime āpogatepi pacchime vāyogatepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:2260_7: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati,
atk-s0201a0:2260_9: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo dayhati,
atk-s0201a0:2260_10: so ca puggalo dayhāmi dayhāmīti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepañca tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
atk-s0201a0:2260_11: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yena taṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi,
atk-s0201a0:2260_14: sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2260_18: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2261_9: tejosaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ jhāpetvā chārikāmattampi na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2261_11: Aggiṃ gavesantīti evarūpaṃ sukhumaṃ upādānaṃ gahetvā aggiṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0201a0:2262_1: Vāyodhātuniddese uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā.
atk-s0201a0:2262_5: Aṅgamaṅgānusārinoti dhamanījālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakavātā.
atk-s0201a0:2262_10: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2263_0: Gāmampi vahatīti sakalagāmampi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānā ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2264_8: Ākāso parivāritoti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ākāso ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2264_9: Agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti agāranti paṇṇattimattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2264_10: Kaṭṭhādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ rāsikatesu kaṭṭharāsivallirāsītveva vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2264_11: Evameva khoti evameva aṭṭhiādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso,
atk-s0201a0:2264_12: tāneva aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2264_14: Yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ khattiyagehaṃ brāhmaṇagehanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2264_16: na hettha koci satto vā jīvo vā vijjati.
atk-s0201a0:2265_2: Heṭṭhā upādārūpaṃ cattāro ca arūpino khandhā tīṇi ca ariyasaccāni na kathitāni,
atk-s0201a0:2265_3: idāni tāni kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2265_4: Tattha cakkhuṃ aparibhinnanti cakkhupasāde niruddhepi upahatepi pittasemhalohitehi palibuddhepi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2265_6: cakkhuviññāṇassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2265_8: Tajjo samannāhāroti taṃ cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭicca bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppajjanamanasikāro,
atk-s0201a0:2265_10: Taṃ rūpānaṃ anāpāthagatattāpi aññāvihitassapi na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2266_0: Yaṃ tathābhūtassātiādīsu dvāravasena cattāri saccāni dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2266_3: Rūpanti cakkhuviññāṇassa na rūpajanakattā cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2266_12: Yo paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatīti yo paccaye passati.
atk-s0201a0:2266_13: So dhammaṃ passatīti so paṭiccasamuppannadhamme passati,
atk-s0201a0:2266_20: iti tīṇi saccāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva maggasaccaṃ āharitvā gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2266_21: yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi bhāvanāpaṭivedho,
atk-s0201a0:2266_23: Bahukataṃ hotīti ettāvatāpi bahuṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2267_0: Manodvāre pana ajjhattiko mano nāma bhavaṅgacittaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2267_1: Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi paribhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2267_2: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2267_4: Neva tāva tajjassāti idaṃ bhavaṅgasamayeneva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2267_15: Iti mahāthero heṭṭhā ekadesameva sammasanto āgantvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā heṭṭhā parihīnadesanaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2267_16: taṃtaṃdvāravasena bhājetvā dassento yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a0:2271_2: Tattha acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā nacirapakkante saliṅgeneva pāṭiyekke jāte.
atk-s0201a0:2272_2: ekacco kulaputtoti kiñcāpi asukakulaputtoti na niyāmito,
atk-s0201a0:2272_3: devadattaṃyeva pana sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2272_4: So hi asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā okkākavaṃse jātattā jātikulaputto.
atk-s0201a0:2272_12: Apaññātāti dvinnaṃ janānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne na paññāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:2272_15: purato vā pacchato vā gacchantaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2273_0: Sārena sārakaraṇīyanti rukkhasārena kattabbaṃ akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci.
atk-s0201a0:2273_1: Sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassāti maggaphalasārassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2273_3: Tena ca vosānaṃ āpādīti teneva ca alamettāvatā sāro me pattoti vosānaṃ āpanno.
atk-s0201a0:2274_2: dibbacakkhu ca pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ matthake ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2274_4: Ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantīti kiñci sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ ajānantā antamaso paṃsupisācakampi apassantā viharanti.
atk-s0201a0:2275_3: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
atk-s0201a0:2275_5: ayaṃ asamayavimokkho”ti evaṃ vutte navalokuttaradhamme ārādheti sampādeti paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a0:2275_6: Lokiyasamāpattiyo hi appitappitakkhaṇeyeva paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanti, tasmā,
atk-s0201a0:2275_8: Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0201a0:2275_11: sakiṃ vimuttāni hi maggaphalāni vimuttāneva honti.
atk-s0201a0:2275_12: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi accantaṃ vimuttamevāti ime nava dhammā asamayavimokkhoti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:2276_4: Etaṃ sāranti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa sāraṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2276_5: Etaṃ pariyosānanti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, esā koṭi,
atk-s0201a0:2276_6: na ito paraṃ pattabbaṃ atthīti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a0:2280_5: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0201a0:2280_10: appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”tiādinā nayena samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0201a0:2280_12: Sādhusammatāti ime sādhu sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0201a0:2280_17: So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto,
atk-s0201a0:2280_23: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a0:2280_26: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0201a0:2280_27: So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
atk-s0201a0:2280_29: Tassa santike aññepi pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2281_2: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta,
atk-s0201a0:2281_4: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0201a0:2281_6: Sopi sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi,
atk-s0201a0:2282_4: tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:2282_11: sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2283_6: uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2283_8: “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2284_3: kilesagaṇṭharahitā mayanti evaṃ vāditāya laddhanāmavasena nigaṇṭho.
atk-s0201a0:2284_8: sace nesaṃ sā paṭiññā niyyānikā sabbe abbhaññaṃsu. No ce,
atk-s0201a0:2284_10: Tasmā kiṃ tesaṃ paṭiññā niyyānikā na niyyānikāti,
atk-s0201a0:2284_12: Atha bhagavā nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato alanti paṭikkhipitvā upamāya atthaṃ pavedento dhammameva desetuṃ, dhammaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2285_2: Na chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ na janayati.
atk-s0201a0:2285_3: Na vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2286_2: vivicceva kāmehīti kathaṃ ime paṭhamajjhānādidhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā jātāti?
atk-s0201a0:2286_7: Iti bhagavā idampi suttaṃ yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2291_2: Tattha nātike viharatīti nātikā nāma ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā,
atk-s0201a0:2291_5: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye bhagavā mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto vajjiraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno nātikaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0201a0:2291_6: Nātikavāsino manussā bhagavato mahādānaṃ datvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannahadayā,
atk-s0201a0:2291_7: “satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā iṭṭhakāheva bhittisopānatthambhe vāḷarūpādīni dassento pāsādaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2291_8: katvā sudhāya limpitvā mālākammalatākammādīni niṭṭhāpetvā bhummattharaṇamañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā satthu
atk-s0201a0:2291_10: Aparāparaṃ panettha manussā bhikkhusaṅghassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānamaṇḍapacaṅkamādīni kārayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2292_0: Gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0201a0:2292_1: taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbampi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2292_7: Tadā hi te laddhassādā laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā hutvā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2293_0: Yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo tenupasaṅkamīti dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu vā,
atk-s0201a0:2293_1: antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya anīkā nissaṭo hatthī viya,
atk-s0201a0:2293_9: “ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2293_12: “anāgate kulaputtā sammāsambuddho samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ santikaṃ sayaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā tayo kulaputte paggaṇhi,
atk-s0201a0:2293_13: ko nāma samaggavāsaṃ na vaseyyāti samaggavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā khippameva dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2293_16: so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo rathavinīte āvikatova.
atk-s0201a0:2293_17: Iti imasmā dhammagarubhāvatopi dhammaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2294_1: So taṃ araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti,
atk-s0201a0:2294_2: evaṃ vatiyā parikkhittassa tassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati, pāleti.
atk-s0201a0:2294_4: Attakāmarūpāti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0201a0:2294_5: Yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0201a0:2294_7: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2294_8: uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2294_9: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno viharati,
atk-s0201a0:2295_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ mā aphāsukaṃ akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2295_6: kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2295_7: Pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo surasagiddho maññe,
atk-s0201a0:2295_8: gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ attano upaṭṭhākānañca vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2295_9: Vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tisso ca paṇṇasālā tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni.
atk-s0201a0:2295_10: Ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro maññe bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:2295_11: So akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhāpessati.
atk-s0201a0:2296_2: Kiñcāpi hi tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2296_3: araññavāsino pana dubbalamanussā sakammappasutā tāni sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:2296_4: Sammāsambuddho ca nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro byāmappabhāya asītianubyañjanehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā
atk-s0201a0:2296_6: tadā ko esoti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2296_7: Tadā pana bhagavā sabbampi taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a0:2296_8: puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2297_0: Etadavocāti thero kira mā samaṇāti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvāva cintesi –
atk-s0201a0:2297_3: ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a0:2297_4: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2297_5: Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
atk-s0201a0:2297_6: asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. Thero,
atk-s0201a0:2297_7: “ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2297_8: aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento etaṃ, “mā,
atk-s0201a0:2298_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami?
atk-s0201a0:2298_4: samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatī”ti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2298_7: tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2298_8: Keci pana tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2298_9: tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gatoti.
atk-s0201a0:2298_11: Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu
atk-s0201a0:2298_13: Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
atk-s0201a0:2298_17: Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi,
atk-s0201a0:2298_18: paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ pīṇitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2298_20: Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro.
atk-s0201a0:2299_1: Tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ kacci vo anuruddhātiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a0:2299_11: sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2299_12: Paccayena akilamantena hi sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2299_17: manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a0:2299_18: tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā viharatha,
atk-s0201a0:2299_19: udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2300_0: Tattha khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati,
atk-s0201a0:2300_3: kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2300_4: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2300_5: Kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ sampassantā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2300_9: Yathā kathaṃ panāti ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2300_13: taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2300_15: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2301_3: Yañhi sahavasantesu ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2301_4: taṃ disvā kenidaṃ vaḷañjitanti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2301_5: vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2301_6: Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ tatheva nikkhipantassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2301_7: vā pana paṭijaggantassa parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2301_8: Sahavasantassa pana tehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammīkathaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2301_9: sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ pañhavissajjananti evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2301_10: Theresu pana pakkantesu mayhaṃ piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno,
atk-s0201a0:2301_11: evaṃ ācārasampannotiādiguṇakathanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2301_12: Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero avero hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2301_13: abyāpajjo sukhī hotūti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi mettaṃ manokammaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2302_1: kāyāti kāyañhi piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato kātuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0201a0:2302_2: Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no hitaṭṭhena nirantaraṭṭhena aviggahaṭṭhena samaggaṭṭhena ekamevāti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2302_3: Kathaṃ panetaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti?
atk-s0201a0:2302_9: patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭatīti vutte itare mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2302_10: mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabbanti avatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā chinditvā pattakaṭāhe paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti,
atk-s0201a0:2302_13: mama paṇṇasālā uklāpā paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṭhamataraṃ ārocitepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a0:2303_2: anuruddhāti bhagavā heṭṭhā na ca mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2303_3: piṇḍakena kilamimhāti vutte na sādhukāramadāsi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2303_4: Ayañhi kabaḷīkāro āhāro nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ apāyalokepi devamanussalokepi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇova.
atk-s0201a0:2303_6: apāyaloke devamanussalokepi ime sattā paṭiviruddhā eva,
atk-s0201a0:2303_8: kadācideva hotīti samaggavāsassa dullabhattā idha bhagavā sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2303_9: Idāni tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto kacci pana vo,
atk-s0201a0:2303_14: Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2303_15: Avakkārapātinti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a0:2304_0: Yo pacchāti te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0201a0:2304_2: Pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā vattappaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a0:2304_3: Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhāti;
atk-s0201a0:2304_4: so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti –
atk-s0201a0:2304_7: Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni katvā yadi patte paṭivisamattameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2304_11: Katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:2304_15: So sace patte bhattaṃ pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a0:2304_19: avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:2304_23: Sopi dutiyatthero viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā āsanāni ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a0:2304_24: pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2304_25: taṃ vuttanayena jahitvā pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a0:2304_27: Tato kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā sammajjaniṃ ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a0:2304_28: Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāyaṃ vattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2305_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2305_7: Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2305_8: parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti,
atk-s0201a0:2305_9: odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2305_16: tato dvīhi kattabbakamme tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2305_17: Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2305_19: tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a0:2306_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
atk-s0201a0:2306_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nhāyitvā anuruddhattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2306_2: Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2306_6: Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2306_17: Tasmā thero amhākaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā pamādakālo nāma natthīti dassento pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a0:2307_1: Athassa bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pucchanto puna atthi pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2308_1: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānādhigame byākate dutiyajjhānādīni pucchanto etassa pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2308_5: Pacchimapañhe pana lokuttarañāṇadassanavasena adhigataṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ pucchanto alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2308_7: Tattha yasmā vedayitasukhato avedayitasukhaṃ santataraṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2308_8: tasmā aññaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā na samanupassāmāti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2309_3: tena tesaṃ paṭivedhatthāya kiñci kathetabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2309_4: Sāmaggirasena pana ayañca ayañca ānisaṃsoti sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ bhagavā kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2309_6: Te kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā thokaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2309_11: Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmatoti bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādīni adhigantvāpi attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānā adhigamappicchatāya āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2309_13: Cetasā ceto paricca viditoti ajja me āyasmanto lokiyasamāpattiyā vītināmesuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2309_14: ajja lokuttarāyāti evaṃ cittena cittaṃ paricchinditvā viditaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2309_18: ajja ayyo kimilatthero imāya ca imāya ca samāpattiyā vītināmesīti evamārocesunti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2309_19: Pañhābhipuṭṭhenāti tampi mayā sayaṃ viditanti vā devatāhi ārocitanti vā ettakeneva mukhaṃ me sajjanti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā apuṭṭheneva me na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2309_20: Bhagavatā pana pañhābhipuṭṭhena pañhaṃ abhipucchitena satā byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2309_21: tatra me kiṃ na rocathāti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2310_2: atho serīsako sahā”ti evaṃ āgato aṭṭhavīsatiyā yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantaro eko devarājā.
atk-s0201a0:2310_4: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira vessavaṇena pesito etaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ sayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a0:2310_5: gahetvā giñjakāvasathato gosiṅgasālavanassa antare disvā bhagavā attanā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gosiṅgasālavane
atk-s0201a0:2310_8: Mayāpi tassā desanāya bhāginā bhavitabbanti adissamānena kāyena satthu padānupadiko gantvā avidūre ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari gacchantepi na gato, –
atk-s0201a0:2310_9: “ime therā kiṃ karissantī”ti dassanatthaṃ pana tattheva ṭhito.
atk-s0201a0:2310_10: Atha te dve there anuruddhattheraṃ paliveṭhente disvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2310_11: “ime therā bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādayo sabbaguṇe adhigantvāpi bhagavatova maccharāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:2310_15: pathavito yāva brahmalokā etesaṃ guṇe pakāsessāmī”ti cintetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2311_2: vajjiraṭṭhavāsino bhagavantañca ime ca tayo kulaputte passituṃ labhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2311_8: Saddaṃ sutvāti so kira attano yakkhānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā sakalaṃ vajjiraṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharanto taṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2311_9: Tena cassa tesu rukkhapabbatādīsu adhivatthā bhummā devatā saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2311_16: “amhākaṃ kulato nikkhamitvā ime kulaputtā pabbajitā evaṃ sīlavanto guṇavanto ācārasampannā kalyāṇadhammā”ti
atk-s0201a0:2311_17: evaṃ tañcepi kulaṃ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṃ anussareyyāti evaṃ sabbattha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2315_4: “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā pacchā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2315_5: Imasmiṃ pana mahāgosiṅgasutte bhagavato gocaragāmo anibandho,
atk-s0201a0:2315_11: Therehi sāvakehi saddhinti pātimokkhasaṃvarādīhi thirakārakeheva dhammehi samannāgatattā therehi,
atk-s0201a0:2315_15: Tatthāyasmā sāriputto attano sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhasāsane abhiññāto.
atk-s0201a0:2315_16: Cakkhumantānaṃ gaganamajjhe ṭhito sūriyo viya cando viya,
atk-s0201a0:2315_17: samuddatīre ṭhitānaṃ sāgaro viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a0:2315_18: Na kevalañcassa imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇavaseneva mahantatā veditabbā,
atk-s0201a0:2315_19: ito aññesaṃ dhammadāyādasuttaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ rathavinītaṃ mahāhatthipadopamaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2315_20: mahāvedallaṃ cātumasuttaṃ dīghanakhaṃ anupadasuttaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ piṇḍapātapārisuddhi
atk-s0201a0:2315_21: sampasādanīyaṃ saṅgītisuttaṃ dasuttarasuttaṃ pavāraṇāsuttaṃ susimasuttaṃ therapañhasuttaṃ mahāniddeso
atk-s0201a0:2315_22: paṭisambhidāmaggo therasīhanādasuttaṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi suttānaṃ vasena therassa mahantatā
atk-s0201a0:2315_27: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2316_0: Mahāmoggallānopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a0:2316_2: cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ māratajjaniyasuttaṃ pāsādakampanaṃ sakalaṃ iddhipādasaṃyuttaṃ nandopanandadamanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2316_3: yamakapāṭihāriyakāle devalokagamanaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a0:2316_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2317_0: Mahākassapopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a0:2317_1: Apicassa cīvaraparivattanasuttaṃ jiṇṇacīvarasuttaṃ candopamaṃ sakalaṃ kassapasaṃyuttaṃ mahāariyavaṃsasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2317_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2317_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2318_0: Anuruddhattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a0:2318_1: Apicassa cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ naḷakapānasuttaṃ anuttariyasuttaṃ upakkilesasuttaṃ anuruddhasaṃyuttaṃ mahāpurisavitakkasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2318_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2318_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2319_0: Āyasmatā ca revatenāti ettha pana dve revatā khadiravaniyarevato ca kaṅkhārevato ca.
atk-s0201a0:2319_4: akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ kaṅkhābahulo pana thero idha revatoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:2319_5: Sopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a0:2319_10: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2320_0: Ānandattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a0:2320_1: Apicassa sekkhasuttaṃ bāhitikasuttaṃ āneñjasappāyaṃ gopakamoggallānaṃ bahudhātukaṃ cūḷasuññataṃ mahāsuññataṃ
atk-s0201a0:2320_2: acchariyabbhutasuttaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ mahānidānaṃ mahāparinibbānaṃ subhasuttaṃ cūḷaniyalokadhātusuttaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2320_3: abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2320_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2321_0: Aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehīti na kevalañca eteheva,
atk-s0201a0:2321_1: aññehi ca mahāguṇatāya pākaṭehi abhiññātehi bahūhi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṃ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2321_2: Āyasmā hi sāriputto sayaṃ mahāpañño aññepi bahū mahāpaññe bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2321_7: āyasmā ānando sayaṃ bahussuto aññepi bahū bahussute bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2321_8: evaṃ tadā ete ca aññe ca abhiññātā mahātherā tiṃsasahassamattā bhikkhū dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihariṃsūti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2322_1: Yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkamīti thero kira paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento vanante
atk-s0201a0:2322_2: kīḷantassa mattakhattiyassa kaṇṇato patamānaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:2322_4: maṇināgadantato patamānaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya ca atthaṃ gacchamānaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2322_5: Tadanantaraṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento nemiyaṃ gahetvā parivattayamānaṃ rajatacakkaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:2322_7: sapakkhe papphoṭetvā gaganatale pakkhandamānaṃ setahaṃsaṃ viya ca meghavaṇṇāya samuddakucchito uggantvā
atk-s0201a0:2322_10: Tasmiñhi samaye sālarukkhā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā sabbapāliphullā dukūlapārutā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2322_13: tattha tattha nipatantena pupphareṇunā lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2322_14: Bhamaramadhukaragaṇā kusumareṇumadamattā upagāyamānā viya vanantaresu vicaranti.
atk-s0201a0:2322_17: “kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti cintesi,
atk-s0201a0:2322_20: “ajja mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dhammasenāpatittherassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2322_21: Gacchanto pana ekakova agantvā “mayhaṃ piyasahāyaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a0:2322_22: vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2323_0: Evamāvusoti kho āyasmā mahākassapoti theropi yasmā piyadhammassavanova ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a0:2323_1: tasmā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gacchāvuso, tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2323_2: mayhaṃ sīsaṃ vā rujjati piṭṭhi vāti kiñci lesāpadesaṃ akatvā tuṭṭhahadayova,
atk-s0201a0:2323_4: Paṭissutvā ca nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahāmoggallānaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0201a0:2323_5: Tasmiṃ samaye dve mahātherā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya,
atk-s0201a0:2323_10: Anuruddhattheropi tasmiṃ samaye divāṭṭhāne nisinno dve mahāthere sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gacchante
atk-s0201a0:2323_11: disvā pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento sūriyaṃ vanantaṃ pavisantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:2323_12: pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento candaṃ vanantato uggacchantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:2323_13: sālavanaṃ olokento sabbapāliphullameva sālavanañca disvā ajja uposathadivaso,
atk-s0201a0:2323_14: ime ca me jeṭṭhabhātikā dhammasenāpatissa santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2323_16: ahampi dhammassavanassa bhāgī bhavissāmīti nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahātherānaṃ padānupadiko hutvā nikkhami.
atk-s0201a0:2323_18: “atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2324_1: Evaṃ upasaṅkamante pana te mahāthere āyasmā ānando attano divāṭṭhāne nisinnoyeva disvā,
