atk-s0201a0:2324_5: mayhaṃ piyasahāyampi revatattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti sabbaṃ mahāmoggallānassa mahākassapassa anuruddhassa
atk-s0201a0:2324_7: Iti te dve janā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā dve candā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2324_12: Disvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti dūratova disvā anukkamena kathāupacāraṃ sampattametaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2324_15: āvusoti ettha duvidhaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ puggalarāmaṇeyyakañca.
atk-s0201a0:2324_16: Tattha vanaṃ nāma nāgasalaḷasālacampakādīhi sañchannaṃ hoti bahalacchāyaṃ pupphaphalūpagaṃ vividharukkhaṃ udakasampannaṃ gāmato nissaṭaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2327_0: Vanaṃ pana sacepi ujjaṅgale hoti nirudakaṃ viralacchāyaṃ kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2328_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0201a0:2330_1: Tadā hi gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ hoti kusumagandhasugandhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2330_2: sadevake cettha loke aggapuggalo sammāsambuddho tiṃsasahassamattehi abhiññātabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2331_1: abbhaṃ mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2331_3: mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā apupphitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2331_4: Dibbā maññe gandhā sampavantīti dibbā mandārapupphakoviḷārapāricchattakacandanacuṇṇagandhā viya samantā pavāyanti,
atk-s0201a0:2332_1: āvuso ānandāti ānandatthero tesaṃ pañcannaṃ therānaṃ saṅghanavakova.
atk-s0201a0:2332_4: Te hi dve therā aññamaññaṃ mamāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2332_6: “mayā kattabbaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ karotī”ti ānandattheraṃ mamāyi.
atk-s0201a0:2332_7: Ānandatthero bhagavato sāvakānaṃ aggoti sāriputtattheraṃ mamāyi,
atk-s0201a0:2332_8: kuladārake pabbājetvā sāriputtattherassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2332_10: Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2332_11: Āyasmā ānando paṇītāni cīvarādīnipi labhitvā therasseva deti.
atk-s0201a0:2333_2: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0201a0:2333_12: Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2333_16: idaṃ panāhaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmoti. Dehi, ānandāti.
atk-s0201a0:2334_0: Apica anumatipucchā nāmesā khuddakato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2334_11: Ettāvatāpi ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2334_12: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a0:2334_14: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:2334_15: Yathā hi janapadamhi uppanno aṭṭo gāmabhojakaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a0:2334_21: raññā vinicchitakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭo aparāparaṃ na sañcarati,
atk-s0201a0:2334_24: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a0:2334_26: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:2334_27: Evaṃ anumatipucchaṃ pucchanto thero paṭhamaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2335_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahu assa sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2335_1: navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena uggahitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2335_3: Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito palāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2335_5: parisamajjhe ekaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2335_7: Yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2335_8: dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa na nassati,
atk-s0201a0:2335_11: Yathā hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāyaṃ lekhā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2335_12: suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2335_15: Ekaccassa hi uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2335_16: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2335_18: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
atk-s0201a0:2336_4: yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2336_5: Mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2336_8: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā.
atk-s0201a0:2336_9: Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2336_10: taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2336_12: Apica yo bhikkhu parisati dhammaṃ desento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhapitvā aññaṃ upārambhakaraṃ suttaṃ āharati,
atk-s0201a0:2336_15: evamidaṃ gahetvā ettha khipanto ekapasseneva pariharanto kālaṃ ñatvā vuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0201a0:2336_18: Yo pana suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā bahi ekapadampi agantvā pāḷiyā anusandhiñca pubbāparañca amakkhento
atk-s0201a0:2336_19: ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tulikāya paricchindanto viya,
atk-s0201a0:2337_0: Anuppabandhehīti ettha yo bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā ārabhitvā āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya turitaturito araṇiṃ manthento viya,
atk-s0201a0:2337_2: pāḷiyā anusandhipubbāparesu gahitaṃ gahitameva aggahitaṃ aggahitameva ca katvā purāṇapaṇṇantaresu caramānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2337_3: godhaṃ uṭṭhapento viya tattha tattha paharanto osāpento ohāya gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2337_4: Yopi dhammaṃ kathento kālena sīghaṃ kālena dandhaṃ kālena mahāsaddaṃ kālena khuddakasaddaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2337_11: imesaṃ sabbesampi kathā appabandhā nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2337_12: Yo pana suttaṃ ārabhitvā ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhito acchinnadhāraṃ katvā nadīsotaṃ viya pavatteti,
atk-s0201a0:2337_13: ākāsagaṅgato bhassamānaṃ udakaṃ viya nirantaraṃ kathaṃ pavatteti,
atk-s0201a0:2337_17: Evarūpenāti evarūpena bahussutena bhikkhunā tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2337_18: pallaṅkena vā pallaṅkaṃ āhacca nisinnena gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyya.
atk-s0201a0:2338_0: 334. Paṭisallānaṃ assa ārāmoti paṭisallānārāmo. Paṭisallāne ratoti paṭisallānarato.
atk-s0201a0:2339_3: ākaṅkhamāno pana thero anekānipi cakkavāḷasahassāni voloketiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2339_4: Uparipāsādavaragatoti sattabhūmakassa vā navabhūmakassa vā pāsādavarassa upari gato.
atk-s0201a0:2339_5: Sahassaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ volokeyyāti pāsādapariveṇe nābhiyā patiṭṭhitānaṃ nemivaṭṭiyā nemivaṭṭiṃ āhacca
atk-s0201a0:2339_6: ṭhitānaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ sahassaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2339_10: evaṃ ayampi dibbacakkhuko bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokānaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0201a0:2339_11: Tassa pāsāde ṭhitapurisassa cakkanābhiyo viya cakkavāḷasahasse sinerusahassaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2341_2: Sahetukañhi sakāraṇaṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ vissajjitumpi asakkonto saṃsādeti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2342_0: 338. Yāya vihārasamāpattiyāti yāya lokiyāya vihārasamāpattiyā, yāya lokuttarāya vihārasamāpattiyā.
atk-s0201a0:2343_1: Sādhu sādhu sāriputtāti ayaṃ sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno.
atk-s0201a0:2343_4: Yathā taṃ ānandovāti yathā ānandova sammā byākaraṇamāno byākareyya,
atk-s0201a0:2343_9: “aho vata sāsane sabrahmacārī bahussutā bhaveyyu”nti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2343_12: Bahussuto uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ āvajjitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2343_15: imasmiṃ maggaphalanibbānānīti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā,
atk-s0201a0:2343_16: samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhiṃ pūretvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0201a0:2343_18: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye uggahetvā āvajjantā sīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2343_19: āgataṭṭhānesu sīlādīni paripūretvā anukkamena maggaphalanibbānāni sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2344_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekikā nisīditvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2345_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā anekesu cakkavāḷasahassesu cavamāne ca upapajjamāne
atk-s0201a0:2345_4: ca satte disvā vaṭṭabhayena cittaṃ saṃvejetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2346_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī dhutavādā hutvā dhutaṅgānubhāvena paccayataṇhaṃ milāpetvā aparepi nānappakāre
atk-s0201a0:2346_4: kilese dhunitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2347_2: sukhumaṃ pana cittantaraṃ khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ jhānokkantikaṃ ārammaṇokkantikaṃ aṅgavavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2347_3: ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ aṅgasaṅkanti ārammaṇasaṅkanti ekatovaḍḍhanaṃ ubhatovaḍḍhananti ābhidhammikadhammakathikasseva pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2347_13: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ābhidhammikā hutvā sukhumesu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2348_2: paññavāyeva ca cittaṃ attano vase vattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2348_4: Duppañño hi uppannassa cittassa vase vattetvā ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi katipāheneva gihibhāvaṃ patvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2348_6: “aho vata sabrahmacārī acittavasikā hutvā cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā sabbānassa visevitavipphanditāni
atk-s0201a0:2348_7: bhañjitvā īsakampi bahi nikkhamituṃ adentā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2349_4: yasmā saṅghārāmassa nāma bahussutabhikkhūhipi sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:2349_13: Apica mamapi suṇāthāti apica mamapi vacanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0201a0:2349_14: Na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti na tāva ahaṃ imaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ābhujitaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2349_16: Idaṃ kira bhagavā paripākagate ñāṇe rajjasiriṃ pahāya katābhinikkhamano anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
atk-s0201a0:2349_17: caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā daḷhasamādāno hutvā nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2349_18: bhinditvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0201a0:2349_20: Apica pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānopi paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2349_29: mayaṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhissāmā’ti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a0:2349_30: daḷhasamādānā hutvā ‘arahattaṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmā’ti samaṇadhammaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a0:2349_31: te evaṃ paṭipannā katipāheneva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:2349_32: imaṃ pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2349_37: evarūpena bhikkhunā nippariyāyeneva gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a0:2353_5: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2353_9: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvāti catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2353_13: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamananti ayaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2354_7: Na rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2354_8: Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma attano gunnaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vāti saṅkhyaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2354_9: So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2354_10: ajja ettikā na dissantīti dve tīṇi gāmantarāni vā aṭaviṃ vā vicaranto na pariyesati,
atk-s0201a0:2354_11: aññesaṃ gāvīsu attano gogaṇaṃ paviṭṭhāsupi gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2354_12: “imā ettikā gāvo na amhāka”nti yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā na nīharati,
atk-s0201a0:2354_15: “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ dhenuṃ gaṇhātī”ti tajjetvā attano gāviyo gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2354_22: ettikā kabarā ettikā nīlā”ti na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2355_0: Na lakkhaṇakusalo hotīti gāvīnaṃ sarīre kataṃ dhanusattisūlādibhedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2355_1: so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā ajja asukalakkhaṇā ca asukalakkhaṇā ca gāvo na dissanti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2356_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretāti gunnaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi pahaṭaṭṭhānesu vaṇo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2356_3: Tāni daṇḍena apanetvā bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2356_10: gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2357_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti gunnaṃ vuttanayeneva sañjāto vaṇo bhesajjaṃ datvā vākena vā cīrakena vā bandhitvā paṭicchādetabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2357_5: Evaṃ gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2358_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti antovasse ḍaṃsamakasādīnaṃ ussannakāle gogaṇe vajaṃ paviṭṭhe tattha tattha dhūmo kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2358_2: Gogaṇo sabbarattiṃ ḍaṃsādīhi upadduto niddaṃ alabhitvā punadivase araññe tattha tattha rukkhamūlādīsu nipajjitvā niddāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2359_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthaṃ samanti vā visamanti vā sagāhanti vā niggāhanti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2359_2: Tāsaṃ visamatitthe pāsāṇādīni akkamantīnaṃ pādā bhijjanti,
atk-s0201a0:2359_3: sagāhaṃ gambhīraṃ titthaṃ otiṇṇā kumbhīlādayo gāhā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2360_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti pītampi apītampi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2360_4: imāya na laddho”ti evaṃ pītāpītaṃ jānitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2360_5: Ayaṃ pana divasabhāgaṃ araññe gogaṇaṃ rakkhitvā pānīyaṃ pāyessāmīti nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2360_6: Tattha mahāusabhā ca anuusabhā ca balavagāviyo ca dubbalāni ceva mahallakāni ca gorūpāni siṅgehi vā phāsukāhi
atk-s0201a0:2360_7: vā paharitvā attano okāsaṃ katvā ūruppamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā yathākāmaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0201a0:2360_8: Avasesā okāsaṃ alabhamānā tīre ṭhatvā kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0201a0:2360_10: Atha ne gopālako piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā puna araññaṃ paveseti,
atk-s0201a0:2360_11: tattha apītagāviyo pipāsāya sukkhamānā yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:2361_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti “ayaṃ maggo samo khemo,
atk-s0201a0:2361_1: ayaṃ visamo sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2361_2: So samaṃ khemaṃ maggaṃ vajjetvā gogaṇaṃ itaraṃ maggaṃ paṭipādeti,
atk-s0201a0:2361_3: tattha gāvo sīhabyagghādīnaṃ gandhena coraparissayena vā abhibhūtā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2362_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti gopālakena hi gocarakusalena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2362_2: ekadisāya gogaṇaṃ cāretvā punadivase tattha na cāretabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2362_3: Mahatā hi gogaṇena ciṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ bheritalaṃ viya suddhaṃ hoti nittiṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2362_5: Tasmā pañcame vā sattame vā divase puna tattha cāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:2362_8: Ayaṃ pana imaṃ pañcāhikavāraṃ vā sattāhikavāraṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2363_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṇḍitagopālakena yāva vacchakassa maṃsalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2363_1: tāva ekaṃ dve thane ṭhapetvā sāvasesadohinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2363_4: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto kampamāno mātu purato patitvā kālaṅkaroti.
atk-s0201a0:2363_6: “mayhaṃ puttako attano mātukhīraṃ pātumpi na labhatī”ti puttasokena na yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2364_1: Gāvo pariṇayanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gopariṇāyakā.
atk-s0201a0:2364_2: Na atirekapūjāyāti paṇḍito hi gopālako evarūpe usabhe atirekapūjāya pūjeti,
atk-s0201a0:2364_7: rattiṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā celavitānassa heṭṭhā sayāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2364_8: Ayaṃ pana tato ekasakkārampi na karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2364_9: usabhā atirekapūjaṃ alabhamānā gogaṇaṃ na rakkhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2365_3: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vuttarūpaṃ dvīhākārehi na jānāti gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā.
atk-s0201a0:2365_17: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2365_18: Seyyathāpi so gopālako gaṇanato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2365_20: So gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0201a0:2365_21: lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2365_22: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a0:2365_23: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānehi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a0:2365_24: yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2366_6: Seyyathāpi so gopālako vaṇṇato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2366_8: So samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2367_1: kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍitoti evaṃ vuttaṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇanti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2367_2: So evaṃ ajānanto bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevati,
atk-s0201a0:2367_3: bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite asevanto kappiyākappiyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti;
atk-s0201a0:2367_4: taṃ ajānanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2367_5: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a0:2367_6: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a0:2367_7: gopālako viya ca pañcahi gorasehi pañcahi dhammakkhandhehi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2368_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotīti uppannaṃ kāmavitakkanti evaṃ vutte kāmavitakkādike na vinodeti,
atk-s0201a0:2368_1: so imaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā vitakkavasiko hutvā vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2369_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotītiādinā nayena sabbārammaṇesu nimittaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2369_1: gaṇhanto yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a0:2369_3: So vivaṭadvāro vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2370_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti so gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2370_1: dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā na karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2370_2: Tato naṃ manussā bahussuto guṇavāti na jānanti,
atk-s0201a0:2370_3: te guṇāguṇaṃ ajānantā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2370_4: So paccayehi kilamamāno buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2371_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū na upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0201a0:2371_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho kiṃ dīpetī”ti evaṃ na paripucchati na paripañhati,
atk-s0201a0:2371_7: Tassa te evaṃ aparipucchato avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
atk-s0201a0:2371_11: Anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesūti anekavidhāsu kaṅkhāsu ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0201a0:2371_12: Kaṅkhā eva hi kaṅkhāṭhāniyā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2371_13: Tattha ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na nīharantīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2371_14: So evaṃ bahussutatitthaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2371_15: Yathā ca so gopālako titthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2371_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu dhammatitthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2371_20: Te avisaye puṭṭhā kathetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:2371_21: so attanā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2372_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti yathā so gopālako pītāpītaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2372_1: evaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ na jānāti na labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2372_2: savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a0:2372_7: so sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ asuṇanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2373_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti so gopālako maggāmaggaṃ viya, –
atk-s0201a0:2373_1: “ayaṃ lokiyo ayaṃ lokuttaro”ti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2373_2: Ajānanto lokiyamagge abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2374_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti so gopālako pañcāhikavāre sattāhikavāre viya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0201a0:2374_1: “ime lokiyā ime lokuttarā”ti yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2374_2: Ajānanto sukhumaṭṭhānesu attano ñāṇaṃ carāpetvā lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2375_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto anavasesaṃ duhati.
atk-s0201a0:2375_1: Niddesavāre panassa abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentīti abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a0:2375_2: Ettha dve abhihārā vācābhihāro ca paccayābhihāro ca.
atk-s0201a0:2375_3: Vācābhihāro nāma manussā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2375_6: Paccayābhihāro nāma vatthādīni vā telaphāṇitādīni vā gahetvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2375_9: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhu tesu paccayesu pamāṇaṃ na jānāti, –
atk-s0201a0:2375_12: attano thāmo veditabbo”ti rathavinīte vuttanayena pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahetvā yaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0201a0:2375_14: Manussā vippaṭisārino na puna abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a0:2375_15: So paccayehi kilamanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a0:2376_0: Te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hotīti so gopālako mahāusabhe viya te there bhikkhū imāya āvi ceva raho ca mettāya kāyakammādikāya atirekapūjāya na pūjeti.
atk-s0201a0:2376_2: “ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti navake bhikkhū dvīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2376_3: na āmisasaṅgahena cīvarena vā pattena vā pattapariyāpannena vā vasanaṭṭhānena vā.
atk-s0201a0:2376_5: Pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā dhammakathābandhaṃ vā guyhaganthaṃ vā na sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:2376_6: Navakā therānaṃ santikā sabbaso ime dve saṅgahe alabhamānā imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:2376_7: Yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a0:2376_9: Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2380_3: Tasmiṃ kira māpiyamāne rattiṃ gaṅgāsotato maccho thalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:2380_4: Manussā celāni telapātiyaṃ temetvā ukkā katvā macchaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2380_5: Nagare niṭṭhite tassa nāmaṃ karonte amhehi nagaraṭṭhānassa gahitadivase celukkāhi maccho gahitoti ukkacelā-
atk-s0201a0:2380_7: Bhikkhū āmantesīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnassa sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2380_8: tādise vālikussade gaṅgātitthe sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā mahāgaṅgaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sandamānaṃ olokento, –
atk-s0201a0:2380_9: “atthi nu kho imaṃ gaṅgaṃ nissāya koci pubbe vaḍḍhiparihāniṃ patto”ti āvajjitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2380_10: pubbe ekaṃ bālagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassā gogaṇā imissā gaṅgāya āvaṭṭe patitvā samuddameva paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a0:2380_11: aparaṃ pana paṇḍitagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassagogaṇassa sotthi jātā vaḍḍhi jātā ārogyaṃ jātanti addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2380_12: Disvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmīti cintetvā bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a0:2381_4: Uttaraṃ tīraṃ suvidehānanti gaṅgāya orime tīre magadharaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2381_6: gāvo magadharaṭṭhato videharaṭṭhaṃ netvā rakkhissāmīti uttaraṃ tīraṃ patāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2381_12: Tena hi gopālakena gāvo otārentena gaṅgāya orimatīre samatitthañca visamatitthañca oloketabbaṃ assa,
atk-s0201a0:2381_13: majjhe gaṅgāya gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalāni sallakkhetabbāni assu.
atk-s0201a0:2381_15: imasmā titthā bhaṭṭhā imaṃ titthaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0201a0:2381_17: Ayaṃ pana bālagopālako orimatīre gunnaṃ otaraṇatitthaṃ samaṃ vā visamaṃ vā anoloketvāva majjhe gaṅgāya
atk-s0201a0:2381_18: gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalānipi asallakkhetvāva paratīre cattāri pañca uttaraṇatitthāni
atk-s0201a0:2381_20: Athassa mahāusabho javanasampannatāya ceva thāmasampannatāya ca tiriyaṃ gaṅgāya sotaṃ chetvā pārimaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2381_24: Gāvo mahāusabho nivatto mayampi nivattissāmāti nivattā.
atk-s0201a0:2381_25: Mahato gogaṇassa nivattaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chijjitvā majjhe gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaṃ uṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2381_27: Ekopi goṇo arogo nāma nāhosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2382_0: Akusalā imassa lokassāti idha loke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā,
atk-s0201a0:2383_1: Evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ niṭṭhapetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dassento bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2383_3: Tattha balavagāvoti dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo ca.
atk-s0201a0:2383_9: Mātugoravakena vuyhamānoti mātā purato purato huṃhunti goravaṃ katvā saññaṃ dadamānā urena udakaṃ chindamānā gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2383_10: vacchako tāya goravasaññāya dhenuyā vā urena chinnodakena gacchamāno “mātugoravakena vuyhamāno”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2384_1: Mārassa sotaṃ chetvāti arahattamaggena mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā.
atk-s0201a0:2384_2: Pāraṃ gatāti mahāusabhā nadīpāraṃ viya saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0201a0:2384_3: Pāraṃ agamaṃsūti mahāusabhānaṃ pāraṅgatakkhaṇe gaṅgāya sotassa tayo koṭṭhāse atikkamma ṭhitā mahāusabhe
atk-s0201a0:2384_4: pāraṃ patte disvā tesaṃ gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2384_5: Pāraṃ gamissantīti catumaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā idāni arahattamaggena avasesaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2384_6: taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā balavagāvo viya nadīpāraṃ saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissantīti.
atk-s0201a0:2385_9: Evarūpaṃ satthāraṃ labhitvā tumhe pattāyeva nāmāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2389_2: Tattha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2389_3: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2389_6: Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā
atk-s0201a0:2390_0: Saccako nigaṇṭhaputtoti pubbe kira eko nigaṇṭho ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2390_1: vādaṃ āropessāmāti jambudīpe vicarantā vesāliyaṃ samāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:2390_17: idheva vasathā”ti gehaṃ datvā baliṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2390_24: mātāpitūhi uggahitāni pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2390_26: “amhākaṃ ammā kule dārikā nāma hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni datvā kulagharaṃ pesitapubbā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2390_27: Yo pana agāriko tāsaṃ vādaṃ maddituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2390_34: “ayaṃ jambudīpo nāma jambuyā paññāyatī”ti jambusākhaṃ gahetvā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2390_36: tassa dvāre paṃsupuñje vā vālikapuñje vā jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2390_38: so imaṃ maddatū”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0201a0:2390_39: Evaṃ gāmena gāmaṃ vicarantiyo sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇitvā tatheva gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā sampattamanussānaṃ ārocetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0201a0:2391_0: Tena samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2391_1: Athāyasmā sāriputto gilāne pucchanto ajaggitaṭṭhānaṃ jagganto attano kiccamahantatāya aññehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0201a0:2391_2: divātaraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ disvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2391_11: vādaṃ āropetukāmā jetavane therassa santikaṃ gacchathāti vadeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2391_12: Te therassa vacanaṃ sutvā jambudhajaṃ madditvā chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2391_17: Paribbājikā puna gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekekaṃ vīthiṃ gahetvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2391_18: “buddhasāvako kira sāriputto nāma amhehi saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissati,
atk-s0201a0:2392_1: “amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne mātugāmassa āgamanaṃ nāma aphāsuka”nti vihāramajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2392_9: tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma paṭhamaṃ pucchathāti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2392_10: Tā catassopi catūsu disāsu ṭhatvā mātāpitūnaṃ santike uggahitaṃ vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2392_11: Thero khaggena kumudanāḷaṃ chindanto viya pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā kathesi,
atk-s0201a0:2392_17: ahaṃ pana ekaṃ yeva pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2393_0: Thero ayaṃ pana kulaputte pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpetabbapañhoti vatvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2393_7: mayhaṃ tumhe ekaṃ pañhampi kathetuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0201a0:2393_8: evaṃ sante kassa jayo kassa parājayoti? Tumhākaṃ, bhante, jayo,
atk-s0201a0:2393_13: Tumhe mātugāmā nāma amhākaṃ santike pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a0:2393_14: amhākaṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajathāti.
atk-s0201a0:2393_15: Tā sādhūti therassa sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2393_16: Pabbajitā ca pana appamattā ātāpiniyo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2394_3: tato bahutarañca bāhirasamayaṃ uggahetvā katthaci agantvā rājadārake sippaṃ sikkhāpento tattheva vesāliyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0201a0:2394_4: paññāya atipūritattā kucchi me bhijjeyyāti bhīto ayapaṭṭena kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā carati,
atk-s0201a0:2395_3: Sādhusammato bahujanassāti yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattacārena ādisati,
atk-s0201a0:2395_5: tasmā ayaṃ sādhuladdhiko bhaddakoti evaṃ sammato mahājanassa.
atk-s0201a0:2395_6: Vādena vādaṃ samāraddhoti kathāmaggena dosaṃ āropito.
atk-s0201a0:2395_8: Jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamānoti tato tato licchavirājagehato taṃ taṃ gehaṃ gamanatthāya anucaṅkamamāno.
atk-s0201a0:2396_3: Parassa hi samayaṃ ñatvā āropito vādo svāropito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2396_4: Ayaṃ pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako paññāyati assajitthero;
atk-s0201a0:2396_6: etāhaṃ pucchitvā kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2396_10: Thero pana yasmā dukkhanti vutte upārambhassa okāso hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2396_21: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya dukkhameva jirāpentā āhiṇḍathā”ti dosaṃ āropeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2396_22: tasmā paravādissa pariyāyakathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2397_2: Yena te licchavī tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0201a0:2397_3: “ahaṃ pubbe samayaṃ ajānanabhāvena samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ na āropesiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2397_4: idāni panassa mahāsāvakena kathitaṃ samayaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2397_5: ime ca mama antevāsikā pañcasatā licchavī sannipatitā.
atk-s0201a0:2397_6: Etehi saddhiṃ gantvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti tasmā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2397_11: tatra mayā kiṃ sakkā kātunti idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattento āha.
atk-s0201a0:2397_18: Vālaṃ kaṇṇe gahetvāti surāparissāvanatthavikaṃ dhovitukāmo kasaṭanidhunanatthaṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā.
atk-s0201a0:2397_22: Sāṇadhovikaṃ nāmāti ettha manussā sāṇasāṭakakaraṇatthaṃ sāṇavāke gahetvā muṭṭhiṃ muṭṭhiṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhipanti.
atk-s0201a0:2397_24: Atha manussā ambilayāgusurādīni ādāya tattha gantvā sāṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2397_25: dakkhiṇato vāmato sammukhā cāti tīsu phalakesu sakiṃ dakkhiṇaphalake,
atk-s0201a0:2397_27: sakiṃ sammukhaphalake paharantā ambilayāgusurādīni bhuñjantā pivantā khādantā dhovanti.
atk-s0201a0:2397_29: Rañño nāgo taṃ kīḷaṃ disvā gambhīraṃ udakaṃ anupavisitvā soṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā sakiṃ kumbhe sakiṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2397_30: sakiṃ ubhosu passesu sakiṃ antarasatthiyaṃ pakkhipanto kīḷittha.
atk-s0201a0:2397_31: Tadupādāya taṃ kīḷitajātaṃ sāṇadhovikaṃ nāma vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2397_35: yo bhagavato vādaṃ āropessatīti yo saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati,
atk-s0201a0:2397_36: so kiṃ bhavamāno kiṃ yakkho bhavamāno udāhu indo,
atk-s0201a0:2397_37: udāhu brahmā bhavamāno bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati?
atk-s0201a0:2397_38: Na hi sakkā pakatimanussena bhagavato vādaṃ āropetunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:2398_1: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye saccako ārāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2398_7: Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2398_8: Yena te bhikkhūti so kira kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamoti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ gantvā pucchitvā pavisissāmīti vilokento
atk-s0201a0:2398_9: araññe hatthī viya caṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlikabhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2398_13: bhoti katarasmiṃ āvāse vā maṇḍape vāti attho. Esa,
atk-s0201a0:2398_15: bhagavāti tadā kira bhagavā paccūsakāle mahākaruṇā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷe sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2398_17: “sve saccako nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiṃ licchaviparisaṃ gahetvā mama vādaṃ āropetukāmo āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2398_18: Tasmā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0201a0:2398_19: mahāparisāya nisīdituṃ sukhaṭṭhāne nisīdissāmīti gandhakuṭiṃ apavisitvā mahāvane aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0201a0:2398_21: Te bhikkhū bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:2398_22: saccakena puṭṭhā dūre nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassentā,
atk-s0201a0:2399_0: Mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhinti heṭṭhā pañcamattehi licchavisatehi parivutoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2399_2: antovesāliyaṃ pana saccako pañcamattāni licchavirājasatāni gahetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2399_3: “vādatthiko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto”ti sutvā dvinnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sossāmāti yebhuyyena manussā nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a0:2399_4: evaṃ sā parisā mahatī aparicchinnagaṇanā ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2399_17: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgatoti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2399_19: ahaṃ vāsiṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idha āgatoti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2399_20: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti evaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2399_25: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a0:2399_26: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a0:2400_1: Kiñcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2400_2: athassa bhagavā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha – puccha,
atk-s0201a0:2400_9: sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0201a0:2401_0: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a0:2402_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā,
atk-s0201a0:2403_0: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti vā,
atk-s0201a0:2405_0: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti. vā,
atk-s0201a0:2406_0: “Puccha maṃ sabhiya pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a0:2407_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā –
atk-s0201a0:2408_2: yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā etaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya.
atk-s0201a0:2418_1: sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ antakaraṃ adisvā suciratena brāhmaṇena pañhaṃ puṭṭho okāse kārite,
atk-s0201a0:2418_2: jātiyā sattavasso rathikāyaṃ paṃsuṃ kīḷanto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā antaravīthiyaṃ nisinnova –
atk-s0201a0:2420_0: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:2422_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya attamano pañhaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2423_9: tattha kiṃ mayā sakkā kātu”nti evaṃ nigaṇṭhassa vacanokāso mā hotūti heṭṭhā assajittherena kathitaniyāmeneva kathento,
atk-s0201a0:2423_21: āhara taṃ upamaṃ visatthoti bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a0:2423_23: Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggaloti rūpaṃ attā assāti rūpattā,
atk-s0201a0:2423_25: Rūpe patiṭṭhāyāti tasmiṃ attāti gahitarūpe patiṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2423_26: Puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā pasavatīti kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a0:2423_29: Ime pañcakkhandhā imesaṃ sattānaṃ pathavī viya patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a0:2423_30: te imesu pañcasu khandhesu patiṭṭhāya kusalākusalakammaṃ nāma āyūhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2423_31: Tumhe evarūpaṃ vijjamānameva attānaṃ paṭisedhento pañcakkhandhā anattāti dīpethāti ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0201a0:2423_33: sabbaññubuddhato añño tassa kathaṃ chinditvā vāde dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2423_34: Duvidhā hi puggalā buddhaveneyyā ca sāvakaveneyyā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2423_36: Buddhaveneyye pana sāvakā vinetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:2423_39: tasmā etassa vādaṃ chinditvā añño dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2423_40: Tenassa bhagavā sayameva vāde dosadassanatthaṃ nanu tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2424_4: Handāhaṃ imaṃ vādaṃ mahājanassāpi matthake pakkhipāmī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:2424_10: Bhagavā pana nigaṇṭhato sataguṇenapi sahassaguṇenapi satasahassaguṇenapi vādīvarataro,
atk-s0201a0:2424_12: “ayaṃ nigaṇṭho attānaṃ mocetvā mahājanassa matthake vādaṃ pakkhipati,
atk-s0201a0:2424_18: nāyaṃ janatā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgatā,
atk-s0201a0:2424_19: tvaṃyeva sakalaṃ vesāliṃ saṃvaṭṭitvā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2425_1: Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā, tena hi,
atk-s0201a0:2425_7: Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetunti ghātārahaṃ ghātetabbayuttakaṃ ghātetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2425_8: Jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetunti dhanajānirahaṃ jāpetabbayuttaṃ jāpetuṃ jiṇṇadhanaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2425_9: Pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetunti sakaraṭṭhato pabbājanārahaṃ pabbājetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2425_11: Vattituñca arahatīti vattati ceva vattituñca arahati.
atk-s0201a0:2425_13: Iti nigaṇṭho attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhaṭakāraṇameva attano māraṇatthāya āvudhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ karonto viya visesetvā dīpeti,
atk-s0201a0:2425_15: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotūti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2425_16: pāsādikaṃ abhirūpaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya susajjitacittapaṭo viya ca manāpadassananti.
atk-s0201a0:2425_17: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosīti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2426_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti nigaṇṭho imasmiṃ ṭhāne viraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a0:2426_1: “samaṇo gotamo mama vādaṃ bhindanatthāya kāraṇaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a0:2426_7: tvaṃ mama rūpe vaso vattatīti vadasi,
atk-s0201a0:2426_9: kasmā tvaṃ yathā ime licchavirājāno tāvatiṃsadevasadisehi attabhāvehi virocanti abhirūpā pāsādikā,
atk-s0201a0:2426_14: tvaṃ pubbe vattati me rūpasmiṃ vasoti vatvā idāni paṭikkhipasī’ti vādaṃ āropessati.
atk-s0201a0:2426_16: na vattatīti vuttepi eko doso”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2426_19: Yasmā pana yāvatatiyaṃ bhagavatā pucchite abyākarontassa sattadhā muddhā phalati,
atk-s0201a0:2426_20: buddhā ca nāma sattānaṃyeva atthāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramīnaṃ pūritattā sattesu balavaanuddayā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2426_21: Tasmā yāvatatiyaṃ apucchitvā atha kho bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a0:2427_2: Yakkhoti na yo vā so vā yakkho,
atk-s0201a0:2427_10: bhayānakāni akkhināsādīnīti evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a0:2427_14: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2427_19: Tasmā “ajja saccakaṃ tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2428_1: saccako ca nigaṇṭhaputtoti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2428_3: “samaṇo gotamo saccakaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ āvāhetvā dassesi,
atk-s0201a0:2428_5: Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati saccako ca.
atk-s0201a0:2428_6: Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2428_8: So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi na addasa. Tato –
atk-s0201a0:2428_13: paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena vādasaṅghāṭe khittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā –
atk-s0201a0:2428_14: “na dāni me idha aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:2429_1: Manasi karitvāti manamhi katvā paccavekkhitvā upadhāretvā.
atk-s0201a0:2429_2: Evaṃ me vedanā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2429_4: Evaṃ me saññā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2429_8: Mā ahosīti ettha pana vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2429_10: Samanupassitunti “etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā”ti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena passituṃ. No hidaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2429_13: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma cheko ahituṇḍiko sappadaṭṭhavisaṃ teneva sappena puna ḍaṃsāpetvā ubbāheyya,
atk-s0201a0:2429_14: evaṃ tassaṃyeva parisati saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ teneva mukhena pañcakkhandhā aniccā dukkhā anattāti vadāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2429_15: Dukkhaṃ allīnoti imaṃ pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi allīno.
atk-s0201a0:2429_17: Dukkhaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samanupassatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2429_18: Parijāneyyāti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīraṇapariññāya parito jāneyya.
atk-s0201a0:2430_2: Akukkukajātanti pupphaggahaṇakāle anto aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo eko ghanadaṇḍako nibbattati,
atk-s0201a0:2430_7: Bhāsitā kho pana teti idaṃ bhagavā tassa mukharabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā niggaṇhanto āha.
atk-s0201a0:2430_8: So kira pubbe pūraṇādayo cha satthāro upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2430_10: Atha nesaṃ parisamajjhe mahantaṃ vippakāraṃ āropetvā uṭṭhāya jayaṃ pavedento gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2430_11: So sammāsambuddhampi tatheva viheṭhessāmīti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0201a0:2431_0: “Ambho ko nāma yaṃ rukkho, sinnapatto sakaṇṭako;
atk-s0201a0:2433_0: Ayaṃ khadiraṃ āhacca asārakarukkhaparicito mudutuṇḍasakuṇo viya sabbaññutaññāṇasāraṃ āhacca ñāṇatuṇḍabhedaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2433_2: Tadassa parisamajjhe pakāsento bhāsitā kho pana tetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2433_3: Natthi etarahīti upādinnakasarīre sedo nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2433_5: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ vivarīti na sabbaṃ kāyaṃ vivari.
atk-s0201a0:2433_6: Buddhā nāma gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā paṭicchannasarīrā parisati dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0201a0:2433_7: Atha bhagavā galavāṭakasammukhaṭṭhāne cīvaraṃ gahetvā caturaṅgulamattaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2433_8: Otāritamatte pana tasmiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo puñjapuñjā hutvā suvaṇṇaghaṭato rattasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2433_9: rattavaṇṇavalāhakato vijjulatā viya ca nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahākhandhaṃ uttamasiraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānā ākāse pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2433_12: Mahājano hi samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sedo natthīti vadati,
atk-s0201a0:2433_13: saccakassa tāva nigaṇṭhaputtassa yantāruḷhassa viya sedā paggharanti.
atk-s0201a0:2433_14: Samaṇo pana gotamo ghanadupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinno,
atk-s0201a0:2433_15: anto sedassa atthitā vā natthitā vā kathaṃ sakkā ñātunti kaṅkhaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:2434_4: Abhabbo taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ puna otaritunti sabbesaṃ aḷānaṃ bhaggattā pacchinnagamano otarituṃ abhabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2434_10: vādādhippāyo hutvā vādaṃ āropessāmīti ajjhāsayena upasaṅkamituṃ abhabbo;
atk-s0201a0:2434_13: Dummukhassa kirassa upamāharaṇakāle sesa licchavikumārāpi cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a0:2434_14: “iminā nigaṇṭhena amhākaṃ sippuggahaṇaṭṭhāne ciraṃ avamāno kato,
atk-s0201a0:2434_15: ayaṃ dāni amittassa piṭṭhiṃ passituṃ kālo.
atk-s0201a0:2434_16: Mayampi ekekaṃ upamaṃ āharitvā pāṇippahārena patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya tathā naṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a0:2434_17: yathā na puna parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissatī”ti,
atk-s0201a0:2434_18: te opammāni karitvā dummukhassa kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2434_20: ime sabbeva gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā oṭṭhehi calamānehi ṭhitā;
atk-s0201a0:2434_22: puna mayā parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2434_23: handāhaṃ dummukhaṃ apasādetvā yathā aññassa okāso na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2434_24: evaṃ kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti tasmā etadavoca.
atk-s0201a0:2435_4: esā amhākañceva aññesañca puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācā tiṭṭhatu.
atk-s0201a0:2435_5: Vilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti etañhi vacanaṃ vilapitaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2435_7: Atha vā tiṭṭhatesāti ettha kathāti āharitvā vattabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2435_8: Vācāvilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti ettha panidaṃ vācānicchāraṇaṃ vilapitamattaṃ maññe hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2436_6: Yasmā panettha passatīti vuttattā sekkhabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0201a0:2436_7: Tasmā uttari asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a0:2436_18: Buddho so bhagavāti so bhagavā sayampi cattāri saccāni buddho.
atk-s0201a0:2437_5: Natveva bhavantaṃ gotamanti bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja kassaci attano vādaṃ anupahataṃ sakalaṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ thāmo natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2437_6: Na hi bhagavā hatthiādayo viya kassaci jīvitantarāyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2437_7: Ayaṃ pana nigaṇṭho imā tisso upamā na bhagavato ukkaṃsanatthaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a0:2437_9: Yathā hi rājā kañci paccatthikaṃ ghātetvā evaṃ nāma sūro evaṃ thāmasampanno puriso bhavissatīti paccatthikaṃ thomentopi attānameva thometi.
atk-s0201a0:2437_12: hatthiṃ pabhinnantiādīhi bhagavantaṃ ukkaṃsentopi mayameva sūrā mayaṃ paṇḍitā mayaṃ bahussutāyeva evaṃ pabhinnahatthiṃ viya,
atk-s0201a0:2437_14: phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ viya ca vādatthikā sammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamimhāti attānaṃyeva ukkaṃseti.
atk-s0201a0:2437_15: Evaṃ attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā bhagavantaṃ nimantayamāno adhivāsetu metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2437_17: Svātanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu kāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca,
atk-s0201a0:2437_19: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ dhārento tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi.
atk-s0201a0:2437_20: Saccakassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2438_1: Yamassa patirūpaṃ maññeyyāthāti te kira licchavī tassa pañcathālipākasatāni niccabhattaṃ āharanti.
atk-s0201a0:2438_2: Tadeva sandhāya esa sve tumhe yaṃ assa samaṇassa gotamassa patirūpaṃ kappiyanti maññeyyātha,
atk-s0201a0:2438_4: samaṇassa hi gotamassa tumhe paricārakā kappiyākappiyaṃ yuttāyuttaṃ jānāthāti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2438_17: onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇī.
atk-s0201a0:2438_19: hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2438_20: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2438_24: Taṃ dāyakānaṃ sukhāya hotūti taṃ imesaṃ licchavīnaṃ sukhatthāya hotu.
atk-s0201a0:2438_25: Idaṃ kira so ahaṃ pabbajito nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2438_26: pabbajitena ca na yuttaṃ attano dānaṃ niyyātetunti tesaṃ niyyātento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2438_27: Atha bhagavā yasmā licchavīhi saccakassa dinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2438_32: Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa matena vināyeva attano dinnaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ nigaṇṭhassa niyyātesi,
atk-s0201a0:2442_2: Tattha ekaṃ samayanti ca tena kho pana samayenāti ca pubbaṇhasamayanti ca tīhi padehi ekova samayo vutto.
atk-s0201a0:2442_3: Bhikkhūnañhi vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā pattacīvaramādāya cetiyaṃ vanditvā kataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisissāmāti vitakkamāḷake ṭhitakālo nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2442_4: Bhagavā evarūpe samaye rattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0201a0:2442_7: “ekaṃ samayanti ca tena kho pana samayenāti ca pubbaṇhasamaya”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2442_12: “pubbepāhaṃ apaṇḍitatāya sakalaṃ vesāliparisaṃ gahetvā samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā parisamajjhe maṅku jāto.
atk-s0201a0:2442_13: Idāni tathā akatvā ekakova gantvā vādaṃ āropessāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2442_17: andhakāre naccaṃ viya na koci jānissatī”ti niddāpañhaṃ nāma gahetvā iminā vādajjhāsayena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2443_0: Anukampaṃ upādāyāti saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa anukampaṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0201a0:2443_4: Tasmā bhagavantaṃ yācitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ catugguṇaṃ paññapetvā nisīdatu bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2443_5: “Kāraṇaṃ ānando vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane.
atk-s0201a0:2443_6: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti yaṃ pana pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ādāya āgato taṃ ṭhapetvā passena tāva pariharanto etaṃ santi,
atk-s0201a0:2444_2: bho gotamāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sarīre uppannaṃ sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ phusanti labhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2444_7: Kāyanvayaṃ hotīti kāyānugataṃ hoti kāyassa vasavatti.
atk-s0201a0:2444_10: iti nigaṇṭho asantaṃ abhūtaṃ yaṃ natthi, tadevāha.
atk-s0201a0:2444_12: samādhiyuttassa ca puggalassa ūrukkhambhādayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2444_15: “yatheva ‘bhūtapubbanti vatvā ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī’tiādīni vadato anāgatarūpaṃ na sameti,
atk-s0201a0:2445_4: tasmiṃ kho pana samaye bhikkhū pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu paṭisallānaṃ upagacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2445_5: So te paṭisallīne disvā cittabhāvanāmattaṃ ete anuyuñjanti,
atk-s0201a0:2446_1: Atha naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjanto kinti pana te,
atk-s0201a0:2446_20: Ācayāpacayo hotīti vaḍḍhi ca avaḍḍhi ca hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2446_23: kāyabhāvanā pana na paññāyatīti dīpetvā cittabhāvanaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2447_1: Kuto pana tvanti yo tvaṃ evaṃ oḷārikaṃ dubbalaṃ kāyabhāvanaṃ na jānāsi?
atk-s0201a0:2447_2: So tvaṃ kuto saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasīti.
atk-s0201a0:2447_4: “abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ pada”nti bījaniṃ ṭhapetvā pakkamituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2447_7: imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopi ādānampi nikkhepanampī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2447_9: “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ pariggaṇhantassa uppannavipassanā oḷārikāti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2448_2: Sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanāti na anantarāva uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2448_4: Yasmā pana sukhe aniruddhe dukkhaṃ nuppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2448_7: Ubhatopakkhanti sukhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhaṃ dukkhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhanti evaṃ ubhatopakkhaṃ hutvā.
atk-s0201a0:2449_1: Uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2449_3: Uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2449_10: Vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa hi addhāne gacchante gacchante tattha tattha aggiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2449_12: matthakato usumavaṭṭiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti cittaṃ haññati vihaññati vipphandati.
atk-s0201a0:2449_15: Uppanne pana kāyike vā cetasike vā dukkhe taṃ dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe dukkhaṃ dūrāpagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2449_26: “uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2449_28: Uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2450_0: 370. Āsajja upanīyāti guṇe ghaṭṭetvā ceva upanetvā ca. Taṃ vata meti taṃ vata mama cittaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2451_8: uppannāya panassā ahaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ na demi.
atk-s0201a0:2451_9: Idānissa tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ upari pasādāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desetukāmo mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2451_14: alamidaṃ padhānāyāti idaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā pāsarāsisutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2452_11: Ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyāti sabbaṃ lokuttaramaggavevacanameva.
atk-s0201a0:2453_1: allaṃ sakhīraṃ udumbarakaṭṭhaṃ viya hi kilesakāmena vatthukāmato anissaṭapuggalā.
atk-s0201a0:2453_3: manthanenāpi aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena vatthukāmato anissaṭānaṃ opakkamikāhi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo.
atk-s0201a0:2453_4: Amanthanenāpi aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya tesaṃ puggalānaṃ vināpi opakkamikāhi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo.
atk-s0201a0:2454_2: Thale nikkhittanti pabbatathale vā bhūmithale vā nikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2454_4: sukkhakoḷāpakaṭṭhaṃ viya hi kilesakāmena vatthukāmato nissaṭapuggalā,
atk-s0201a0:2454_5: ārakā udakā thale nikkhittabhāvo viya kilesakāmena atintatā.
atk-s0201a0:2454_6: Manthanenāpi aggino abhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena vatthukāmato nissaṭānaṃ abbhokāsikanesajjikādivasena
atk-s0201a0:2454_8: Aññassa rukkhassa sukkhasākhāya saddhiṃ ghaṃsanamatteneva aggino abhinibbattanaṃ viya vināpi opakkamikāhi
atk-s0201a0:2454_10: Ayaṃ upamā bhagavatā attano atthāya āhaṭā.
atk-s0201a0:2455_3: Kiṃ pana bhagavā dukkaraṃ akatvā buddho bhavituṃ na samatthoti?
atk-s0201a0:2455_8: Pāsāde nisinnoyeva hi paveṇiāgataṃ rajjaṃ labhitvāpi khattiyo na tathāpamudito hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2455_9: yathā balakāyaṃ gahetvā saṅgāme dve tayo sampahāre datvā amittamathanaṃ katvā pattarajjo.
atk-s0201a0:2455_10: Evaṃ pattarajjassa hi rajjasiriṃ anubhavantassa parisaṃ oloketvā attano parakkamaṃ anussaritvā,
atk-s0201a0:2455_11: “asukaṭṭhāne asukakammaṃ katvā asukañca asukañca amittaṃ evaṃ vijjhitvā evaṃ paharitvā imaṃ rajjasiriṃ
atk-s0201a0:2455_13: Evamevaṃ bhagavāpi sadevakassa lokassa parakkamaṃ dassessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2455_14: so hi maṃ parakkamo ativiya hāsessati,
atk-s0201a0:2456_1: pacchimā hi janatā sammāsambuddho kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvāpi padhānaṃ padahitvāva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a0:2456_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti padhānavīriyaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissati;
atk-s0201a0:2456_3: evaṃ sante khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissatīti pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno akāsiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2458_3: Sīsavedanā hontīti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2458_5: Devatāti bodhisattassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ paṇṇasālapariveṇasāmantā ca adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a0:2459_0: Tadā kira bodhisattassa adhimatte kāyadāhe uppanne mucchā udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2459_4: “arahanto nāma evarūpā honti matakasadisā”ti laddhiyā vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2459_13: mama puttassa bodhiṃ apatvā kālaṅkiriyā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0201a0:2460_0: Aparabhāge sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā kapilavatthuṃ anuppattassa
atk-s0201a0:2460_1: suddhodanamahārājā pattaṃ gahetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā antarābhattasamaye etamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0201a0:2460_7: supinappaṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya acchariyāni passanto kiṃ saddahissasi?
atk-s0201a0:2460_10: pubbe pana mayhaṃ aparipakke ñāṇe bodhicariyaṃ carantassa dhammapālakumārakālepi sippaṃ uggahetuṃ gatassa,
atk-s0201a0:2460_16: mahārājāti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā bhagavā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2461_1: Mā kho tvaṃ mārisāti sampiyāyamānā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2462_5: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharitāti rañño kira vappamaṅgaladivaso nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2462_7: Nagaravīthiyo sodhāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpetvā dhajapaṭākādayo ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkaronti.
atk-s0201a0:2462_8: Sabbe dāsakammakarādayo ahatavatthanivatthā gandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitā rājakule sannipatanti.
atk-s0201a0:2462_10: Tasmiṃ pana divase ekena ūnaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ yojenti.
atk-s0201a0:2462_11: Sabbanaṅgalāni saddhiṃ balibaddarasmiyottehi jāṇussoṇissa ratho viya rajataparikkhittāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:2462_14: Rājā mahāparivārena nikkhamanto puttaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2463_0: Kammantaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2463_1: Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa sayanaṃ paññapetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhāpetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0201a0:2463_2: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2463_4: Amaccā ekenūnaaṭṭhasatarajatanaṅgalāni gahetvā ito cito ca kasanti.
atk-s0201a0:2463_8: bodhisattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo rañño sampattiṃ passissāmāti antosāṇito bahi nikkhantā.
atk-s0201a0:2463_9: Bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kañci adisvā vegena uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0201a0:2463_12: tassa pana rukkhassa parimaṇḍalā hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2463_13: Dhātiyo ayyaputto ekakoti vegena sāṇiṃ ukkhipitvā anto pavisamānā bodhisattaṃ sayane pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2463_14: tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā rañño ārocayiṃsu –
atk-s0201a0:2463_16: evaṃ nisinno aññesaṃ rukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā,
atk-s0201a0:2463_18: Rājā vegenāgantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, “idaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0201a0:2463_23: Siyā nu kho eso maggo bodhāyāti bhaveyya nu kho etaṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ bujjhanatthāya maggoti.
atk-s0201a0:2463_25: ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ pana bhavissatīti evaṃ ekaṃ dve vāre uppannasatiyā anantaraṃ uppannaviññāṇaṃ satānusāriviññāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2463_26: Yaṃ taṃ sukhanti yaṃ taṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2464_3: Āvatto bāhullāyāti rasagiddho hutvā paṇītapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya āvatto.
atk-s0201a0:2464_4: Nibbijja pakkamiṃsūti ukkaṇṭhitvā dhammaniyāmeneva pakkantā bodhisattassa sambodhiṃ pattakāle kāyavivekassa okāsadānatthaṃ dhammatāya gatā.
atk-s0201a0:2464_5: Gacchantā ca aññaṭṭhānaṃ agantvā bārāṇasimeva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2464_6: Bodhisatto tesu gatesu addhamāsaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhitvā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisīditvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0201a0:2466_1: Abhijānāmi kho panāhanti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a0:2466_11: tathāgate anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṃ desente kupito samaṇo gotamoti ekopi vattā natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2466_12: paresaṃ bodhanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya eva tathāgato dhammaṃ desetīti dassento imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2467_2: tathāgato hi yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:2467_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe pubbābhogena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2467_4: sādhukārasaddassa nigghose avicchinneyeva samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0201a0:2467_5: buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko hotīti assāsavāre passāsavāre samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2467_6: Yena sudaṃ niccakappanti yena suññena phalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ viharāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2467_7: tasmiṃ samādhinimitte cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi samādahāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2468_1: Evaṃ bhagavato ekaggacittataṃ sampaṭicchitvā idāni attano ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānītapañhaṃ pucchanto abhijānāti
atk-s0201a0:2468_2: kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo divā supitāti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2468_3: Yathā hi sunakho nāma asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasaṃ sappinā yojetvā udarapūraṃ bhojitopi gūthaṃ disvā akhāditvā gantuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0201a0:2468_6: evamevaṃ imassapi satthā asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasasadisaṃ abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva āsavakkhayā pasādanīyaṃ dhammadesanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2468_7: Etassa pana evarūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthari pasādamattampi na uppannaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2468_8: tasmā ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānītapañhaṃ apucchitvā gantuṃ asakkonto evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2468_9: Tattha yasmā thinamiddhaṃ sabbakhīṇāsavānaṃ arahattamaggeneva pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:2468_11: Tathā hi kamaluppalādīni ekasmiṃ kāle vikasanti,
atk-s0201a0:2468_15: Evaṃ upādinnakassa kāyassa darathoyeva darathavasena bhavaṅgasotañca idha niddāti adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2469_4: Abhinanditvā anumoditvāti alanti cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā vācāyapi pasaṃsanto anumoditvā.
atk-s0201a0:2469_5: Bhagavatā imassa nigaṇṭhassa dve suttāni kathitāni.
atk-s0201a0:2469_8: iti aḍḍhatiye bhāṇavāre sutvāpi ayaṃ nigaṇṭho neva abhisamayaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a0:2469_15: mayhaṃ pana parinibbānato samadhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ accayena tambapaṇṇidīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0201a0:2469_16: Tatrāyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā sampatte kāle pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0201a0:2469_17: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā kāḷabuddharakkhito nāma mahākhīṇāsavo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2469_18: Idaṃ disvā anāgate vāsanatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a0:2470_0: Sopi tattheva tambapaṇṇidīpamhi sāsane patiṭṭhite devalokato cavitvā dakkhiṇagirivihārassa bhikkhācāragāme
atk-s0201a0:2470_1: ekasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatto pabbajjāsamatthayobbane pabbajitvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā gaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2470_3: Athassa upajjhāyo saddhivihārikaṃ codessāmīti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā āgatena tena saddhiṃ mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2470_4: So paccūsasamaye vuṭṭhāya therassa santikaṃ gantvā, – “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2470_5: mayi ganthakammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgate mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na karittha,
atk-s0201a0:2470_8: buddharakkhita ettakeneva ‘pabbajjākiccaṃ me matthakaṃ patta’nti saññaṃ karosī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2470_10: Gaṇaṃ vinodetvā tvaṃ papañcaṃ chinditvā cetiyapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0201a0:2470_11: So upajjhāyassa ovāde ṭhatvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā puññavā rājapūjito hutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro cetiyapabbatavihāre vasi.
atk-s0201a0:2471_0: Tasmiñhi kāle tissamahārājā uposathakammaṃ karonto cetiyapabbate rājaleṇe vasati.
atk-s0201a0:2471_5: Theropi ekasmiṃ dhammassavanadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro kaṇṭakacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā kāḷatimbarurukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2471_6: Atha naṃ eko piṇḍapātikatthero kāḷakārāmasuttante pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2471_16: Patvā ca aññātakaveseneva parisante ṭhatvā tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakova dhammaṃ sutvā therassa,
atk-s0201a0:2471_22: Dukkaraṃ te mahārāja, katanti. Nayidaṃ, bhante, dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2471_23: yadi pana me ayyassa dhammakathaṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ekapadepi aññavihitabhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2471_24: tambapaṇṇidīpassa patodayaṭṭhinitudanamattepi ṭhāne sāmibhāvo nāma me mā hotūti sapathamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2472_20: kiṃ nu kho tassa sakuṇassa ākāse pakkhapasāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ bahu,
atk-s0201a0:2472_21: avaseso ākāso appoti? Kiṃ, bhante, vadatha,
atk-s0201a0:2472_30: Ayaṃ me duggatapaṇṇākāro imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe imaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ ayyassa demāti. Tumhehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0201a0:2472_32: mayaṃ pana amhākaṃ dinnaṃ rajjaṃ tumhākaṃyeva dema,
atk-s0201a0:2476_2: Tattha pubbārāme migāramātupāsādeti pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde.
atk-s0201a0:2476_3: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathāatīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0201a0:2476_4: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2476_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0201a0:2476_7: dhanañjayassa seṭṭhino gahe sumanadeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0201a0:2476_10: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2476_11: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā,
atk-s0201a0:2477_0: Patikulaṃ gacchantiyā cassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2477_1: Tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2477_5: iti etehi ca aññehi ca sattavaṇṇehi ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2477_6: Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati,
atk-s0201a0:2477_7: pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva naṃ itthī dhāretuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2477_8: Sā aparabhāge dasabalassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā hutvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi bhagavato vihāraṃ
atk-s0201a0:2477_12: Sā “suddhapāsādova na sobhatī”ti taṃ parivāretvā pañca dvikūṭagehasatāni,
atk-s0201a0:2478_0: Mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya visākhāya viya aññissā buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2478_1: purisattabhāve ṭhitassa ca anāthapiṇḍikassa viya aññassa buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2478_2: So hi catupaññāsakoṭiyo vissajjetvā sāvatthiyā dakkhiṇabhāge anurādhapurassa mahāvihārasadise ṭhāne jetavanamahāvihāraṃ nāma kāresi. Visākhā,
atk-s0201a0:2478_3: sāvatthiyā pācīnabhāge uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne pubbārāmaṃ nāma kāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2478_4: Bhagavā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ anukampāya sāvatthiṃ nissāya viharanto imesu dvīsu vihāresu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0201a0:2478_7: etasmiṃ pana samaye bhagavā pubbārāme viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2479_2: Saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hotīti taṇhāsaṅkhaye nibbāne taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vimuttacittatāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto
atk-s0201a0:2479_5: taṃ me khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2479_14: Seṭṭho devamanussānanti devānañca manussānañca seṭṭho uttamo.
atk-s0201a0:2479_16: khippametassa saṅkhepeneva paṭipattiṃ kathethāti bhagavantaṃ yācati.
atk-s0201a0:2480_0: Ayaṃ kira uyyānakīḷaṃ āṇāpetvā catūhi mahārājūhi catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā dvīsu devalokesu devasaṅghena
atk-s0201a0:2480_1: parivuto aḍḍhatiyāhi nāṭakakoṭīhi saddhiṃ erāvaṇaṃ āruyha uyyānadvāre ṭhito imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhesi –
atk-s0201a0:2480_2: “kittakena nu kho taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttassa khīṇāsavassa saṅkhepato āgamaniyapubbabhāgapaṭipadā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2480_5: sacāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva uyyānaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2480_6: chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathito na puna imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhessāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2480_8: satthu santikaṃ gantvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā uggahitapañho uyyāne kīḷissāmī”ti hatthikkhandhe antarahito bhagavato santike pāturahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2480_9: Tepi cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhitā,
atk-s0201a0:2480_10: paricārikadevasaṅghāpi nāṭakānipi erāvaṇopi nāgarājā tattheva uyyānadvāre aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2481_0: Sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti ettha sabbe dhammā nāma pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0201a0:2481_1: Te sabbepi taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesāya nālaṃ na pariyattā na samatthā na yuttā, kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2481_3: Te hi niccāti gahitāpi aniccāva sampajjanti,
atk-s0201a0:2481_7: Abhijānātīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2481_9: Yaṃkiñci vedananti antamaso pañcaviññāṇasampayuttampi yaṃkiñci appamattakampi vedanaṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0201a0:2481_10: Iminā bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa vedanāvasena nibbattetvā arūpapariggahaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2481_11: Sace pana vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ heṭṭhā na kathitaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:2481_22: Tasmā “aniccānupassī viharatī”ti aniccato anupassanto viharatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a0:2482_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca.
atk-s0201a0:2482_7: nirodhopi hi khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cāti duvidhoyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2482_9: so ca pariccāgavossaggo pakkhandanavossaggoti duvidho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2482_11: sā hi tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca vossajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2482_13: so hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇato pakkhandati.
atk-s0201a0:2482_17: Tasmā kilese ca khandhe ca pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo,
atk-s0201a0:2482_18: nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṃ pakkhandatīti pakkhandanavossaggoti ubhayampetaṃ magge sameti.
atk-s0201a0:2482_19: Tadubhayasamaṅgīpuggalo imāya paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgatattā paṭinissaggānupassī nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2482_21: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti kiñci ekampi saṅkhāragataṃ taṇhāvasena na upādiyati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati.
atk-s0201a0:2482_22: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti aggaṇhanto taṇhāparitassanāya na paritassati.
atk-s0201a0:2482_25: Iti bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa saṃkhittena khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ pucchito sallahukaṃ katvā saṃkhitteneva khippaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2483_1: Avidūre nisinno hotīti anantare kūṭāgāre nisinno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2483_5: kiṃ nu kho esa jānitvā anumodi,
atk-s0201a0:2483_8: Thero kira na bhagavato pañhavissajjanasaddaṃ assosi,
atk-s0201a0:2483_11: Sakko kira devarājā mahatā saddena anumodi.
atk-s0201a0:2483_12: Atha kasmā na bhagavato saddaṃ assosīti?
atk-s0201a0:2483_14: Buddhānañhi dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ ekābaddhāya cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya saddo suyyati,
atk-s0201a0:2483_15: pariyantaṃ pana muñcitvā aṅgulimattampi bahiddhā na niccharati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2483_17: Tadā bhagavā migāramātupāsāde sattaratanamaye kūṭāgāre sirigabbhamhi nisinno hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2483_21: tasmā thero na bhagavato saddaṃ assosi,
atk-s0201a0:2484_0: Pañcahi tūriyasatehīti pañcaṅgikānaṃ tūriyānaṃ pañcahi satehi.
atk-s0201a0:2484_1: Pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ nāma ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ susiraṃ ghananti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2484_2: Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2484_9: Paricāretīti taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto tato tato indriyāni cāreti.
atk-s0201a0:2484_11: parivāretvā vajjamānehi pañcahi tūriyasatehi samannāgato hutvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavatī.
atk-s0201a0:2484_14: Yatheva hi idāni saddhā rājāno garubhāvaniyaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā –
atk-s0201a0:2484_15: “asuko nāma ayyo āgacchati, mā, tātā, gāyatha,
atk-s0201a0:2484_21: imaṃ pariyāyamakāsīti evarūpaṃ loke pakatiyā piyasamudāhāravacanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2484_22: lokiyā hi cirassaṃ āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātiyaṃ āgataṃ disvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2484_25: kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo ñāto maggamūḷhosī”tiādīni vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2484_27: Thero hi kālena kālaṃ devacārikaṃ gacchatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2484_29: Yadidaṃ idhāgamanāyāti yo ayaṃ idhāgamanāya vāro, taṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2484_31: Idamāsanaṃ paññattanti yojanikaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ paññapāpetvā evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2485_1: Bahukiccā bahukaraṇīyāti ettha yesaṃ bahūni kiccāni,
atk-s0201a0:2485_4: Appeva sakena karaṇīyenāti sakaraṇīyameva appaṃ mandaṃ, na bahu,
atk-s0201a0:2485_6: pathavito paṭṭhāya hi kapparukkhamātugāmādīnaṃ atthāya aṭṭā sakkassa santike chijjanti,
atk-s0201a0:2485_9: Devānañhi dhītā ca puttā ca aṅke nibbattanti,
atk-s0201a0:2485_11: tāsaṃ maṇḍanapasādhanakārikā devadhītā sayanaṃ parivāretvā nibbattanti,
atk-s0201a0:2485_15: te “mama santakā tava santakā”ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aṭṭaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a0:2485_23: taṃ ubhinnaṃ kalahupacchedanatthaṃ attano santakaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2486_0: Yaṃ no khippameva antaradhāyatīti yaṃ amhākaṃ sīghameva andhakāre rūpagataṃ viya na dissati. Iminā – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2486_1: taṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ na sallakkhemī”ti dīpeti. Thero –
atk-s0201a0:2486_2: “kasmā nu kho ayaṃ yakkho asallakkhaṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0201a0:2486_5: Chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathīyamānā attano bhuttābhuttabhāvampi pītāpītabhāvampi na jānanti,
atk-s0201a0:2486_9: tasmā ‘idāneva loke aggapuggalassa santike pañhaṃ uggahetvā āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2486_10: idāneva nāṭakānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭhoti evaṃ maṃ thero tajjeyyā’ti bhayena evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2486_12: na ariyasāvakassa evarūpaṃ kohaññaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2486_15: Thero tassa somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ nīhari,
atk-s0201a0:2487_0: Idāni sakko pubbe attano evaṃ bhūtakāraṇaṃ therassa ārocetuṃ bhūtapubbantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2487_5: Sakko kira anantare attabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2487_9: Ekadivasaṃ attanova paññāya upaparikkhitvā gāmamajjhe mahājanassa sannipatitaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ ubhayato apabbahitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atiramaṇīyamakāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2487_12: Gāmato ca nikkhamitvā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi tigāvutampi yojanampi vicaritvā tehi sahāyehi saddhiṃ visamaṃ samaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2487_13: Te sabbepi ekacchandā tattha tattha setuyuttaṭṭhānesu setuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2487_15: Magho satta vatapadāni pūretvā kāyassa bhedā saddhiṃ sahāyehi tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2488_1: Sabbe te devānaṃ samānāyukā samānavaṇṇā ca honti,
atk-s0201a0:2488_2: te sakkaṃ saparisaṃ disvā adhunā nibbattā navakadevaputtā āgatāti mahāpānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2488_4: “amhehi kusalaṃ karontehi na parehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2488_5: tumhe gaṇḍapānaṃ mā pivittha pītamattameva karothā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2488_7: Bālaasurā gaṇḍapānaṃ pivitvā mattā niddaṃ okkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2488_8: Sakko devānaṃ saññaṃ datvā te pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi,
atk-s0201a0:2488_16: Te gaṇhatha nanti vatvā sineruṃ pariharamānā deve vuṭṭhe vammikapādato vammikamakkhikā viya abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2488_23: Tasmiṃ pana saṅgāme devānaṃ jayo ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2488_25: Sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2488_26: Evaṃ ārakkhaṃ datvā vedikapāde vajirahatthā indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2488_27: Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā tā paṭimāyo disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2489_1: Vessavaṇo ca mahārājāti so kira sakkassa vallabho,
atk-s0201a0:2489_5: Pavisiṃsūti pavisitvā pana upaḍḍhapihitāni dvārāni katvā olokayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Idampi,
atk-s0201a0:2489_11: rajatatthambhe maṇitthambhe pavāḷatthambhe lohitaṅgatthambhe masāragallatthambhe muttatthambhe sattaratanatthambhe,
atk-s0201a0:2489_12: tesaṃyeva suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake vāḷarūpakāni ca passāti evaṃ thambhapantiyo ādiṃ katvā rāmaṇeyyakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2489_13: Yathā taṃ pubbekatapuññassāti yathā pubbe katapuññassa upabhogaṭṭhānena sobhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2489_15: Atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharatīti attano pāsāde nāṭakaparivārena sampattiyā vasena ativiya matto.
atk-s0201a0:2490_1: Āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pāsādapatiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotūti iddhiṃ adhiṭṭhāya pāsādakaṇṇike pādaṅguṭṭhakena pahari.
atk-s0201a0:2490_2: So pāsādo yathā nāma udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapitapattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṅguliyā pahaṭaṃ aparāparaṃ kampati calati na santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2490_4: thambhapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṇṇikagopānasiādīni karakarāti saddaṃ muñcantāni patituṃ viya āraddhāni.
atk-s0201a0:2490_8: aho abbhutanti evaṃ sañjātaacchariyaabbhutā ceva sañjātatuṭṭhino ca ahesuṃ uppannabalavasomanassā.
atk-s0201a0:2490_11: kañcanabhittiyaṃ ṭhapitamaṇināgadantehi viya uddhaggehi lomehi ākiṇṇasarīranti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2490_12: Lomahaṃso ca nāmesa somanassenapi hoti domanassenapi,
atk-s0201a0:2490_14: Thero hi sakkassa somanassavegena saṃvejetuṃ taṃ pāṭihāriyamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2491_1: mārisāti idānissa yasmā therena somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ vinoditaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2491_5: tvaṃ kuhiṃ gatosīti vutte mayhaṃ satthu santikanti vadesi,
atk-s0201a0:2491_10: Sabrahmacārī me esoti ettha kiñcāpi thero anagāriyo abhinīhārasampanno aggasāvako,
atk-s0201a0:2491_14: Aho nūna te so bhagavā satthāti sabrahmacārī tāva te evaṃmahiddhiko,
atk-s0201a0:2491_15: so pana te bhagavā satthā aho nūna mahiddhikoti satthu iddhipāṭihāriyadassane jātābhilāpā hutvā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2496_2: Tattha diṭṭhigatanti alagaddūpamasutte laddhimattaṃ diṭṭhigatanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2496_16: paralokato imaṃ lokaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”ti sassatadassanaṃ uppannaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2497_3: vinā paccayaṃ natthi viññāṇassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2497_4: Tasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu buddhena akathitaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a0:2497_8: ariyapathe tiriyaṃ nipatitvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0201a0:2497_9: Yathā nāma rañño rajje mahācoro uppajjamāno mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2497_10: evaṃ jinasāsane coro hutvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2497_12: Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ayaṃ parisaṃ labhitvā sāsanampi antaradhāpeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2497_14: tāvadeva naṃ diṭṭhigatā vivecemāti sutasutaṭṭhānatoyeva aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2498_1: Katamaṃ taṃ sāti viññāṇanti sāti yaṃ tvaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāya vadesi,
atk-s0201a0:2498_3: vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2498_5: yo cāyaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ vipākaṃ paccanubhoti. Idaṃ, bhante, viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2498_7: Kassa nu kho nāmāti kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessasuddagahaṭṭhapabbajitadevamanussānaṃ vā aññatarassa.
atk-s0201a0:2499_1: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi?
atk-s0201a0:2499_4: na ca moghapurisoti vuttamatteneva maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2499_6: ‘atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ moghapurisa bāhullāya āvatto’ti bhagavā moghapurisavādena ovadi.
atk-s0201a0:2499_7: Thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto cha abhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2499_8: Ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2499_9: Athassa bhagavā chinnapaccayo ayaṃ sāsane aviruḷhadhammoti dassento bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a0:2499_11: Atha kho bhagavāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a0:2499_15: Na hi tathāgatā saupanissayasseva dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a0:2499_17: Ahaṃ buddhassa santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā saggasampattūpagaṃ kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2499_20: tuyhaṃ ovādaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ vā demī”ti sugatovādaṃ paṭippassambhento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2500_1: Idāni viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ yadeva,
atk-s0201a0:2500_3: Tattha manañca paṭicca dhamme cāti sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgamanañca tebhūmakadhamme ca paṭicca.
atk-s0201a0:2500_7: Yathā hi kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca jalamāno aggi upādānapaccaye satiyeva jalati,
atk-s0201a0:2500_10: evameva cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ tasmiṃ dvāre cakkhurūpaālokamanasikārasaṅkhāte paccayamhi satiyeva uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2500_14: Iti bhagavā nāhaṃ viññāṇappavatte dvārasaṅkantimattampi vadāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2500_15: ayaṃ pana sāti moghapuriso bhavasaṅkantiṃ vadatīti sātiṃ niggahesi.
atk-s0201a0:2501_1: Evaṃ viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pana pañcannampi khandhānaṃ sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a0:2501_3: Tattha bhūtamidanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2501_7: Tadāhārasambhavanti taṃ panetaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhārasambhavaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2501_8: sati paccaye uppajjati evaṃ passathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2501_10: Bhūtamidaṃ nossūti bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2501_12: Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossūti taṃ bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a0:2501_15: Nirodhadhammaṃ nossūti taṃ dhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a0:2501_17: Sammappaññāya passatoti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato vipassanāpaññāya sammā passantassa.
atk-s0201a0:2501_18: Paññāya sudiṭṭhanti vuttanayeneva vipassanāpaññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2501_19: Evaṃ ye ye taṃ pucchaṃ sallakkhesuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2501_20: tesaṃ tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gaṇhanto pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2502_0: Idāni yāya paññāya tehi taṃ sappaccayaṃ sanirodhaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2502_1: tattha nittaṇhabhāvaṃ pucchanto imaṃ ce tumhetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2502_7: Dhanāyethāti dhanaṃ viya icchantā gedhaṃ āpajjeyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:2502_9: Nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyāti yo so mayā caturoghanittharaṇatthāya kullūpamo dhammo desito,
atk-s0201a0:2503_6: Yathā pana eko imaṃ jānāsīti vutto,
atk-s0201a0:2503_9: mātu mātarampī”ti evaṃ paveṇivasena jānanto suṭṭhu jānāti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2503_10: Evamevaṃ bhagavā na kevalaṃ khandhamattameva jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2503_11: khandhānaṃ paccayampi tesampi paccayānaṃ paccayanti evaṃ sabbapaccayaparamparaṃ jānāti. So taṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2503_12: buddhabalaṃ dīpento idāni paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ, ime ca,
atk-s0201a0:2503_18: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti ettha pana paṭiccasamuppādakathā vitthāretabbā bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:2504_1: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2504_2: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2504_6: Evaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento,
atk-s0201a0:2504_8: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya eva tu.
atk-s0201a0:2504_11: evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇanirodho hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2504_12: viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādiṃ
atk-s0201a0:2504_13: vatvā evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2506_1: Evaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni imaṃ dvādasaṅgapaccayavaṭṭaṃ saha vipassanāya maggena jānantassa yā paṭidhāvanā pahīyati,
atk-s0201a0:2506_2: tassā abhāvaṃ pucchanto api nu tumhe,
atk-s0201a0:2506_4: Tattha evaṃ jānantāti evaṃ sahavipassanāya maggena jānantā.
atk-s0201a0:2507_3: evaṃ jānantā evaṃ passantā evaṃ vadeyyātha,
atk-s0201a0:2507_7: Aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāthāti ayaṃ satthā amhākaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ na sakkotīti api nu evaṃsaññino hutvā aññaṃ bāhirakaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:2507_8: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti evaṃsaññino hutvā puthūnaṃ titthiyasamaṇānaṃ ceva brāhmaṇānañca.
atk-s0201a0:2507_9: Vatakotūhalamaṅgalānīti vatasamādānāni ca diṭṭhikutūhalāni ca diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalāni ca.
atk-s0201a0:2507_10: Tāni sārato paccāgaccheyyāthāti etāni sāranti evaṃsaññino hutvā paṭiāgaccheyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:2507_11: Evaṃ nissaṭṭhāni ca puna gaṇheyyāthāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2507_14: Sāmaṃ viditanti sayaṃ vibhāvitaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2507_17: tumhe iminā sandiṭṭhikādisabhāvena dhammena nibbānaṃ upanītā,
atk-s0201a0:2507_20: Idametaṃ paṭicca vuttanti etaṃ vacanamidaṃ tumhehi sāmaṃ ñātādibhāvaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2508_3: Nanu heṭṭhā vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanā matthakaṃ pāpitāti?
atk-s0201a0:2508_7: tassa sammohaṭṭhānaṃ viddhaṃsetvā pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2508_10: iti vaṭṭamūlaṃ avijjaṃ vivaṭṭamūlañca buddhuppādaṃ dassetvāpi,
atk-s0201a0:2508_11: “puna ekavāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2508_15: Katthaci hi gabbhoti mātukucchi vutto. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:2510_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2511_3: aññā itthikā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2512_1: Mātā ca utunī hotīti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2512_2: Mātugāmassa kira yasmiṃ okāse dārako nibbattati,
atk-s0201a0:2512_3: tattha mahatī lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā bhijjitvā paggharati,
atk-s0201a0:2512_5: suddhe vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2512_6: Tasmiṃ samaye hatthaggāhaveṇiggāhādinā aṅgaparāmasanenapi dārako nibbattatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2512_8: Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito paccupaṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2512_9: Kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a0:2512_10: Saṃsayenāti “arogo nu kho bhavissāmi ahaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2512_11: putto vā me”ti evaṃ mahantena jīvitasaṃsayena.
atk-s0201a0:2512_13: bhikkhaveti tadā kira mātulohitaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ puttasinehena paṇḍaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2512_18: ākāse vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2512_19: Ciṅgulakaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2513_6: Yatthassa te pāpakāti yassaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ ete nirujjhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2513_11: Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatīti taṇhāajjhosānagahaṇena gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2513_14: “Ahaṃ dukkhito mama dukkha”nti gaṇhanto abhinandati nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2513_16: Tadupādānanti sāva taṇhā gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2513_19: idañhi bhagavatā puna ekavāraṃ dvisandhi tisaṅkhepaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2514_4: Tattha appamāṇacetasoti appamāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ ceto assāti appamāṇacetaso,
atk-s0201a0:2514_11: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttidesanaṃ tumhe niccakālaṃ dhāreyyātha mā pamajjeyyātha.
atk-s0201a0:2514_12: Desanā hi ettha vimuttipaṭilābhahetuto vimuttīti vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:2514_15: iti imasmiṃ mahātaṇhājāle taṇhāsaṅghāṭe ca imaṃ sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ paṭimukkaṃ dhāretha.
atk-s0201a0:2518_2: Tattha aṅgesūti aṅgā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0201a0:2518_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “aṅgā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2518_5: Assapuraṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamoti assapuranti nagaranāmena laddhavohāro aṅgānaṃ janapadassa eko nigamo,
atk-s0201a0:2519_1: Tasmiṃ kira nigame manussā saddhā pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
