atk-s0201a0:2519_3: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā bījanaṅgalādīni gahetvā khettaṃ gacchantāpi,
atk-s0201a0:2519_4: pharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisantāpi tāni upakaraṇāni nikkhipitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2519_5: āsanasālaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā sammajjitvā āsanāni paññapetvā arajapānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0201a0:2519_6: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā katabhattakiccaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā tato tāni
atk-s0201a0:2519_7: upakaraṇāni ādāya khettaṃ vā araññaṃ vā gantvā attano kammāni karonti,
atk-s0201a0:2519_8: kammantaṭṭhānepi nesaṃ aññā kathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2519_9: Cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭha puggalā ariyasaṅgho nāma;
atk-s0201a0:2519_12: evarūpāya paṭipattiyā samannāgatā lajjino pesalā uḷāraguṇā”ti bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:2519_14: sayanigharaṃ pavisitvā nisinnāpi bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a0:2519_15: Bhagavā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nipaccakāraṃ disvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyane niyojetvā etadavoca.
atk-s0201a0:2520_0: Ye dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā cāti ye dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇañca bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇañca karontīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2520_7: adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāna”nti ettha pana samaṇena kattabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:2520_10: Evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2520_24: Iti bhagavā iminā ettakena ṭhānena hirottappādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2520_26: Sace hi koci acirapabbajito bālabhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0201a0:2520_28: ko nu kho tesaṃ samādāya vattane ānisaṃso”ti?
atk-s0201a0:2520_31: ime hi dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇaṃ nāma bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇaṃ nāma karonti,
atk-s0201a0:2520_34: pabbajjaṃ avañjhaṃ saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ karontīti vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2520_36: Vitthārato pana vaṇṇakathā satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2521_2: ottappati ottappitabbenā”ti evaṃ vitthāritāya hiriyā ceva ottappena ca.
atk-s0201a0:2521_10: Apica ime dve dhammā lokaṃ pālanato lokapāladhammā nāmāti kathitā. Yathāha – “dveme,
atk-s0201a0:2521_19: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2524_0: Mahācundattherassa pana kilesasallekhanapaṭipadāti katvā dassitā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a0:2524_9: tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesūti.
atk-s0201a0:2525_0: Yasmā pana ettāvatā sāmaññattho matthakaṃ patto nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2525_1: tasmā aparepi samaṇakaraṇadhamme dassetuṃ siyā kho pana,
atk-s0201a0:2525_22: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne maggampi phalampi ekato katvā sāmaññattho kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2526_1: Parisuddho no kāyasamācāroti ettha kāyasamācāro parisuddho aparisuddhoti duvidho.
atk-s0201a0:2526_2: Yo hi bhikkhu pāṇaṃ hanati adinnaṃ ādiyati,
atk-s0201a0:2526_6: Yo pana pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā paraṃ potheti viheṭheti,
atk-s0201a0:2526_9: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2526_10: Yo hi bhikkhu pānīyaghaṭe vā pānīyaṃ pivantānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2526_11: patte vā bhattaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ kākānaṃ nivāraṇavasena hatthaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā uggirati,
atk-s0201a0:2526_17: Na ca chiddavāti sadā ekasadiso antarantare chiddarahito.
atk-s0201a0:2527_7: Yo pana gahapatikāti vā dāsāti vā pessāti vā ādīhi khuṃsento vadati,
atk-s0201a0:2527_10: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2527_11: Yo hi bhikkhu daharena vā sāmaṇerena vā, “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2527_15: upajjhāyo te vikkāyikasākabhaṇḍikaṃ ukkhipitvā gato bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena hasādhippāyopi evarūpaṃ kathaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a0:2528_1: Manosamācāre yo bhikkhu abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2528_7: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2528_8: Yo pana bhikkhu kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0201a0:2529_1: Ājīvasmiṃ yo bhikkhu ājīvahetu vejjakammaṃ pahiṇagamanaṃ gaṇḍaphālanaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2529_7: Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2529_9: “sve vā punadivase vā bhavissatī”ti sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0201a0:2529_10: yo vā pana nimbaṅkurādīni disvā sāmaṇere vadati –
atk-s0201a0:2529_12: sāmaṇerā thero khāditukāmoti kappiyaṃ katvā denti,
atk-s0201a0:2529_13: dahare pana sāmaṇere vā pānīyaṃ pivatha,
atk-s0201a0:2529_15: te thero pānīyaṃ pivitukāmoti pānīyasaṅkhaṃ dhovitvā denti,
atk-s0201a0:2529_16: tampi paribhuñjantassa ājīvo aparisuddho nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2531_1: Jāgariyamanuyuttāti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse niddāya okāsaṃ datvā pañca koṭṭhāse jāgariyamhi yuttā payuttā.
atk-s0201a0:2531_8: kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā,
atk-s0201a0:2531_9: tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2532_3: petā hi appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a0:2533_2: sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena passena setī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā.
atk-s0201a0:2533_3: Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi
atk-s0201a0:2533_4: pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake
atk-s0201a0:2533_6: Divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrāsanto pabujjhati.
atk-s0201a0:2533_7: Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0201a0:2533_8: Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2533_10: na sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-s0201a0:2533_12: Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2533_13: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0201a0:2533_20: jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2535_3: Tattha iṇaṃ ādāyāti vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a0:2535_5: Yathā tesaṃ kākaṇikamattopi pariyanto nāma nāvasissati,
atk-s0201a0:2535_9: So hi aṇaṇomhīti āvajjanto balavapāmojjaṃ labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2536_0: Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhatīti ābādho,
atk-s0201a0:2536_8: tassa hi arogomhīti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2536_12: Na cassa kiñci bhogānaṃ vayoti kākaṇikamattampi bhogānaṃ vayo na bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2536_16: attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a0:2536_19: Na yena kāmaṃ gamoti yena disābhāgenassa kāmo hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2537_0: Ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīneti ettha bhagavā appahīnaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ iṇasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2537_3: yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā vināseti.
atk-s0201a0:2537_4: So tehi iṇaṃ dehīti vuccamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi kiñci paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2537_9: so tena pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi sabbaṃ titikkhati.
atk-s0201a0:2537_10: Titikkhakāraṇañhissa so kāmacchando hoti gharasāmikehi vadhīyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viyāti.
atk-s0201a0:2538_0: Yathā pana pittarogāturo madhusakkarādīsupi dinnesu pittarogāturatāya tesaṃ rasaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a0:2538_2: Evamevaṃ byāpannacitto hitakāmehi ācariyupajjhāyehi appamattakampi ovadīyamāno ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2538_3: “ati viya me tumhe upaddavethā”tiādīni vatvā vibbhamati.
atk-s0201a0:2539_0: Yathā pana nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāre baddho puriso nakkhattassa neva ādiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2539_6: aho gīta”ntiādīni sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0201a0:2539_9: Evamevaṃ thinamiddhābhibhūto bhikkhu vicittanayepi dhammassavane pavattamāne neva tassa ādiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2539_15: aho upamā”ti dhammassavanassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānānaṃ sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti.
atk-s0201a0:2540_4: hatthapādaṃ vā te chindāmi kaṇṇanāsaṃ vā”ti vutto sīghaṃ gacchatiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2540_5: nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a0:2540_7: Evamevaṃ vinaye appakataññunā vivekatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭhenāpi kismiñcideva antamaso kappiyamaṃsepi
atk-s0201a0:2540_8: akappiyamaṃsasaññāya uppannāya vivekaṃ pahāya sīlavisodhanatthaṃ vinayadharassa santike gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2541_0: Yathā pana kantāraddhānamaggapaṭipanno puriso corehi manussānaṃ viluttokāsaṃ pahatokāsañca disvā daṇḍakasaddenapi
atk-s0201a0:2541_6: So kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā,
atk-s0201a0:2541_8: Evamevaṃ yassa aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vicikicchā uppannā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2541_10: na nu kho buddho”tiādinā nayena vicikicchanto adhimuccitvā saddhāya gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2541_11: Asakkonto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā na pāpuṇātīti yathā kantāraddhānamagge “corā atthi natthī”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2541_12: āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitatta cittassa uppādento khemantapattiyā antarāyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2541_13: evaṃ vicikicchāpi “buddho nu kho na buddho”tiādinā nayena punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2541_14: chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādayamānā ariyabhūmippattiyā antarāyaṃ karotīti kantāraddhānamaggo viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2542_5: yathā hi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojetvā samiddhakammanto,
atk-s0201a0:2542_6: “idaṃ iṇaṃ nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā savaḍḍhikaṃ iṇaṃ niyyātetvā paṇṇaṃ phālāpeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2542_7: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya neva koci dūtaṃ peseti,
atk-s0201a0:2542_14: “ayaṃ kāmacchando nāma palibodhamūla”nti satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva cha dhamme bhāvetvā kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2542_15: Tassevaṃ pahīnakāmacchandassa yathā iṇamuttassa purisassa iṇasāmike disvā neva bhayaṃ na chambhitattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2542_16: Evameva paravatthumhi neva saṅgo na bandho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2542_17: Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati.
atk-s0201a0:2543_0: Yathā pana so pittarogāturo puriso bhesajjakiriyāya taṃ rogaṃ vūpasametvā tato paṭṭhāya madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ vindati.
atk-s0201a0:2543_2: “ayaṃ byāpādo nāma anatthakārako”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2543_3: So evaṃ pahīnabyāpādo yathā pittarogavimutto puriso madhusakkarādīni madhurāni sampiyāyamāno paṭisevati.
atk-s0201a0:2543_4: Evamevaṃ ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpiyamāno sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sampiyāyamāno sikkhati.
atk-s0201a0:2544_0: Yathā so nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso aparasmiṃ nakkhattadivase,
atk-s0201a0:2544_1: “pubbepi ahaṃ pamādadosena baddho taṃ nakkhattaṃ nānubhavāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2544_2: idāni appamatto bhavissāmī”ti yathāssa paccatthikā okāsaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2544_6: “idaṃ thinamiddhaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2544_7: So evaṃ pahīnathinamiddho yathā bandhanā mutto puriso sattāhampi nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0201a0:2544_8: Evamevaṃ bhikkhu dhammanakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2545_0: Yathā pana dāso kañcideva mittaṃ upanissāya sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:2545_3: “idaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2545_4: So evaṃ pahīnuddhaccakukkucco yathā bhujisso puriso yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a0:2545_6: Na taṃ koci balakkārena tato nivatteti.
atk-s0201a0:2545_8: na naṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ balakkārena tato nivatteti.
atk-s0201a0:2546_0: Yathā balavā puriso hatthasāraṃ gahetvā sajjāvudho saparivāro kantāraṃ paṭipajjeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2546_2: So sotthinā taṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ patto haṭṭhatuṭṭho assa.
atk-s0201a0:2546_4: “ayaṃ vicikicchā nāma anatthakārikā”ti cha dhamme bhāvetvā vicikicchaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2546_5: So evaṃ pahīnavicikiccho yathā balavā sajjāvudho saparivāro puriso nibbhayo core tiṇaṃ viya agaṇetvā sotthinā nikkhamitvā khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2546_6: Evamevaṃ duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā paramakhemantabhūmiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2547_7: Sabbāvato kāyassāti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato kāyassa.
atk-s0201a0:2547_8: Kiñci upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāne chavimaṃsalohitānugataṃ aṇumattampi ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭṭhaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2547_9: Dakkhoti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni kātuñceva yojetuñca sannetuñca.
atk-s0201a0:2547_15: Sanneyyāti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0201a0:2547_18: Santarabāhirāti saddhiṃ antopadesena ceva bahipadesena ca,
atk-s0201a0:2547_20: Na ca pagghariṇīti na bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati,
atk-s0201a0:2547_21: sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulīhi gahetuṃ ovaṭṭikampi kātunti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2548_11: Sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvāti sītaṃ vāri taṃ udakarahadaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ubbhijjitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2548_12: Heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi uggantvā uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti.
atk-s0201a0:2548_13: Catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi udakaṃ khobheti.
atk-s0201a0:2548_15: Sannisinnameva pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a0:2549_3: Ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃkiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva,
atk-s0201a0:2549_9: Antonimuggaposīnīti udakatalassa anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posīni,
atk-s0201a0:2550_1: Catutthajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenāti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2550_6: Imissā hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo.
atk-s0201a0:2550_8: Tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a0:2550_10: Evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2550_13: Yathā hi katthaci odātavatthe kāyaṃ apphusantepi taṃsamuṭṭhānena utunā sabbatthakameva kāyo phuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2550_14: Evaṃ catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhitena sukhumarūpena sabbatthakameva bhikkhuno karajakāyo phuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2551_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇaupamāyaṃ taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyā pākaṭā hotīti taṃdivasaṃ gatagāmattayameva gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2551_2: Tattha gāmattayaṃ gatapuriso viya pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2551_3: Tayo gāmā viya tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2551_4: Tassa purisassa tīsu gāmesu taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyāya āvibhāvo viya pubbenivāsāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0201a0:2551_5: nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu katakiriyāya āvibhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2552_5: ito pana gehā nikkhamitvā etaṃ gehaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2552_6: etasmā vā nikkhamitvā imaṃ gehaṃ pavisanavasenapi daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2552_7: Tattha dve agārā sadvārā viya cutipaṭisandhiyo,
atk-s0201a0:2552_9: cakkhumato purisassa dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ṭhatvā passato dve agāre pavisanakanikkhamanakapurisānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2552_10: pākaṭakālo viya dibbacakkhulābhino ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā olokentassa cavanakaupapajjanakasattānaṃ pākaṭakālo.
atk-s0201a0:2553_8: Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi vijjamānāsupi,
atk-s0201a0:2553_9: “etā gāvo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi carantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2553_10: Evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2553_11: Itarañca dvayaṃ carantaṃ upādāya sakkharakathalampi carantanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2553_12: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa tīre ṭhatvā passato sippisambukādīnaṃ vibhūtakālo viya āsavānaṃ khayāya cittaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2553_13: nīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ saccānaṃ vibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2554_1: Idāni sattahākārehi saliṅgato saguṇato khīṇāsavassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto,
atk-s0201a0:2554_13: Catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi vedehi akusaladhammānaṃ gatattā vedagū hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2559_1: Samaṇamalānantiādīsu ete dhammā uppajjamānā samaṇe maline karonti malaggahite,
atk-s0201a0:2559_6: Ete uppajjitvā samaṇe kasaṭe niroje karonti milāpenti,
atk-s0201a0:2559_10: Matajaṃ nāmāti manussā tikhiṇaṃ ayaṃ ayena sughaṃsitvā taṃ ayacuṇṇaṃ maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā koñcasakuṇe khādāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:2559_14: Atha tesaṃ kucchiṃ phāletvā naṃ udakena dhovitvā cuṇṇaṃ gahetvā maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā puna khādāpentīti
atk-s0201a0:2559_15: evaṃ satta vāre khādāpetvā gahitena ayacuṇṇena āvudhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2559_16: Susikkhitā ca naṃ ayakārā bahuhatthakammamūlaṃ labhitvā karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2560_6: Pariyāyabhattikassāti māsavārena vā aḍḍhamāsavārena vā bhuñjantassa.
atk-s0201a0:2560_8: Imasmiñhi sāsane cīvaradharo bhikkhu saṅghāṭikoti na vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2560_16: Saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyunti saṅghāṭikaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2561_4: Pamuditassa pītīti tuṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti jāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2561_7: Sukhaṃ vedetīti kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0201a0:2561_8: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti iminā nekkhammasukhena sukhitassa cittaṃ samādhiyati,
atk-s0201a0:2561_10: So mettāsahagatena cetasāti heṭṭhā kilesavasena āraddhā desanā pabbate vuṭṭhavuṭṭhi viya nadiṃ yathānusandhinā brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ otiṇṇā.
atk-s0201a0:2561_17: Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti sabbakilesānaṃ samitattā paramatthasamaṇo hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:2566_2: Tattha kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā.
atk-s0201a0:2566_3: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kosalāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2566_6: yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakāni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āha –
atk-s0201a0:2566_9: Tato naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāye sannipatite manussā sātirekāni sattavassāni nānākīḷikāyo dassetvā naṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2566_12: Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2566_13: Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā, “kacci, bho, kusalaṃ, kacci, bho,
atk-s0201a0:2566_15: Tasmā taṃ “kusalaṃ kusala”nti vacanaṃ upādāya so padeso kosalāti vuccatīti.
atk-s0201a0:2567_1: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vāti evaṃ aparicchinnena mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2567_2: Brāhmaṇagāmoti brāhmaṇānaṃ samosaraṇagāmopi brāhmaṇagāmoti vuccati brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmopi.
atk-s0201a0:2567_7: tasmā tassa avidūre buddhānaṃ anucchaviko eko vanasaṇḍo bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2567_13: na nesaṃ koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2568_12: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2568_15: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2568_20: Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggato. Kinti?
atk-s0201a0:2569_4: Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2569_8: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a0:2569_9: sabbāneva etāni padāni visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato tesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2570_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana;
atk-s0201a0:2570_2: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0201a0:2570_3: evarūpānaṃ anekehipi kappakoṭisatasahassehi dullabhadassanānaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhittehi asītianubyañjanaratanapaṭimaṇḍitehi
atk-s0201a0:2570_6: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi sādhu hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2570_7: Sace pana aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena brahmassarena dhammaṃ desentassa ekaṃ padampi sotuṃ labhissāma,
atk-s0201a0:2571_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti sabbakiccāni pahāya tuṭṭhamānasā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2571_1: Etadavocunti duvidhā hi pucchā agārikapucchā anagārikapucchā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2571_3: kiṃ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā. “Ime kho, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2571_5: Ime pana attano anurūpaṃ agārikapucchaṃ pucchantā etaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2571_9: Tesaṃ bhagavā yathā na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2571_12: Kasmā pana bhagavā yathā na sallakkhenti,
atk-s0201a0:2571_18: mayampi kathentā evameva katheyyāmāti vattāro bhavanti.
atk-s0201a0:2571_19: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā yathā na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2571_21: Tato sallakkhetuṃ asakkontehi vitthāradesanaṃ yācito vitthārena desetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2572_9: Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā.
atk-s0201a0:2572_13: Lohitapāṇīti paraṃ jīvitā voropentassa pāṇī lohitena lippanti.
atk-s0201a0:2572_16: Hatappahate niviṭṭhoti hate ca parassa pahāradāne,
atk-s0201a0:2573_0: Yaṃ taṃ parassāti yaṃ taṃ parassa santakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2573_1: Paravittūpakaraṇanti tasseva parassa vittūpakaraṇaṃ tuṭṭhijananaṃ parikkhārabhaṇḍakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2573_3: Araññagataṃ vāti araññe rukkhaggapabbatamatthakādīsu vā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2573_4: Adinnanti tehi parehi kāyena vā vācāya vā adinnaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2574_0: Māturakkhitātiādīsu yaṃ pitari naṭṭhe vā mate vā ghāsacchādanādīhi paṭijaggamānā,
atk-s0201a0:2574_4: Sabhāgakulāni pana kucchigatesupi gabbhesu katikaṃ karonti –
atk-s0201a0:2574_11: tassa ettako daṇḍo”ti evaṃ gāmaṃ vā gehaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā uddissa ṭhapitadaṇḍā,
atk-s0201a0:2574_14: “esā me bhariyā bhavissatī”ti saññāya tassā upari kenaci mālāguṇaṃ khipantena mālāguṇamattenāpi parikkhittā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2574_15: Tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hotīti evarūpāsu itthīsu sammādiṭṭhisutte vuttamicchācāralakkhaṇavasena vītikkamaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2575_8: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0201a0:2575_9: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lābho adhippeto.
atk-s0201a0:2575_10: Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2575_12: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2576_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2576_2: Amūsaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ amutrāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2576_4: Iti samaggānaṃ vā bhedakāti evaṃ samaggānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhedaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a0:2576_5: Bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātāti suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā,
atk-s0201a0:2576_6: taṃ pajahantena katipāheneva te mahantaṃ anatthaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ bhinnānaṃ puna asaṃsandanāya anuppadātā upatthambhetā kāraṇaṃ dassetāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2576_9: Vagge disvā vā sutvā vā nandatīti vagganandī.
atk-s0201a0:2576_10: Vaggakaraṇiṃ vācanti yā vācā samaggepi satte vagge karoti bhindati,
atk-s0201a0:2577_0: Aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a0:2577_3: Yathā nāma pūtikarukkho kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo,
atk-s0201a0:2577_8: Parābhisajjanīti kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya mammesu vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī gantukāmānampi gantuṃ adatvā lagganakārī.
atk-s0201a0:2577_10: Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa vā upacārasamādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0201a0:2578_6: Anidhānavati vācanti hadayamañjūsāyaṃ nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2578_7: Akālenāti vattabbakālassa pubbe vā pacchā vā ayuttakāle vattā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2578_10: suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tassa upalabbhaṃ vā upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti.
atk-s0201a0:2578_12: “Suttaṃ nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0201a0:2578_13: nassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā passāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2578_20: nikkhittaṃ nikkhittamattameva katvā passeneva pariharanto gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2578_21: Yo pana bahumpi bhaṇanto etadatthamidaṃ vuttanti āharitvā jānāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2579_2: Abhijjhāya olokitamattakena cettha kammapathabhedo na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2580_4: Mā vā ahesunti kiñcipi mā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2581_2: Natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2581_8: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0201a0:2581_10: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2581_11: Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2581_13: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2581_14: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā upapajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2581_15: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sayaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedenti,
atk-s0201a0:2582_1: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādayo satta kammapathā cūḷahatthipade vitthāritā.
atk-s0201a0:2583_3: Ābhānaṃ devānanti ābhā nāma visuṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2583_5: Parittābhānantiādi pana ekato aggahetvā tesaṃyeva bhedato gahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2583_7: Iti bhagavā āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2584_1: Tissannaṃ tāva jhānabhūmīnaṃ vasena nava brahmalokā,
atk-s0201a0:2584_2: pañca suddhāvāsā catūhi ārūpehi saddhiṃ navāti aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0201a0:2584_4: te asaññaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsati brahmalokā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2584_5: evaṃ chahi kāmāvacarehi saddhiṃ chabbīsati devalokā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2584_6: Tesaṃ sabbesampi bhagavatā dasakusalakammapathehi nibbatti dassitā.
atk-s0201a0:2585_0: Tattha chasu tāva kāmāvacaresu tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vipākeneva nibbatti hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2585_1: Uparidevalokānaṃ pana ime kammapathā upanissayavasena kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:2585_4: Sīle patiṭṭhāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattati;
atk-s0201a0:2585_6: rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito pañcasu suddhāvāsesu nibbattati;
atk-s0201a0:2585_7: rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā catūsu arūpesu nibbattati;
atk-s0201a0:2585_8: rūpārūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2585_9: Asaññabhavo pana bāhirakānaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ āciṇṇoti idha na niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:2589_5: Kevalañhi idha adhammacārī visamacārīti evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-s0201a0:2593_5: Duppañño duppaññoti ettha paññāya duṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2593_8: kittakena nu kho evaṃ vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2594_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2594_2: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2595_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2595_2: aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2597_2: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti? Aniccaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2597_3: bhante”ti evarūpā anumatiṃ gahetvā dhammadesanākāle pucchā anumatipucchā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2598_3: katame cattāro”ti evarūpā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sayameva pucchitvā sayameva vissajjetukāmassa pucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2599_0: Thero hi attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva pañhaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2599_1: Ekacco hi pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃyeva sakkoti na nicchetuṃ;
atk-s0201a0:2599_7: Mahāpaññaṃ nissāya hi imasmiṃ sāsane sāriputtatthero,
atk-s0201a0:2599_12: ayameva āyasmāti sambahulā therā visesaṭṭhānaṃ adhigatā.
atk-s0201a0:2599_13: Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2599_14: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya sāriputtatthero taṃ ṭhānaṃ adhigato.
atk-s0201a0:2599_19: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2600_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa
atk-s0201a0:2600_1: sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā samānetvā vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2600_2: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākaccānatthero tattha paṭibalo jāto,
atk-s0201a0:2600_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2601_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā dhammakathaṃ kathentena
atk-s0201a0:2601_1: dasa kathāvatthūni āharitvā satta visuddhiyo vibhajantena dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2601_2: mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya puṇṇatthero catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane cittabījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a0:2601_3: nisinno līḷāyanto puṇṇacando viya dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2601_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2602_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento ito vā etto vā anukkamitvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā andho viya,
atk-s0201a0:2602_1: ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ āruḷho viya ca gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2602_2: Mahāpañño pana catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2602_3: Mahāpaññatāya pana kumārakassapatthero catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā
atk-s0201a0:2602_4: tehi saddhiṃ yojento jātassare pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni phullāpento viya sinerumatthake vaṭṭisahassaṃ telapadīpaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2602_5: jālento viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2602_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ kumārakassapo”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2603_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu catūhi māsehi catuppadikampi gāthaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2603_1: Mahāpañño pana ekapade ṭhatvā padasatampi padasahassampi gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2603_2: Ānandatthero pana mahāpaññatāya ekapaduddhāre ṭhatvā sakiṃyeva sutvā puna apucchanto saṭṭhi padasahassāni
atk-s0201a0:2603_3: pannarasa gāthāsahassāni valliyā pupphāni ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhanto viya ekappahāreneva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2603_5: suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca gahitākāreneva tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2603_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0201a0:2604_0: Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā catupaṭisambhidāpabhedassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2604_1: Mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākoṭṭhitatthero adhigamaparipucchāsavanapubbayogānaṃ vasena anantanayussadaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a0:2604_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhito”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2605_0: Iti thero mahāpaññatāya pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetumpi nicchetumpīti ubhayampi sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2605_1: So divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva sabbapañhe samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2605_4: tato ayaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekamatiyā ekajjhāsayena ca ṭhapitā atigarukā bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā,
atk-s0201a0:2605_6: maggagamanatthikānaṃ sahassayuttaājaññaratho viya bahupakārā bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhasaṃsandanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2606_5: ito uddhaṃ natthīti dukkhasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2606_6: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti ito dukkhaṃ samudetīti pavattidukkhapabhāvikā taṇhā samudayasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2606_7: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti idaṃ dukkhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ca idaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhatīti ubhinnaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2606_8: appavatti nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2606_9: Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti ayaṃ paṭipadā dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchatīti maggasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānātīti.
atk-s0201a0:2606_11: Saṅkhepato panettha catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko puggalo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2607_0: Ayañhi ācariyasantike cattāri saccāni savanato uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2607_4: dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto nirodhapāpano maggo maggasaccanti evaṃ uggahetvā abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a0:2608_0: Dukkhasaccaṃ nāma rūpādayo pañcakkhandhāti vavatthapetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena otaritvā,
atk-s0201a0:2608_1: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ rūpa”nti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a0:2608_2: Tadārammaṇā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmanti evaṃ yamakatālakkhandhaṃ bhindanto viya “dveva ime dhammā nāmarūpa”nti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a0:2608_3: Taṃ panetaṃ na ahetukaṃ sahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2608_4: ko cassa paccayo avijjādayo dhammāti evaṃ paccaye ceva paccayuppannadhamme ca vavatthapetvā “sabbepi
atk-s0201a0:2608_5: dhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0201a0:2608_7: avasavattanākārena anattāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā sammasanto lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a0:2609_16: Etassa pana pariggaṇhantasseva maggo tīsu saccesu pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentova nirodhaṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-s0201a0:2610_0: Tasmā paññavāti vuccatīti ettha heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpanno,
atk-s0201a0:2610_2: Yo pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anusandhito ca pubbāparato ca uggahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto vicarati,
atk-s0201a0:2610_8: Atha yo tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā sammasanto ajja ajjeva arahattanti carati,
atk-s0201a0:2611_1: Yena viññāṇena saṅkhāre sammasitvā esa paññavā nāma jāto,
atk-s0201a0:2611_2: tassa āgamanavipassanā viññāṇaṃ kammakārakacittaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2611_5: Iminā thero “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena āgatavedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a0:2612_2: Ettha ca thero maggapaññañca vipassanāviññāṇañcāti ime dve lokiyalokuttaradhamme missetvā bhūmantaraṃ
atk-s0201a0:2612_3: bhinditvā samayaṃ ajānanto viya pucchatīti na veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2612_5: vipassanāpaññāya ca vipassanāviññāṇeneva saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pucchatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2612_6: Theropissa tamevatthaṃ vissajjento ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2612_7: Tattha na ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānanti imesaṃ lokiyamaggakkhaṇepi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi ekato uppannānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2612_8: Vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti visuṃ visuṃ katvā vinivaṭṭetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2612_9: ārammaṇato vā vatthuto vā uppādato vā nirodhato vā nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2612_10: Tesaṃ tesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ visayo nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2612_11: Lokiyadhammaṃ patvā hi cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2613_3: udāhu dutiya tatiya catuttha maggapañña”nti na evaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2613_14: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ca evaṃ cittavaseneva paññāpeti.
atk-s0201a0:2613_15: Lokuttaraṃ pucchanto pana kiṃ phasso tvaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a0:2615_0: Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa
atk-s0201a0:2615_1: seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_5: Dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_9: Atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issarova,
atk-s0201a0:2615_13: Evamevaṃ kho saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi
atk-s0201a0:2615_14: yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_16: evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2615_18: Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_20: evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2615_22: Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_24: evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2615_26: Yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_28: evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2615_30: Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2615_32: evameva ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2616_0: Iti paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ agge ṭhapito mahākoṭṭhitatthero lokiyadhammaṃ pucchanto cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi;
atk-s0201a0:2616_1: lokuttaradhammaṃ pucchanto paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2617_1: pajānātīti yaṃ catusaccadhammamidaṃ dukkhantiādinā nayena maggapaññā pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2617_2: Taṃ vijānātīti maggaviññāṇampi tatheva taṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2617_3: Yaṃ vijānātīti yaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanāviññāṇaṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2617_4: Taṃ pajānātīti vipassanāpaññāpi tatheva taṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2617_5: Tasmā ime dhammāti tena kāraṇena ime dhammā.
atk-s0201a0:2618_0: Paññā bhāvetabbāti idaṃ maggapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2618_1: Taṃsampayuttaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ tāya saddhiṃ bhāvetabbameva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2618_2: Viññāṇaṃ pariññeyyanti idaṃ vipassanāviññāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2618_3: Taṃsampayuttā pana paññā tena saddhiṃ parijānitabbāva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2619_4: Sukhampi vedetīti sukhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti anubhavati.
atk-s0201a0:2619_11: rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena,
atk-s0201a0:2619_18: saṃkilissantī”ti iminā hi mahālisuttapariyāyena idha ārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhanti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2619_19: Apica purimaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā sukhā vedanā vedeti;
atk-s0201a0:2619_20: purimaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā dukkhā vedanā vedeti;
atk-s0201a0:2619_21: purimaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2619_23: na añño koci veditā nāma atthīti vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2620_5: Nīlakampi sañjānātīti nīlapupphe vā vatthe vā parikammaṃ katvā upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā pāpento sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2620_6: Imasmiñhi atthe parikammasaññāpi upacārasaññāpi appanāsaññāpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2621_2: viññāṇanti imāni tīṇi gahetvā paññā kasmā na gahitāti?
atk-s0201a0:2621_4: Paññāya hi gahitāya paññāya sampayuttāva vedanādayo labbhanti,
atk-s0201a0:2621_6: Taṃ pana aggahetvā imesu gahitesu paññāya sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca antamaso dve pañcaviññāṇadhammāpi labbhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2621_7: Yathā hi tayo purisā suttaṃ suttanti vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2621_9: Tesu purimā tayo takkagatampi paṭṭivaṭṭakādigatampi yaṃkiñci bahuṃ suttaṃ labhanti antamaso makkaṭakasuttampi.
atk-s0201a0:2621_12: Heṭṭhato vā paññā viññāṇena saddhiṃ sampayogaṃ labhāpitā vissaṭṭhattāva idha na gahitāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2621_16: Yaṃ sañjānātīti yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ saññā sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2622_0: Idāni sañjānāti vijānāti pajānātīti ettha viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2622_5: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2622_8: ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2623_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake kahāpaṇarāsimhi kate ajātabuddhi dārako gāmikapuriso mahāheraññikoti tīsu janesu
atk-s0201a0:2623_1: oloketvā ṭhitesu ajātabuddhi dārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittacaturassamaṇḍalabhāvameva jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2623_2: idaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ratanasammatanti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2623_5: “Ayaṃ kūṭo ayaṃ cheko ayaṃ karato ayaṃ saṇho”ti pana na jānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2623_7: jānanto ca pana naṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2623_11: hatthena garukalahukabhāvaṃ upadhāretvāpi asukagāme katotipi jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2623_14: Evamevaṃ saññā ajātabuddhidārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇamattameva sañjānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2623_15: Viññāṇaṃ gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2623_17: Paññā mahāheraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2624_3: nāgasena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ katanti? Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0201a0:2624_5: imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2624_15: vasātelanti imāni pañca telāni ekacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā divasaṃ yamakamanthehi manthetvā tato idaṃ tilatelaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2624_16: idaṃ sāsapatelanti ekekassa pāṭiyekkaṃ uddharaṇaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2624_18: Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā dhammissaro dhammarājā imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2624_21: idaṃ yamunāyā”ti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ udakauddharaṇenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2625_2: Tattha nissaṭenāti atthe sati pañcahi indriyehīti nissakkavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2625_5: pañcahi indriyehi nissaritvā manodvāre pavattena pañcahi vā indriyehi tassa vatthubhāvaṃ anupagamanatāya pariccattenāti.
atk-s0201a0:2625_9: “Yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ nāma atthi dhamma”ntiādīsu hi jānitabbaṃ neyyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2625_10: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ neyyanti kathaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittena arūpāvacarasamāpatti neyyāti?
atk-s0201a0:2625_11: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne ṭhitena arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2625_16: Tattha hi kalāpato nayato sammasanaṃ labbhati,
atk-s0201a0:2625_17: dhammasenāpatisadisassāpi hi bhikkhuno pāṭiyekkaṃ abhiniveso na jāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2625_20: hutvā paṭiventī”ti kalāpato nayato sammasitvā vissajjesīti.
atk-s0201a0:2625_21: Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa hatthagatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyampi paropaññāsa dhamme pāṭiyekkaṃ aṃguddhāreneva uddharitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2626_0: Paññācakkhunā pajānātīti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūtāya paññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0201a0:2626_1: Tattha dve paññā samādhipaññā vipassanāpaññā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2626_8: Sā panesā lokiyāpi abhiññatthā ca pariññatthā ca vikkhambhanato pahānatthā.
atk-s0201a0:2626_9: Lokuttarāpi abhiññatthā ca pariññatthā ca samucchedato pahānatthā.
atk-s0201a0:2626_10: Tattha lokiyā kiccato asammohato ca pajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2627_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyāti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā ca maggasammādiṭṭhiyā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2627_4: Tattha sāvakesu api dhammasenāpatino dve paccayā laddhuṃ vaṭṭantiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2627_5: Thero hi kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvāpi attano dhammatāya aṇumattampi kilesaṃ pajahituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0201a0:2627_6: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti assajittherato imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāvassa paṭivedho jāto.
atk-s0201a0:2628_2: Phalakkhaṇe nibbattā cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti cetovimuttiphalā.
atk-s0201a0:2628_3: Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṃsā.
atk-s0201a0:2628_16: sattavidhaṃ anupassanaṃ bhāventassa arahattamaggo uppajjitvā phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2629_0: Yathā hi madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṃ thiraṃ katvā bandhati.
atk-s0201a0:2629_1: Ghaṭaṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcati.
atk-s0201a0:2629_3: Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā makkaṭakajālaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2629_5: Khaṇittiṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ mūlāni parikhaṇati.
atk-s0201a0:2629_6: Evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2629_8: Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya hi sīlaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2629_11: samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2629_12: kālena kālaṃ khaṇittiṃ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā.
atk-s0201a0:2629_13: Tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi
atk-s0201a0:2630_6: Tattha kāmabhavoti kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammābhinibbattā upādinnakkhandhāpīti ubhayamekato katvā kāmabhavoti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2630_11: Tatrātatrābhinandanāti rūpābhinandanā saddābhinandanāti evaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ abhinandanā,
atk-s0201a0:2630_17: vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2630_24: Padīpujjalanena andhakāravigamo viya vijjuppādena avijjā niruddhāva hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2630_26: Punabbhavābhinibbatti na hotīti evaṃ āyatiṃ punabbhavassa abhinibbatti na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2630_28: vaṭṭaṃ na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2631_2: Ubhatobhāgavimutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2631_5: Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā aṅgavavatthānaṃ koṭṭhāsaparicchedo nāma jānitabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2631_6: idaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikanti aṅgavavatthānaṃ koṭṭhāsaparicchedaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2631_11: avikkhepalakkhaṇā cittekaggatāti ime pañca dhammā vattanti.
atk-s0201a0:2631_13: Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā upakārānupakārāni aṅgāni jānitabbāni,
atk-s0201a0:2632_1: Idāni viññāṇanissaye pañca pasāde pucchanto pañcimāni,
atk-s0201a0:2632_4: Aññamaññassāti cakkhu sotassa sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti.
atk-s0201a0:2632_5: Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya,
atk-s0201a0:2632_8: Cakkhuviññāṇañhi vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0201a0:2632_10: vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0201a0:2632_13: yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2632_17: Evametāni aññamaññassa gocaraṃ visayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2632_21: Mano ca nesanti manodvārikajavanamano vā pañcadvārikajavanamano vā etesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti.
atk-s0201a0:2632_23: ettha rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2632_24: Etasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā dussati vā muyhati vā.
atk-s0201a0:2633_1: pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2633_2: Tesaṃ tattha macchabhāgo maṃsabhāgo yuttikahāpaṇo vā,
atk-s0201a0:2633_10: Satavatthukaṃ pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ mahābaliṃ rājāva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2633_11: Tattha pañcakulikagāmo viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā;
atk-s0201a0:2633_14: dubbalabhojakānaṃ parittakaṃ āyapāpuṇanaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpadassanādimattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2633_16: Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu dvāresu javanassa rajjanādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a0:2634_4: Kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne arūpadhammā pasādānaṃ balavapaccayā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2634_5: Yo pana taṃ pavattaṃ nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno,
atk-s0201a0:2634_6: tassa antonirodhe pañca pasādā kiṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhantīti idaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2634_8: Usmaṃ paṭiccāti jīvitindriyaṃ kammajatejaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2634_9: Yasmā pana kammajatejopi jīvitindriyena vinā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2634_14: Ābhaṃ paṭicca accīti taṃ ālokaṃ paṭicca jālasikhā paññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2635_1: āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatīti ettha jālasikhā viya kammajatejo.
atk-s0201a0:2635_3: Jālasikhā hi uppajjamānā ālokaṃ gahetvāva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2635_4: Sā tena attanā janitaālokeneva sayampi aṇu thūlā dīghā rassāti pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2635_5: Tattha jālapavattiyā janitaālokena tassāyeva jālapavattiyā pākaṭabhāvo viya usmaṃ paṭicca nibbattena
atk-s0201a0:2635_9: Iti mahābhūtāni upādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayādivasena paccayāni hontīti āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2635_10: Jīvitindriyaṃ mahābhūtāni pāletīti usmā āyuṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2636_4: Yo hi bhikkhu arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhaṃ samāpanno,
atk-s0201a0:2636_8: Yathā eko puriso jālāpavatte ukkhaṇṭhito udakena paharitvā jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhī nisīdati.
atk-s0201a0:2636_9: Yadā panassa puna jālāya attho hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2636_10: chārikaṃ apanetvā aṅgāre parivattetvā upādānaṃ datvā mukhavātaṃ vā tālavaṇṭavātaṃ vā dadāti.
atk-s0201a0:2636_13: Purisassa jālāpavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā udakappahārena jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhībhūtassa
atk-s0201a0:2636_14: nisajjā viya bhikkhuno arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2636_16: Purisassa puna jālāya atthe sati chārikāpanayanādīni viya bhikkhuno yathāparicchinnakālāpagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2636_17: Aggijālāya pavatti viya puna arūpadhammesu uppannesu rūpārūpapavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2637_2: cittanti ime tayo dhammā yadā imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ jahanti,
atk-s0201a0:2637_3: athāyaṃ acetanaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ viya pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍito setīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2638_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:2640_6: Tattha keci “nirodhasamāpannassa cittasaṅkhārāva niruddhā”ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2640_10: tasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannena dhammampi kathentena sajjhāyampi karontena nisīditabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0201a0:2640_12: tassāpi cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā”ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:2640_13: tasmā kālaṅkate mātāpitaro vā arahante vā jhāpayantena anantariyakammaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2640_14: Iti byañjane abhinivesaṃ akatvā ācariyānaṃ naye ṭhatvā attho upaparikkhitabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2641_0: Indriyāni vippasannānīti kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne bahiddhā ārammaṇesu pasāde ghaṭṭentesu indriyāni
atk-s0201a0:2641_2: vātādīhi uṭṭhitena rajena catumahāpathe ṭhapitaādāso viya.
atk-s0201a0:2641_3: Yathā pana thavikāyaṃ pakkhipitvā mañjūsādīsu ṭhapito ādāso antoyeva virocati,
atk-s0201a0:2641_4: evaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno antonirodhe pañca pasādā ativirocanti.
atk-s0201a0:2642_4: Vissajjane panassa sukhassa ca pahānāti cattāro apagamanapaccayā kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:2642_8: nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pana vipassanānissandāya phalasamāpattiyāti tameva pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2642_10: Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbanimittāpagatāya nibbānadhātuyā manasikāro.
atk-s0201a0:2643_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirodhakathā kathetabbā hoti. Sā,
atk-s0201a0:2643_1: “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi
atk-s0201a0:2643_2: vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge āgatā.
atk-s0201a0:2644_2: Nirodhato hi vuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyā ṭhiti nāma na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2644_3: ekaṃ dve cittavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
atk-s0201a0:2644_4: Ayañhi bhikkhu satta divase arūpapavattaṃ nirodhetvā nisinno nirodhavuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyaṃ na ciraṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2644_6: Tasmā sā ṭhiti nāma hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2644_9: Vissajjane panassā pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti addhānaparicchedo vutto.
atk-s0201a0:2644_11: Vissajjanepissā sabbanimittānañca manasikāroti rūpādinimittavasena bhavaṅgasahajātamanasikāro vutto.
atk-s0201a0:2645_3: Heṭṭhā kathitadhammeyeva ekato samodhānetvā pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2645_7: odātakampi sañjānātī”ti etasmiñhi ṭhāne appamāṇā cetovimutti kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:2645_11: paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā vuṭṭhānāyā”ti ettha animittā.
atk-s0201a0:2645_12: Evaṃ heṭṭhā kathitāva imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekato samodhānetvā pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2645_13: Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā etā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne niddiṭṭhāvāti vatvā aññe cattāro dhammā ekanāmakā atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2645_15: etaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā kathāpetuṃ idha pucchatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2645_17: appamāṇā cetovimuttīti ayaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇatāya appamāṇā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2646_2: Attena vāti atta bhāvaposapuggalādisaṅkhātena attena suññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2646_6: Nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā cāti byañjanampi nesaṃ nānā atthopi.
atk-s0201a0:2646_9: appamāṇā cetovimutti bhūmantarato mahaggatā eva hoti rūpāvacarā;
atk-s0201a0:2647_1: pamāṇakaraṇotiādīsu yathā pabbatapāde pūtipaṇṇarasaudakaṃ nāma hoti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ;
atk-s0201a0:2647_3: Yaṭṭhiṃ vā rajjuṃ vā gahetvā minantassa piṭṭhipādottharaṇamattampi na hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2647_5: tāva puggalaṃ sañjānituṃ na sakkā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2647_11: Iti ete “ettako aya”nti puggalassa pamāṇaṃ dassento viya uppajjantīti pamāṇakaraṇā nāma vuttā.
atk-s0201a0:2647_25: tasmā aggamakkhāyatīti vuttā. Rāgo kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2647_26: kiñcanoti rāgo uppajjitvā puggalaṃ kiñcati maddati palibundhati.
atk-s0201a0:2647_28: Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpento kiñcehi kapila,
atk-s0201a0:2647_32: Ākiñcaññā cetovimuttiyo nāma nava dhammā ākiñcaññāyatanañca maggaphalāni ca.
atk-s0201a0:2647_33: Tattha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kiñcanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assa natthīti ākiñcaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2647_34: Maggaphalāni kiñcanānaṃ maddanānaṃ palibundhanakilesānaṃ natthitāya ākiñcaññāni.
atk-s0201a0:2648_1: nimittakaraṇotiādīsu yathā nāma dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ sadisā dve vacchakā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2648_2: Yāva tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2648_4: ayaṃ asukakulassā”ti na sakkā honti jānituṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2648_5: Yadā pana tesaṃ sattisūlādīsu aññataraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2648_8: tāva na sakkā hoti jānituṃ ariyo vā puthujjano vāti.
atk-s0201a0:2648_9: Rāgo panassa uppajjamānova sarāgo nāma ayaṃ puggaloti sañjānananimittaṃ karonto viya uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2649_5: Tattha vipassanā niccanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittaṃ ugghāṭetīti animittā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2649_6: Cattāro āruppā rūpanimittassa abhāvena animittā nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2649_11: Atha kasmā suññatā cetovimutti na gahitāti? Sā,
atk-s0201a0:2649_15: Appamāṇaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ suññataṃ animittanti hi sabbānetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni.
atk-s0201a0:2649_18: aññasmiṃ ākiñcaññā aññasmiṃ suññatā aññasmiṃ animittāti iminā pariyāyena nānābyañjanā.
atk-s0201a0:2653_2: Tattha visākho upāsakoti visākhoti evaṃnāmako upāsako.
atk-s0201a0:2653_3: Yena dhammadinnāti yena dhammadinnā nāma bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a0:2653_8: So yadā bhagavā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pavattavaradhammacakko yasādayo kulaputte vinetvā uruvelaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2653_9: patvā tattha jaṭilasahassaṃ vinetvā purāṇajaṭilehi khīṇāsavabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā buddhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2653_10: dvādasanahutāya parisāya saddhiṃ āgatassa bimbisāramahārājassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a0:2653_11: Tadā raññā saddhiṃ āgatesu dvādasanahutesu ekaṃ nahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi,
atk-s0201a0:2653_12: ekādasa nahutāni sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu saddhiṃ raññā bimbisārena.
atk-s0201a0:2653_15: puna ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a0:2653_16: tato aparabhāgepi ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0201a0:2653_17: So anāgāmī hutvā gehaṃ āgacchanto yathā aññesu divasesu ito cito ca olokento sitaṃ kurumāno āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2653_18: evaṃ anāgantvā santindriyo santamānaso hutvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2654_0: Dhammadinnā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā vīthiṃ olokayamānā tassa āgamanākāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2654_1: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ kurumānā sopānasīse ṭhatvā olambanatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0201a0:2654_4: Upāsako pubbe tāya saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a0:2654_5: Taṃ divasaṃ pana taṃ anapaloketvā yogāvacarabhikkhu viya ekakova bhuñji. Sā,
atk-s0201a0:2654_8: aññaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā kappiyamañcakaṃ paññapāpetvā nipajji. Upāsikā,
atk-s0201a0:2654_11: udāhu mayheva koci doso atthī”ti balavadomanassā hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2654_12: “ekaṃ dve divase vasitakāle sakkā ñātu”nti tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2655_4: kiṃ nu te bahiddhā patthanā atthīti?
atk-s0201a0:2655_8: Evaṃ sante mayheva koci doso bhavissatīti.
atk-s0201a0:2655_10: Atha kasmā mayā saddhiṃ yathā pakatiyā ālāpasallāpamattampi na karothāti?
atk-s0201a0:2655_12: “ayaṃ lokuttaradhammo nāma garu bhāriyo na pakāsetatabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2655_14: ayaṃ hadayaṃ phāletvā ettheva kālaṃ kareyyā”ti tassānuggahatthāya kathesi –
atk-s0201a0:2655_15: “dhammadinne ahaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nāma adhigato,
atk-s0201a0:2655_16: taṃ adhigatassa evarūpā lokiyakiriyā na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a0:2655_18: tava cattālīsa koṭiyo mama cattālīsa koṭiyoti asītikoṭidhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a0:2655_19: ettha issarā hutvā mama mātiṭṭhāne vā bhaginiṭṭhāne vā ṭhatvā vasa.
atk-s0201a0:2655_24: ahaṃ taṃ bhaginiṭṭhāne vā dhituṭṭhāne vā ṭhapetvā posessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2656_3: So pana dhammo kiṃ puriseheva paṭibujjhitabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2656_4: udāhu mātugāmopi paṭivijjhituṃ sakkotī”ti visākhaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a0:2656_5: “kiṃ nu kho eso dhammo puriseheva labhitabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2656_15: manaṃ pana te ajānamāno na kathemīti tāvadeva bimbisārassa rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2657_10: Visākho dhammadinnaṃ gandhodakena nahāpetvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkārāpetvā sovaṇṇasivikāya nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0201a0:2657_11: ñātigaṇena parivārāpetvā gandhapupphādīhi pūjayamāno nagaravāsanaṃ karonto viya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2657_13: Bhikkhuniyo “ekaṃ vā dve vā dose sahituṃ vaṭṭati gahapatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2657_16: Athekā byattā therī tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā kese ohāretvā pabbājesi. Visākho,
atk-s0201a0:2658_1: Teneva palibuddhā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a0:2658_3: upajjhāyatheriyo gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0201a0:2659_0: Ito paṭṭhāya hi satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0201a0:2659_1: Tadā esā ekasmiṃ kule dāsī hutvā attano kese vikkiṇitvā sujātattherassa nāma aggasāvakassa dānaṃ datvā patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2659_9: rājagahaṃ gacchāmī”ti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ gahetvā rājagahameva agamāsi. Visākho,
atk-s0201a0:2659_16: “atha kho visākho upāsako yena dhammadinnā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2660_4: ayye”ti evaṃ pucchanaṃ nāma na paṇḍitakiccaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2660_6: pañhabyākaraṇena tassā abhiratiṃ vā anabhiratiṃ vā jānissāmīti,
atk-s0201a0:2660_10: acirapabbajitā sakāyaṃ vā parakāyaṃ vā kuto jānissāmīti vā,
atk-s0201a0:2660_11: aññattheriyo upasaṅkamitvā pucchāti vā avatvā upanikkhittaṃ sampaṭicchamānā viya,
atk-s0201a0:2660_12: ekapāsakagaṇṭhiṃ mocentī viya gahanaṭṭhāne hatthimaggaṃ nīharamānā viya khaggamukhena samuggaṃ vivaramānā
atk-s0201a0:2660_13: viya ca paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā pañhaṃ vissajjamānā,
atk-s0201a0:2660_18: Upādānakkhandhāti upādānānaṃ paccayabhūtā khandhāti evamādinā nayenettha upādānakkhandhakathā vitthāretvā kathetabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2660_19: Sā panesā visuddhimagge vitthāritā evāti tattha vittāritanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2661_0: Idaṃ pana catusaccabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā visākho theriyā abhiratabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2661_1: Yo hi buddhasāsane ukkaṇṭhito hoti anabhirato,
atk-s0201a0:2661_2: so evaṃ pucchitapucchitapañhaṃ saṇḍāsena ekekaṃ palitaṃ gaṇhanto viya,
atk-s0201a0:2661_3: sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viya vissajjetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2661_4: Yasmā pana imāni cattāri saccāni loke candimasūriyā viya buddhasāsane pākaṭāni,
atk-s0201a0:2661_5: parisamajjhe gato hi bhagavāpi mahātherāpi saccāneva pakāsenti;
atk-s0201a0:2661_6: bhikkhusaṅghopi pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya kulaputte cattāri nāma kiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2661_8: Ayañca dhammadinnā upāyakosalle ṭhitā paṇḍitā byattā nayaṃ gahetvā sutenapi kathetuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a0:2661_9: tasmā “na sakkā etissā ettāvatā saccānaṃ paṭividdhabhāvo ñātuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2661_10: saccavinibbhogapañhabyākaraṇena sakkā ñātu”nti cintetvā heṭṭhā kathitāni dve saccāni paṭinivattetvā guḷhaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2661_11: katvā gaṇṭhipañhaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchanto taññeva nu kho,
atk-s0201a0:2662_2: taññeva upādānanti upādānassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesabhāvato na taṃyeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0201a0:2662_7: parasamaye cittavippayutto anusayo viya paṇṇatti viya nibbānaṃ viya ca khandhavinimuttaṃ vā siyā,
atk-s0201a0:2662_10: Tassā byākaraṇaṃ sutvā “adhigatapatiṭṭhā aya”nti visākho niṭṭhamagamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2662_11: Na hi sakkā akhīṇāsavena asambaddhena avitthāyantena padīpasahassaṃ jālentena viya evarūpo guḷho paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a0:2662_14: “ayaṃ dhammadinnā sāsane laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā vesārajjappattā bhavamatthake ṭhitā mahākhīṇāsavā,
atk-s0201a0:2662_16: idāni pana naṃ ovattikasāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2663_5: yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpanti rūpañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2663_6: Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo,
atk-s0201a0:2663_7: yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2663_9: advayaṃ samanupassatī”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-s0201a0:2663_10: Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ attāti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2663_11: Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2663_12: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā karaṇḍāya maṇiṃ viya attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2664_1: rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2664_6: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2664_9: vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2664_10: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassati… vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0201a0:2664_11: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā,
atk-s0201a0:2664_15: Na rūpaṃ attatoti ettha rūpaṃ attāti na samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2664_18: na viññāṇasmiṃ attānanti ime pañcakkhandhe kenaci pariyāyena attato na samanupassati,
atk-s0201a0:2664_19: sabbākārena pana aniccā dukkhā anattāti samanupassati.
atk-s0201a0:2665_3: sakkāyadiṭṭhi hotī”ti evaṃ purimapañhaṃ vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2665_6: vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0201a0:2665_8: sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti pacchimaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2665_11: vaṭṭaṃ nāma na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2666_2: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ayaṃ pañho theriyā paṭipucchitvā vissajjetabbo bhaveyya – “upāsaka,
atk-s0201a0:2666_5: Sā pana attano byattatāya paṇḍiccena tassa adhippāyaṃ sallakkhesi –
atk-s0201a0:2666_6: “iminā upāsakena heṭṭhā paṭipattivasena maggo pucchito bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2666_10: Tattha saṅkhatoti cetito kappito pakappito āyūhito kato nibbattito samāpajjantena samāpajjitabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2666_13: khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahitoti ettha yasmā maggo sappadeso,
atk-s0201a0:2666_15: tasmā ayaṃ sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito.
atk-s0201a0:2666_18: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena viya niddeso kato,
atk-s0201a0:2666_20: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2666_21: Vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro hutvā sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2667_1: yathā hi “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2667_3: so tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2667_5: so ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2667_7: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyakā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
atk-s0201a0:2667_9: Hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi.
atk-s0201a0:2667_12: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2667_14: satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2668_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2668_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a0:2668_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhudaleneva parivattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2668_3: aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2668_4: Evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2668_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyā dinnameva vinicchetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2668_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā.
atk-s0201a0:2668_8: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2669_0: Idāni ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ maggasamādhiṃ sanimittaṃ saparikkhāraṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2669_2: Tassa vissajjane cattāro satipaṭṭhānā maggakkhaṇe catukiccasādhanavasena uppannā sati,
atk-s0201a0:2670_2: ‘evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī’ti hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2670_3: kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi ñāṇehi chijjantī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2670_6: “yā tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma”nti idameva suttaṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2670_16: evaṃ sante ekaṃ cittaṃ āsevamānaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2670_18: aparampi āsevamānanti evaṃ divasampi āsevanāva bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2670_21: Ekaṃ vā bhāvayamānaṃ uppannaṃ aparampi bhāvayamānaṃ aparampi bhāvayamānanti evaṃ divasampi bhāvanāva bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2670_25: aparampi bahulīkarontanti evaṃ divasampi bahulīkammameva bhavissati kuto āsevanā,
atk-s0201a0:2671_11: “mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca.
atk-s0201a0:2671_12: Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyassa santike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2671_21: gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2672_1: Kati panāyye saṅkhārāti idha kiṃ pucchati?
atk-s0201a0:2672_8: Tattha kāyapaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati karīyati nibbattīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a0:2672_10: Cittapaṭibaddhattā cittena saṅkharīyati karīyati nibbattīyatīti cittasaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a0:2672_12: Ime saṅkhārā aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā. Tathā hi,
atk-s0201a0:2672_13: kāyadvāre ādānagahaṇamuñcanacopanāni pāpetvā uppannā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā dvādasa akusalacetanāti
atk-s0201a0:2672_14: evaṃ kusalākusalā vīsati cetanāpi assāsapassāsāpi kāyasaṅkhārātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2672_15: Vacīdvāre hanusaṃcopanaṃ vacībhedaṃ pāpetvā uppannā vuttappakārāva vīsati cetanāpi vitakkavicārāpi vacīsaṅkhārotveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2672_16: Kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ apattā raho nisinnassa cintayato uppannā kusalākusalā ekūnatiṃsa cetanāpi saññā
atk-s0201a0:2672_17: ca vedanā cāti ime dve dhammāpi cittasaṅkhārotveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2672_18: Evaṃ ime saṅkhārā aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā.
atk-s0201a0:2672_19: Te pākaṭe vibhūte katvā kathāpessāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2673_0: Kasmā panāyyeti idha kāyasaṅkhārādināmassa padatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a0:2674_1: Idāni kiṃ nu kho esā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ valañjeti,
atk-s0201a0:2674_3: Ciṇṇavasī vā tattha no ciṇṇavasīti jānanatthaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a0:2674_6: Tassa vissajjane samāpajjissanti vā samāpajjāmīti vā padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2674_8: Tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi sacittakakālo kathito,
atk-s0201a0:2674_10: Pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2674_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2674_12: Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2675_0: Paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāroti sesasaṅkhārehi paṭhamaṃ dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a0:2675_1: Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a0:2675_2: Tato cittasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ cittasaṅkhāro antonirodhe nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a0:2675_3: Vuṭṭhahissanti vā vuṭṭhahāmīti vā padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2675_5: Tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi acittakakālo kathito,
atk-s0201a0:2675_7: Pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2675_8: acittako hutvā tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2675_9: Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2676_0: Idāni nirodhakathaṃ kathetuṃ vāroti nirodhakathā kathetabbā siyā,
atk-s0201a0:2676_2: “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi
atk-s0201a0:2676_3: vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā.
atk-s0201a0:2676_8: Saṅkhārānaṃ pavatte ukkaṇṭhitā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā sukhaṃ viharissāma,
atk-s0201a0:2677_0: Paṭhamaṃ uppajjati cittasaṅkhāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa hi phalasamāpatticittaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2677_3: Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasamaye kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2677_4: Kiṃ pana phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti?
atk-s0201a0:2677_8: Kiṃ vā etena phalasamāpatti paṭhamajjhānikā vā hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2677_10: santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2677_12: Sañjīvattherassa hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya kiṃsukapupphasadise vītaccitaṅgāre maddamānassa gacchato cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyi,
atk-s0201a0:2677_15: Evamevaṃ santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā hontīti bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2678_0: Tato vacīsaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakāle vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2678_3: Taṃsamuṭṭhānā pana vitakkavicārā vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkontīti kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakālenevataṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2678_6: tāya sahajātaṃ phassaṃ sandhāya suññato phassoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2678_8: Ārammaṇena pana nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññattā suññaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2678_11: Suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso suññato nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2679_0: Aparā āgamaniyakathā nāma hoti, suññatā, animittā,
atk-s0201a0:2679_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccato pariggahetvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2679_4: Yo dukkhato pariggahetvā dukkhato disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2679_6: Yo anattato pariggahetvā anattato disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2679_10: Animittaphalasamāpattisahajāte phasse phusante animitto phasso phusatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a0:2679_12: Āgamaniyena kathite pana suññato vā phasso animitto vā phasso appaṇihito vā phassoti vikappo āpajjeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2679_13: tasmā saguṇena ceva ārammaṇena ca kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2680_3: tena vaṅkaṃ viya hutvā ṭhitanti vivekapoṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2681_1: Idāni yā vedanā nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2681_4: Kāyikaṃ vātiādīsu pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2681_11: Ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhātiādīsu sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukhaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2682_0: Kiṃ anusayo anusetīti katamo anusayo anuseti.
atk-s0201a0:2682_1: Appahīnaṭṭhena sayito viya hotīti anusayapucchaṃ pucchati. Na kho,
atk-s0201a0:2682_3: sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetīti na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti.
atk-s0201a0:2682_4: Na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno,
atk-s0201a0:2682_5: na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2683_0: Rāgaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha ekeneva byākaraṇena dve pucchā vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a0:2683_1: Idha bhikkhu rāgānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2683_2: jhānavikkhambhitaṃ rāgānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a0:2683_3: So anāgāmimaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva paṭhamajjhāne nānuseti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2683_7: Iti anuttaresūti evaṃ anuttarā vimokkhāti laddhanāme arahatte.
atk-s0201a0:2683_9: Uppajjati pihāpaccayā domanassanti patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a0:2683_10: Taṃ panetaṃ na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2683_13: Tattha kiñcāpi domanassaṃ nāma ekantena akusalaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2683_14: idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2683_15: Yogino hi temāsikaṃ chamāsikaṃ vā navamāsikaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2683_16: Tesu yo taṃ taṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā antokālaparicchedeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti ghaṭento vāyamanto na sakkoti yathāparicchinnakālena pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2683_19: Thero kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. Tassa,
atk-s0201a0:2683_21: imasmiṃ vāre visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī”ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontasseva ekūnavīsativassāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0201a0:2683_22: Pavāraṇādivase āgate therassa assupātena muttadivaso nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0201a0:2684_0: Paṭighaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha domanasseneva paṭighaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a0:2684_3: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu temāsikādīsu aññataraṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0201a0:2684_8: nanu te sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ paññā sūrā hutvā vahatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2684_10: “na dāni puna imassa domanassassa uppajjituṃ dassāmī”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā antotemāse vā antochamāse
atk-s0201a0:2684_11: vā antonavamāse vā anāgāmimaggena taṃ samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a0:2685_0: Na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetīti tattha evarūpe domanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti.
atk-s0201a0:2685_3: Avijjaṃ tena pajahatīti idha bhikkhu avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a0:2685_4: jhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattamaggena samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a0:2685_5: So arahattamaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva catutthajjhāne nānuseti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2686_7: Yattakesu pana ṭhānesu avijjā tamaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a0:2686_8: tattakesu vijjā tamaṃ vinodetīti visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2686_10: āvusoti ettha ubhopete dhammā anāsavā lokuttarāti sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2686_12: āvusoti ettha anāsavaṭṭhena lokuttaraṭṭhena abyākataṭṭhena ca sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito.
atk-s0201a0:2686_13: Accayāsīti ettha pañhaṃ atikkamitvā gatosīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2686_14: Nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhānaṃ paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0201a0:2686_17: na sakkā nīlaṃ vā pītakaṃ vāti kenaci dhammena saddhiṃ paṭibhāgaṃ katvā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2686_18: Tañca tvaṃ iminā adhippāyena pucchasīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2687_0: Ettāvatā cāyaṃ upāsako yathā nāma sattame ghare salākabhattaṃ labhitvā gato bhikkhu satta gharāni atikkamma
atk-s0201a0:2687_1: aṭṭhamassa dvāre ṭhito sabbānipi satta gehāni viraddhova na aññāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2687_2: evamevaṃ appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchanto sabbāsupi sattasu sappaṭibhāgapucchāsu viraddhova hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2687_4: Nibbānaparāyananti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati,
atk-s0201a0:2688_3: Mahāpaññāti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggaṇhanasamatthāya paññāya samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a0:2688_4: Yathā taṃ dhammadinnāyāti yathā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2688_6: Ettāvatā ca pana ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto,
atk-s0201a0:2688_8: Yathā hi rājayuttehi likhitaṃ paṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañchitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2688_10: lañchitamattaṃ pana rājapaṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, tathā,
atk-s0201a0:2688_11: “ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyya”nti imāya jinavacanamuddikāya lañchitattā ayaṃ suttanto āhaccavacanena jinabhāsito nāma jāto.
atk-s0201a0:2692_4: āyūhanakkhaṇe sukhaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena sakkā pūretuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2693_1: Natthi kāmesu dosoti vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2693_2: Pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti te vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyataṃ pivitabbataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2693_13: Rukkhamūle patitamāluvābījato hi latā uppajjitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0201a0:2693_14: Sā mahāpattā ceva hoti bahupattā ca,
atk-s0201a0:2693_16: Atha taṃ rukkhaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya vinandhamānā sabbaviṭapāni sañchādetvā mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a0:2693_17: Sā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante oghanaṃ janetvā tassa rukkhassa sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ bhañjati,
atk-s0201a0:2693_19: Tato tasmiṃ rukkhe patiṭṭhitavimānaṃ bhijjati nassati.
atk-s0201a0:2694_0: Ārāmadevatāti tattha tattha pupphārāmaphalārāmesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a0:2694_2: Rukkhadevatāti abhilakkhitesu naḷerupucimandādīsu rukkhesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a0:2694_3: Osadhitiṇavanappatīsūti harītakīāmalakīādīsu osadhīsu tālanāḷikerādīsu tiṇesu vanajeṭṭhakesu ca vanappatirukkhesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a0:2694_4: Vanakammikāti vane kasanalāyanadāruāharaṇagorakkhādīsu kenacideva kammena vā vicarakamanussā.
atk-s0201a0:2694_6: Vilambinīti vātena pahatapahataṭṭhānesu keḷiṃ karontī viya vilambantī.
atk-s0201a0:2694_7: Sukho imissāti evarūpāya māluvālatāya samphassopi sukho,
atk-s0201a0:2694_11: dutiyaṃ me vimānaṃ paṭiladdhanti latāya dassanepi samphassepi somanassajātā evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2695_0: Viṭabhiṃ kareyyāti sākhānaṃ upari chattākārena tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0201a0:2695_2: Upari āruyha sakalaṃ rukkhaṃ paliveṭhetvā puna heṭṭhā bhassamānā bhūmiṃ gaṇheyyāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2695_3: Padāleyyāti evaṃ oghanaṃ katvā puna tato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhi abhiruhamānā sabbasākhā paliveṭhentī
atk-s0201a0:2695_4: matthakaṃ patvā teneva niyāmena puna orohitvā ca abhiruhitvā ca sakalarukkhaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharantī
atk-s0201a0:2695_5: sabbasākhā heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya.
atk-s0201a0:2695_9: taṃ sākhāsu bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati.
atk-s0201a0:2695_10: Rukkhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ pana yāva rukkhassa mūlamattampi tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2695_14: Devatā puttake gahetvā khāṇuke ṭhitā paridevituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0201a0:2696_2: Rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti tibbarāgajātikattā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇe nimittaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2696_4: So abhikkhaṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karonto dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0201a0:2696_9: Mohajātiko pana idha kataṃ vā katato akataṃ vā akatato na sallakkheti,
atk-s0201a0:2697_5: Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2697_9: tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a0:2697_10: adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0201a0:2697_11: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2698_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2698_4: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca,
atk-s0201a0:2698_5: paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
atk-s0201a0:2699_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2699_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca,
atk-s0201a0:2700_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2700_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
atk-s0201a0:2701_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2702_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2702_2: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti sukhasīlako ca,
atk-s0201a0:2703_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2703_2: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca,
atk-s0201a0:2704_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a0:2704_2: so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2709_5: Tatrāti tasmiṃ aniṭṭhavaḍḍhane ceva iṭṭhaparihāne ca.
atk-s0201a0:2709_9: tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0201a0:2709_10: bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā.
atk-s0201a0:2709_11: Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti.
atk-s0201a0:2709_12: Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetāti.
atk-s0201a0:2709_13: Yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassitā dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti.
atk-s0201a0:2709_14: Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0201a0:2709_16: Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2709_18: Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0201a0:2709_21: Tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2709_23: Bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatoyeva etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0201a0:2710_3: Yathā taṃ aviddasunoti yathā aviduno bālassa andhaputhujjanassa.
atk-s0201a0:2710_4: Yathā taṃ viddasunoti yathā viduno medhāvino paṇḍitassa.
atk-s0201a0:2711_3: idha pana yathādhammaraseneva satthā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2714_1: Sahāpi dukkhenāti ettha micchācāro abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya
atk-s0201a0:2714_2: cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2714_3: Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasampayuttā vā upekkhāsampayuttā vā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2714_4: Sesā pāṇātipātādayo satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2714_8: Pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassa pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ dukkhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2715_1: Sahāpi sukhenāti ettha pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādoti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2715_3: Sesā satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā hontiyeva.
