atk-s0201a0:2715_4: Sahāpi somanassenāti somanassameva cettha sukhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2715_5: Iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbasamaṅgino vā pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ sukhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2716_4: Tassa garuṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu akāmakasseva pāṇātipāte ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2716_5: pāṇātipātaviratiyā ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā sikkhāpadaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2716_6: So gaṇhantopi dukkhito domanassitova hutvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2716_7: Aparabhāge katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā rakkhituṃ asakkontopi dukkhitova hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2716_9: Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vāti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2717_1: Catutthadhammasamādāne dasasupi padesu tissopi pubbabhāgāparabhāgasanniṭṭhāpakacetanā sukhasampayuttā hontiyeva,
atk-s0201a0:2718_2: Visena saṃsaṭṭhoti halāhalavisena sampayutto missito luḷito.
atk-s0201a0:2718_3: Nacchādessatīti na ruccissati na tuṭṭhiṃ karissati.
atk-s0201a0:2719_4: Chādessatīti tañhi halāhalavisaṃ yattha yattha pakkhittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2720_4: Evaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ gahitaṃ taruṇampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva.
atk-s0201a0:2720_6: Sukhī assāti arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhī bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2721_1: Dadhi ca madhu cāti suparisuddhaṃ dadhi ca sumadhuraṃ madhu ca.
atk-s0201a0:2721_2: Ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti ekato katvā missitaṃ āluḷitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2721_3: Tassa tanti tassa taṃ catumadhurabhesajjaṃ pivato rucceyya.
atk-s0201a0:2722_8: Bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cāti saradakāle majjhanhikasamaye ādiccova obhāsaṃ muñcati tapati vijjotatīti.
atk-s0201a0:2723_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ devatānaṃ ativiya piyaṃ manāpaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2723_2: dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ kira hatthibhogajanapade saṅgaravihāro nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2723_3: Tassa bhojanasāladvāre saṅgararukkhe adhivatthā devatā rattibhāge ekassa daharassa sarabhaññavasena idaṃ suttaṃ osārentassa sutvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2723_4: Daharo kiṃ esoti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2723_12: Satthārā jetavane nisīditvā kathitadivase ca ajja ca ekabyañjanepi nānaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0201a0:2723_13: Assosi tvaṃ devate satthārā kathitadivaseti? Āma, bhante.
atk-s0201a0:2723_16: mahesakkhāsu pana devatāsu āgacchantīsu tattha okāsaṃ alabhitvā idheva ṭhatvā assosinti.
atk-s0201a0:2723_17: Ettha ṭhitāya sakkā sutthu saddo sotunti?
atk-s0201a0:2723_21: Dakkhiṇakaṇṇapasse nisīditvā kathanakālo viya, bhante, hotīti.
atk-s0201a0:2723_22: Kiṃ pana devate satthu rūpaṃ passasīti?
atk-s0201a0:2723_23: Satthā mameva oloketīti maññamānā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkomi, bhanteti.
atk-s0201a0:2723_26: Taṃ divasaṃ kiresa devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0201a0:2727_12: paṇḍito bhikkhu vīmaṃsakoti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti ettha saṅkhāravīmaṃsako āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2728_1: Dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti idha kalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2728_4: ekasmiṃ hi samaye āyasmā ānando upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvena hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2728_5: upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenāti cintetvā attano dhammatāya nicchetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, –
atk-s0201a0:2728_24: sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ evaṃ kho, ānanda,
atk-s0201a0:2728_29: Yathā sakalamevidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. Mamañhi, ānanda,
atk-s0201a0:2728_30: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2729_12: mayamettha kalyāṇamittā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2733_0: Etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, mā lokaṃ punarāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0201a0:2734_2: Idhāpi taṃ dassento bhagavā dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2734_3: Paṇḍito bhikkhu dvīsu dhammesu tathāgataṃ esatu gavesatūti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2734_8: imaṃ nissāyāhaṃ cīvarādayo paccaye labhissāmīti vā,
atk-s0201a0:2734_9: evaṃ cintetvā maṃ nissāya vasanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2734_11: “pahoti me esa satthā hutvā satthukiccaṃ sādhetu”nti,
atk-s0201a0:2735_0: Idāni te dve dhamme dassento cakkhusotaviññeyyesūti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2735_1: Tattha satthu kāyiko samācāro vīmaṃsakassa cakkhuviññeyyo dhammo nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2735_3: Idāni tesu samannesitabbākāraṃ dassento ye saṃkiliṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2735_6: Yathā pana udake calante vā pupphuḷake vā muñcante anto maccho atthīti viññāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2735_8: musāvādādīni vā bhaṇantassa kāyavacīsamācāre disvā ca sutvā ca taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti viññāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2735_11: Na te tathāgatassa saṃvijjantīti na te tathāgatassa atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2735_13: Natthitāyeva hi te na upalabbhanti na paṭicchannatāya.
atk-s0201a0:2735_14: Tathā hi bhagavā ekadivasaṃ imesu dhammesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārento āha –
atk-s0201a0:2735_18: na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2735_19: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a0:2735_21: bhagavato kiñci garahāma kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a0:2735_30: Uttaropi sudaṃ māṇavo tathāgatassa kāyavacīdvāre anārādhanīyaṃ kiñci passissāmīti satta māse anubandhitvā likkhāmattampi na addasa.
atk-s0201a0:2735_31: Manussabhūto vā esa buddhabhūtassa kāyavacīdvāre kiṃ anārādhanīyaṃ passissati?
atk-s0201a0:2735_32: Māropi devaputto bodhisattassa sato mahābhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya chabbassāni gavesamāno kiñci anārādhanīyaṃ nāddasa,
atk-s0201a0:2735_37: So chabbassāni adisvā buddhabhūtampi ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhitvā kiñci vajjaṃ apassanto gamanasamaye vanditvā –
atk-s0201a0:2740_0: Imaṃ kusalaṃ dhammanti imaṃ anavajjaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2740_1: “Ayamāyasmā satthā kiṃ nu kho dīgharattaṃ samāpanno aticirakālato paṭṭhāya iminā samannāgato,
atk-s0201a0:2740_2: udāhu ittarasamāpanno hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā divase samāpanno”ti evaṃ gavesatūti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2740_3: Ekaccena hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantena bahu micchājīvakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2740_6: So aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ vā samuddatīraṃ vā gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā āraññako viya hutvā viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2740_7: Manussā sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā tassa paṇīte paccaye denti.
atk-s0201a0:2740_11: “asukaṭṭhāne asukaṃ nāma micchājīvaṃ katvā pakkantabhikkhū”ti ñatvā na sakkā iminā saddhiṃ uposatho vā
atk-s0201a0:2740_12: pavāraṇā vā kātunti sannipatitvā dhammena samena ukkhepanīyādīsu aññataraṃ kammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a0:2740_13: Evarūpāya paṭicchannapaṭipattiyā atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā vīmaṃsāpetuṃ evamāha.
atk-s0201a0:2741_3: Yaṃ tathāgatassa etarahi sabbaññutaṃ pattassa dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2742_0: Atīte kira gandhārarājā ca vedeharājā ca dvepi sahāyakā hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā rajjāni puttānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2742_1: niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ araññagāmake piṇḍāya caranti.
atk-s0201a0:2742_3: Tato aloṇaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā ekissāya sālāya nisīditvā pivanti.
atk-s0201a0:2742_5: Ekadivasaṃ eko vedehisissa paṇṇe pakkhipitvā loṇacuṇṇaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2742_7: santike ṭhapetvā upaḍḍhaṃ attano santike ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2742_9: “mā idaṃ nassī”ti paṇṇena veṭhetvā tiṇagahane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a0:2742_10: Puna ekasmiṃ divase yāgupānakāle satiṃ katvā olokento taṃ disvā gandhārisiṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2742_13: Tasmiṃ divase paribhuttāvasesaṃ “mā nassī”ti mayā ṭhapitanti.
atk-s0201a0:2742_15: aloṇakaṃyeva yāguṃ pivitvā vedehaṃ isiṃ avoca –
atk-s0201a0:2745_2: idāni kasmā loṇacuṇṇamattasannidhikāraṇā pabbajjāya anucchavikaṃ na karothā”ti?
atk-s0201a0:2749_0: “Dhammaṃ bhaṇāmi vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati;
atk-s0201a0:2753_0: Mahatthiyampi ce vācaṃ, na taṃ bhāseyya paṇḍito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2755_0: “Kāmaṃ ruppatu vā mā vā, bhusaṃva vikirīyatu;
atk-s0201a0:2757_0: Tato vedehisi yassa sakāpi buddhi natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2757_2: so andhamahiṃso viya vane caratīti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0201a0:2758_0: “No ce assa sakā buddhi, vinayo vā susikkhito;
atk-s0201a0:2762_0: Evañca pana vatvā vedehisi ajānitvā mayā katanti gandhārisiṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0201a0:2762_1: Te ubhopi tapaṃ caritvā brahmalokaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2762_2: Evaṃ tathāgatassa bodhisattakālepi dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2763_0: Uttajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasapattoti ayamāyasmā amhākaṃ satthā bhikkhu ñattaṃ paññātabhāvaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ ajjhāpanno nu kho,
atk-s0201a0:2763_1: sayañca parivārasampattiṃ patto nu kho noti.
atk-s0201a0:2763_2: Tena cassa paññātajjhāpannabhāvena yasasannissitabhāvena ca kiṃ ekacce ādīnavā sandissanti udāhu noti evaṃ samannesantūti dasseti. Na tāva,
atk-s0201a0:2763_5: yāva bhikkhu na rājarājamahāmattādīsu abhiññātabhāvaṃ vā parivārasampattiṃ vā āpanno hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2763_6: tāva ekacce mānātimānādayo ādīnavā na saṃvijjanti upasantūpasanto viya sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya ca viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2763_7: Ariyo nu kho puthujjano nu khotipi ñātuṃ na sakkā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2764_1: bhikkhaveti yadā pana idhekacco bhikkhu ñāto hoti parivārasampanno vā,
atk-s0201a0:2764_2: tadā tiṇhena siṅgena gogaṇaṃ vijjhanto duṭṭhagoṇo viya,
atk-s0201a0:2764_3: migasaṅghaṃ abhimaddamāno dīpi viya ca aññe bhikkhū tattha tattha vijjhanto agāravo asabhāgavutti aggapādena bhūmiṃ phusanto viya carati.
atk-s0201a0:2764_4: Ekacco pana kulaputto yathā yathā ñāto hoti yasassī,
atk-s0201a0:2764_5: tathā tathā phalabhārabharito viya sāli suṭṭhutaraṃ onamati,
atk-s0201a0:2764_6: rājarājamahāmattādīsu upasaṅkamantesu akiñcanabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chinnavisāṇausabho viya,
atk-s0201a0:2764_7: caṇḍāladārako viya ca sorato nivāto nīcacitto hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ceva sadevakassa ca lokassa,
atk-s0201a0:2764_9: Evarūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ sandhāya “nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2765_9: tasmā sabbākārena nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2765_13: Cattāri hi bhayāni kilesabhayaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ upavādabhayanti.
atk-s0201a0:2765_22: “mādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ paṭicca sattā mā nassantū”ti upavādaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0201a0:2766_1: Athassa upaṭṭhākakuladvāraṃ pattassa pattaṃ gahetvā thaṇḍilapīṭhakaṃ nissāya āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2766_2: Amaccadhītāpi taṃyeva pīṭhakaṃ nissāya paratobhāge nīcataraṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2766_3: Eko nevāsiko bhikkhu pacchā piṇḍāya paviṭṭho dvāre ṭhatvāva olokento thero amaccadhītarā saddhiṃ ekamañce nisinnoti sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2766_5: antogāme pana upaṭṭhāyikāhi saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīdatī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2766_6: “kiṃ nu kho mayā duddiṭṭha”nti punappunaṃ oloketvā tathāsaññīva hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2766_7: Theropi bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2766_9: “taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ niggaṇhitvā vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmī”ti asaññatanīhārena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a0:2766_10: paribhogaghaṭato uluṅkena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsaddaṃ karonto pāde dhovi. Thero,
atk-s0201a0:2766_11: “ko nu kho ayaṃ asaññatacāriko”ti āvajjanto sabbaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a0:2766_12: “ayaṃ mayi manaṃ padosetvā apāyūpago mā ahosī”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalasamīpe pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2766_13: Nevāsiko duṭṭhākārena ghaṭikaṃ ukkhipitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto paviṭṭho theraṃ apassanto,
atk-s0201a0:2766_14: “heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho bhavissatī”ti oloketvā tatthāpi apassanto nikkhamituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2766_16: Itaro uddhaṃ olokento disvā adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto evamāha –
atk-s0201a0:2766_18: paṃsukūlika evaṃ ānubhāvasampannassa upaṭṭhāyikāya saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīditu”nti.
atk-s0201a0:2767_3: Tañceti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahānaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha ṭhitanisinnakālādīsupi catuparisamajjhe
atk-s0201a0:2767_4: alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvāpi itipi satthā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho vantakileso pahīnamalo abbhā muttapuṇṇacando
atk-s0201a0:2767_5: viya suparisuddhoti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ vīmaṃsakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pare
atk-s0201a0:2768_2: Saṅghe vā viharantoti appekadā aparicchinnagaṇanassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe viharanto.
atk-s0201a0:2768_6: temāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti evaṃ paṭisallāne ceva pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe ca ekako viharanto.
atk-s0201a0:2768_11: Gaṇamanusāsantīti gaṇabandhanena baddhā gaṇārāmā gaṇabahulikā hutvā gaṇaṃ pariharanti.
atk-s0201a0:2768_13: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā gaṇato nissaṭā visaṃsaṭṭhā vippamuttavihārinopi atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2769_0: Āmisesu sandissantīti āmisagiddhā āmisacakkhukā catupaccayaāmisatthameva āhiṇḍamānā āmisesu sandissamānakabhikkhūpi atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2769_1: Āmisena anupalittā catūhi paccayehi vinivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasadisā hutvā viharamānāpi atthi.
atk-s0201a0:2769_2: Nāyamāyasmā taṃ tena avajānātīti ayaṃ āyasmā satthā tāya tāya paṭipattiyā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ nāvajānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2769_5: Ayaṃ āmisena anupalitto paccayehi vinivattamānaso abbhā mutto candimā viyāti evamassa gehasitavasena ussādanāpi natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2769_8: ayaṃ āmisagiddho lolo āmisacakkhukoti evamassa gehasitavasena apasādanāpi natthīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2769_10: Tathāgatassa sattesu tādibhāvo kathito hoti. Ayañhi –
atk-s0201a0:2771_0: Dhanapāle rāhule ca, sabbesaṃ samako munī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a0:2772_2: “ke panāyasmato ākārā”ti pucchāyaṃ āgato gaṇṭhivīmaṃsako ca,
atk-s0201a0:2772_5: So hi pubbe parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṅgato.
atk-s0201a0:2772_6: Paro ca nāma jānitvāpi katheyya ajānitvāpi.
atk-s0201a0:2772_8: tasmā parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṃ agantvā tato uttari tathāgatova paṭipucchitabboti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2773_0: Byākaramānoti ettha yasmā tathāgatassa micchābyākaraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2773_1: tasmā sammā micchāti avatvā byākaramānotveva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2773_2: Etaṃ pathohamasmi etaṃ gocaroti esa mayhaṃ patho esa gocaroti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2773_5: svāhaṃ tassa parisuddhabhāvena vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno ñāṇamukhe etāpātho,
atk-s0201a0:2773_7: No ca tena tammayoti tenapi cāhaṃ parisuddhena sīlena na tammayo,
atk-s0201a0:2774_0: Uttaruttariṃ paṇītapaṇītanti uttaruttariṃ ceva paṇītatarañca katvā deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2774_3: kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkanti sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti evaṃ sappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā kaṇhasukkaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a0:2774_6: Abhiññāya idhekaccaṃ dhammaṃ dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti tasmiṃ desite dhamme ekaccaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2774_7: abhiññāya tena paṭivedhadhammena desanādhamme niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2774_8: Satthari pasīdatīti evaṃ dhamme niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddho so bhagavāti satthari pasīdati.
atk-s0201a0:2774_9: Tena pana bhagavatā yo dhammo akkhāto,
atk-s0201a0:2774_12: sopi suppaṭipanno vaṅkādidosarahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ dhamme saṅghepi pasīdati.
atk-s0201a0:2774_13: Tañceti taṃ evaṃ pasannaṃ tattha tattha tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentaṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2775_3: Imehi byañjanehīti imehi idha vuttehi akkharehi.
atk-s0201a0:2775_16: sotāpannassa hi vasavattimārenāpi saddhā asaṃhāriyā hoti sūrambaṭṭhassa viya.
atk-s0201a0:2776_0: So kira satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā gehaṃ āgato.
atk-s0201a0:2776_1: Atha māro dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ buddharūpaṃ māpetvā tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā –
atk-s0201a0:2776_4: “ahaṃ idāneva satthu santikā dhammaṃ sutvā āgato,
atk-s0201a0:2776_5: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā satthusaññāya vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2776_11: taṃ anupadhāretvāva sahasā mayā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2776_16: yaṃ buddhā anupadhāretvā apaccakkhaṃ katvā kiñci katheyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2776_17: addhā ayaṃ mayhaṃ vibādhanatthaṃ māro āgato”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2776_21: Kasmā āgatosīti vutte tava saddhācālanatthanti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2776_24: tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2776_25: maggena āgatā saddhā nāma silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitasineru viya acalā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2776_29: Kenaci vā lokasminti ete samaṇādayo ṭhapetvā aññenapi kenaci vā lokasmiṃ harituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0201a0:2780_3: Tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2780_5: Kusambassa nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattātipi eke.
atk-s0201a0:2781_1: Tato kotūhalako nāma daliddo chātakabhayena saputtadāro kedāraparicchinnaṃ subhikkhaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto chaḍḍetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2781_6: Atha so puriso pahūtapāyasaṃ bhuñjitvā jirāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā tattheva sunakhiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto.
atk-s0201a0:2781_9: Paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccāvasāne kukkurassa ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a0:2781_10: So paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ paṇṇasālampi gacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2782_0: So gopālake asannihite bhattavelāya sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre bhussati,
atk-s0201a0:2782_2: So paccekabuddhe mudukena cittena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2782_4: So devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulaghare nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2782_5: Taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi.
atk-s0201a0:2782_6: Atha so attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ mārāpetuṃ upakkami.
atk-s0201a0:2782_7: So puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne ekāya seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīviko
atk-s0201a0:2782_8: aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jāto.
atk-s0201a0:2782_9: Aññepi kosambiyaṃ kukkuṭaseṭṭhi pāvārikaseṭṭhīti dve seṭṭhino santi.
atk-s0201a0:2783_0: Tena ca samayena tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ seṭṭhīnaṃ kulūpakā pañcasatā isayo pabbatapāde vasiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2783_1: Te kālena kālaṃ loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2783_2: Athekasmiṃ vāre gimhasamaye manussapathaṃ āgacchantā nirudakamahākantāraṃ atikkamitvā kantārapariyosāne mahantaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a0:2783_6: sace no pānīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2783_7: Devatā isīnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmīti attano ānubhāvena viṭapantarato naṅgalasīsamattaṃ udakadhāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0201a0:2783_8: Isigaṇo rajatakkhandhasadisaṃ udakavaṭṭiṃ disvā attano bhājanehi udakaṃ gahetvā paribhogaṃ katvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a0:2783_13: Devatā isīnaṃ upasaṃkappanavasena dibbāni yāgukhajjakādīni datvā santappesi.
atk-s0201a0:2784_0: Devatā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2784_3: kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatāsī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2784_5: Upaḍḍhauposathakammaṃ nissāya hi devatāya sā sampatti laddhā.
atk-s0201a0:2785_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira gehe ayaṃ devaputto kammakāro ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2785_1: Seṭṭhissa hi gehe uposathadivasesu antamaso dāsakammakāre upādāya sabbo jano uposathiko hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2785_2: Ekadivasaṃ ayaṃ kammakāro ekakova pāto uṭṭhāya kammantaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:2785_3: Mahāseṭṭhi nivāpaṃ labhanamanusse sallakkhento etassevekassa araññaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā assa sāyamāsatthāya nivāpaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2785_4: Bhattakārikā dāsī ekasseva bhattaṃ pacitvā araññato āgatassa bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2785_6: “aññesu divasesu imasmiṃ kāle gehaṃ ekasaddaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a0:2785_14: Imasmiṃ kāle uposathaṃ samādinnassa uposathakammaṃ hoti na hotīti mahāseṭṭhiṃ puccha ammāti?
atk-s0201a0:2785_19: Kammakāro bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko hutvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nipajji.
atk-s0201a0:2785_21: So paccūsasamaye kālaṃ katvā upaḍḍhauposathakammanissandena mahāvaṭṭaniaṭaviyaṃ nigrodharukkhe devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2786_2: uppanno nu kho loke buddhoti? Āma, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2786_6: Isayo tiṭṭhatha tāva tumhe mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāmāti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nikkhamitvā anupubbena kosambinagaraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2786_10: bhante”ti nimantetvā punadivase isigaṇassa mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2786_11: Isayo bhuñjitvāva gacchāmāti āpucchiṃsu. Tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2786_12: aññasmiṃ kāle ekampi māsaṃ dvepi tayopi cattāropi māse vasitvā gacchatha.
atk-s0201a0:2786_13: Imasmiṃ pana vāre hiyyo āgantvā ajjeva gacchāmāti vadatha,
atk-s0201a0:2786_16: na kho pana sakkā jīvitantarāyo vidituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2786_17: tena mayaṃ turitā gacchāmāti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2786_22: mayaṃ puretaraṃ gamissāmāti nikkhamitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvepi divasāni avasitvā turitagamaneneva sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0201a0:2786_24: Satthu madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2787_0: Tepi tayo seṭṭhino pañcahi pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva paṭṭunnadukūlādīni ca ādāya
atk-s0201a0:2787_1: kosambito nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanasāmante khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2787_2: gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2787_4: Te balavasomanassajātā satthāraṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2787_5: Puna nimantetvā punadivaseti evaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ dānaṃ datvā,
atk-s0201a0:2787_6: “amhākaṃ janapadaṃ āgamanāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti pādamūle nipajjiṃsu. Bhagavā,
atk-s0201a0:2787_8: Ettāvatā paṭiññā dinnā nāma hotīti gahapatayo sallakkhetvā dinnā no bhagavatā paṭiññāti dasabalaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0201a0:2787_9: nikkhamitvā antarāmagge yojane yojane ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā anupubbena kosambiṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a0:2787_11: Tayopi janā attano attano ārāme mahantaṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā bhagavato vasanatthāya vihāre kārāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2787_12: Tattha kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā kārito kukkuṭārāmo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2787_13: Pāvārikaseṭṭhinā ambavane kārito pāvārikambavano nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2788_2: Hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā.
atk-s0201a0:2788_7: Te na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpenti na ca saññattiṃ upentīti te atthañca kāraṇañca dassetvā neva aññamaññaṃ jānāpenti.
atk-s0201a0:2789_0: Dve kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ āvāse vasanti vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca.
atk-s0201a0:2789_1: Tesu suttantiko bhikkhu ekadivasaṃ vaccakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami.
atk-s0201a0:2789_2: Vinayadharo pacchā paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2789_3: tayā idaṃ udakaṃ ṭhapitanti? Āma, āvusoti.
atk-s0201a0:2790_1: “ayaṃ suttantiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0201a0:2790_3: “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2790_9: “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo musāvādī”ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2791_2: Tañca kho neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena,
atk-s0201a0:2791_9: appeva nāma sadevake loke appaṭipuggalo bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2791_10: attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0201a0:2791_11: sāmaggiṃ kareyyā”ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya gantvā avoca.
atk-s0201a0:2792_2: dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0201a0:2792_3: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cha sāraṇīyā dhammā āgatāti evamidaṃ kosambiyasuttaṃ yathānusandhināva gataṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2792_4: Tattha sāraṇīyāti saritabbayuttā addhāne atikkantepi na pamussitabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2792_17: Bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2792_18: Gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū
atk-s0201a0:2792_19: disvā paccuggamanaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2793_1: kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ dhammadesanā tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2793_15: paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”tiādikathanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2794_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane nisīditvā,
atk-s0201a0:2794_2: averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2794_4: averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_0: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2795_1: Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_2: Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanavandanabījanadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_3: Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_4: Devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_7: amhākaṃ tissatthero kadā nu kho āgamissatīti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_8: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā suppasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2795_10: tissatthero arogo hotu appābādhoti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2796_1: Dhammikāti kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā dhammena samena bhikkhācariyavattena uppannā.
atk-s0201a0:2796_2: Antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampīti pacchimakoṭiyā patte pariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvattikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi.
atk-s0201a0:2796_3: Appaṭivibhattabhogīti ettha dve paṭivibhattāni nāma āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ puggalapaṭivibhattañca. Tattha,
atk-s0201a0:2796_5: ettakaṃ na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2796_7: asukassa na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2797_0: Sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogīti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2797_2: taṃ taṃ neva lābhena lābhaṃ jigīsanāmukhena gihīnaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a0:2797_4: paṭiggaṇhantova saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti gahetvā gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati.
atk-s0201a0:2797_8: Na hi tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a0:2798_1: yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti,
atk-s0201a0:2798_6: tena pana odissakaṃ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākaāgantukagamikānañceva navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2798_7: Etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a0:2798_9: Avasiṭṭhe asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2799_0: Ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2799_2: Susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati,
atk-s0201a0:2799_6: Ayañca pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūrati,
atk-s0201a0:2799_8: Sace hi dvādasamepi vasse sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nahāyituṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2799_11: “āharatha na”nti sabbaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvā bhuñjitvā ca rittapattaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a0:2799_17: Sakiṃ khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. Yo pana,
atk-s0201a0:2799_20: yassa me pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī”ti somanassaṃ janeti,
atk-s0201a0:2800_6: bhaye vā chātake vā sampatte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2801_1: leṇagirivāsī tissatthero kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a0:2801_2: Paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2801_15: Dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā theraṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2801_16: So taṃ ādāya therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2801_21: kiṃ nu kho”ti sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0201a0:2801_24: nikkukkuccā gaṇhatha bhante”tiādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0201a0:2802_0: Atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu – “kadā, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2802_5: Etampi me, bhante, natthīti. Nanu, āvuso,
atk-s0201a0:2802_8: tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2802_13: Idaṃ tāva pattagataṃ na khīyatīti ettha vatthu.
atk-s0201a0:2803_0: Ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a0:2803_9: Tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ nārohanti,
atk-s0201a0:2803_12: So tassa hatthe ṭhapetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā daharassa santike nisīditvā, “kadā, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2803_19: tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0201a0:2803_22: Idaṃ bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti ettha vatthu.
atk-s0201a0:2804_0: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2804_4: Tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. Sā sutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2804_6: attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ karothā”ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāya pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2804_7: Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, “ayye,
atk-s0201a0:2804_10: Theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā nāgatthero nāma atthi. So,
atk-s0201a0:2804_13: paratīraṃ gamissāmāti attadvādasamova attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā gamissāmī”ti bhātaragāmaṃ āgato. Therī,
atk-s0201a0:2804_17: “ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreyeva vasitvā sveva gamissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2805_0: Therī punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a0:2805_3: Dhammiko tātā piṇḍapāto kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti.
atk-s0201a0:2805_8: therīti vatvā bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2805_10: ‘bho piṇḍapātika bhikkhunībhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā’ti cittena anuvadiyamāno santhambhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2806_4: nivattessāmī”ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa gamanaṃ disvā rukkhā oruyha pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a0:2806_5: dethāti pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva ānetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa bhikkhuniyo,
atk-s0201a0:2806_6: dvādasa ca bhikkhū satta vassāni upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0201a0:2806_7: Idaṃ devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti ettha vatthu,
atk-s0201a0:2807_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2807_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2807_3: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2807_4: Yassa pana paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni,
atk-s0201a0:2807_5: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2807_7: tassa antarantarā visabhāgabinducitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2807_9: tassa tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma honti.
atk-s0201a0:2807_10: Tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato bhujissāni.
atk-s0201a0:2807_13: “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpannapubbo”ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca aparāmaṭṭhāni.
atk-s0201a0:2807_14: Upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikānīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2807_15: Sīlasāmaññagato viharatīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo viharati.
atk-s0201a0:2807_16: Sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ sīlena samānameva hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2808_10: Yadidaṃ kūṭanti yametaṃ kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2808_12: Yasmiṃ patite mattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe patanti.
atk-s0201a0:2808_15: evaṃ imesampi sāraṇīyadhammānaṃ yā ayaṃ ariyā diṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a0:2808_16: sā aggā ca saṅgāhikā ca saṅghāṭaniyā cāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a0:2809_4: yāyaṃ sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti vuttā,
atk-s0201a0:2809_5: sā kathaṃ kena kāraṇena niyyātīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2809_6: Pariyuṭṭhitacittova hotīti ettāvatāpi pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2809_8: Suppaṇihitaṃ me mānasanti mayhaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2809_10: Ariyantiādīsu taṃ ñāṇaṃ yasmā ariyānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2809_17: Puthujjanānaṃ pana abhāvato asādhāraṇaṃ puthujjanehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2810_1: Labhāmi paccattaṃ samathanti attano citte samathaṃ labhāmīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2812_3: Vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatīti saṅghakammavasena vā desanāya vā vuṭṭhānaṃ dissati.
atk-s0201a0:2812_4: Ariyasāvako hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto garukāpattīsu kuṭikārasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2812_14: dakkhiṇena vā vāmena vā passena sayituṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2812_15: Aṅgāraṃ akkamitvāti ito cito ca pasāritena hatthena vā pādena vā phusitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2812_16: Evaṃ phusantānaṃ pana manussānaṃ na sīghaṃ hattho jhāyati,
atk-s0201a0:2812_17: tathā hi ekacce hatthena aṅgāraṃ gahetvā parivattamānā dūrampi gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2812_19: so phuṭṭhamatteneva dayhamāno cirīti saddaṃ karonto khippaṃ paṭisaṃharati,
atk-s0201a0:2812_24: Desetīti āpattipaṭiggāhake sabhāgapuggale sati ekaṃ divasaṃ vā rattiṃ vā anadhivāsetvā rattiṃ caturaṅgepi
atk-s0201a0:2813_2: Kiṃ karaṇīyānīti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
atk-s0201a0:2813_3: Tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu kattabbakammanti evamādi.
atk-s0201a0:2813_5: atha vā cetiye sudhākammādi uccakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2813_7: Ussukkaṃ āpanno hotīti ussukkabhāvaṃ kattabbataṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2813_11: Taruṇavacchā hi gāvī araññe ekato āgataṃ vacchakaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipannaṃ pahāya dūraṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0201a0:2813_12: vacchakassa āsannaṭṭhāne caramānā tiṇaṃ ālumpitvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā ekantaṃ vacchakameva ca viloketi,
atk-s0201a0:2813_13: evameva sotāpanno uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni karonto tanninno hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2814_1: mahācetiye kira sudhākamme kariyamāne eko ariyasāvako ekena hatthena sudhābhājanaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2814_2: ekena kucchaṃ gahetvā sudhākammaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho.
atk-s0201a0:2814_3: Eko kāyadaḷhibahulo bhikkhu gantvā therassa santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2814_4: Thero aññasmiṃ sati papañco hotīti tasmā ṭhānā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a0:2814_6: Thero puna aññaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ katipayaṭṭhāne āgataṃ, –
atk-s0201a0:2814_7: “sappurisa mahantaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ kiṃ aññasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ na labhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a0:2815_5: Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti appamattakampi vikkhepaṃ akaronto sakalacittena samannāharitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2815_8: dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā niddāyamānā vā yena kenaci saddhiṃ sallapamānā vā vikkhittacittā vā na nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a0:2815_9: atha kho amataṃ paribhuñjantā viya atittāva honti dhammassavane,
atk-s0201a0:2816_1: Dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hotīti sabhāvo suṭṭhu samannesito hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2816_4: Evaṃ sattaṅgasamannāgatoti evaṃ imehi sattahi mahāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a0:2817_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana ekacittakkhaṇiko nāma maggo natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2817_1: “evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā honti.
atk-s0201a0:2817_2: Kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi ñāṇehi chijjantīti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2817_7: idamassa sattamaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hotī”ti imameva āharitvā dassessati.
atk-s0201a0:2817_8: Tato vattabbo kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītatthanti.
atk-s0201a0:2817_13: “dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyāti ettha ko attho”ti?
atk-s0201a0:2817_22: ariyasāvako sotāpattiphalasamannāgato hotīti idha maggaṃ abhāvetvā maṇḍūko viya uppatitvā ariyasāvako phalameva gaṇhissati.
atk-s0201a0:2817_23: Mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca.
atk-s0201a0:2817_24: Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyasantike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2817_30: “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2821_3: Idaṃ niccanti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ “nicca”nti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2821_9: Idañhi na jāyatītiādīsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā natthīti sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2821_10: Ito ca panaññanti ito saha kāyakā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti evamassa thāmagatā sassatadiṭṭhi uppannā hoti.
atk-s0201a0:2821_11: Evaṃvādī pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0201a0:2821_12: Avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto.
atk-s0201a0:2822_2: māro pāpimāti māro kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa?
atk-s0201a0:2822_3: So kira attano bhavane nisīditvā kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ āvajjeti –
atk-s0201a0:2822_4: “ajja samaṇo gotamo katarasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā vasatī”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2822_7: “kattha nu kho gato”ti olokento brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2822_9: yāva tattha dhammakathaṃ kathetvā brahmagaṇaṃ mama visayā nātikkameti,
atk-s0201a0:2822_10: tāva gantvā dhammadesanāyaṃ vichandaṃ karissāmī”ti satthu padānupadiko gantvā brahmagaṇassa antare adissamānena kāyena aṭṭhāsi. So,
atk-s0201a0:2822_11: “satthārā bakabrahmā apasādito”ti ñatvā brahmuno upatthambho hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2823_0: Brahmapārisajjaṃ anvāvisitvāti ekassa brahmapārisajjassa sarīraṃ pavisitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2823_1: Mahābrahmānaṃ pana brahmapurohitānaṃ vā anvāvisituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2823_10: Kattā nimmātāti lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca,
atk-s0201a0:2824_0: Seṭṭho sajitāti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2824_8: goṇo hohī”ti evaṃ sattānaṃ visajjetā ayanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2824_9: Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti ayaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya vasī,
atk-s0201a0:2824_11: Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2825_5: Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu nibbattā.
atk-s0201a0:2825_8: “niccā dhuvā sassatā acchejjā abhejjā akkhayā”ti evaṃ pathavīpasaṃsakā pathaviyā vaṇṇavādino ahesunti vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2825_12: Taṃ tāhanti tena kāraṇena taṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2825_17: Daṇḍena paṭippaṇāmeyyāti catuhatthena muggaradaṇḍena pothetvā palāpeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2825_19: Virādheyyāti hatthena gahaṇayutte vā pādena patiṭṭhānayutte vā ṭhāne gahaṇapatiṭṭhānāni kātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a0:2825_20: Nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasīti bhikkhu nanu tvaṃ imaṃ brahmaparisaṃ sannipatitaṃ obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2825_21: jotayamānaṃ passasīti brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a0:2825_26: māro pāpimā nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasi brahmaparisaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2825_27: yadi tvampi mahābrahmuno vacanaṃ anatikkamitvā yadeva te brahmā vadati,
atk-s0201a0:2825_29: tvampi evamevaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca viroceyyāsīti evaṃ vadanto maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesi upasaṃhari.
atk-s0201a0:2825_30: Mā tvaṃ maññitthoti mā tvaṃ maññi.
atk-s0201a0:2825_31: Māro tvamasi pāpimāti pāpima tvaṃ mahājanassa māraṇato māro nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2825_32: pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mahājanassa ayasaṃ karaṇato pāpimā nāmāti jānāmi.
atk-s0201a0:2826_2: Te kho evaṃ jāneyyunti te evaṃ mahantena tapokammena samannāgatā,
atk-s0201a0:2826_5: yassa te ajjāpi mukhe khīragandho vāyatīti ghaṭṭento vadati.
atk-s0201a0:2826_6: Pathaviṃ ajjhosissasīti pathaviṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gaṇhissasi.
atk-s0201a0:2826_7: Opasāyiko me bhavissasīti mayhaṃ samīpasayo bhavissasi,
atk-s0201a0:2826_13: Yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāhiteyyoti mayā attano ruciyā yaṃ icchāmi,
atk-s0201a0:2826_15: bāhitvā ca pana jajjharikāgumbatopi nīcataro lakuṇḍaṭakataro kātabbo bhavissasīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2827_0: Iminā esa bhagavantaṃ upalāpeti vā apasādeti vā.
atk-s0201a0:2827_1: Upalāpeti nāma sace kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a0:2827_8: ahaṃ taṃ sesajanaṃ paṭibāhitvā vissāsikaṃ abbhantarikaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ tāva upalāpeti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2827_13: mama gamanādīni āgametvā gamissasi vā ṭhassasi vā nisīdissasi vā nipajjissasi vā,
atk-s0201a0:2827_15: ahaṃ pana taṃ yathākāmaṃ karissāmi bāhitvā ca jajjharikāgumbatopi lakuṇḍakataranti evaṃ apasādeti nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2828_0: Apica te ahaṃ brahmeti idāni bhagavā,
atk-s0201a0:2828_2: attano yasena sammatto sarīraṃ phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati,
atk-s0201a0:2828_3: thokaṃ niggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2829_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā vicaranti.
atk-s0201a0:2829_1: Disā bhanti virocanāti disāsu virocamānā obhāsanti,
atk-s0201a0:2829_3: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakena pamāṇena sahassadhā loko,
atk-s0201a0:2829_5: Ettha te vattate vasoti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse tuyhaṃ vaso vattati.
atk-s0201a0:2829_6: Paroparañca jānāsīti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paropare uccanīce hīnappaṇīte satte jānāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2829_9: “ayaṃ pana sarāgo ayaṃ vītarāgo”ti evaṃ rāgavirāginampi janaṃ jānāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2829_12: Sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gatinti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paṭisandhivasena sattānaṃ āgatiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2829_16: aññesaṃ pana tayā uttari dvisahassānaṃ tisahassānaṃ catusahassānaṃ pañcasahassānaṃ dasasahassānaṃ satasahassānañca brahmānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2829_17: catuhatthāya pilotikāya paṭappamāṇaṃ kātuṃ vāyamanto viya mahantosmīti saññaṃ karosīti niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2830_2: Tena taṃ tvaṃ na jānāsīti tena kāraṇena taṃ kāyaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2830_3: Neva te samasamoti jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpi tayā samasamo na homi.
atk-s0201a0:2830_5: Kuto nīceyyanti tayā nīcatarabhāvo pana mayhaṃ kuto.
atk-s0201a0:2831_0: Heṭṭhūpapattiko kiresa brahmā anuppanne buddhuppāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo
atk-s0201a0:2831_1: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vehapphalabrahmaloke pañcakappasatikaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2831_3: Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā heṭṭūpapattikaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhabrahmaloke catusaṭṭhikappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2831_4: Tattha dutiyajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassaresu aṭṭhakappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a0:2831_5: Tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyuko hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0201a0:2831_6: so paṭhamakāle attanā katakammañca nibbattaṭṭhānañca aññāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2831_7: kāle pana gacchante ubhayaṃ pamussitvā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0201a0:2832_1: “samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ āyuñca nibbattaṭṭhānañca pubbekatakammañca jānāti,
atk-s0201a0:2832_2: handa naṃ pubbe katakammaṃ pucchāmī”ti satthāraṃ attano pubbekatakammaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a0:2833_0: Pubbe kiresa kulaghare nibbattitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2833_1: “jātijarābyādhimaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a0:2833_2: abhiññāpādakajjhānalābhī hutvā gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti.
atk-s0201a0:2833_3: Tadā ca kālena kālaṃ satthavāhā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi marukantāraṃ paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0201a0:2833_4: Marukantāre pana divā na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2833_6: Atha purimasakaṭassa aggayuge yuttabalibaddā gacchantā nivattitvā āgatamaggābhimukhāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2833_7: Itarasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā aruṇe uggate nivattitabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2833_10: “natthi dāni amhākaṃ jīvita”nti cintetvā goṇe cakkesu bandhitvā manussā sakaṭapacchāyāyaṃ pavisitvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2833_11: Tāpasopi kālasseva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisinno gaṅgaṃ olokayamāno addasa gaṅgaṃ mahatā
atk-s0201a0:2833_14: “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ loke evarūpassa madhurodakassa alābhena kilissamānā sattā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2833_15: So evaṃ āvajjanto marukantāre taṃ satthaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2833_17: “ito mahā udakakkhandho chijjitvā marukantāre satthābhimukho gacchatū”ti abhiññācittena adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2833_18: Sahacittuppādena mātikāruḷhaṃ viya udakaṃ tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2833_19: Manussā udakasaddena vuṭṭhāya udakaṃ disvā hatthatuṭṭhā nhāyitvā pivitvā goṇepi pāyetvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2839_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye tāpaso gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā āraññakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a0:2839_1: Tena ca samayena corā taṃ gāmaṃ paharitvā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā gāviyo ca karamare ca gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2839_3: Tāpaso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjanto,
atk-s0201a0:2839_5: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena corānaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2845_0: Puna ekasmiṃ samaye uparigaṅgāvāsikaṃ kulaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāvāsikena kulena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2845_1: bandhitvā bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyañceva gandhamālādīni ca āropetvā gaṅgāsotena āgacchati.
atk-s0201a0:2845_2: Manussā khādamānā bhuñjamānā naccantā gāyantā devavimānena gacchantā viya balavasomanassā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2845_5: idāni ne samuddameva pāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā uṭṭhāya phaṇaṃ katvā sussūkāraṃ karonto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2845_10: kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjanto nāgarājaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a0:2845_11: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā nāgarājassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2845_12: Nāgarājā bhīto phaṇaṃ saṃharitvā udakaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0201a0:2852_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye esa isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kesavo nāma tāpaso ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2852_1: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto kappo nāma māṇavo kesavassa baddhacaro antevāsiko hutvā ācariyassa kiṃkārapaṭissāvī
atk-s0201a0:2858_0: Evaṃ brahmuno nānattabhāvesu katakammaṃ satthā pakāsesi.
atk-s0201a0:2858_2: dīpasahasse ujjalite rūpāni viya sabbakammānissa pākaṭāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2863_0: Athassa bhagavā uttari asamasamataṃ pakāsento pathaviṃ kho ahaṃ brahmetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2863_1: Tattha pathaviyā pathavattena ananubhūtanti pathaviyā pathavisabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ appattaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2863_3: Tañhi sabbasmā saṅkhatā nissaṭattā pathavisabhāvena appattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a0:2863_5: Pathaviṃ nāpahosinti pathaviṃ taṇhādiṭṭhimānagāhehi na gaṇhiṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2864_1: sabbassa sabbattenāti idameva brahmā attano vāditāya sabbanti akkharaṃ niddisitvā akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhanto āha.
atk-s0201a0:2864_8: Mā heva te rittakameva ahosi tucchakameva ahosīti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ rittakaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a0:2864_9: tucchakaṃ mā hotūti satthāraṃ musāvādena niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a0:2865_0: Satthā pana etasmā brahmunā sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena vādītaro,
atk-s0201a0:2865_3: suṇāhi meti tassa vādamaddanatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharanto viññāṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a0:2865_5: Anidassananti cakkhuviññāṇassa āpāthaṃ anupagamanato anidassanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a0:2867_0: Bhūte antāni dissanti, bhūte antā pakāsitā”ti.
atk-s0201a0:2868_1: Nibbānato hi añño dhammo sapabhataro vā jotivantataro vā parisuddhataro vā paṇḍarataro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a0:2868_4: Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāya nāma nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2868_7: Nibbānassa kira yathā mahāsamuddassa yato yato otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2868_10: Evamevaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu yena yena mukhena nibbānaṃ otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a0:2868_14: Taṃ pathaviyā pathavattenāti taṃ nibbānaṃ pathaviyā pathavīsabhāvena tato paresaṃ āpādīnaṃ āpādisabhāvena ca ananubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2868_15: Iti yaṃ tumhādisānaṃ visayabhūtaṃ sabbatebhūmakadhammajātaṃ tassa sabbattena taṃ viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2869_0: Tato brahmā gahitagahitaṃ satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ adisvā laḷitakaṃ kātukāmo handa carahi te, mārisa,
atk-s0201a0:2869_3: Sace visahasīti yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2869_6: Nevassu me sakkoti antaradhāyitunti mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ neva sakkoti.
atk-s0201a0:2869_12: Satthā tassa mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2869_13: Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ vā agantvāpi yena tamena attānaṃ antaradhāpetvā adissamānako bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a0:2869_23: brahme tvaṃ antarahitomhī”ti saññaṃ uppādesi nāmāti.
atk-s0201a0:2870_5: antaradhāyāmī”ti evaṃ vutte taṃ antaradhāyituṃ asakkontaṃ disvā ahaṃ etadavocaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2870_7: Samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā kathaṃ sakkā jānitunti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa
atk-s0201a0:2871_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyeva.
atk-s0201a0:2871_1: Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavāditividhampi sattabhavaṃ vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānaṃ pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhaveyeva disvā.
atk-s0201a0:2871_2: Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2871_4: Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagañchiṃ,
atk-s0201a0:2871_6: Iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a0:2871_7: Desanāpariyosāne desanānusārena vipassanāgabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalāmatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2872_0: Acchariyabbhutacittajātāti acchariyajātā abbhutajātā tuṭṭhijātā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2872_1: Samūlaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahīti bodhimaṇḍe attano tāya tāya desanāya aññesampi bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ samūlakaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahi,
atk-s0201a0:2873_1: Tasmiṃ pana samaye māro pāpimā kodhābhibhūto hutvā,
atk-s0201a0:2873_2: “mayi vicaranteyeva samaṇena gotamena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni mama vasaṃ ativattitānī”ti
atk-s0201a0:2873_6: Tattha sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti sace tvaṃ evaṃ attanāva cattāri saccāni anubuddho.
atk-s0201a0:2873_7: Mā sāvake upanesīti gihisāvake vā pabbajitasāvake vā taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasi.
atk-s0201a0:2873_8: Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a0:2873_12: Anuppanne hi buddhuppāde kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kassaci kiñci avicāretvā ekacarā hutvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmaloke uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2873_14: Anakkhātaṃ kusalañhi mārisāti paresaṃ anakkhātaṃ anovadanaṃ dhammakathāya akathanaṃ kusalaṃ etaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0201a0:2873_21: Brahmuno ca abhinimantanatāyāti bakabrahmuno ca idañhi, mārisa,
atk-s0201a0:2873_22: niccantiādinā nayena saha kāyakena brahmaṭṭhānena nimantanavacanena.
atk-s0201a0:2873_24: Imassa veyyākaraṇassa brahmanimantanikaṃtveva adhivacanaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti jātā.
atk-s0201a0:2877_2: Tattha koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhoti kucchiṃ pavisitvā antānaṃ anto anupaviṭṭho,
atk-s0201a0:2877_4: Garugaro viyāti garukagaruko viya thaddho pāsāṇapuñjasadiso.
atk-s0201a0:2877_5: Māsācitaṃ maññeti māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viya māsapūritapasibbako viya tintamāso viya cāti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2877_6: Vihāraṃ pavisitvāti sace āhāradosena esa garubhāvo,
atk-s0201a0:2877_7: abbhokāse caṅkamituṃ na sappāyanti caṅkamā orohitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā pakatipaññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0201a0:2877_9: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjamāno attanoyeva upāyena manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2877_10: Sace pana thero attano sīlaṃ āvajjetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2877_11: “yaṃ hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā paribhuttaṃ avipakkamatthi,
atk-s0201a0:2877_13: sabbaṃ jīratu phāsukaṃ hotū”ti hatthena kucchiṃ parāmasissa,
atk-s0201a0:2877_15: Thero pana tathā akatvā yoniso manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a0:2877_16: Mā tathāgataṃ vihesesīti yathā hi puttesu vihesitesu mātāpitaro vihesitāva honti,
atk-s0201a0:2877_19: evaṃ tathāgatasāvake vihesite tathāgato vihesitova hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a0:2878_2: mukhena uggantvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā bahipaṇṇasālāya kavāṭaṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2879_1: Bhūtapubbāhaṃ pāpimāti kasmā idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi?
atk-s0201a0:2879_3: “ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānaṃ tāva manussagandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ ābādhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a0:2879_6: Ayaṃ pana māro nāgariko paricokkho mahesakkho ānubhāvasampanno devarājā samāno mama kucchiyaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a0:2879_7: antānaṃ anto pakkāsayokāse nisinno ativiya paduṭṭho bhavissati.
atk-s0201a0:2879_8: Evarūpaṃ nāma jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ okāsaṃ pavisitvā nisīdituṃ sakkontassa kimaññaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a0:2879_10: tvaṃ mama ñātikoti pana vutte mudubhāvaṃ anāpajjamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2879_11: handassa ñātikoṭiṃ paṭivijjhitvā mudukeneva naṃ upāyena vissajjessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanamārabhi.
atk-s0201a0:2880_0: So me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosīti so tvaṃ tasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hosi.
atk-s0201a0:2880_2: Devalokasmiṃ pana mārassa pitu vaṃso pitāmahassa vaṃso rajjaṃ karonto nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a0:2880_5: Añño eko attanā katena kammena tasmiṃ ṭhāne adhipati hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0201a0:2880_6: Iti ayaṃ māropi tadā tato cavitvā puna kusalaṃ katvā imasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ adhipatiṭṭhāne nibbattoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2881_6: Aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsūti ettakena sarīraṃ pariyādānaṃ gamissatīti citakassa pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā catūsu disāsu aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2881_8: therassa udakaleṇaṃ pavisitvā nisinnakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a0:2881_9: Cīvarāni papphoṭetvāti samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vigatadhūme kiṃsukavaṇṇe aṅgāre maddamāno cīvarāni vidhunitvā.
atk-s0201a0:2882_6: Yathā taṃ dūsī māroti yathā etesaṃ dūsī māro.
atk-s0201a0:2882_9: Muṇḍakātiādīsu muṇḍe muṇḍāti samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0201a0:2882_10: ime pana hīḷentā muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2883_0: Jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmāti jhāyino mayaṃ jhāyino mayanti.
atk-s0201a0:2883_4: Mūsikaṃ maggayamānoti sāyaṃ gocaratthāya susirarukkhato nikkhantaṃ rukkhasākhāya mūsikaṃ pariyesanto.
atk-s0201a0:2883_5: So kira upasantūpasanto viya niccalova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a0:2883_9: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi ca samale ca saṅkaṭire ca.
atk-s0201a0:2883_14: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi vā samale vā saṅkaṭire vā.
atk-s0201a0:2883_15: Sopi hi baddhagatto viya niccalo jhāyati.
atk-s0201a0:2884_0: Nirayaṃ upapajjantīti sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā evaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a0:2884_3: Sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā visabhāgavatthuṃ vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:2884_4: tadā kira so bhikkhū khippaṃ gahetvā macche ajjhottharante viya,
atk-s0201a0:2884_7: sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññe migavaṃ carante viya,
atk-s0201a0:2884_13: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ passitvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a0:2884_17: Evaṃ te manussā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sīlavante akkosantā apuññaṃ pasavitvā apāyapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2885_2: Pharitvā vihariṃsūti na kevalaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2885_3: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato ovāde ṭhatvā ime cattāro brahmavihāre nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0201a0:2886_1: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti paṭisandhivasena āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a0:2886_3: Siyā cittassa aññathattanti somanassavasena aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a0:2886_4: Saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantīti idhāpi purimanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a0:2886_5: Yathā hi pubbe vippaṭisārakaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a0:2886_7: So kira tadā manussānaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū ākāse gacchante viya,
atk-s0201a0:2886_11: ākāse cīvaraṃ pasāretvā kāyaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpente viya,
atk-s0201a0:2886_13: taruṇasāmaṇere ākāse ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinante viya katvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a0:2886_14: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi pabbajitānaṃ taṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a0:2886_18: Tato manussā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkarontā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā saggapathapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2887_3: asubhānupassino kāye viharathāti bhagavā sakalajambudīpaṃ āhiṇḍanto antamaso dvinnampi tiṇṇampi bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0201a0:2888_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato methunadhammasamāpattiyā cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a0:2889_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato rasataṇhāya cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a0:2890_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lokacitresu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a0:2891_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lābhasakkārasiloke cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a0:2891_3: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhātī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā –
atk-s0201a0:2892_3: āhāre paṭikūlasaññino sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassinoti.
atk-s0201a0:2892_5: Tepi bhikkhū imesu catūsu kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sabbāsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2892_6: imānipi cattāri kammaṭṭhānāni rāgasantāni dosamohasantāni rāgapaṭighātāni dosamohapaṭighātāni cāti.
atk-s0201a0:2893_1: Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a0:2893_4: otāraṃ alabhanto idāni sahatthā upakkamitukāmo aññatarassa kumārassa sarīre adhimuccitvā evarūpaṃ pāsāṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0201a0:2894_2: Sakkharā panassa sīsakaṭāhaṃ abhinditvā aṭṭhiṃ āhacceva nivattā.
atk-s0201a0:2894_3: Nāgāpalokitaṃ apalokesīti pahārasaddaṃ sutvā yathā nāma hatthināgo ito vā etto vā apaloketukāmo gīvaṃ
atk-s0201a0:2894_6: Yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a0:2894_9: Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a0:2894_10: tasmā pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2894_11: Yathā pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati,
atk-s0201a0:2894_13: Tasmā bhagavā yantena parivattitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesi,
atk-s0201a0:2894_17: ayaṃ dūsī māro pāpaṃ karonto neva pamāṇaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0201a0:2895_0: Sahāpalokanāyāti kakusandhassa bhagavato apalokaneneva saha taṅkhaṇaññeva.
atk-s0201a0:2895_1: Tamhā ca ṭhānā cavīti tamhā ca devaṭṭhānā cuto,
atk-s0201a0:2895_3: Cavamāno hi na yattha katthaci ṭhito cavati,
atk-s0201a0:2895_5: “sahāpalokanāyā”ti ca vacanato na bhagavato apalokitattā cutoti veditabbo,
atk-s0201a0:2895_7: Uḷāre pana mahāsāvake viraddhattā kudāriyā pahaṭaṃ viyassa āyu tattheva chijjitvā gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2895_8: Tayo nāmadheyyā hontīti tīṇi nāmāni honti.
atk-s0201a0:2895_9: Chaphassāyatanikoti chasu phassāyatanesu pāṭiyekkāya vedanāya paccayo.
atk-s0201a0:2896_2: Saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyyāti ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūlaṃ hadayamajjhe samāgaccheyya.
atk-s0201a0:2896_3: Tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2896_5: Athassa hi nirayapālā tālakkhandhapamāṇāni ayasūlāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni sajotibhūtāni sayameva gahetvā punappunaṃ nivattamānā, –
atk-s0201a0:2896_6: “iminā te ṭhānena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata”nti pūvadoṇiyaṃ pūvaṃ koṭṭento viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā,
atk-s0201a0:2896_7: paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a0:2896_8: evaṃ gacchantā pañcahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a0:2897_1: Sā kira mahāniraye vedanāto dukkhatarā hoti,
atk-s0201a0:2897_3: evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato ussade vipākavuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a0:2897_5: sūlena paharantassa pahāro ṭhānaṃ na labhati parigalati,
atk-s0201a0:2898_3: Īdiso nirayo āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirayo devadūtasuttena dīpetabbo. Kaṇha-
atk-s0201a0:2898_6: Majjhe sarassāti mahāsamuddassa majjhe udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti,
atk-s0201a0:2898_8: pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikkhandho viya ca nesaṃ acciyo jotanti,
atk-s0201a0:2898_10: tesu vimānesu nīlabhedādivasena nānattavaṇṇā accharā naccanti.
atk-s0201a0:2898_11: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānavatthuṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0201a0:2898_14: Yo vejayantaṃ pāsādanti idaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2898_15: Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti idampi teneva dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2899_0: Brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke mahāmoggallānamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ tassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ.
atk-s0201a0:2899_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya devasabhāya sannipatitvā, –
atk-s0201a0:2899_2: “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko.
atk-s0201a0:2899_3: Yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentasseva brahmagaṇassa cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmagaṇassa matthake
atk-s0201a0:2899_4: nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0201a0:2899_5: Tepi gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā paccekaṃ disāsu nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0201a0:2900_3: Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca.
atk-s0201a0:2900_8: Āsaṃ mā akāsi bhikkhūsūti bhikkhū vihesemīti etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsi.
